atk-s0401a:102_16: Bhagavantaṃ pana upasaṅkamitvā te te devamanussā tathā tathā pañhaṃ pucchanti.

atk-s0401a:102_19: Yāni pana uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca kathitāni dhammadāyādasuttaputtamaṃsūpamādīni,
atk-s0401a:102_21: Evamimesu catūsu nikkhepesu imassa suttassa parajjhāsayo nikkhepo.
atk-s0401a:103_6: Samanupassāmīti dve samanupassanā ñāṇasamanupassanā ca diṭṭhisamanupassanā ca.
atk-s0401a:103_11: Imassa pana padassa nakārena sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:103_14: sabbaññutaññāṇena olokentopi aññaṃ ekarūpampi na samanupassāmīti.
atk-s0401a:103_15: Yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatīti yaṃ rūpaṃ rūpagarukassa purisassa catubhūmakakusalacittaṃ pariyādiyitvā gaṇhitvā khepetvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0401a:103_16: “Sabbaṃ hatthikāyaṃ pariyādiyitvā”tiādīsu hi gahaṇaṃ pariyādānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0401a:103_19: bhāvitā bahulīkatā sabbaṃ kāmarāgaṃ pariyādiyatī”tiādīsu khepanaṃ.
atk-s0401a:103_21: Tattha idaṃ rūpaṃ catubhūmakakusalacittaṃ gaṇhantaṃ na nīluppalakalāpaṃ puriso viya hatthena gaṇhāti,
atk-s0401a:103_22: nāpi khepayamānaṃ aggi viya uddhane udakaṃ santāpetvā khepeti.
atk-s0401a:103_23: Uppattiñcassa nivārayamānameva catubhūmakampi kusalacittaṃ gaṇhāti ceva khepeti cāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:104_9: Sītenapi ruppati uṇhenapi ruppatī”ti suttānusārena rūpassa vacanattho ceva sāmaññalakkhaṇañca veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:104_10: Ayaṃ pana rūpasaddo khandhabhavanimittapaccayasarīravaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīsu anekesu atthesu vattati.
atk-s0401a:104_11: Ayañhi “yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppanna”nti ettha rūpakkhandhe vattati.
atk-s0401a:104_13: “Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti ettha kasiṇanimitte. “Sarūpā,
atk-s0401a:104_15: uppajjanti pāpakā akusalā dhammā no arūpā”ti ettha paccaye.
atk-s0401a:104_16: “Ākāso parivārito rūpanteva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti ettha sarīre.
atk-s0401a:104_17: “Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti ettha vaṇṇe.
atk-s0401a:104_21: Idha panesa itthiyā catusamuṭṭhāne rūpāyatanasaṅkhāte vaṇṇe vattati.
atk-s0401a:104_22: Apica yo koci itthiyā nivatthanivāsanassa vā alaṅkārassa vā gandhavaṇṇakādīnaṃ vā piḷandhanamālādīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:104_23: vāti kāyappaṭibaddho ca vaṇṇo purisassa cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ hutvā upakappati,
atk-s0401a:104_27: purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatīti idaṃ purimasseva daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0401a:105_1: mahādāṭhikanāgarājā kira cetiyagirimhi ambatthale mahāthūpaṃ kārāpetvā giribhaṇḍapūjaṃ nāma katvā kālena
atk-s0401a:105_2: kālaṃ orodhagaṇaparivuto cetiyagiriṃ gantvā bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ deti.
atk-s0401a:105_3: Bahūnaṃ sannipātaṭṭhāne nāma na sabbesaṃ sati sūpaṭṭhitā hoti,
atk-s0401a:105_4: rañño ca damiḷadevī nāma mahesī paṭhamavaye ṭhitā dassanīyā pāsādikā.
atk-s0401a:105_5: Atheko cittatthero nāma vuḍḍhapabbajito asaṃvaraniyāmena olokento tassā rūpārammaṇe nimittaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0401a:105_8: Tato paṭṭhāya cassa daharasāmaṇerā ummattakacittattherotveva nāmaṃ katvā vohariṃsu.
atk-s0401a:105_10: Bhikkhusaṅghe sivathikadassanaṃ gantvā āgate daharasāmaṇerā tassa santikaṃ gantvā evamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0401a:105_13: mayaṃ tassā deviyā sivathikadassanaṃ gantvā āgatā”ti.
atk-s0401a:105_14: Evaṃ vuttepi assaddahanto “yassā vā tassā vā tumhe sivathikadassanatthāya gatā,
atk-s0401a:105_17: Evaṃ ummattakacittattherassa cittaṃ pariyādāya aṭṭhāsi idaṃ itthirūpaṃ.
atk-s0401a:106_1: saddhātissamahārājā kira ekadivasaṃ orodhagaṇaparivuto vihāraṃ āgato.
atk-s0401a:106_2: Eko daharo lohapāsādadvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā asaṃvare ṭhito ekaṃ itthiṃ olokesi.
atk-s0401a:106_4: Ubhopi abbhantare uṭṭhitena rāgagginā ḍayhitvā kālamakaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:106_5: Evaṃ itthirūpaṃ daharassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0401a:107_1: kalyāṇiyamahāvihārato kireko daharo uddesatthāya kāḷadīghavāpigāmadvāravihāraṃ gantvā niṭṭhituddesakicco
atk-s0401a:107_2: atthakāmānaṃ vacanaṃ aggahetvā “gataṭṭhāne daharasāmaṇerehi puṭṭhena gāmassa niviṭṭhākāro kathetabbo
atk-s0401a:107_3: bhavissatī”ti gāme piṇḍāya caranto visabhāgārammaṇe nimittaṃ gahetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gato tāya nivatthavatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:107_5: idaṃ laddha”nti pucchanto tassā matabhāvaṃ ñatvā “evarūpā nāma itthī maṃ nissāya matā”ti cintento antouṭṭhitena
atk-s0401a:107_7: Evampi idaṃ itthirūpaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:108_3: Apica itthiyā nivatthanivāsanassāpi alaṅkatālaṅkārassāpi itthipayoganipphādito vīṇāsaṅkhapaṇavādisaddopi itthisaddotveva veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:108_4: Sabbopi heso purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0401a:109_1: Pabbatantaraṃ kira nissāya mahantaṃ hatthināgakulaṃ vasati.
atk-s0401a:109_4: So taṃ saraṃ otiṇṇotiṇṇe saṇḍāsena viya aḷehi pāde gahetvā attano vasaṃ netvā māreti.
atk-s0401a:109_5: Tassa otārāpekkhā hatthināgā ekaṃ mahāhatthiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā vicaranti.
atk-s0401a:109_9: sabbe yathāruciyā akīḷitvā palāyissantī”ti niccalova aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:109_10: Atha sabbesaṃ uttiṇṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā tena gahitabhāvaṃ attano bhariyaṃ jānāpetuṃ viravitvā evamāha –
atk-s0401a:114_0: Sā taṃ sutvā sāmikassa gahitabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ tamhā bhayā mocetuṃ hatthinā ca kuḷīrena ca saddhiṃ sallapantī evamāha –
atk-s0401a:116_0: Pathabyā cāturantāya, suppiyo hosi me tuvaṃ.
atk-s0401a:118_0: Tesaṃ tvaṃ vārijo seṭṭho, muñca rodantiyā pati”nti. ;
atk-s0401a:119_1: Atha hatthināgo “ayamevetassa okāso”ti ekaṃ pādaṃ gahitākāreneva ṭhapetvā dutiyaṃ ukkhipitvā taṃ piṭṭhikapāle
atk-s0401a:119_2: akkamitvā vicuṇṇikaṃ katvā thokaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā tīre khipi.
atk-s0401a:119_3: Atha naṃ sabbahatthino sannipatitvā “amhākaṃ verī”ti vicuṇṇayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:119_4: Evaṃ tāva itthisaddo suvaṇṇakakkaṭakassa cittaṃ pariyādiyitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0401a:120_0: Suvaṇṇamoropi himavantaṃ anupavisitvā mahantaṃ pabbatagahanaṃ nissāya vasanto niccakālaṃ sūriyassa udayakāle
atk-s0401a:120_1: sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ ulloketvā attano rakkhaṃ karonto evaṃ vadati –
atk-s0401a:126_0: Te me namo te ca maṃ pālayantu;
atk-s0401a:131_0: So divasaṃ gocaraṃ gahetvā sāyanhasamaye vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisanto atthaṅgataṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ oloketvāpi imaṃ gāthaṃ vadati –
atk-s0401a:137_0: Te me namo te ca maṃ pālayantu;
atk-s0401a:142_0: Iminā niyāmena satta vassasatāni vītināmetvā ekadivasaṃ parittakammato puretarameva morakukkuṭikāya saddaṃ
atk-s0401a:142_1: sutvā parittakammaṃ asaritvā raññā pesitassa luddakassa vasaṃ upagato.
atk-s0401a:142_2: Evaṃ itthisaddo suvaṇṇamorassa cittaṃ pariyādiyitvā tiṭṭhatīti.
atk-s0401a:142_3: Chātapabbatavāsī daharo pana sudhāmuṇḍakavāsī daharo ca itthisaddaṃ sutvā anayabyasanaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0401a:143_9: Cakkavattino pana itthiratanassa kāyato candanagandho vāyati,
atk-s0401a:143_13: Tiracchānagatā pana hatthiassagoṇādayo tiracchānagatānaṃ sajātiitthīnaṃ utugandhena yojanadviyojanatiyojanacatuyojanampi gacchanti.
atk-s0401a:143_14: Itthikāye gandho vā hotu itthiyā nivatthanivāsanaanulittālepanapiḷandhamālādigandho vā,
atk-s0401a:144_2: Tipiṭakacūḷanāgacūḷābhayattherā pana “svāyaṃ itthiyā kiṃkārapaṭissāvitādivasena savanaraso ceva paribhogaraso ca,
atk-s0401a:144_7: Aneke hi sattā attano mātugāmena yaṃkiñci sahatthā dinnameva madhuranti gahetvā anayabyasanaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0401a:145_3: Sabbopesa purisassa cittaṃ pariyādiyati mahācetiyaṅgaṇe gaṇasajjhāyaṃ gaṇhantassa daharabhikkhuno visabhāgārammaṇaphasso viyāti.
atk-s0401a:146_0: Iti satthā sattānaṃ āsayānusayavasena rūpādīsu ekekaṃ gahetvā aññaṃ īdisaṃ na passāmīti āha.
atk-s0401a:146_1: Yathā hi rūpagarukassa purisassa itthirūpaṃ cittuppādaṃ gameti palibundhati bajjhāpeti baddhāpeti moheti saṃmoheti,
atk-s0401a:146_5: Ekaccassa ca rūpādīsu ekamevārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ pariyādiyati,
atk-s0401a:146_7: Iti ime pañca suttantā pañcagarukavasena kathitā,
atk-s0401a:146_10: Tatra hi amanussehi kantāramajjhe katāya āpaṇādivicāraṇāya mahāpurisassa pañcasu sahāyesu rūpagaruko rūpārammaṇe bajjhitvā anayabyasanaṃ patto,
atk-s0401a:146_13: Ime pana pañca suttantā pañcagarukavaseneva kathitā.
atk-s0401a:147_1: Yasmā ca na kevalaṃ purisāyeva pañcagarukā honti,
atk-s0401a:147_3: tasmā tāsampi vasena puna pañca suttante kathesi.
atk-s0401a:147_5: Vatthūsupi paṭhamasutte lohapāsādadvāre ṭhitaṃ daharaṃ oloketvā matāya rājorodhāya vatthu veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:148_1: Dutiyasutte bārāṇasiyaṃ rūpūpajīvino mātugāmassa vatthu veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:148_3: sā taṃ uppaṇḍetvā gaṇhituṃ na icchi.
atk-s0401a:148_4: So “karissāmettha kattabba”nti sāyanhakālasamanantare alaṅkatapaṭiyatto tassā gehassa abhimukhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:148_5: aññasmiṃ gehadvāre nisinno vīṇāya tantiyo same guṇe patiṭṭhāpetvā tantissarena gītassaraṃ anatikkamanto gāyi.
atk-s0401a:148_6: Sā itthī tassa gītasaddaṃ sutvā dvāranti saññāya “vivaṭavātapānena tassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti ākāseyeva jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā.
atk-s0401a:149_4: Sāvatthiyaṃ kirekissā kuṭumbikadhītāya sāmiko satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0401a:149_5: “na sakkā mayā ayaṃ dhammo gihibhūtena pūretu”nti aññatarassa piṇḍapātikattherassa santike pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:149_6: Athassa bhariyaṃ “assāmikā aya”nti ñatvā rājā pasenadikosalo antepuraṃ āharāpetvā ekadivasaṃ ekaṃ nīluppalakalāpaṃ
atk-s0401a:149_7: ādāya antepuraṃ paviṭṭho ekekissā ekekaṃ nīluppalaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0401a:149_8: Pupphesu bhājiyamānesu tassā itthiyā dve hatthaṃ pattāni.
atk-s0401a:149_10: Rājā tassā ubhayākāraṃ disvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā pucchi.
atk-s0401a:149_12: Yāvatatiyaṃ kathitepi rājā assaddahanto punadivase sakalarājanivesane sabbamālāvilepanādisugandhagandhaṃ
atk-s0401a:149_13: harāpetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa āsanāni paññāpetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ
atk-s0401a:149_14: datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne taṃ itthiṃ “kataro te thero”ti pucchitvā,
atk-s0401a:149_18: Satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:149_19: There anumodanaṃ vattuṃ āraddhamatte sakalaṃ rājanivesanaṃ gandhapūraṃ viya jātaṃ.
atk-s0401a:149_20: Rājā “saccamevesā āhā”ti pasīditvā punadivase satthāraṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0401a:149_21: Satthā “ayaṃ atīte dhammakathaṃ suṇanto ‘sādhu sādhū’ti sādhukāraṃ pavattento sakkaccaṃ assosi,
atk-s0401a:149_22: tammūlako tena mahārāja ayamānisaṃso laddho”ti ācikkhi.
atk-s0401a:152_0: Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti. Imasmiṃ vagge vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0401a:155_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame ekadhammampīti ettha “tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā hontī”tiādīsu viya nissattaṭṭhena dhammo veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:155_2: Tasmā ekadhammampīti nissattaṃ ekasabhāvampīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0401a:155_3: Anuppannovāti ettha pana “bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃ vā anuggahāya yāvatā,
atk-s0401a:155_5: sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā”ti evamādīsu viya samuccayattho vāsaddo daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0401a:155_8: yena dhammena anuppanno ca kāmacchando uppajjati,
atk-s0401a:155_9: uppanno ca kāmacchando bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0401a:155_12: Tattha anuppannoti ajāto asañjāto apātubhūto asamudāgato.
atk-s0401a:155_13: Kāmacchandoti “yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmataṇhā”tiādinā nayena vitthāritaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0401a:155_15: So panesa asamudācāravasena vā ananubhūtārammaṇavasena vā anuppanno uppajjatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:155_16: Aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppanno nāma natthi.
atk-s0401a:156_0: Tattha ekaccassa vattavasena kileso na samudācarati,
atk-s0401a:156_5: ca karontasseva kileso okāsaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0401a:156_6: Aparabhāge panassa vattaṃ vissajjetvā bhinnavattassa carato ayonisomanasikārañceva sativossaggañca āgamma uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:157_1: ekampi nikāyaṃ gaṇhāti dvepi tayopi cattāropi pañcapi.
atk-s0401a:157_2: Tassa tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ atthavasena pāḷivasena anusandhivasena pubbāparavasena gaṇhantassa sajjhāyantassa
atk-s0401a:157_3: vācentassa desentassa pakāsentassa kileso okāsaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0401a:157_4: Aparabhāge panassa ganthakammaṃ pahāya kusītassa carato ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:158_2: Tassa pana dhutaṅgaguṇe pariharantassa kileso okāsaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0401a:158_3: Aparabhāge panassa dhutaṅgāni vissajjetvā bāhullāya āvattassa carato ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:159_1: tassa paṭhamajjhānādīsu āvajjanavasiādīnaṃ vasena viharantassa kileso okāsaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0401a:159_2: Aparabhāge panassa parihīnajjhānassa vā vissaṭṭhajjhānassa vā bhassādīsu anuyuttassa viharato ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:160_1: sattasu vā anupassanāsu aṭṭhārasasu vā mahāvipassanāsu kammaṃ karonto viharati.
atk-s0401a:160_2: Tassevaṃ viharato kileso okāsaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0401a:160_3: Aparabhāge panassa vipassanākammaṃ pahāya kāyadaḷhībahulassa viharato ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:161_2: Tassa tesaṃ upakaraṇāni cintentassa kileso okāsaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0401a:161_3: Aparabhāge panassa navakamme niṭṭhite vā vissaṭṭhe vā ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:162_0: Ekacco pana brahmalokā āgato suddhasatto hoti,
atk-s0401a:162_1: tassa anāsevanatāya kileso okāsaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0401a:162_2: Aparabhāge panassa laddhāsevanassa ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:162_4: Evaṃ tāva asamudācāravasena anuppannassa uppannatā veditabbā.
atk-s0401a:163_2: tassa tattha ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma rāgo uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:164_0: Uppannoti jāto sañjāto nibbatto abhinibbatto pātubhūto.
atk-s0401a:164_3: Tattha sakiṃ uppanno kāmacchando na nirujjhissati,
atk-s0401a:164_4: sakiṃ niruddho vā sveva puna uppajjissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
atk-s0401a:164_5: Ekasmiṃ pana niruddhe tasmiṃ vā ārammaṇe aññasmiṃ vā ārammaṇe aparāparaṃ uppajjamāno bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattati nāma.
atk-s0401a:165_4: no animittā”ti ettha nimittanti paccayassa nāmaṃ.
atk-s0401a:165_7: bhikkhunā pañca nimittāni kālena kālaṃ manasikātabbānī”ti ettha kāraṇassa.
atk-s0401a:165_8: “So taṃ nimittaṃ āsevati bhāvetī”ti ettha samādhissa.
atk-s0401a:165_9: “Yaṃ nimittaṃ āgamma yaṃ nimittaṃ manasikaroto anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti ettha vipassanāya.
atk-s0401a:165_18: saccavippaṭikūlena vā cittassa āvajjanā anvāvajjanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro.
atk-s0401a:165_19: Ayaṃ vuccati ayonisomanasikāro”ti imassa manasikārassa vasena anupāyena manasikarontassāti.
atk-s0401a:166_1: Dutiye byāpādoti bhattabyāpatti viya cittassa byāpajjanaṃ pakativijahanabhāvo.
atk-s0401a:166_3: Anatthaṃ me acarīti āghāto jāyatī”ti evaṃ vitthāritassa byāpādanīvaraṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0401a:167_7: Yā cittassa akalyatā akammaññatā olīyanā sallīyanā.
atk-s0401a:167_9: Yā kāyassa akalyatā akammaññatā onāho pariyonāho”tiādinā nayena vitthāro veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:168_1: Pantesu vā senāsanesu aññataraññataresu vā adhikusalesu dhammesu arati aratitā anabhirati anabhiramanā ukkaṇṭhitā paritassitā,
atk-s0401a:168_4: Yā tandī tandiyanā tandimanatā ālassaṃ ālassāyanā ālassāyitattaṃ,
atk-s0401a:168_7: Yā kāyassa jambhanā vijambhanā ānamanā vinamanā sannamanā paṇamanā byādhiyakaṃ,
atk-s0401a:168_10: Yā bhuttāvissa bhattamucchā bhattakilamatho bhattapariḷāho kāyaduṭṭhullaṃ,
atk-s0401a:168_13: Yā cittassa akalyatā akammaññatā olīyanā sallīyanā līnaṃ līyanā līyitattaṃ thinaṃ thiyanā thiyitattaṃ cittassa,
atk-s0401a:169_0: Ettha ca purimā cattāro dhammā thinamiddhanīvaraṇassa sahajātavasenāpi upanissayavasenāpi paccayā honti,
atk-s0401a:169_1: cetaso ca līnattaṃ attanova attanā sahajātaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0401a:170_3: Kukkuccaṃ nāma akatakalyāṇassa katapāpassa tappaccayā vippaṭisāro.
atk-s0401a:170_5: Avūpasantacittassāti jhānena vā vipassanāya vā avūpasamitacittassa.
atk-s0401a:170_6: Ayaṃ pana avūpasamo uddhaccakukkuccassa upanissayakoṭiyā paccayo hotīti.
atk-s0401a:171_1: Pañcame vicikicchāti “satthari kaṅkhatī”tiādinā nayena vitthāritaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0401a:172_1: Chaṭṭhe anuppanno vā kāmacchando nuppajjatīti asamudācāravasena vā ananubhūtārammaṇavasena vāti dvīheva kāraṇehi anuppanno na uppajjati,
atk-s0401a:172_3: puna hetuṃ vā paccayaṃ vā na labhati.
atk-s0401a:172_5: Ekaccassa hi vuttanayeneva vatte yuttassa vattaṃ karontasseva kileso okāsaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0401a:172_7: So taṃ tathāvikkhambhitameva katvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti milakkhatissatthero viya.
atk-s0401a:173_0: So kirāyasmā rohaṇajanapade gāmeṇḍavālamahāvihārassa bhikkhācāre nesādakule nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:173_1: Vayaṃ āgamma katagharāvāso “puttadāraṃ posessāmī”ti adūhalasataṃ saṇṭhapetvā pāsasataṃ yojetvā sūlasataṃ
atk-s0401a:173_2: ropetvā bahuṃ pāpaṃ āyūhanto ekadivasaṃ gehato aggiñca loṇañca gahetvā araññaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:173_3: Pāse baddhamigaṃ vadhitvā aṅgārapakkamaṃsaṃ khāditvā pipāsito hutvā gāmeṇḍavālamahāvihāraṃ paviṭṭho pānīyamāḷake
atk-s0401a:173_5: “kiṃ nāmetaṃ ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne pipāsāya āgatānaṃ pipāsāvinodanamattaṃ pānīyaṃ natthī”ti ujjhāyituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0401a:173_6: Cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissatthero tassa kathaṃ sutvā tassa santikaṃ gacchanto pānīyamāḷake dasamatte pānīyaghaṭe
atk-s0401a:173_9: piva pānīya”nti vatvā kuṭaṃ ukkhipitvā tassa hatthesu āsiñci.
atk-s0401a:173_10: Tassa kammaṃ paṭicca pītapītaṃ pānīyaṃ tattakapāle pakkhittamiva nassati,
atk-s0401a:173_11: sakalepi ghaṭe pivato pipāsā na pacchijji.
atk-s0401a:174_0: So tassa kathaṃ sutvā laddhasaṃvego theraṃ vanditvā tāni adūhalādīni visaṅkharitvā vegena gharaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:174_1: puttadāraṃ oloketvā satthāni bhinditvā dīpakamigapakkhino araññe vissajjetvā theraṃ paccupasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0401a:174_4: evarūpaṃ paccakkhakāraṇaṃ disvā kathaṃ na pabbajissāmīti?
atk-s0401a:174_6: So vattārabhito hutvā buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhanto ekadivasaṃ devadūtasutte “tamenaṃ,
atk-s0401a:174_8: nirayapālā puna mahāniraye pakkhipantī”ti imaṃ ṭhānaṃ sutvā “ettakaṃ dukkharāsiṃ anubhavitasattaṃ puna mahāniraye pakkhipanti,
atk-s0401a:174_14: diṭṭhasadisaṃ kātuṃ ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassessāmī”ti sāmaṇere samādapetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhe alladārurāsiṃ kārehīti.
atk-s0401a:174_16: Thero yathānisinnova iddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā mahānirayato khajjopanakamattaṃ aggipapaṭikaṃ nīharitvā
atk-s0401a:174_18: Tassa tattha nipāto ca dārurāsino jhāyitvā chārikabhāvūpagamanañca apacchā apurimaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0401a:175_1: imasmiṃ sāsane kati dhurāni nāmā”ti pucchi. Āvuso,
atk-s0401a:175_6: vipassanādhuraṃ pūressāmi kammaṭṭhānaṃ me dethā”ti vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:175_7: Thero “vattasampanno bhikkhū”ti vattasīse ṭhatvā tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0401a:175_8: So kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanāya ca kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0401a:175_13: Thinamiddhe okkantamatte vattaparihānibhayena palālavaraṇakaṃ temetvā sīse ṭhapetvā pāde udake otāretvā nisīdati.
atk-s0401a:175_14: So ekadivasaṃ cittalapabbatamahāvihāre dve yāme vattaṃ katvā balavapaccūsakāle niddāya okkamituṃ āraddhāya
atk-s0401a:175_15: allapalālaṃ sīse ṭhapetvā nisinno pācīnapabbatapasse sāmaṇerassa aruṇavatiyasuttantaṃ sajjhāyantassa –
atk-s0401a:180_0: Idaṃ ṭhānaṃ sutvā “mādisassa āraddhavīriyassa bhikkhuno sammāsambuddhena idaṃ kathitaṃ bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0401a:180_1: pītiṃ uppādetvā jhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ katvā anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāya aparāparaṃ vāyamanto
atk-s0401a:180_3: Parinibbānakāle ca tadeva kāraṇaṃ dassento evamāha –
atk-s0401a:182_0: Pattosmi tatiyaṃ ṭhānaṃ, ettha me natthi saṃsayo”ti.
atk-s0401a:183_0: Evarūpassa vattavasena vikkhambhitakileso tathā vikkhambhitova hoti.
atk-s0401a:184_0: Ekaccassa vuttanayeneva ganthe yuttassa ganthaṃ uggaṇhantassa sajjhāyantassa vācentassa desentassa pakāsentassa ca kileso okāsaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0401a:184_2: So taṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti maliyadevatthero viya.
atk-s0401a:184_3: So kirāyasmā tivassabhikkhukāle kallagāmake maṇḍalārāmamahāvihāre uddesañca gaṇhāti,
atk-s0401a:184_5: Tassekadivasaṃ kallagāme bhikkhāya carato ekā upāsikā yāguuḷuṅkaṃ datvā puttasinehaṃ uppādetvā theraṃ
atk-s0401a:184_6: antonivesane nisīdāpetvā paṇītabhojanaṃ bhojetvā “kataragāmavāsikosi tātā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0401a:184_9: Tena hi tāta yāva ganthakammaṃ karosi,
atk-s0401a:184_11: So taṃ adhivāsetvā tattha nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0401a:184_14: Antovasse temāsaṃ tassāyeva saṅgahaṃ karonto piṇḍāpacitiṃ katvā mahāpavāraṇāya saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:185_4: mama putto ettakaṃ kālaṃ mayhaṃ kathento “sukhaṃ hotu,
atk-s0401a:185_10: Upāsikā gandhamālādīni gahetvā gantvā pūjetvā parisante dhammaṃ suṇamānā nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:185_11: Divādhammakathiko ca sarabhāṇako ca attano pamāṇaṃ ñatvā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:185_12: Tato maliyadevatthero dhammāsane nisīditvā cittabījaniṃ gahetvā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ vatvā –
atk-s0401a:185_13: “mayā mahāupāsikāya tayo māse dvīheva padehi anumodanā katā,
atk-s0401a:185_14: ajja sabbarattiṃ tīhi piṭakehi sammasitvā tasseva padadvayassa atthaṃ kathessāmī”ti dhammadesanaṃ ārabhitvā sabbarattiṃ kathesi.
atk-s0401a:186_0: Aparopi tasmiṃyeva mahāvihāre tissabhūtitthero nāma vinayaṃ gaṇhanto bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ antogāmaṃ paviṭṭho visabhāgārammaṇaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0401a:186_2: so patiṭṭhitapādaṃ acāletvā attano patte yāguṃ upaṭṭhākadaharassa patte ākiritvā “ayaṃ vitakko vaḍḍhamāno
atk-s0401a:186_3: maṃ catūsu apāyesu saṃsīdāpessatī”ti tatova nivattitvā ācariyassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0401a:186_8: Tumhe divā uddesañca sāyaṃ uddesañca maṃ oloketvā ṭhapetha,
atk-s0401a:186_9: paccūsakāle uddesaṃ pana mā ṭhapayitthā”ti evaṃ vatvā malayavāsimahāsaṅgharakkhitattherassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:186_10: Thero attano paṇṇasālāya paribhaṇḍaṃ karonto taṃ anoloketvāva “paṭisāmehi, āvuso,
atk-s0401a:186_15: uppannaṃ rogaṃ tikicchituṃ samatthassa santikaṃ āgatosi,
atk-s0401a:186_17: Subbaco bhikkhu “amhākaṃ ācariyo ajānitvā evaṃ na vakkhatī”ti pattacīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā therassa vattaṃ dassetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:187_1: So uṭṭhāya pattacīvaraṃ aṃse laggetvā theraṃ punappunaṃ vandi. Kiṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0401a:187_6: mahābhūti tādisassa yuttayogassa kulaputtassa na jhānaṃ vā vipassanā vā maggo vā phalaṃ vā dullabhanti.
atk-s0401a:187_7: So therassa kathaṃ sutvā nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā āgamanakāle vavatthāpitaṃ channaṃ sepaṇṇigacchamūlaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:187_8: pallaṅkena nisinno asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāya paccūsakāle
atk-s0401a:187_10: Evarūpānaṃ ganthavasena vikkhambhitā kilesā tathā vikkhambhitāva honti.
atk-s0401a:188_0: Ekaccassa pana vuttanayeneva dhutaṅgāni pariharato kileso okāsaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0401a:188_2: So taṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti gāmantapabbhāravāsī mahāsīvatthero viya.
atk-s0401a:188_3: Thero kira mahāgāme tissamahāvihāre vasanto tepiṭakaṃ atthavasena ca pāḷivasena ca aṭṭhārasa mahāgaṇe vāceti.
atk-s0401a:188_4: Therassa ovāde ṭhatvā saṭṭhisahassa bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:188_5: Tesu eko bhikkhu attanā paṭividdhadhammaṃ ārabbha uppannasomanasso cintesi –
atk-s0401a:188_6: “atthi nu kho idaṃ sukhaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyassā”ti.
atk-s0401a:188_7: So āvajjento therassa puthujjanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ekenupāyena therassa saṃvegaṃ uppādessāmī”ti attano vasanaṭṭhānato
atk-s0401a:188_8: therassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā vattaṃ dassetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:188_12: ekaṃ dhammapadaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti āgatosmi, bhanteti. Bahū, āvuso, gaṇhanti,
atk-s0401a:188_15: evaṃ okāse asati maraṇassa kathaṃ okāsaṃ labhissathā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:188_20: mādisena bhavitabba”nti vatvā theraṃ vanditvā maṇivaṇṇe ākāse uppatitvā agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:189_0: Thero tassa gatakālato paṭṭhāya jātasaṃvego divā uddesañca sāyaṃ uddesañca vācetvā pattacīvaraṃ hatthapāse
atk-s0401a:189_1: ṭhapetvā paccūsakāle uddesaṃ gahetvā otarantena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ pattacīvaramādāya otiṇṇo terasa dhutaguṇe
atk-s0401a:189_2: paripuṇṇe adhiṭṭhāya gāmantapabbhārasenāsanaṃ gantvā pabbhāraṃ paṭijaggitvā mañcapīṭhaṃ ussāpetvā “arahattaṃ
atk-s0401a:189_3: apatvā mañce piṭṭhiṃ na pasāressāmī”ti mānasaṃ bandhitvā caṅkamaṃ otari.
atk-s0401a:189_4: Tassa “ajja arahattaṃ gaṇhissāmi ajja arahattaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti ghaṭentasseva pavāraṇā sampattā.
atk-s0401a:189_5: So pavāraṇāya upakaṭṭhāya “puthujjanabhāvaṃ pahāya visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāressāmī”ti cintento ativiya kilamati.
atk-s0401a:189_6: So tāya pavāraṇāya maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā uppādetuṃ asakkonto “mādisopi nāma āraddhavipassako na labhati,
atk-s0401a:189_7: yāva dullabhañca vatidaṃ arahatta”nti vatvā teneva niyāmena ṭhānacaṅkamabahulo hutvā tiṃsa vassāni samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:189_8: katvā mahāpavāraṇāya majjhe ṭhitaṃ puṇṇacandaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho candamaṇḍalaṃ visuddhaṃ,
atk-s0401a:189_9: udāhu mayhaṃ sīla”nti cintento “candamaṇḍale sasalakkhaṇaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0401a:189_10: mayhaṃ pana upasampadato paṭṭhāya yāvajjadivasā sīlasmiṃ kāḷakaṃ vā tilako vā natthī”ti āvajjetvā sañjātapītisomanasso
atk-s0401a:189_11: paripakkañāṇattā pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:189_12: Evarūpassa dhutaṅgavasena vikkhambhito kileso tathā vikkhambhitova hoti.
atk-s0401a:190_0: Ekaccassa vuttanayeneva paṭhamajjhānādisamāpajjanabahulatāya kileso okāsaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0401a:190_2: So taṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti mahātissatthero viya.
atk-s0401a:190_4: So samāpattivikkhambhitānaṃ kilesānaṃ asamudācārena uggahaparipucchāvaseneva ariyamaggasāmantaṃ katheti,
atk-s0401a:190_6: Athekadivasaṃ mahāgāme tissamahāvihārato bhikkhusaṅgho talaṅgaravāsidhammadinnattherassa sāsanaṃ pesesi
atk-s0401a:190_8: Thero adhivāsetvā “mama santike mahallakataro bhikkhu natthi,
atk-s0401a:190_10: taṃ saṅghattheraṃ katvā gamissāmī”ti cintento bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto therassa vihāraṃ gantvā divāṭṭhāne therassa vattaṃ dassetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:191_5: tumhehi pana saddhiṃ gantukāmo hutvā āgatomhī”ti sāraṇīyakathaṃ kathentova papañcetvā “kadā, bhante,
atk-s0401a:191_12: Ekaṃ pokkharaṇiṃ māpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyātha, bhanteti? “Na, āvuso,
atk-s0401a:191_13: etaṃ bhāriya”nti vatvā sammukhaṭṭhāne pokkharaṇiṃ māpesi. “Ettha, bhante,
atk-s0401a:191_14: ekaṃ padumagacchaṃ māpethā”ti ca vutto tampi māpesi.
atk-s0401a:191_21: Thero attanāva māpitaṃ itthirūpaṃ olokento lobhaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0401a:191_22: Tadā attano puthujjanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “avassayo me sappurisa hohī”ti antevāsikassa santike ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:191_24: āgato”ti therassa asubhavasena sallahukaṃ katvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā therassa okāsaṃ kātuṃ bahi nikkhanto.
atk-s0401a:191_25: Suparimadditasaṅkhāro thero tasmiṃ divāṭṭhānato nikkhantamatteyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:191_26: Atha naṃ saṅghattheraṃ katvā dhammadinnatthero tissamahāvihāraṃ gantvā saṅghassa dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0401a:191_27: Evarūpassa samāpattivasena vikkhambhito kileso tathā vikkhambhitova hoti.
atk-s0401a:192_0: Ekaccassa pana vuttanayeneva vipassanāya kammaṃ karontassa kileso okāsaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0401a:192_2: So taṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0401a:192_4: Te kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vivittaṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karontā kilesānaṃ
atk-s0401a:192_5: asamudācāravasena “paṭividdhamaggaphalā maya”nti saññāya maggaphalatthāya vāyāmaṃ akatvā “amhehi paṭividdhadhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:193_0: Satthā tesaṃ pure āgamanatova ānandattheraṃ āha – “ānanda,
atk-s0401a:193_1: padhānakammikā bhikkhū ajja maṃ passituṃ āgamissanti,
atk-s0401a:193_2: tesaṃ mama dassanāya okāsaṃ akatvā ‘āmakasusānaṃ gantvā allaasubhabhāvanaṃ karothā’ti pahiṇeyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0401a:193_3: Thero tesaṃ āgatānaṃ satthārā kathitasāsanaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0401a:193_5: addhā ettha kāraṇaṃ bhavissatī”ti āmakasusānaṃ gantvā allaasubhaṃ olokentā lobhaṃ uppādetvā “idaṃ nūna
atk-s0401a:193_6: sammāsambuddhena diṭṭhaṃ bhavissatī”ti jātasaṃvegā laddhamaggaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:193_7: Satthā tesaṃ vipassanāya āraddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova imaṃ obhāsagāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:195_0: Kāpotakāni aṭṭhīni, tāni disvāna kā ratī”ti. ;
atk-s0401a:196_1: Evarūpānaṃ vipassanāvasena vikkhambhitā kilesā tathā vikkhambhitāva honti.
atk-s0401a:197_0: Ekaccassa vuttanayeneva navakammaṃ karontassa kileso okāsaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0401a:197_2: So taṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti cittalapabbate tissatthero viya.
atk-s0401a:197_4: so taṃ vinodetuṃ asakkonto attano cīvaraṃ dhovitvā rajitvā pattaṃ pacitvā kese ohāretvā upajjhāyaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:197_7: atuṭṭhassa viya te ākāro”ti? Āma, bhante,
atk-s0401a:197_10: Thero tassāsayaṃ olokento arahattassa upanissayaṃ disvā anukampāvasena āha –
atk-s0401a:198_5: bhante”ti theraṃ vanditvā tathārūpaṃ sappāyaṭṭhānaṃ oloketvā “ettha kātuṃ sakkā”ti dārūhi pūretvā jhāpetvā
atk-s0401a:198_6: sodhetvā iṭṭhakāhi parikkhipitvā dvāravātapānādīni yojetvā saddhiṃ caṅkamanabhūmibhittiparikammādīhi
atk-s0401a:198_7: leṇaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā mañcapīṭhaṃ santharitvā therassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:198_13: bhante”ti vanditvā pāde dhovitvā leṇaṃ pavisitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno attanā katakammaṃ āvajji.
atk-s0401a:198_14: Tassa “manāpaṃ mayā upajjhāyassa kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ kata”nti cintentassa abbhantare pīti uppannā.
atk-s0401a:198_15: So taṃ vikkhambhetvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:198_16: Evarūpassa navakammavasena vikkhambhito kileso tathā vikkhambhitova hoti.
atk-s0401a:199_0: Ekacco pana brahmalokato āgato suddhasatto hoti.
atk-s0401a:199_3: So taṃ tathā vikkhambhitameva katvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti āyasmā mahākassapo viya.
atk-s0401a:199_4: So hi āyasmā agāramajjhepi kāme aparibhuñjitvā mahāsampattiṃ pahāya pabbajitvā nikkhanto antarāmagge
atk-s0401a:199_5: paccuggamanatthāya āgataṃ satthāraṃ disvā vanditvā tīhi ovādehi upasampadaṃ labhitvā aṭṭhame aruṇe saha
atk-s0401a:199_7: Evarūpassa bhavavasena vikkhambhito kileso tathā vikkhambhitova hoti.
atk-s0401a:200_0: Yo pana ananubhūtapubbaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ labhitvā tattheva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0401a:200_1: evarūpassa ananubhūtārammaṇavasena kāmacchando anuppannova nuppajjati nāma.
atk-s0401a:201_0: Uppanno vā kāmacchando pahīyatīti ettha uppannoti jāto bhūto samudāgato.
atk-s0401a:201_7: Tattha vipassanāya kilesā tadaṅgavasena pahīyantīti vipassanā tadaṅgappahānanti veditabbā.
atk-s0401a:201_8: Samāpatti pana kilese vikkhambhetīti sā vikkhambhanappahānanti veditabbā.
atk-s0401a:201_11: nibbānaṃ sabbakilesehi nissaṭanti imāni tīṇi samucchedapaṭipassaddhinissaraṇappahānānīti vuccanti.
atk-s0401a:201_12: Imehi lokiyalokuttarehi pañcahi pahānehi pahīyatīti attho.
atk-s0401a:202_0: Asubhanimittanti dasasu asubhesu uppannaṃ sārammaṇaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ.
atk-s0401a:202_6: Anicce anicca”ntiādinā nayena vuttassa upāyamanasikārassa vasena manasikaroto.
atk-s0401a:202_7: Anuppanno ceva kāmacchando nuppajjatīti asamudāgato na samudāgacchati.
atk-s0401a:202_8: Uppanno ca kāmacchando pahīyatīti samudāgato ca kāmacchando pañcavidhena pahānena pahīyati.
atk-s0401a:203_0: Apica cha dhammā kāmacchandassa pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-s0401a:203_9: catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ ālopānaṃ okāse sati udakaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlatāya bhojane mattaññunopi.
atk-s0401a:206_0: Asubhakammikatissattherasadise asubhabhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi kāmacchando pahīyati,
atk-s0401a:207_1: Sattame mettā cetovimuttīti sabbasattesu hitapharaṇakā mettā.
atk-s0401a:207_2: Yasmā pana taṃsampayuttacittaṃ nīvaraṇādīhi paccanīkadhammehi vimuccati,
atk-s0401a:207_4: Visesato vā sabbabyāpādapariyuṭṭhānena vimuttattā sā cetovimuttīti veditabbā.
atk-s0401a:207_6: “cetovimuttī”ti vuttattā pana idha tikacatukkajjhānavasena appanāva adhippetā.
atk-s0401a:207_7: Yonisomanasikarototi taṃ mettaṃ cetovimuttiṃ vuttalakkhaṇena upāyamanasikārena manasikarontassa.
atk-s0401a:208_0: Apica cha dhammā byāpādassa pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-s0401a:208_7: Odissakaanodissakadisāpharaṇānañhi aññataravasena mettaṃ uggaṇhantassāpi byāpādo pahīyati,
atk-s0401a:208_11: nanu tvaṃ attano kammena āgantvā attano kammeneva gamissasi?
atk-s0401a:208_12: Parassa kujjhanaṃ nāma vītaccitaṅgāratattaayasalākagūthādīni gahetvā paraṃ paharitukāmatāsadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0401a:208_15: Esa attano kammena āgantvā attano kammeneva gamissati,
atk-s0401a:208_16: appaṭicchitapaheṇakaṃ viya paṭivātaṃ khittarajomuṭṭhi viya ca etassevesa kodho matthake patissatī”ti
atk-s0401a:208_17: evaṃ attano ca parassa ca kammassakataṃ paccavekkhatopi,
atk-s0401a:208_19: assaguttattherasadise mettābhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi byāpādo pahīyati,
atk-s0401a:208_23: Sesamidha ito paresu ca vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0401a:209_2: Nikkamadhātu nāma kosajjato nikkhantattā tato balavataraṃ.
atk-s0401a:209_3: Parakkamadhātu nāma paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanato tatopi balavataraṃ.
atk-s0401a:209_6: parakkamo cetaso bandhanacchedanāyā”ti vatvā “tīhi petehi adhimattavīriyameva kathita”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0401a:210_8: Tattha “idha bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī”ti evaṃ rattidivasassa
atk-s0401a:210_9: pañca koṭṭhāse kāyena ghaṭentassa vāyamantassa kāyikavīriyaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:210_11: yāva me na anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccatī”ti evaṃ okāsaparicchedena vā,
atk-s0401a:210_12: “na tāvāhaṃ imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmī”ti evaṃ nisajjādiparicchedena vā mānasaṃ bandhitvā ghaṭentassa vāyamantassa cetasikavīriyaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:210_14: Duvidhenāpi hi iminā vīriyena āraddhavīriyassa anuppannañceva thinamiddhaṃ nuppajjati,
atk-s0401a:210_19: Etesu hi purimā tayo aññe ca evarūpā kāyikavīriyena āraddhavīriyā,
atk-s0401a:210_20: kuṭumbiyaputtatissatthero aññe ca evarūpā cetasikavīriyena āraddhavīriyā,
atk-s0401a:210_21: uccāvālukavāsī mahānāgatthero pana dvīhipi vīriyehi āraddhavīriyova.
atk-s0401a:210_27: catutthe sattāhe vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:211_0: Apica cha dhammā thinamiddhassa pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-s0401a:211_12: brāhmaṇādayo viya bhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhāne nisinnassa hi samaṇadhammaṃ karoto thinamiddhaṃ mahāhatthī viya ottharantaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0401a:211_13: catupañcaālopaokāsaṃ pana ṭhapetvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā yāpanasīlassa bhikkhuno taṃ na hotīti evaṃ atibhojane nimittaṃ gaṇhantassāpi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0401a:211_18: mahākassapattherasadise pahīnathinamiddhe kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi thinamiddhaṃ pahīyati,
atk-s0401a:212_0: 19. Navame vūpasantacittassāti jhānena vā vipassanāya vā vūpasamitacittassa.
atk-s0401a:213_0: Apica cha dhammā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-s0401a:213_7: Bāhusaccenāpi hi ekaṃ vā dve vā tayo vā cattāro vā pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati,
atk-s0401a:213_11: upālittherasadise vinayadhare kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati,
atk-s0401a:214_0: 20. Dasame yoniso, bhikkhave, manasikarototi vuttanayeneva upāyato manasikarontassa.
atk-s0401a:215_0: Apica cha dhammā vicikicchāya pahānāya saṃvattanti –
atk-s0401a:215_8: pañca vā nikāye pāḷivasena ca atthavasena ca uggaṇhantassāpi vicikicchā pahīyati,
atk-s0401a:215_12: saddhādhimutte vakkalittherasadise kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi vicikicchā pahīyati,
atk-s0401a:218_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame abhāvitanti avaḍḍhitaṃ bhāvanāvasena appavattitaṃ.
atk-s0401a:218_2: Akammaniyaṃ hotīti kammakkhamaṃ kammayoggaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0401a:218_4: Ettha ca paṭhame cittanti vaṭṭavasena uppannacittaṃ,
atk-s0401a:219_2: Mahato anatthāya saṃvattatīti devamanussasampattiyo mārabrahmaissariyāni ca dadamānampi punappunaṃ jātijarābyādhimaraṇasokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāse
atk-s0401a:219_3: khandhadhātuāyatanapaṭiccasamuppādavaṭṭāni ca dadamānaṃ kevalaṃ dukkhakkhandhameva detīti mahato anatthāya
atk-s0401a:220_3: vaṭṭavasena uppannacittaṃ nāma uppannampi abhāvitaṃ apātubhūtameva hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0401a:220_5: Vivaṭṭavasena uppannaṃ pana bhāvitaṃ pātubhūtaṃ nāma hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0401a:222_1: Navame “jātipi dukkhā”tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ dukkhaṃ adhivahati āharatīti dukkhādhivahaṃ.
atk-s0401a:222_4: lokuttarapādakajjhānādi ariyadhammābhimukhaṃ dukkhena adhivāhīyati pesīyatīti dukkhādhivāhaṃ.
atk-s0401a:222_6: Tañhi vuttappakārā devamanussādisampattiyo dadamānampi jātiādīnaṃ adhivahanato dukkhādhivahaṃ,
atk-s0401a:223_7: phalasukhato nibbānasukhaṃ adhivahati āharatīti sukhādhivahaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0401a:223_9: Tañhi lokuttarapādakajjhānādiariyadhammābhimukhaṃ supesayaṃ vissaṭṭhaindavajirasadisaṃ hotīti sukhādhivāhantipi vuccati.
atk-s0401a:230_1: Pañcamachaṭṭhāni arakkhitaṃ rakkhitanti padavasena bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayena vuttāni.
atk-s0401a:231_0: 37-38. Sattamaṭṭhamesupi eseva nayo. Upamā panettha asaṃvutagharadvārādivasena veditabbā.
atk-s0401a:232_0: 39-40. Navamadasamāni catūhipi padehi yojetvā vuttāni. Imasmimpi vagge vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitanti.
atk-s0401a:235_2: Tatra bhagavā katthaci atthena upamaṃ parivāretvā dasseti vatthasutte viya,
atk-s0401a:235_5: katthaci upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā dasseti loṇambilasutte viya,
atk-s0401a:235_7: Imasmiṃ pana sālisūkopame upamāya atthaṃ parivāretvā dassento seyyathāpi,
atk-s0401a:235_14: na evaṃ uddhaggaṃ katvā ṭhapitanti attho.
atk-s0401a:235_19: Avijjanti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇabhūtaṃ ghanabahalaṃ mahāavijjaṃ.
atk-s0401a:235_21: Nibbānanti taṇhāvānato nikkhantabhāvena evaṃ vuttaṃ amataṃ.
atk-s0401a:236_3: Akkantanti ettha pādeneva akkantaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0401a:236_7: Kasmā pana aññe sepaṇṇikaṇṭakamadanakaṇṭakādayo mahante aggahetvā sukhumaṃ dubbalaṃ sālisūkayavasūkameva gahitanti?
atk-s0401a:236_9: Yathā hi sukhumaṃ dubbalaṃ sālisūkaṃ vā yavasūkaṃ vā hotu,
atk-s0401a:236_11: etesu yaṃkiñci micchā ṭhapitaṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhindituṃ lohitaṃ vā uppādetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0401a:236_13: evameva appamattakaṃ tiṇamuṭṭhi mattadānakusalaṃ vā hotu,
atk-s0401a:236_15: sace vaṭṭasampattiṃ patthetvā vaṭṭasannissitavasena micchā ṭhapitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0401a:236_18: “Idaṃ me dānaṃ āsavakkhayāvahaṃ hotū”ti evaṃ pana vivaṭṭaṃ patthentena vivaṭṭavasena sammā ṭhapitaṃ arahattampi
atk-s0401a:240_2: Cetasā cetopariccāti attano cittena tassa cittaṃ paricchinditvā.
atk-s0401a:240_4: Evaṃ nirayeti evaṃ niraye ṭhitoyevāti vattabbo.
atk-s0401a:240_6: Nirayo hi ayasaṅkhātā sukhā apetoti apāyo,
atk-s0401a:241_3: Saggaṃ lokanti rūpādisampattīhi suṭṭhu aggaṃ lokaṃ.
atk-s0401a:242_5: Sippisambukantiādīsu sippiyo ca sambukā ca sippisambukaṃ.
atk-s0401a:242_10: Yathā pana antarantarā ṭhitāsupi nisinnāsupi nipajjamānāsupi “etā gāviyo carantī”ti carantiyo upādāya itarāpi “carantī”ti vuccanti,
atk-s0401a:242_11: evaṃ tiṭṭhantameva sakkharakaṭhalaṃ upādāya itarampi dvayaṃ “tiṭṭhanta”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0401a:242_12: itaraṃ dvayaṃ carantaṃ upādāya sakkharakaṭhalampi “caranta”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0401a:243_1: Attatthaṃ vātiādīsu attano diṭṭhadhammiko lokiyalokuttaramissako attho attattho nāma.
atk-s0401a:243_2: Attanova samparāye lokiyalokuttaramissako attho parattho nāma hoti.
atk-s0401a:243_5: Apica attano diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikopi lokiyalokuttaro attho attattho nāma,
atk-s0401a:243_8: Uttariṃ vā manussadhammāti dasakusalakammapathasaṅkhātā manussadhammā uttariṃ.
atk-s0401a:243_9: Ayañhi dasavidho dhammo vināpi aññaṃ samādāpakaṃ satthantarakappāvasāne jātasaṃvegehi manussehi sayameva samādinnattā manussadhammoti vuccati,
atk-s0401a:243_12: ariyabhāvaṃ vā kātuṃ samatthaṃ ñāṇadassanasaṅkhātaṃ visesaṃ.
atk-s0401a:245_6: Koci hi rukkho vaṇṇena aggo hoti,
atk-s0401a:245_10: Phandano pana mudutāya ceva kammaññatāya ca aggo seṭṭhoti dasseti. Cittaṃ,
atk-s0401a:245_12: bhāvitaṃ bahulīkatanti ettha samathavipassanāvasena bhāvitañceva punappunakatañca cittaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0401a:245_14: “ekantaṃ mudu ceva kammaniyañca cittaṃ nāma abhiññāpādakacatutthajjhānacittameva, āvuso”ti.
atk-s0401a:246_1: Aṭṭhame evaṃ lahuparivattanti evaṃ lahuṃ uppajjitvā lahuṃ nirujjhanakaṃ.
atk-s0401a:246_6: taṃ pana paṭikkhipitvā “idha cittanti yaṃkiñci antamaso cakkhuviññāṇampi adhippetamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0401a:246_7: Imasmiṃ panatthe milindarājā dhammakathikaṃ nāgasenattheraṃ pucchi,
atk-s0401a:246_9: ekasmiṃ accharākkhaṇe pavattitacittasaṅkhārā sace rūpino assu,
atk-s0401a:246_12: vīhīnaṃ aḍḍhacūḷañca vāhā vīhisattambaṇāni dve ca tumbā ekaccharākkhaṇe pavattitassa cittassa saṅkhampi na upenti,
atk-s0401a:246_15: Atha kasmā sammāsambuddhena “upamāpi na sukarā”ti vuttaṃ?
atk-s0401a:246_16: Yatheva hi upamaṃ paṭikkhipitvāpi kappadīghabhāvassa yojanikapabbatena yojanikasāsapapuṇṇanagarena,
atk-s0401a:246_21: upamā kātu”nti evaṃ pucchāvasena upamā katā,
atk-s0401a:246_22: imasmiṃ sutte pucchāya abhāvena na katā.
atk-s0401a:246_24: Iti imasmiṃ sutte cittarāsi nāma kathitoti.
atk-s0401a:247_3: Kiṃ pana cittassa vaṇṇo nāma atthīti? Natthi.
atk-s0401a:247_4: Nīlādīnañhi aññataravaṇṇaṃ vā hotu avaṇṇaṃ vā yaṃkiñci parisuddhatāya “pabhassara”nti vuccati.
atk-s0401a:247_8: Upakkilesehīti rāgādīhi upakkiliṭṭhattā upakkiliṭṭhaṃ nāmāti vuccati. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0401a:247_9: Yathā hi sīlavantā ācārasampannā mātāpitaro vā ācariyupajjhāyā vā dussīlānaṃ durācārānaṃ avattasampannānaṃ
atk-s0401a:247_10: puttānañceva antevāsikasaddhivihārikānañca vasena “attano putte vā antevāsikasaddhivihārike vā na tajjenti
atk-s0401a:247_11: na sikkhāpenti na ovadanti nānusāsantī”ti avaṇṇaṃ akittiṃ labhanti,
atk-s0401a:247_13: Ācārasampannā mātāpitaro viya ca ācariyupajjhāyā viya ca bhavaṅgacittaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0401a:247_14: puttādīnaṃ vasena tesaṃ akittilābho viya javanakkhaṇe rajjanadussanamuyhanasabhāvānaṃ lobhasahagatādīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:247_15: cittānaṃ vasena uppannehi āgantukehi upakkilesehi pakatiparisuddhampi bhavaṅgacittaṃ upakkiliṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti.
atk-s0401a:248_2: Vippamuttanti javanakkhaṇe arajjamānaṃ adussamānaṃ amuyhamānaṃ tihetukañāṇasampayuttādikusalavasena uppajjamānaṃ
atk-s0401a:248_4: Idhāpi yathā sīlavantānaṃ ācārasampannānaṃ puttādīnaṃ vasena mātādayo “sobhanā eteyeva attano puttakādayo
atk-s0401a:248_6: evaṃ javanakkhaṇe uppannakusalacittavasena idaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ āgantukehi upakkilesehi vippamuttanti vuccatīti.
atk-s0401a:251_1: Chaṭṭhassa paṭhame taṃ assutavā puthujjanoti taṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ sutavirahito puthujjano.
atk-s0401a:251_3: Yo hi idaṃ suttaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya atthavasena upaparikkhanto “idaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ nāma pakatiparisuddhampi
atk-s0401a:251_4: javanakkhaṇe uppannehi lobhādīhi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭha”nti neva āgamavasena na adhigamavasena jānāti,
atk-s0401a:251_5: yassa ca khandhadhātuāyatanapaccayākārasatipaṭṭhānādīsu uggahaparipucchāvinicchayavirahitattā yathābhūtañāṇapaṭivedhasādhako neva āgamo,
atk-s0401a:251_6: paṭipattiyā adhigantabbassa anadhigatattā na adhigamo atthi.
atk-s0401a:251_7: So āgamādhigamābhāvā ñeyyo assutavā iti. Svāyaṃ –
atk-s0401a:254_0: So hi puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādīhi kāraṇehi puthujjano. Yathāha –
atk-s0401a:255_8: puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhopannā laggā laggitā palibuddhāti puthujjanā,
atk-s0401a:255_9: puthu pañcahi nīvaraṇehi āvutā nivutā ovutā pihitā paṭicchannā paṭikujjitāti puthujjanā”ti.
atk-s0401a:256_0: Puthūnaṃ vā gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ janānaṃ antogadhattāpi puthujjano,
atk-s0401a:256_1: puthu vā ayaṃ visuṃyeva saṅkhaṃ gato,
atk-s0401a:256_3: Evametehi “assutavā puthujjano”ti dvīhi padehi ye te –
atk-s0401a:259_0: Dve puthujjanā vuttā, tesu andhaputhujjano vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:260_0: Yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātīti “idañca bhavaṅgacittaṃ evaṃ āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0401a:260_1: evaṃ vippamuttaṃ nāmā”ti yathāsabhāvato na jānāti.
atk-s0401a:261_2: Vitthārato panettha assutavāti padassa paṭipakkhavasena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:261_7: atthi neva ariyo na sāvako seyyathāpi puthutitthiyā.
atk-s0401a:261_10: Idha pana gihī vā hotu pabbajito vā,
atk-s0401a:261_11: yo koci sutavāti ettha vuttassa atthassa vasena sutasampanno,
atk-s0401a:261_13: Yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti “evamidaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ āgantukehi upakkilesehi vippamuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0401a:262_4: Bhagavā kira ekasmiṃ samaye sāvatthiṃ upanissāya jetavanamahāvihāre paṭivasati.
atk-s0401a:262_5: Buddhānañca yattha katthaci paṭivasantānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ kiccaṃ avijahitameva hoti.
atk-s0401a:263_1: bhagavā hi pātova vuṭṭhāya upaṭṭhākānuggahatthaṃ sarīraphāsukatthañca mukhadhovanādisarīraparikammaṃ
atk-s0401a:263_2: katvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā tāva vivittāsane vītināmetvā bhikkhācāravelāya nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0401a:263_4: kadāci bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisati kadāci pakatiyā,
atk-s0401a:263_7: piṇḍāya pavisato lokanāthassa purato purato gantvā mudugatavātā pathaviṃ sodhenti,
atk-s0401a:263_8: valāhakā udakaphusitāni muñcantā magge reṇuṃ vūpasametvā upari vitānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0401a:263_9: apare vātā pupphāni upasaṃharitvā magge okiranti,
atk-s0401a:263_14: Indakhīlassa anto ṭhapitamatte dakkhiṇapāde sarīrato chabbaṇṇarasmiyo nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇarasapiñjarāni
atk-s0401a:263_15: viya citrapaṭaparikkhittāni viya ca pāsādakūṭāgārādīni alaṅkarontiyo ito cito ca dhāvanti,
atk-s0401a:263_16: hatthiassavihaṅgādayo sakasakaṭṭhānesu ṭhitāyeva madhurenākārena saddaṃ karonti,
atk-s0401a:263_17: tathā bherivīṇādīni tūriyāni manussānañca kāyūpagāni ābharaṇāni.
atk-s0401a:263_18: Tena saññāṇena manussā jānanti “ajja bhagavā idha piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti.
atk-s0401a:263_19: Te sunivatthā supārutā gandhapupphādīni ādāya gharā nikkhamitvā antaravīthiṃ paṭipajjitvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0401a:263_24: sataṃ dethā”ti yācitvā bhagavatopi pattaṃ gahetvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā sakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātena paṭimānenti.
atk-s0401a:263_25: Bhagavā katabhattakicco tesaṃ upanissayacittasantānāni oloketvā tathā dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0401a:263_30: Evaṃ mahājanaṃ anuggahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0401a:263_31: Tattha gantvā gandhamaṇḍalamāḷe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdati bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosānaṃ āgamayamāno.
atk-s0401a:263_32: Tato bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosāne upaṭṭhāko bhagavato nivedeti.
atk-s0401a:264_0: Atha bhagavā evaṃ katapurebhattakicco gandhakuṭiyā upaṭṭhāne nisīditvā pāde pakkhāletvā pādapīṭhe ṭhatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ovadati –
atk-s0401a:264_10: Tato sabbepi bhagavantaṃ vanditvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni gacchanti.
atk-s0401a:264_16: Tato bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā sace ākaṅkhati,
atk-s0401a:264_17: dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno muhuttaṃ sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0401a:264_18: Atha samassāsitakāyo uṭṭhahitvā dutiyabhāge lokaṃ voloketi.
atk-s0401a:264_19: Tatiyabhāge yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati,
atk-s0401a:264_20: tattha mahājano purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ sunivattho supāruto gandhapupphādīni ādāya vihāre sannipatati.
atk-s0401a:264_21: Tato bhagavā sampattaparisāya anurūpena pāṭihāriyena gantvā dhammasabhāyaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane nisajja dhammaṃ deseti kālayuttaṃ samayayuttaṃ,
atk-s0401a:265_0: So evaṃ niṭṭhitapacchābhattakicco sace gattāni osiñcitukāmo hoti,
atk-s0401a:265_1: buddhāsanā uṭṭhāya nhānakoṭṭhakaṃ pavisitvā upaṭṭhākena paṭiyāditaudakena gattāni utuṃ gaṇhāpeti.
atk-s0401a:265_3: Bhagavā surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ ekaṃsaṃ katvā tattha āgantvā nisīdati ekakova muhuttaṃ paṭisallīno,
atk-s0401a:265_4: atha bhikkhū tato tato āgamma bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0401a:265_8: Bhagavā tesaṃ adhippāyaṃ sampādento purimayāmaṃ vitināmeti.
atk-s0401a:266_0: Purimayāmakiccapariyosāne pana bhikkhūsu bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pakkantesu sakaladasasahassilokadhātudevatāyo
atk-s0401a:266_1: okāsaṃ labhamānā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchanti yathābhisaṅkhataṃ antamaso caturakkharampi.
atk-s0401a:266_2: Bhagavā tāsaṃ devatānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento majjhimayāmaṃ vītināmeti.
atk-s0401a:267_0: Pacchimayāmaṃ pana tayo koṭṭhāse katvā purebhattato paṭṭhāya nisajjāpīḷitassa sarīrassa kilāsubhāvamocanatthaṃ ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ caṅkamena vītināmeti,
atk-s0401a:267_1: dutiyakoṭṭhāse gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0401a:267_2: Tatiyakoṭṭhāse paccuṭṭhāya nisīditvā purimabuddhānaṃ santike dānasīlādivasena katādhikārapuggaladassanatthaṃ buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ voloketi.
atk-s0401a:268_0: Tampi divasaṃ bhagavā imasmiṃyeva kicce ṭhito lokaṃ olokento idaṃ addasa –
atk-s0401a:268_1: mayā kosalaraṭṭhe cārikaṃ carantena aggikkhandhena upametvā ekasmiṃ sutte desite saṭṭhi bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇissanti,
atk-s0401a:268_6: Itaresaṃ pana bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgahatthāya cārikaṃ caritukāmo hutvā, “ānanda,
atk-s0401a:269_3: Bhikkhū mahālābhaṃ labhitvā viya tuṭṭhamānasā “labhissāma vata mahājanassa dhammaṃ desentassa bhagavato
atk-s0401a:269_4: suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ oloketuṃ madhurañca dhammakathaṃ sotu”nti paruḷhakesā kese ohāretvā malaggahitapattā
atk-s0401a:269_5: patte pacitvā kiliṭṭhacīvarā cīvarāni dhovitvā gamanasajjā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:269_6: Satthā aparicchinnena bhikkhusaṅghena parivuto kosalaraṭṭhaṃ cārikāya nikkhanto gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0401a:269_7: ekadivasaṃ gāvutaaḍḍhayojanatigāvutayojanaparamaṃ cārikaṃ caranto ekasmiṃ padese mahantaṃ susirarukkhaṃ
atk-s0401a:269_8: agginā sampajjalitaṃ disvā “imameva vatthuṃ katvā sattahi aṅgehi paṭimaṇḍetvā dhammadesanaṃ kathessāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:269_9: gamanaṃ pacchinditvā aññataraṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upasaṅkamitvā nisajjākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0401a:269_10: Ānandatthero satthu adhippāyaṃ ñatvā “addhā kāraṇaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:269_11: na akāraṇena tathāgatā gamanaṃ pacchinditvā nisīdantī”ti catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpesi.
atk-s0401a:269_12: Satthā nisīditvā bhikkhū āmantetvā “passatha no tumhe,
atk-s0401a:270_0: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇe bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ mukhato uggañchi,
atk-s0401a:270_2: saṭṭhimattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu.
atk-s0401a:270_3: Tañhi veyyākaraṇaṃ sutvā saṭṭhimattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ nāmakāyo santatto,
atk-s0401a:270_5: karajakāye santatte nidhānagataṃ uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ mukhato uggañchi.
atk-s0401a:270_6: Saṭṭhimattā bhikkhū “dukkaraṃ vata buddhasāsane yāvajīvaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritu”nti sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattā,
atk-s0401a:270_7: saṭṭhimattā bhikkhū satthu desanābhimukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0401a:271_0: Tattha yesaṃ uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ mukhato uggañchi,
atk-s0401a:271_6: Satthu dhammadesanā imesaṃ tiṇṇampi saphalāva jātāti.
atk-s0401a:271_9: Tepi hi sace imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ na suṇeyyuṃ,
atk-s0401a:271_10: pamattāva hutvā ṭhānaṃ jahituṃ na sakkuṇeyyuṃ.
atk-s0401a:271_11: Tato nesaṃ taṃ pāpaṃ vaḍḍhamānaṃ apāyesuyeva saṃsīdāpeyya.
atk-s0401a:271_12: Imaṃ pana desanaṃ sutvā jātasaṃvegā ṭhānaṃ jahitvā sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitā dasa sīlāni pūretvā yoniso
atk-s0401a:271_13: manasikāre yuttappayuttā keci sotāpannā keci sakadāgāmino keci anāgāmino ahesuṃ,
atk-s0401a:271_16: Itare pana sace imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ na suṇeyyuṃ,
atk-s0401a:271_17: gacchante gacchante kāle anupubbena saṅghādisesampi pārājikampi pāpuṇitvā apāyesuyeva uppajjitvā mahādukkhaṃ anubhaveyyuṃ.
atk-s0401a:271_18: Imaṃ pana desanaṃ sutvā “aho sallekhitaṃ buddhasāsanaṃ,
atk-s0401a:271_19: na sakkā amhehi yāvajīvaṃ imaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūretuṃ,
atk-s0401a:271_20: sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya upāsakadhammaṃ pūretvā dukkhā muccissāmā”ti gihibhāvaṃ upagamiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:271_21: Te tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya pañca sīlāni rakkhitvā upāsakadhammaṃ pūretvā keci sotāpannā keci sakadāgāmino keci anāgāmino jātā,
atk-s0401a:272_0: Imaṃ pana satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā devasaṅghā yehipi sutā,
atk-s0401a:272_4: buddhānaṃ sāsane yāvajīvaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritu”nti ekakkhaṇeneva dasapi bhikkhū
atk-s0401a:272_5: vīsatipi saṭṭhipi satampi sahassampi bhikkhū gihī honti.
atk-s0401a:272_6: Satthā yathāruciyā cārikaṃ caritvā puna jetavanameva āgantvā bhikkhū āmantesi –
atk-s0401a:272_8: tathāgato cārikaṃ caramāno ciraṃ ākiṇṇo vihāsi,
atk-s0401a:272_12: nāmhi kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakenā”ti.
atk-s0401a:272_13: Aḍḍhamāsaṃ ekībhāvena vītināmetvā paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito ānandattherena saddhiṃ vihāracārikaṃ caramāno
atk-s0401a:272_14: olokitolokitaṭṭhāne tanubhūtaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā jānantoyeva theraṃ pucchi – “ānanda,
atk-s0401a:272_15: aññasmiṃ kāle tathāgate cārikaṃ caritvā jetavanaṃ āgate sakalavihāro kāsāvapajjoto isivātappaṭivāto hoti,
atk-s0401a:272_19: Etarahi bhagavā tumhākaṃ aggikkhandhopamadhammadesanaṃ kathitakālato paṭṭhāya bhikkhū saṃvegappattā hutvā
atk-s0401a:272_20: “mayaṃ etaṃ dhammaṃ sabbappakārena paripūretuṃ na sakkhissāma,
atk-s0401a:272_21: asammāvattantānañca janassa saddhādeyyaṃ paribhuñjituṃ ayutta”nti gihibhāvaṃ saṅkamantīti.
atk-s0401a:273_2: “mayi paṭisallāne vītināmente na koci mama puttānaṃ ekaṃ assāsaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0401a:273_3: Sāgarassa hi otaraṇatitthāni viya bahūni imasmiṃ sāsane assāsakāraṇāni.
atk-s0401a:273_11: sattānaṃ hitapharaṇamattamevā”ti vatvā imissā aṭṭhuppattiyā imaṃ cūḷaccharāsaṅghātasuttaṃ desesi.
atk-s0401a:274_19: Idha pana mettāpubbabhāgena hitapharaṇappavattanamatteneva āsevatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:275_1: Viharatīti iriyati pavattati pāleti yapeti yāpeti carati viharati.
atk-s0401a:275_3: Iminā padena mettaṃ āsevantassa bhikkhuno iriyāpathavihāro kathito.
atk-s0401a:275_12: otiṇṇe vā anotiṇṇe vā vatthusmiṃ tantiṭhapanavasena vacanaṃ anusāsanī.
atk-s0401a:275_14: Paramatthato pana ovādoti vā anusāsanīti vā ese eke ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāte taññevāti.
atk-s0401a:275_17: bhikkhu mettācittaṃ āsevatī”ti idameva satthusāsanañceva ovādo ca,
atk-s0401a:275_18: tassa karaṇato esa sāsanakaro ovādapatikaroti veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:276_1: Raṭṭhapiṇḍanti ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya raṭṭhaṃ nissāya pabbajitena paresaṃ gehato paṭiladdhattā piṇḍapāto raṭṭhapiṇḍo nāma vuccati.
atk-s0401a:276_2: Paribhuñjatīti cattāro paribhogā theyyaparibhogo iṇaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo sāmiparibhogoti.
atk-s0401a:276_7: Tattha imassa bhikkhuno ayaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaparibhogo dvīhi kāraṇehi amogho hoti.
atk-s0401a:276_8: Accharāsaṅghātamattampi mettācittaṃ āsevanto bhikkhu raṭṭhapiṇḍassa sāmiko hutvā,
atk-s0401a:276_11: Accharāsaṅghātamattampi mettaṃ āsevantassa bhikkhuno dinnadānaṃ mahaṭṭhiyaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ mahānisaṃsaṃ
atk-s0401a:276_13: Ko pana vādo ye naṃ bahulīkarontīti ye pana imaṃ mettācittaṃ bahulaṃ āsevanti bhāventi punappunaṃ karonti,
atk-s0401a:276_14: te amoghaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ paribhuñjantīti ettha vattabbameva kiṃ?
atk-s0401a:276_15: Evarūpā hi bhikkhū raṭṭhapiṇḍassa sāmino aṇaṇā dāyādā hutvā paribhuñjantīti.
atk-s0401a:277_3: Sesaṃ imesu dvīsupi tatiye vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:277_10: Sammāsambuddho pana yāya dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā desanāvilāsappatto nāma hoti,
atk-s0401a:277_11: tassā suppaṭividdhattā attano desanāvilāsaṃ dhammissariyataṃ paṭisambhidāpabhedakusalataṃ appaṭihatasabbaññutaññāṇañca
atk-s0401a:277_12: nissāya ekakkhaṇe uppannaṃ ekacittameva tīhi koṭṭhāsehi vibhajitvā dassesīti.
atk-s0401a:278_8: Sabbete manopubbaṅgamāti mano pubbaṃ paṭhamataraṃ gacchati etesanti manopubbaṅgamā.
atk-s0401a:278_9: Ete hi kiñcāpi manena saddhiṃ ekuppādā ekavatthukā ekanirodhā ekārammaṇā ca honti.
atk-s0401a:278_10: Yasmā pana tesaṃ mano uppādako kārako janako samuṭṭhāpako nibbattako,
atk-s0401a:279_0: Paṭhamaṃ uppajjatīti yathā nāma “rājā nikkhanto”ti vutte “rājāyeva nikkhanto,
atk-s0401a:279_1: sesā rājasenā nikkhantā anikkhantā”ti pucchitabbakāraṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0401a:279_3: evameva mano uppannoti vuttakālato paṭṭhāya avasesā sahajātasaṃsaṭṭhasampayuttā uppannā na uppannāti pucchitabbakāraṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0401a:279_5: Etamatthavasaṃ paṭicca tehi saṃsaṭṭhasampayutto ekuppādekanirodhopi samāno mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppajjatīti vutto.
atk-s0401a:279_8: Byañjanacchāyaṃ pana gahetvā paṭhamaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0401a:280_0: 57. Sattame kusalāti catubhūmakāpi kusalā dhammā kathitā. Sesaṃ chaṭṭhe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:282_1: Kāyaduccarite vā vacīduccarite vā manoduccarite vā pañcasu vā kāmaguṇesu cittassa vossaggo vossaggānuppadānaṃ
atk-s0401a:282_2: kusalānaṃ vā dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya asakkaccakiriyatā asātaccakiriyatā anaṭṭhitakiriyatā olīnavuttitā nikkhittachandatā
atk-s0401a:282_3: nikkhittadhuratā anadhiṭṭhānaṃ ananuyogo anāsevanā abhāvanā abahulīkammaṃ.
atk-s0401a:283_0: Uppannā ca kusalā dhammā parihāyantīti idaṃ jhānavipassanānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0401a:283_1: Maggaphalānaṃ pana sakiṃ uppannānaṃ puna parihānaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0401a:284_0: 59. Navame appamādo pamādassa paṭipakkhavasena vitthārato veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:288_1: Sattamassa paṭhame vīriyārambhoti catukiccassa sammappadhānavīriyassa ārambho,
atk-s0401a:289_0: 62. Dutiye mahicchatāti mahālobho. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0401a:290_2: yā evarūpā icchā icchāgatā mahicchatā rāgo sārāgo cittassa sārāgo.
atk-s0401a:291_5: Na hi appamattikāya icchāya atthibhāvena so appicchoti vutto,
atk-s0401a:291_6: icchāya pana abhāvena punappunaṃ āsevitassa alobhasseva bhāvena appicchoti vutto.
atk-s0401a:292_3: Tattha sakalābhe atittassa paralābhe patthanā atricchatā nāma,

atk-s0401a:292_6: Asantaguṇasambhāvanatā pana paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā pāpicchatā nāma,

atk-s0401a:292_9: Santaguṇasambhāvanatā pana paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā mahicchatā nāma,
atk-s0401a:292_10: sāpi “idhekacco saddho samāno saddhoti maṃ jano jānātūti icchati,
atk-s0401a:292_11: sīlavā samāno sīlavāti maṃ jano jānātū”ti iminā nayena āgatāyeva.
atk-s0401a:295_0: Santaguṇanigūhanatā pana paṭiggahaṇe ca mattaññutā appicchatā nāma,
atk-s0401a:295_1: tāya samannāgato puggalo attani vijjamānampi guṇaṃ paṭicchādetukāmatāya saddho samāno “saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati. Sīlavā,
atk-s0401a:295_6: khīṇāsavo samāno “khīṇāsavoti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati seyyathāpi majjhantikatthero.
atk-s0401a:296_2: So asokassa dhammarañño vihāramahadivase saṅghatthero ahosi.
atk-s0401a:296_5: Thero “mādise khīṇāsave rañño saṅgahaṃ akaronte añño ko karissatī”ti pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā saṅghattherassa ukkhittapiṇḍaṃ gaṇhantoyeva ummujji.
atk-s0401a:296_6: Evaṃ khīṇāsavo samāno “khīṇāsavoti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati.
atk-s0401a:296_7: Evaṃ appiccho ca pana bhikkhu anuppannaṃ lābhaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0401a:296_10: Yathā yathā hi so attano appicchatāya appaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0401a:296_11: tathā tathā tassa vatte pasannā manussā bahū denti.
atk-s0401a:297_5: Tattha catūsu paccayesu appiccho paccayaappiccho nāma.

atk-s0401a:301_1: Kaniṭṭho upaṭṭhākena pesitaṃ ucchukhaṇḍikaṃ gahetvā jeṭṭhassa santikaṃ agamāsi “paribhogaṃ, bhante,

atk-s0401a:302_0: Yo pana sāketatissatthero viya bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati,

atk-s0401a:302_4: Tattha antovassaṃ theranavamajjhimānaṃ upakāro hutvā mahāpavāraṇāya uposathadivase dhammakathāya janapadaṃ khobhetvā gato.

atk-s0401a:304_1: Catutthe asantuṭṭhitāti asantuṭṭhe puggale sevantassa bhajantassa payirupāsantassa uppanno asantosasaṅkhāto lobho.
atk-s0401a:305_1: Pañcame santuṭṭhitāti santuṭṭhe puggale sevantassa bhajantassa payirupāsantassa uppanno alobhasaṅkhāto santoso.
atk-s0401a:306_1: idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā.
atk-s0401a:306_2: So teneva yāpeti aññaṃ na pattheti,
atk-s0401a:306_5: Atha pana pakatidubbalo vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā,
atk-s0401a:306_7: So sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0401a:306_10: So paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni vā pana cīvarāni labhitvā “idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ,
atk-s0401a:306_13: idaṃ appalābhānaṃ hotū”ti datvā tesaṃ purāṇacīvaraṃ vā saṅkārakūṭādito vā nantakāni uccinitvā tehi saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0401a:307_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0401a:307_5: Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ labhati,
atk-s0401a:307_7: so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno taṃ datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0401a:307_10: So taṃ cīvaraṃ viya theracirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ piṇḍāya vā caritvā missakāhāraṃ bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0401a:308_0: Idha pana bhikkhu senāsanaṃ labhati manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā,
atk-s0401a:308_1: so tena neva somanassaṃ na domanassaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0401a:308_4: Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā senāsanaṃ labhati,
atk-s0401a:308_6: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0401a:309_0: Aparo mahāpuñño leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati.
atk-s0401a:309_1: So tāni cīvarādīni viya theracirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ datvā yattha katthaci vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0401a:309_5: niddābhibhūtassa puna paṭibujjhato pāpavitakkā pātubhavantī”ti paṭisañcikkhitvā tādisaṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0401a:309_6: so taṃ paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsarukkhamūlādīsu vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0401a:310_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0401a:310_6: Yo pana telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati,
atk-s0401a:310_7: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato telaṃ gahetvā aññadeva vā pariyesitvā bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0401a:311_1: So taṃ cīvaraṃ viya theracirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatena yena kenaci yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0401a:311_2: Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharītakaṃ ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ –
atk-s0401a:311_4: yadicchaka”nti vuccamāno “sacassa tesu aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati,
atk-s0401a:311_5: atha muttaharītakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇita”nti catumadhuraṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakena bhesajjaṃ karontopi paramasantuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0401a:311_7: Imesaṃ pana paccekapaccayesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ santosānaṃ yathāsāruppasantosova aggo.
atk-s0401a:314_0: 69. Navame sampajaññanti sampajānabhāvo, paññāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Sampajānassāti sampajānantassa.

atk-s0401a:323_7: Atha bhagavā tesaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā “mayi gate mahatī desanā bhavissatī”ti ñatvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma
atk-s0401a:323_12: asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ pubbe bahuñātikaṃ ahosi bahupakkhaṃ,

atk-s0401a:324_4: Yadidaṃ paññāparihānīti yā esā mama sāsane kammassakatapaññāya jhānapaññāya vipassanāpaññāya maggapaññāya phalapaññāya ca parihāni,

atk-s0401a:325_7: Satthā tesaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā purimanayeneva āgantvā dhammāsane nisinno “kāya nuttha,

atk-s0401a:335_6: ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ attano santāne samuṭṭhitaṃ kāraṇanti katvā na aññaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇampi samanupassāmīti.
atk-s0401a:338_1: Ito paresu adhammaṃ dhammoti dīpentītiādīsu suttantapariyāyena tāva dasa kusalakammapathā dhammo,
atk-s0401a:338_3: Tathā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro iddhipādā pañcindriyāni pañca balāni satta bojjhaṅgā

atk-s0401a:338_5: tayo satipaṭṭhānā tayo sammappadhānā tayo iddhipādā cha indriyāni cha balāni aṭṭha bojjhaṅgā navaṅgiko
atk-s0401a:338_6: maggoti ca cattāro upādānā pañca nīvaraṇāni satta anusayā aṭṭha micchattāni ca ayaṃ adhammo.

atk-s0401a:339_3: Tatheva dhammakoṭṭhāsesu ekaṃ gahetvā “ayaṃ adhammo”ti kathentā dhammaṃ adhammoti dīpenti nāma.
atk-s0401a:339_4: Vinayapariyāyena pana bhūtena vatthunā codetvā sāretvā yathāpaṭiññāya kattabbaṃ kammaṃ dhammo nāma,
