atk-s0401a:348_0: Gacchante gacchante kāle vinayapiṭakampi matthakato paṭṭhāya parihāyati.
atk-s0401a:348_8: Yadā saddho pasanno rājā hatthikkhandhe suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakamhi sahassatthavikaṃ ṭhapāpetvā “buddhehi kathitaṃ
atk-s0401a:348_9: cātuppadikagāthaṃ jānanto imaṃ sahassaṃ gaṇhatū”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā gaṇhanakaṃ alabhitvā “ekavāraṃ
atk-s0401a:348_10: carāpite nāma suṇantāpi honti assuṇantāpī”ti yāvatatiyaṃ carāpetvā gaṇhanakaṃ alabhitvā rājapurisā taṃ
atk-s0401a:349_0: Gacchante gacchante kāle cīvaraggahaṇaṃ pattaggahaṇaṃ sammiñjanapasāraṇaṃ ālokitavilokitaṃ na pāsādikaṃ hoti.
atk-s0401a:349_1: Nigaṇṭhasamaṇā viya alābupattaṃ bhikkhū pattaṃ aggabāhāya pakkhipitvā ādāya vicaranti,
atk-s0401a:349_3: Gacchante gacchante pana kāle aggabāhato otāretvā hatthena vā sikkāya vā olambitvā vicaranti,
atk-s0401a:349_4: cīvarampi rajanasāruppaṃ akatvā oṭṭhaṭṭhivaṇṇaṃ katvā vicaranti.
atk-s0401a:349_5: Gacchante gacchante kāle rajanampi na hoti dasacchindanampi ovaṭṭikavijjhanampi,
atk-s0401a:349_7: Puna ovaṭṭikaṃ vijjhitvā kappaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0401a:349_8: Tato ubhayampi akatvā dasā chetvā paribbājakā viya caranti.
atk-s0401a:349_9: Gacchante gacchante kāle “ko iminā amhākaṃ attho”ti khuddakaṃ kāsāvakhaṇḍaṃ hatthe vā gīvāya vā bandhanti,
atk-s0401a:349_11: dārabharaṇaṃ vā karontā kasitvā vapitvā jīvikaṃ kappetvā vicaranti.
atk-s0401a:349_12: Tadā dakkhiṇaṃ dentā saṅghaṃ uddissa etesaṃ denti.
atk-s0401a:349_17: tesu dussīlesu saṅghaṃ uddissa dānaṃ dassanti,
atk-s0401a:349_20: Tato gacchante kāle nānāvidhāni kammāni karontā “papañco esa,
atk-s0401a:349_21: kiṃ iminā amhāka”nti kāsāvakhaṇḍaṃ chinditvā araññe khipanti.
atk-s0401a:349_22: Etasmiṃ kāle liṅgaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0401a:349_23: Kassapadasabalassa kira kālato paṭṭhāya yonakānaṃ setavatthaṃ pārupitvā caraṇaṃ cārittaṃ jātanti.
atk-s0401a:350_8: Tato tattha tattha sakkārasammānaṃ alabhamānā dhātuyo buddhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabalena sakkārasammānalabhanakaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0401a:350_9: Gacchante gacchante kāle sabbaṭṭhānesu sakkārasammāno na hoti.
atk-s0401a:350_10: Sāsanassa hi osakkanakāle imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe sabbā dhātuyo sannipatitvā mahācetiyaṃ,
atk-s0401a:350_13: Nāgabhavanatopi devalokatopi brahmalokatopi dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅkameva gamissanti.
atk-s0401a:350_15: Sabbā dhātuyo mahābodhimaṇḍe sannipatitvā buddharūpaṃ gahetvā bodhimaṇḍe pallaṅkena nisinnabuddhasarīrasiriṃ dassenti.
atk-s0401a:350_16: Dvattiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni asīti anubyañjanāni byāmappabhāti sabbaṃ paripuṇṇameva hoti.
atk-s0401a:350_17: Tato yamakapāṭihāriyadivase viya pāṭihāriyaṃ katvā dassenti.
atk-s0401a:350_18: Tadā manussabhūtasatto nāma tattha gato natthi,
atk-s0401a:350_19: dasasahassacakkavāḷe pana devatā sabbāva sannipatitvā “ajja dasabalo parinibbāyati,
atk-s0401a:350_21: Atha dhātusarīrato tejo samuṭṭhāya taṃ sarīraṃ apaṇṇattikabhāvaṃ gameti.
atk-s0401a:350_22: Dhātusarīrato samuṭṭhitā jālā yāva brahmalokā uggacchissati,
atk-s0401a:350_23: sāsapamattāya sesāyapi dhātuyā sati ekajālāva bhavissati.
atk-s0401a:350_25: Evaṃ mahantaṃ ānubhāvaṃ dassetvā dhātuyo antaradhāyanti.
atk-s0401a:350_26: Tadā sannipatitā devasaṅghā buddhānaṃ parinibbutadivase viya dibbagandhamālātūriyādīhi sakkāraṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:350_27: tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vanditvā “anāgate uppajjanakaṃ buddhaṃ passituṃ labhissāma bhagavā”ti vatvā
atk-s0401a:351_3: Teneva imasmiṃ dīpe caṇḍālatissamahābhaye sakko devarājā mahāuḷumpaṃ māpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ ārocāpesi “mahantaṃ bhayaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:351_5: bhikkhū paccayehi kilamantā pariyattiṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkhissanti,
atk-s0401a:351_6: paratīraṃ gantvā ayyehi jīvitaṃ rakkhituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0401a:351_11: Tadā samuddatīraṃ patvā saṭṭhi bhikkhū katikaṃ katvā “amhākaṃ ettha gamanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0401a:351_12: mayaṃ idheva hutvā tepiṭakaṃ rakkhissāmā”ti tato nivattitvā dakkhiṇamalayajanapadaṃ gantvā kandamūlapaṇṇehi jīvikaṃ kappentā vasiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:351_14: avahante vālikaṃ ussāretvā parivāretvā sīsāni ekaṭṭhāne katvā pariyattiṃ sammasanti.
atk-s0401a:351_15: Iminā niyāmena dvādasa saṃvaccharāni sāṭṭhakathaṃ tepiṭakaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā dhārayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:352_0: Bhaye vūpasante sattasatā bhikkhū attano gataṭṭhāne sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake ekakkharampi ekabyañjanampi
atk-s0401a:352_1: anāsetvā imameva dīpamāgamma kallagāmajanapade maṇḍalārāmavihāraṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:352_2: Therānaṃ āgamanappavattiṃ sutvā imasmiṃ dīpe ohīnā saṭṭhi bhikkhū “there passissāmā”ti gantvā therehi
atk-s0401a:352_3: saddhiṃ tepiṭakaṃ sodhentā ekakkharampi ekabyañjanampi asamentaṃ nāma na passiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:352_4: Tasmiṃ ṭhāne therānaṃ ayaṃ kathā udapādi “pariyatti nu kho sāsanassa mūlaṃ,
atk-s0401a:352_8: Atha ne therā “tumhākaṃ dvinnampi janānaṃ vacanamatteneva na karoma,
atk-s0401a:352_10: Suttaṃ āharituṃ na bhāroti “ime ca, subhadda,
atk-s0401a:352_16: Imaṃ suttaṃ sutvā dhammakathikā attano vādaṭhapanatthāya imaṃ suttaṃ āhariṃsu –
atk-s0401a:354_0: Tāva dakkhanti ālokaṃ, sūriye abbhuṭṭhite yathā.
atk-s0401a:356_0: Tamo bhavissati loke, sūriye atthaṅgate yathā.
atk-s0401a:358_0: Paṭipattiyaṃ ṭhito dhīro, yogakkhemā na dhaṃsatī”ti.
atk-s0401a:359_0: Imasmiṃ sutte āhaṭe paṃsukūlikattherā tuṇhī ahesuṃ,
atk-s0401a:359_2: Yathā hi gavasatassa vā gavasahassassa vā antare paveṇipālikāya dhenuyā asati so vaṃso sā paveṇi na ghaṭīyati,
atk-s0401a:359_3: evamevaṃ āraddhavipassakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satepi sahassepi saṃvijjamāne pariyattiyā asati ariyamaggapaṭivedho nāma na hoti.
atk-s0401a:359_4: Yathā ca nidhikumbhiyā jānanatthāya pāsāṇapiṭṭhe akkharesu ṭhapitesu yāva akkharāni dharanti,
atk-s0401a:359_5: tāva nidhikumbhi naṭṭhā nāma na hoti.
atk-s0401a:359_6: Evamevaṃ pariyattiyā dharamānāya sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma na hotīti.
atk-s0401a:362_0: 140. Ekādasame vagge adhammaṃ adhammotiādīni vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0401a:365_1: Dvādasame pana anāpattiṃ āpattītiādīsu “anāpatti ajānantassa atheyyacittassa namaraṇādhippāyassa anullapanādhippāyassa
atk-s0401a:365_2: namocanādhippāyassā”ti tattha tattha vuttā anāpatti anāpatti nāma,
atk-s0401a:365_3: “jānantassa theyyacittassā”tiādinā nayena vuttā āpatti āpatti nāma,
atk-s0401a:368_8: Tattha “puggalo satto itthī puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māro”ti evarūpā sammutidesanā,
atk-s0401a:368_9: “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā khandhā dhātū āyatanāni satipaṭṭhānā”ti evarūpā paramatthadesanā.
atk-s0401a:368_10: Tattha bhagavā ye sammutivasena desanaṃ sutvā atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā mohaṃ pahāya visesaṃ adhigantuṃ samatthā,
atk-s0401a:368_12: Ye pana paramatthavasena desanaṃ sutvā atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā mohaṃ pahāya visesamadhigantuṃ samatthā,
atk-s0401a:369_1: yathā hi desabhāsākusalo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ atthasaṃvaṇṇanako ācariyo ye damiḷabhāsāya vutte atthaṃ jānanti,
atk-s0401a:369_5: Evaṃ te māṇavakā chekaṃ byattaṃ ācariyamāgamma khippameva sippaṃ uggaṇhanti.
atk-s0401a:369_7: tayo vedā viya kathetabbabhāve ṭhitāni tīṇi piṭakāni,
atk-s0401a:369_9: nānādesabhāsā māṇavakā viya sammutiparamatthavasena paṭivijjhanasamatthā veneyyasattā,
atk-s0401a:369_10: ācariyassa damiḷabhāsādiācikkhanaṃ viya bhagavato sammutiparamatthavasena desanā veditabbā.
atk-s0401a:376_0: Apica aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ katheti –
atk-s0401a:376_9: “Khandhadhātuāyatanāni hiriyanti ottappantī”ti hi vutte mahājano na jānāti,
atk-s0401a:376_11: paṭisattu hoti “kimidaṃ khandhadhātuāyatanāni hiriyanti ottappanti nāmā”ti?
atk-s0401a:376_13: puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māro”ti vutte pana jānāti,
atk-s0401a:382_1: dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi mahājano na jānāti,
atk-s0401a:382_4: “Puggalā paṭiggaṇhanti sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammo”ti vutte pana jānāti,
atk-s0401a:383_1: lokasamaññāya lokaniruttiyā lokābhilāpe ṭhitāyeva dhammaṃ desenti.
atk-s0401a:383_2: Tasmā bhagavā lokasammutiyā appahānatthampi puggalakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0401a:384_0: Iti eko ca so puggalo cāti ekapuggalo.
atk-s0401a:384_3: So hi dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ paṭipāṭiyā āvajjanaṃ ādiṃ katvā bodhisambhāraguṇehi ceva buddhaguṇehi ca sesamahājanena asadisoti asadisaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo.
atk-s0401a:384_5: te sesasattānaṃ guṇehi visiṭṭhāti guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo.
atk-s0401a:384_7: tehi saddhiṃ ayameva eko rūpakāyaguṇehi ceva nāmakāyaguṇehi ca samoti asamasamaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo.
atk-s0401a:386_15: orato majjhe”ti evaṃ paricchinne āyāmato tiyojanasate vitthārato aḍḍhateyyayojanasate parikkhepato navayojanasate majjhimadese uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:386_17: paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā asīti mahātherā buddhamātā buddhapitā cakkavattī rājā aññe ca sārappattā brāhmaṇagahapatikā ettheva uppajjanti.
atk-s0401a:387_0: Uppajjamāno uppajjatīti idaṃ pana ubhayampi vippakatavacanameva.
atk-s0401a:387_2: na aññena kāraṇenāti evaṃ panettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:387_3: Evarūpañcettha lakkhaṇaṃ na sakkā etaṃ aññena saddalakkhaṇena paṭibāhituṃ.
atk-s0401a:388_3: Esa hi dīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya laddhabyākaraṇo buddhakārake dhamme pariyesanto dasa pāramiyo disvā
atk-s0401a:388_4: “ime dhammā mayā pūretabbā”ti katasanniṭṭhāno dānapāramiṃ pūrentopi uppajjamāno nāma.
atk-s0401a:388_10: Attatthacariyaṃ ñātatthacariyaṃ lokatthacariyaṃ pūrayamānopi uppajjamāno nāma.
atk-s0401a:388_11: Kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni buddhakārake dhamme matthakaṃ pāpentopi uppajjamāno nāma.
atk-s0401a:388_12: Vessantarattabhāvaṃ pahāya tusitapure paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā saṭṭhivassasatasahassādhikā sattapaṇṇāsavassakoṭiyo tiṭṭhantopi uppajjamāno nāma.
atk-s0401a:388_13: Devatāhi yācito pañcamahāvilokitaṃ viloketvā mahāmāyādeviyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantopi,
atk-s0401a:388_14: anūnādhike dasa māse gabbhavāsaṃ vasantopi uppajjamāno nāma.
atk-s0401a:388_15: Ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe tiṭṭhantopi uppajjamāno nāma.
atk-s0401a:388_16: Kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā rāhulabhaddassa jātadivase channasahāyo kaṇḍakaṃ vāhanavaraṃ āruyha nikkhamantopi uppajjamānova nāma.
atk-s0401a:388_17: Tīṇi rajjāni atikkamantopi anomānadītīre pabbajantopi uppajjamāno nāma.
atk-s0401a:388_19: Paripakkagate ñāṇe oḷārikāhāraṃ āharantopi uppajjamānova nāma.
atk-s0401a:388_20: Sāyanhasamaye visākhapuṇṇamāya mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha mārabalaṃ vidhametvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā
atk-s0401a:388_21: majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ parisodhetvā pacchimayāmasamanantare dvādasaṅgaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomato
atk-s0401a:388_23: Sotāpattiphalakkhaṇepi sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇepi sakadāgāmiphalakkhaṇepi anāgāmimaggakkhaṇepi anāgāmiphalakkhaṇepi uppajjamānova nāma.
atk-s0401a:388_26: Buddhānaṃ hi sāvakānaṃ viya na paṭipāṭiyā iddhividhañāṇādīni uppajjanti,
atk-s0401a:388_27: saheva pana arahattamaggena sakalopi sabbaññutaññāṇādi guṇarāsi āgatova nāma hoti.
atk-s0401a:388_28: Tasmā te nipphattasabbakiccattā arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppannā nāma honti.
atk-s0401a:389_4: Yo tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā amatapānaṃ pivitvā dhammaṃ paṭivijjhi, tassa.
atk-s0401a:389_5: Bhagavatā hi mahābodhimaṇḍe sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā bodhimaṇḍā isipatanaṃ āgamma “dveme,
atk-s0401a:389_7: antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā”ti dhammacakkappavattanasutte desite āyasmatā aññāsikoṇḍaññattherena saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:389_10: Pañcamadivase anattalakkhaṇasuttantapariyosāne pañcavaggiyā therā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:389_12: Tato yasadārakappamukhe pañcapaṇṇāsa purise arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi,
atk-s0401a:389_13: tato kappāsikavanasaṇḍe tiṃsa bhaddavaggiye tayo magge ca tīṇi phalāni ca sampāpesi,
atk-s0401a:389_16: tālaṭṭhivane bimbisārappamukhā ekādasa nahutā brāhmaṇagahapatikā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:389_23: Ānandaseṭṭhisamāgame caturāsītiyā ca pāṇasahassehi amatapānaṃ pītaṃ.
atk-s0401a:389_24: Pāsāṇakacetiye pārāyanasuttantakathādivase cuddasa koṭiyo amatapānaṃ piviṃsu.
atk-s0401a:389_26: tāvatiṃsabhavane paṇḍukambalasilāya nisīditvā mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā sattappakaraṇaṃ abhidhammaṃ desentassa asīti pāṇakoṭiyo,
atk-s0401a:389_29: Mahāsamayasuttante maṅgalasuttante cūḷarāhulovāde samacittapaṭipadāyāti imesu catūsu ṭhānesu abhisamayaṃ pattasattānaṃ paricchedo natthi.
atk-s0401a:389_31: Yāvajjadivasā ito paraṃ anāgate ca sāsanaṃ nissāya saggamokkhamagge patiṭṭhahantānaṃ vasenāpi ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:390_1: avasesānaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnampi atthāya hitāya sukhāyeva uppanno.
atk-s0401a:390_2: Sahetukapaṭisandhike pana maggaphalasacchikiriyāya bhabbe puggale dassetuṃ etaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0401a:390_3: Tasmā etesampi atthāya hitāya sukhāyeva uppannoti veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:392_2: Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātaṃ hoti adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ abhāvitaṃ.
atk-s0401a:392_3: Tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhūtatthāya vibhāvanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0401a:393_1: Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ tulitaṃ tīritaṃ vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ.
atk-s0401a:393_2: So aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0401a:394_1: Pakatiyā saṃsayapakkhanto hoti vimatipakkhanto dveḷhakajāto “evaṃ nu kho,
atk-s0401a:395_1: Bhagavā hi bhikkhūnaṃ anumatiyā pañhaṃ pucchati –
atk-s0401a:395_4: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti? “Aniccaṃ, bhante”.
atk-s0401a:395_6: dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti? “Dukkhaṃ, bhante”.
atk-s0401a:395_8: kallaṃ nu kho taṃ samanupassituṃ etaṃ mama,
atk-s0401a:397_0: Tattha buddhānaṃ purimā tisso pucchā natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0401a:397_1: Buddhānaṃ hi tīsu addhāsu kiñci saṅkhataṃ addhāvimuttaṃ vā asaṅkhataṃ adiṭṭhaṃ ajānitaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0401a:397_3: Yaṃ pana bhagavatā attano ñāṇena paṭividdhaṃ,
atk-s0401a:397_4: tassa aññena samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā saddhiṃ saṃsandanakiccaṃ natthi.
atk-s0401a:397_6: Yasmā panesa akathaṃkathī tiṇṇavicikiccho sabbadhammesu vihatasaṃsayo,
atk-s0401a:397_8: Itarā pana dve pucchā bhagavato atthi,
atk-s0401a:398_0: Idāni tāya pucchāya puṭṭhaṃ ekapuggalaṃ vibhāvento tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddhoti āha.
atk-s0401a:398_1: Tattha tathāgatoti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato –
atk-s0401a:399_1: Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā sammāsambuddhā āgatā,
atk-s0401a:399_16: aṅgapariccāgaṃ nayanadhanarajjaputtadārapariccāganti ime pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajitvā,
atk-s0401a:399_20: kassapo bhagavā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne cattāro sammappadhāne cattāro iddhipāde pañcindriyāni pañca balāni
atk-s0401a:399_21: satta bojjhaṅge ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetvā brūhetvā āgato,
atk-s0401a:405_4: So hi sampatijātova samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gato. Yathāha –
atk-s0401a:405_6: bodhisatto samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne,
atk-s0401a:405_13: Tañcassa gamanaṃ tathaṃ ahosi avitathaṃ anekesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhāvena.
atk-s0401a:405_14: Yañhi so sampatijātova samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahi,
atk-s0401a:405_18: “suvaṇṇadaṇḍā vītipatanti cāmarā”ti ettha vuttacāmarukkhepo pana sabbatitthiyanimmathanassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0401a:405_23: Tañcassa gamanaṃ kathaṃ ahosi avitathaṃ tesaṃyeva visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhāvena.
atk-s0401a:415_2: ayampi bhagavā tatheva nekkhammena kāmacchandaṃ pahāya gato,
atk-s0401a:428_0: Khaye ñāṇassa samucchedalakkhaṇaṃ, anuppāde ñāṇassa passaddhilakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0401a:429_9: Evaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ ñāṇagatiyā āgato avirajjhitvā patto anuppattoti tathāgato.
atk-s0401a:431_0: Apica jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho…pe…
atk-s0401a:431_4: jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa paccayaṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho.
atk-s0401a:431_6: Tasmāpi tathānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgatoti vuccati.
atk-s0401a:432_2: sadevamanussāya aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0401a:432_4: Evaṃ jānatā passatā ca tena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānakapadavasena vā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ?
atk-s0401a:432_5: Yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ pītaka”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0401a:432_6: anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvepaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ tathameva hoti,
atk-s0401a:432_12: sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā,
atk-s0401a:433_1: Yaṃ rattiṃ bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
atk-s0401a:433_2: yañca rattiṃ yamakasālānaṃ antare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi,
atk-s0401a:433_3: etthantare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇe kāle paṭhamabodhiyāpi majjhimabodhiyāpi pacchimabodhiyāpi yaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ,
atk-s0401a:433_4: sabbaṃ taṃ atthato ca byañjanato ca anupavajjaṃ anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ rāgamadanimmadanaṃ dosamohamadanimmadanaṃ,
atk-s0401a:433_6: sabbaṃ taṃ ekamuddikāya lañchitaṃ viya ekanāḷikāya mitaṃ viya ekatulāya tulitaṃ viya ca tathameva hoti avitathaṃ. Tenāha – “yañca, cunda,
atk-s0401a:433_9: yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati,
atk-s0401a:433_10: sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hoti no aññathā.
atk-s0401a:434_2: Tatho aviparīto āgado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evampetasmiṃ atthe padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0401a:435_1: Bhagavato hi vācāya kāyo anulometi kāyassapi vācā,
atk-s0401a:435_2: tasmā yathāvādī tathākārī yathākārī tathāvādī ca hoti.
atk-s0401a:436_1: Upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi vimuttiyāpi,
atk-s0401a:436_2: na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi,
atk-s0401a:436_3: atulo appameyyo anuttaro rājarājo devadevo sakkānamatisakko brahmānamatibrahmā. Tenāha –
atk-s0401a:436_6: sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthu daso vasavattī.
atk-s0401a:437_4: Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko dibbāgadena sappe viya sabbaparappavādino sadevakañca lokaṃ abhibhavati.
atk-s0401a:437_5: Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo ca agado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:438_2: gatoti avagato atīto patto paṭipannoti attho.
atk-s0401a:438_3: Tattha sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya gato avagatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0401a:438_4: Lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato,
atk-s0401a:438_5: lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato pattoti tathāgato,
atk-s0401a:438_6: lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathāya gato paṭipannoti tathāgato.
atk-s0401a:440_2: Sabbākārena pana tathāgatova tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvaṃ vaṇṇeyya.
atk-s0401a:441_3: pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi tāva kāraṇehi arahanti veditabbo.
atk-s0401a:441_4: Sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā pana sammāsambuddhoti ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0401a:441_5: vitthārato panetaṃ padadvayaṃ visuddhimagge buddhānussativaṇṇanāyaṃ pakāsitanti.
atk-s0401a:442_2: Dullabho lokasminti imasmiṃ sattaloke dullabho sudullabho paramadullabho.
atk-s0401a:442_4: Ekavāraṃ dānapāramiṃ pūretvā buddhena bhavituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0401a:442_5: dve vāre dasa vāre vīsati vāre paññāsa vāre vārasataṃ vārasahassaṃ vārasatasahassaṃ vārakoṭisatasahassampi
atk-s0401a:442_6: dānapāramiṃ pūretvā buddhena bhavituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0401a:442_7: tathā ekadivasaṃ dve divase dasa divase vīsati divase paññāsa divase divasasataṃ divasasahassaṃ divasasatasahassaṃ divasakoṭisatasahassaṃ.
atk-s0401a:442_14: Kappānaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni tīṇi asaṅkhyeyyāni dānapāramiṃ pūretvā buddhena bhavituṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0401a:442_17: Pacchimakoṭiyā pana kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dasa pāramiyo pūretvā buddhena bhavituṃ sakkāti iminā kāraṇena dullabho.
atk-s0401a:443_2: Acchariyoti andhassa pabbatārohaṇaṃ viya niccaṃ na hotīti attho.
atk-s0401a:443_9: arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvā cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā pātubhavantī”ti evamādīhi anekehi
atk-s0401a:444_0: Abhinīhārassa hi sampādake aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā ekabuddhassa sammukhe mahābodhimaṇḍe mānasaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0401a:444_1: nisajjanaṃ nāma na aññassa kassaci āciṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:444_3: Tathā buddhānaṃ santike byākaraṇaṃ labhitvā anivattakena hutvā vīriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhāya buddhakārakadhammānaṃ
atk-s0401a:444_6: Tathā pāramiyo gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā vessantarattabhāvasadise attabhāve ṭhatvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitānaṃ
atk-s0401a:444_7: hatthīnaṃ sattasatāni assānaṃ sattasatānīti evaṃ sattasatakamahādānaṃ datvā jālikumārasadisaṃ puttaṃ,
atk-s0401a:444_9: maddīdevisadisaṃ bhariyañca dānamukhe niyyātetvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā dutiye attabhāve tusitabhavane paṭisandhiggahaṇampi na aññassa kassaci āciṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:444_11: Tusitapure yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā devatānaṃ āyācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā pañcamahāvilokanaṃ viloketvā satassa
atk-s0401a:444_12: sampajānassa tusitapurā cavitvā mahābhogakule paṭisandhiggahaṇampi na aññassa kassaci āciṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:444_21: sabbadisāsu sīhavilokanaṃ viloketvā attanā paṭisamaṃ kañci sattaṃ adisvā “aggohamasmi lokassā”ti evaṃ sīhanādanadanampi,
atk-s0401a:444_23: mahābodhimaṇḍe pallaṅkena nisinnassa māravijayaṃ ādiṃ katvā pubbenivāsānussatidibbacakkhuvisodhanāni
atk-s0401a:444_25: paṭhamadhammadesanāya anuttaraṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dhammacakkappavattanampīti evamādi sabbaṃ na aññassa kassaci āciṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0401a:445_1: Catutthe kālakiriyāti ekasmiṃ kāle pākaṭā kiriyāti kālakiriyā.
atk-s0401a:445_2: Tathāgato hi pañcacattālīsa vassāni ṭhatvā tīṇi piṭakāni pañca nikāye navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ caturāsīti
atk-s0401a:445_3: dhammakkhandhasahassāni pakāsetvā mahājanaṃ nibbānaninnaṃ nibbānapoṇaṃ katvā yamakasālānamantare nipanno
atk-s0401a:445_4: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ āmantetvā appamādena ovaditvā sato sampajāno anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0401a:445_5: Ayamassa kiriyā yāvajjatanā pākaṭāti ekasmiṃ kāle pākaṭā kiriyāti kālakiriyā.
atk-s0401a:445_7: Tattha cakkavattirañño kālakiriyā ekacakkavāḷe devamanussānaṃ anutāpakarā hoti.
atk-s0401a:445_8: Buddhānaṃ kālakiriyā dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devamanussānaṃ anutāpakarā hoti.
atk-s0401a:446_1: Pañcame adutiyoti dutiyassa buddhassa abhāvā adutiyo.
atk-s0401a:446_8: Kappasatasahassādhikāni dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā sāmaṃ paṭividdhapaccekabodhiñāṇo paccekabuddho nāma.
atk-s0401a:446_9: Kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri vā aṭṭha vā soḷasa vā asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ
atk-s0401a:446_11: Imesu catūsu buddhesu sabbaññubuddhova adutiyo nāma.
atk-s0401a:446_12: Na hi tena saddhiṃ añño sabbaññubuddho nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:447_0: Asahāyoti attabhāvena vā paṭividdhadhammehi vā sadiso sahāyo nāma assa natthīti asahāyo.
atk-s0401a:447_1: “Laddhasahāyo kho pana so bhagavā sekhānañceva paṭipadāna”nti iminā pana pariyāyena sekhāsekhā buddhānaṃ sahāyā nāma honti.
atk-s0401a:447_3: tassa attabhāvasadisā aññā paṭimā natthīti appaṭimo.
atk-s0401a:447_4: Yāpi ca manussā suvaṇṇarajatādimayā paṭimā karonti,
atk-s0401a:447_5: tāsu vālaggamattampi okāsaṃ tathāgatassa attabhāvasadisaṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthīti sabbathāpi appaṭimo.
atk-s0401a:448_0: Appaṭisamoti attabhāvenevassa paṭisamo nāma koci natthīti appaṭisamo.
atk-s0401a:448_1: Appaṭibhāgoti ye tathāgatena “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā nayena dhammā desitā,
atk-s0401a:448_3: tayo vā pañca vā”tiādinā nayena paṭibhāgaṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthīti appaṭibhāgo.
atk-s0401a:448_4: Appaṭipuggaloti añño koci “ahaṃ buddho”ti evaṃ paṭiññaṃ kātuṃ samattho puggalo natthīti appaṭipuggalo.
atk-s0401a:449_0: Dvipadānaṃ aggoti sammāsambuddho apadānaṃ dvipadānaṃ catuppadānaṃ bahuppadānaṃ rūpīnaṃ arūpīnaṃ saññīnaṃ
atk-s0401a:449_4: Imasmiñhi loke seṭṭho nāma uppajjamāno apadacatuppadabahuppadesu na uppajjati,
atk-s0401a:449_8: Manussesu uppajjamāno tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ vase vattetuṃ samattho buddho hutvā uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:449_9: Devesu uppajjamāno dasasahassilokadhātuṃ vasavattī mahābrahmā hutvā uppajjati.
atk-s0401a:449_10: So tassa kappiyakārako vā ārāmiko vā sampajjati.
atk-s0401a:449_11: Iti tatopi seṭṭhataravasenesa dvipadānaṃ aggoti vutto.
atk-s0401a:450_5: ekapuggalassa tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvena mahantassa cakkhussa pātubhāvo hoti.
atk-s0401a:450_6: Tasmiṃ puggale pātubhūte taṃ pātubhūtameva hoti,
atk-s0401a:450_14: Ubhinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ paññāālokasadisoyeva hi ettha āloko,
atk-s0401a:450_18: mahato obhāsassā”ti imāni ca pana tīṇipi lokiyalokuttaramissakāni kathitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0401a:451_8: Āyasmā hi ānandatthero sāyaṃpātaṃ tathāgataṃ cakkhuviññāṇena daṭṭhuṃ labhati,
atk-s0401a:451_10: Aññopi sotāpanno vā sakadāgāmī vā anāgāmī vā ānandatthero viya tathāgataṃ dassanāya labhati,
atk-s0401a:451_12: Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya dasabalaṃ dassanāya labhitvā taṃ dassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0401a:452_0: Ānandattheroyeva ca abhikkhaṇaṃ dasabalassa vacanaṃ sotaviññāṇena sotuṃ labhati,
atk-s0401a:452_2: Aññepi sotāpannādayo ānandatthero viya tathāgatassa vacanaṃ savanāya labhanti,
atk-s0401a:452_4: Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sotuṃ labhitvā taṃ savanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0401a:453_2: Aññepi sotāpannādayo ānandatthero viya dasabale saddhāpaṭilābhaṃ labhanti,
atk-s0401a:453_4: Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya dasabale saddhāpaṭilābhaṃ labhitvā taṃ lābhaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpeti,
atk-s0401a:454_0: Ānandattheroyeva ca dasabalassa sāsane tisso sikkhā sikkhati,
atk-s0401a:454_2: Aññepi sotāpannādayo ānandatthero viya dasabalassa sāsane tisso sikkhā sikkhanti,
atk-s0401a:454_4: Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya dasabalassa sāsane tisso sikkhā sikkhitvā tā sikkhā vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpeti.
atk-s0401a:455_2: Aññepi sotāpannādayo ānandatthero viya abhiṇhaṃ dasabalaṃ paricaranti,
atk-s0401a:455_4: Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya dasabalaṃ paricaritvā taṃ pāricariyaṃ vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpeti,
atk-s0401a:456_0: Ānandattheroyeva ca dasabalassa lokiyalokuttare guṇe anussarati,
atk-s0401a:456_2: Aññepi sotāpannādayo ānandatthero viya dasabalassa lokiyalokuttare guṇe anussaranti,
atk-s0401a:456_4: Aparo pana puthujjanakalyāṇako ānandatthero viya dasabalassa lokiyalokuttare guṇe anussaritvā taṃ anussatiṃ vaḍḍhetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpeti,
atk-s0401a:456_9: Imāni ca pana cha anuttariyāni lokiyalokuttaramissakāni kathitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0401a:457_0: Catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ sacchikiriyā hotīti catasso hi paṭisambhidāyo atthapaṭisambhidā,
atk-s0401a:457_10: Imāsaṃ catassannaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ buddhuppāde paccakkhakiriyā hoti,
atk-s0401a:458_0: Anekadhātupaṭivedhoti “cakkhudhātu rūpadhātū”tiādīnaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ buddhuppādeyeva paṭivedho hoti,
atk-s0401a:458_2: Nānādhātupaṭivedhoti ettha imāva aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo nānāsabhāvato nānādhātuyoti veditabbā.
atk-s0401a:458_3: Yo panetāsaṃ “nānāsabhāvā etā”ti evaṃ nānākaraṇato paṭivedho,
atk-s0401a:459_0: 187. Anuttaranti niruttaraṃ. Dhammacakkanti seṭṭhacakkaṃ. Cakkasaddo hesa –
atk-s0401a:463_4: rathakāro yaṃ taṃ cakkaṃ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0401a:463_6: “Addasā kho doṇo brāhmaṇo bhagavato pādesu cakkāni sahassārānī”ti ettha lakkhaṇacakke.
atk-s0401a:463_9: yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ vattatī”ti ettha sampatticakke.
atk-s0401a:464_7: Yadā sumedhabrāhmaṇo hutvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā sattasatakamahādānaṃ datvā isipabbajjaṃ
atk-s0401a:464_8: pabbajitvā pañca abhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbatteti,
atk-s0401a:465_1: Yadā aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā dīpaṅkarapādamūle mahābodhimaṇḍatthāya mānasaṃ bandhitvā “byākaraṇaṃ aladdhā
atk-s0401a:465_2: na vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti vīriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nipanno dasabalassa santikā byākaraṇaṃ labhi,
atk-s0401a:466_1: Tato paṭṭhāya dānapāramiṃ pūrentopi dhammacakkaṃ uppādeti nāma.
atk-s0401a:466_4: Dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyo pūrentopi,
atk-s0401a:466_7: Vessantarattabhāve ṭhatvā sattasatakamahādānaṃ datvā puttadāraṃ dānamukhe niyyātetvā pāramikūṭaṃ gahetvā

atk-s0401a:555_5: cirakālato paṭṭhāya taṃ rattiṃ jānātītipi rattaññū.
atk-s0401a:555_7: ayañca paṭhamakhīṇāsavoti evampi rattaññūnaṃ sāvakānaṃ ayameva aggo purimakoṭibhūto seṭṭho.
atk-s0401a:556_8: Iti hidaṃ āyasmato koṇḍaññassa aññāsikoṇḍañño tveva nāmaṃ ahosī”ti.
atk-s0401a:557_0: Ayaṃ pana thero katarabuddhakāle pubbapatthanaṃ abhinīhāraṃ akāsi,
atk-s0401a:557_3: kadā ṭhānantare ṭhapitoti iminā nayena sabbesupi etadaggesu pañhakammaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:558_0: Tattha imassa tāva therassa pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā –
atk-s0401a:558_1: ito kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttaro nāma buddho loke udapādi,
atk-s0401a:558_2: tassa paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇassa mahābodhipallaṅkato uṭṭhahantassa mahāpathaviyaṃ ṭhapetuṃ pāde ukkhittamatte
atk-s0401a:558_8: Tassa pana bhagavato sarīraṃ aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0401a:558_9: Tassa padumakaṇṇikāya dakkhiṇapāde patiṭṭhahante mahātumbamattā reṇu uggantvā sarīraṃ okiramānā otari,
atk-s0401a:558_10: vāmapādassa ṭhapanakālepi tathārūpaṃyeva padumaṃ uggantvā pādaṃ sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0401a:558_11: Tatopi uggantvā vuttappamāṇāva reṇu sarīraṃ okiri.
atk-s0401a:558_12: Taṃ pana reṇuṃ abhibhavamānā tassa bhagavato sarīrappabhā nikkhamitvā yantanāḷikāya vissaṭṭhasuvaṇṇarasadhārā
atk-s0401a:558_16: Imināva niyāmena yattha yattha gantukāmo hoti,
atk-s0401a:559_0: Evaṃ so bhagavā loke uppajjitvā bhikkhusatasahassaparivāro mahājanassa saṅgahatthāya gāmanigamarājadhānīsu
atk-s0401a:559_2: Tassa āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā pitā mahārājā paccuggamanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:559_4: Desanāpariyosāne keci sotāpannā keci sakadāgāmī keci anāgāmī keci arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:559_5: Rājā svātanāya dasabalaṃ nimantetvā punadivase kālaṃ ārocāpetvā bhikkhusatasahassaparivārassa bhagavato sakanivesane mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:560_0: Tasmiṃ kāle ayaṃ thero haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:560_1: Ekadivasaṃ buddhānaṃ dhammadesanākāle haṃsavatīnagaravāsino gandhamālādihatthe yena buddho,
atk-s0401a:560_4: tanninne tappoṇe tappabbhāre gacchante disvā tena mahājanena saddhiṃ dhammadesanaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:560_5: Tasmiñca samaye padumuttaro bhagavā attano sāsane paṭhamaṃ paṭividdhadhammaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:560_6: So kulaputto taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā “mahā vatāyaṃ bhikkhu,
atk-s0401a:560_7: ṭhapetvā kira buddhaṃ añño iminā paṭhamataraṃ paṭividdhadhammo nāma natthi.
atk-s0401a:560_8: Aho vatāhampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhanasamattho bhaveyya”nti cintetvā
atk-s0401a:560_9: desanāpariyosāne bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti nimantesi.
atk-s0401a:561_0: So bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā sakanivesanaṃ gantvā sabbarattiṃ buddhānaṃ nisajjanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:561_1: gandhadāmamālādāmādīhi alaṅkaritvā paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā tassā rattiyā accayena
atk-s0401a:561_3: gandhasālibhojanaṃ datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne ticīvarapahonake vaṅgapaṭṭe tathāgatassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā cintesi –
atk-s0401a:561_6: na kho pana sakkā ekameva divasaṃ dānaṃ datvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetu”nti “anupaṭipāṭiyā satta divasāni mahādānaṃ datvā patthessāmī”ti.
atk-s0401a:561_7: So teneva niyāmena satta divasāni mahādānaṃ datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne dussakoṭṭhāgāraṃ vivarāpetvā
atk-s0401a:561_8: uttamasukhumavatthaṃ buddhānaṃ pādamūle ṭhapetvā bhikkhusatasahassaṃ ticīvarena acchādetvā tathāgataṃ
atk-s0401a:561_10: yo tumhehi ito sattadivasamatthake bhikkhu etadagge ṭhapito,
atk-s0401a:561_11: ahampi so bhikkhu viya anāgate uppajjanakabuddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
atk-s0401a:561_12: samattho bhaveyya”nti vatvā satthu pādamūle sīsaṃ katvā nipajji.
atk-s0401a:562_0: Satthā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “iminā kulaputtena mahāadhikāro kato,
atk-s0401a:562_1: samijjhissati nu kho etassa ayaṃ patthanā no”ti anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pesetvā āvajjento “samijjhissatī”ti passi.
atk-s0401a:562_2: Buddhānañhi atītaṃ vā anāgataṃ vā paccuppannaṃ vā ārabbha āvajjentānaṃ āvaraṇaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0401a:562_3: anekakappakoṭisatasahassantarampi ca atītaṃ vā anāgataṃ vā cakkavāḷasahassantarampi ca paccuppannaṃ vā
atk-s0401a:562_5: Evaṃ appaṭivattiyena ñāṇena so bhagavā idaṃ addasa –
atk-s0401a:562_6: “anāgate satasahassakappapariyosāne gotamo nāma buddho loke uppajjissati,
atk-s0401a:562_10: anāgate satasahassakappapariyosāne gotamo nāma buddho loke uppajjissati,
atk-s0401a:563_0: Iti satthā taṃ kulaputtaṃ byākaritvā caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassāni desetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0401a:563_1: Tassa parinibbutassa sarīraṃ suvaṇṇakkhandho viya ekagghanaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0401a:563_7: parinibbutānaṃ pana tesaṃ rasmi nikkhamitvā samantā yojanasataṃ avatthari.
atk-s0401a:564_0: Ayaṃ seṭṭhi buddhānaṃ sarīracetiyaṃ parivāretvā sahassaratanagghiyāni kāresi.
atk-s0401a:564_2: So vassasatasahassaṃ mahantaṃ dānādimayaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā tato cuto devapure nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:564_3: Tassa devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsarantasseva navanavuti kappasahassāni nava kappasatāni nava ca kappā samatikkantā.
atk-s0401a:564_4: Ettakassa kālassa accayena ito ekanavutikappamatthake ayaṃ kulaputto bandhumatīnagarassa dvārasamīpe gāme kuṭumbiyagehe nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:565_0: Tasmiṃ samaye vipassī bodhisatto tusitapurā cavitvā bandhumatīnagare bandhumassa rañño aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:565_1: Anukkamena sabbaññutaṃ patvā dhammadesanatthāya mahābrahmunā āyācito “kassa nu kho paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:565_2: cintetvā attano kaniṭṭhaṃ khaṇḍaṃ nāma rājakumāraṃ tissañca purohitaputtaṃ “paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ
atk-s0401a:565_4: pitu ca saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti bodhimaṇḍato ākāseneva āgantvā kheme migadāye otiṇṇo te pakkosāpetvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0401a:565_5: Desanāpariyosāne te dvepi janā caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassehi saddhiṃ arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:566_0: Athāparepi bodhisattakāle anupabbajitā caturāsītisahassā kulaputtā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0401a:566_4: Rājāpi taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “puttaṃ passissāmī”ti uyyānaṃ gantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0401a:566_5: satthāraṃ svātanāya nimantetvā abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:567_4: Ime ca avasesabhikkhū gihikālepi mayhaṃ puttameva parivāretvā vicariṃsu,
atk-s0401a:567_8: Vihāradvārakoṭṭhakato paṭṭhāya yāva rājagehadvārā ubhosu passesu khadirapākāraṃ kāretvā vatthehi paṭicchādāpetvā
atk-s0401a:567_10: vicittattharaṇehi santharāpetvā anto ubhosu passesu mālāgacchakesu puṇṇaghaṭe sakalamaggavāsatthāya ca
atk-s0401a:567_11: gandhantaresu pupphāni pupphantaresu gandhe ca ṭhapāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0401a:567_12: Bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto antosāṇiyāva rājagehaṃ gantvā bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ paccāgacchati.
atk-s0401a:567_14: kuto pana bhikkhaṃ vā dātuṃ pūjaṃ vā kātuṃ.
atk-s0401a:568_1: “ajja satthu loke uppannassa sattamāsādhikāni satta saṃvaccharāni,
atk-s0401a:568_3: pageva bhikkhaṃ vā dātuṃ pūjaṃ vā kātuṃ dhammaṃ vā sotuṃ.
atk-s0401a:568_7: Satthā ca uppajjamāno sadevakassa lokassa atthāya uppanno,
atk-s0401a:568_11: Tasmā rājānaṃ evaṃ vadāma ‘sace no satthāraṃ deti,
atk-s0401a:568_14: raññā saddhiṃ yujjhitvā saṅghaṃ gahetvā dānādīni puññāni karoma.
atk-s0401a:568_15: Na sakkā kho pana suddhanāgareheva evaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0401a:568_16: ekaṃ jeṭṭhakapurisampi gaṇhāmā”’ti senāpatiṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “sāmi kiṃ amhākaṃ pakkho hohisi,
atk-s0401a:568_19: apica kho pana paṭhamadivaso mayhaṃ dātabbo”ti.
atk-s0401a:569_7: Alabhantā tumhehi saddhiṃ yujjhitukāmā, devāti. Yujjhāmi, tāta,
atk-s0401a:569_9: tumhākaṃ dāsā tumhehi saddhiṃ yujjhāmāti vadanti,
atk-s0401a:569_14: senāpatipi tesaṃyeva pakkho”ti ñatvā “aññāni sattamāsādhikāni satta saṃvaccharāni mayhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ dentū”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:569_16: Rājā “chabbassāni pañcavassānī”ti evaṃ hāpetvā aññe satta divase yāci.
atk-s0401a:569_17: Nāgarā “atikakkhaḷaṃ dāni raññā saddhiṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti anujāniṃsu.
atk-s0401a:569_18: Rājā sattamāsādhikānaṃ sattannaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ sajjitaṃ dānamukhaṃ sattannameva divasānaṃ sajjetvā cha
atk-s0401a:569_19: divase kesañci apassantānaṃyeva dānaṃ datvā sattame divase nāgare pakkosāpetvā “sakkhissatha, tātā,
atk-s0401a:569_21: Tepi “nanu amheyeva nissāyetaṃ devassa uppanna”nti vatvā “sakkhissāmā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:569_22: Rājā piṭṭhihatthena assūni puñchamāno bhagavantaṃ vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:569_23: aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassaṃ aññassu bhāraṃ akatvā yāvajīvaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahissāmīti cintesiṃ,
atk-s0401a:569_25: nāgarā hi ‘mayaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ na labhāmā’ti bhagavā kuppanti.
atk-s0401a:569_26: Sveva paṭṭhāya tesaṃ anuggahaṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:570_1: Tato nāgarā raññā katasakkārato uttaritaraṃ sakkārasammānaṃ katvā dānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:570_2: Eteneva niyāmena sakalanagarassa paṭipāṭiyā gatāya dvāragāmavāsino sakkārasammānaṃ sajjayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:570_8: amhākaṃ soḷasakarīsamattesu khettesu gahitagabbhā sāliyo atthi.
atk-s0401a:570_9: Sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā ādāya buddhānaṃ anucchavikaṃ pacāpemāti.
atk-s0401a:570_10: Evaṃ kayiramāne kassaci upakāro na hoti,
atk-s0401a:570_13: ahaṃ mayhaṃ santakaṃ mamāyituṃ labhāmīti soḷasakarīsamattaṃ khettaṃ majjhe bhinditvā aṭṭhakarīsaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:570_14: sīmaṃ ṭhapetvā sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā ādāya asambhinne khīre pacāpetvā catumadhuraṃ pakkhipitvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0401a:570_16: Kuṭumbikassa kho gabbhaṃ phāletvā gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ puna pūrati.
atk-s0401a:570_22: Evaṃ so ekasasseva nava vāre aggadānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:571_2: eteneva niyāmena kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā devesu ceva manussesu ca saṃsaranto
atk-s0401a:571_3: ekanavutikappe sampattiṃ anubhavitvā amhākaṃ satthu loke uppannakāle kapilavatthunagarassa avidūre doṇavatthubrāhmaṇagāme
atk-s0401a:571_6: So vuḍḍhimanvāya tayo vede uggahetvā lakkhaṇamantānaṃ pāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:571_7: Tena samayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto tusitapurā cavitvā kapilavatthupure nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:571_8: Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase aṭṭhuttaraṃ brāhmaṇasataṃ ahatavatthehi acchādetvā appodakaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ pāyetvā
atk-s0401a:571_9: tesaṃ antare aṭṭha jane uccinitvā mahātale nisīdāpetvā alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ bodhisattaṃ dukūlacumbaṭake
atk-s0401a:571_11: Dhurāsane nisinnabrāhmaṇo mahāpurisassa sarīrasampattiṃ oloketvā dve aṅguliyo ukkhipi.
atk-s0401a:571_14: so bodhisattassa lakkhaṇavaranipphattiṃ oloketvā “agāramajjhe ṭhānakāraṇaṃ natthi,
atk-s0401a:571_15: ekantenesa vivaṭṭacchado buddho bhavissatī”ti ekameva aṅguliṃ ukkhipi.
atk-s0401a:571_16: Itare pana satta janā “sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasissati,
atk-s0401a:571_19: buddho bhavissatī”ti dve gatiyo disvā dve aṅguliyo ukkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:571_20: Ayaṃ pana koṇḍañño katādhikāro pacchimabhavikasatto paññāya itare satta jane abhibhavitvā “imehi lakkhaṇehi
atk-s0401a:571_22: nissaṃsayaṃ buddho bhavissatī”ti ekameva gatiṃ addasa,
atk-s0401a:571_24: Tato brāhmaṇā attano gharāni gantvā putte āmantayiṃsu – “tātā,
atk-s0401a:571_26: suddhodanamahārājassa puttaṃ sabbaññutappattaṃ mayaṃ sambhāveyyāma vā no vā.
atk-s0401a:571_27: Tumhe tasmiṃ kumāre sabbaññutaṃ patte tassa sāsane pabbajeyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0401a:572_0: Suddhodanamahārājāpi bodhisattassa dhātiyo ādiṃ katvā parihāraṃ upaṭṭhapento bodhisattaṃ vuddhiṃ āpādesi.
atk-s0401a:572_1: Mahāsattopi vuddhippatto devo viya sampattiṃ anubhavitvā paripakke ñāṇe kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca
atk-s0401a:572_2: ānisaṃsaṃ disvā rāhulakumārassa jātadivase channasahāyo kaṇḍakaṃ āruyha devatāhi vivaṭena dvārena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0401a:572_3: nikkhamitvā teneva rattibhāgena tīṇi rajjāni atikkamitvā anomānadītīre pabbajitvā ghaṭikāramahābrahmunā
atk-s0401a:572_4: ābhate arahaddhaje gahitamatteyeva vassasaṭṭhikatthero viya pāsādikena iriyāpathena rājagahaṃ patvā tattha
atk-s0401a:572_5: piṇḍāya caritvā paṇḍavapabbatacchāyāya piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā raññā māgadhena rajjasiriyā nimantiyamānopi
atk-s0401a:572_6: taṃ paṭikkhipitvā anukkamena uruvelaṃ gantvā “ramaṇīyo vata ayaṃ bhūmibhāgo,
atk-s0401a:572_7: alaṃ vatidaṃ kulaputtassa padhānatthikassa padhānāyā”ti padhānābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ uppādetvā tattha vāsaṃ upagato.
atk-s0401a:573_0: Tena samayena itare satta brāhmaṇā yathākammaṃ gatā,
atk-s0401a:573_2: So “mahāpuriso pabbajito”ti sutvā tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ putte upasaṅkamitvā evamāha –
atk-s0401a:573_11: koṇḍaññabrāhmaṇaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā itare cattāro pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:573_12: Ime pañca pabbajitvā gāmanigamarājadhānīsu bhikkhāya carantā bodhisattassa santikaṃ agamiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:573_13: Te chabbassāni bodhisatte mahāpadhānaṃ padahante “idāni buddho bhavissati idāni buddho bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0401a:573_15: Yadā pana bodhisatto ekatilataṇḍulādīhi vītināmentopi dukkarakārikāya ariyadhammapaṭivedhassa abhāvaṃ ñatvā oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āhari,
atk-s0401a:574_0: Atha bodhisatto oḷārikāhāraparibhogena chavimaṃsalohitapāripūriṃ katvā visākhapuṇṇamadivase sujātāya
atk-s0401a:574_1: dinnaṃ varabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā suvaṇṇapātiṃ nadiyā paṭisotaṃ khipitvā “ajja buddho bhavissāmī”ti katasanniṭṭhāno
atk-s0401a:574_2: sāyanhasamaye kālena nāgarājena anekehi thutisatehi abhitthaviyamāno mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha acalaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:574_3: pācīnalokadhātuabhimukho pallaṅkena nisīditvā caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya sūriye dharamāneyeva
atk-s0401a:574_4: mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā paccūsakālasamanantare
atk-s0401a:574_5: paṭiccasamuppāde ñāṇaṃ otāretvā anulomapaṭilomaṃ paccayākāravaṭṭaṃ sammasanto sabbabuddhehi paṭividdhaṃ
atk-s0401a:574_6: asādhāraṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā nibbānārammaṇāya phalasamāpattiyā tattheva sattāhaṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0401a:575_0: Eteneva upāyena sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe viharitvā rājāyatanamūle madhupiṇḍikabhojanaṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0401a:575_1: puna ajapālanigrodhamūlaṃ āgantvā tattha nisinno dhammagambhīrataṃ paccavekkhitvā appossukkatāya citte
atk-s0401a:575_2: namante mahābrahmunā yācito buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento tikkhindriyādibhede satte disvā mahābrahmuno
atk-s0401a:575_3: dhammadesanāya paṭiññaṃ datvā “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti āḷārudakānaṃ kālakatabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:575_4: ñatvā puna cintento “bahūpakārā kho pana me pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū,
atk-s0401a:575_6: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0401a:575_8: ṭhapetvā pana koṇḍaññabrāhmaṇaṃ añño koci paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0401a:575_10: buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa nava vāre aggasassadānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:576_0: Atha satthā pattacīvaramādāya anupubbena isipatanaṃ gantvā yena pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū,
atk-s0401a:576_2: Te tathāgataṃ āgacchantaṃ disvāva attano katikāya saṇṭhātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:576_8: Evaṃ tesu vattaṃ dassetvā santike nisinnesu koṇḍaññattheraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā satthā anuttaraṃ teparivaṭṭaṃ dhammacakkappavattanasuttantaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0401a:576_11: Desanāpariyosāne koṇḍaññatthero aṭṭhārasahi mahābrahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0401a:576_12: Atha satthā “mayā dukkarasatābhataṃ dhammaṃ paṭhamameva aññāsīti aññāsikoṇḍañño nāma aya”nti theraṃ ālapanto “aññāsi vata, bho, koṇḍañño,
atk-s0401a:576_17: “iti hidaṃ āyasmato koṇḍaññassa aññāsikoṇḍaññotveva nāmaṃ ahosī”ti.
atk-s0401a:577_5: Pañcamiyā pana pakkhassa anattalakkhaṇasuttantadesanāpariyosāne sabbepi arahatte patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0401a:578_0: Tena kho pana samayena cha loke arahanto honti.
atk-s0401a:578_1: Tato paṭṭhāya satthā yasadārakappamukhe pañcapaññāsa purise,
atk-s0401a:578_3: gayāsīse piṭṭhipāsāṇe sahassamatte purāṇajaṭileti evaṃ mahājanaṃ ariyabhūmiṃ otāretvā bimbisārappamukhāni ekādasanahutāni sotāpattiphale,
atk-s0401a:578_4: ekaṃ nahutaṃ saraṇattaye patiṭṭhāpetvā jambudīpatale sāsanaṃ pupphitaphalitaṃ katvā sakalajambudīpamaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0401a:578_5: kāsāvapajjotaṃ isivātapaṭivātaṃ karonto ekasmiṃ samaye jetavanamahāvihāraṃ patvā tattha vasanto bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe
atk-s0401a:578_6: paññattavarabuddhāsanagato dhammaṃ desento “paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ paṭividdhabhikkhūnaṃ antare mama putto koṇḍañño
atk-s0401a:579_0: Theropi dve aggasāvake attano nipaccakāraṃ karonte disvā buddhānaṃ santikā apakkamitukāmo hutvā “puṇṇamāṇavo
atk-s0401a:579_1: pabbajitvā sāsane aggadhammakathiko bhavissatī”ti disvā doṇavatthubrāhmaṇagāmaṃ gantvā attano bhāgineyyaṃ
atk-s0401a:579_2: puṇṇamāṇavaṃ pabbājetvā “ayaṃ buddhānaṃ santike vasissatī”ti tassa buddhānaṃ antevāsikabhāvaṃ katvā sayaṃ
atk-s0401a:579_5: chaddantadahaṃ gantvā vasissāmī”ti bhagavantaṃ anujānāpetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā satthāraṃ vanditvā chaddantadahaṃ
atk-s0401a:579_6: gantvā chaddantahatthikulaṃ nissāya dvādasa vassāni vītināmetvā tattheva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
atk-s0401a:582_1: ito satasahassakappādhike asaṅkhyeyyakappamatthake sāriputto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti,
atk-s0401a:582_6: Saradamāṇavo pitu accayena kulasantakaṃ mahādhanaṃ paṭipajjitvā ekadivasaṃ rahogato cintesi –
atk-s0401a:582_10: mayā ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā mokkhadhammagavesanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0401a:582_18: “paralokaṃ gacchantā sahāye vā ñātimitte vā gahetvā gatā nāma natthi,
atk-s0401a:582_20: Tato ratanakoṭṭhāgāraṃ vivarāpetvā kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakānaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā pabbatapādaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:582_21: Tassa eko dve tayoti evaṃ anupabbajjaṃ pabbajitā catusattatisahassamattā jaṭilā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:582_22: So pañcābhiññā aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā tesampi jaṭilānaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0401a:582_23: Tepi sabbe pañca abhiññā aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:583_0: Tena samayena anomadassī nāma buddho loke udapādi.
atk-s0401a:583_5: nisabhatthero ca anomatthero cāti dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0401a:583_7: sundarā ca sumanā cāti dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0401a:584_0: Athekadivasaṃ paccūsakāle mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento saradatāpasaṃ disvā “ajja mayhaṃ
atk-s0401a:584_1: saradatāpasassa santikaṃ gatapaccayena dhammadesanā ca mahatī bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:584_4: desanāpariyosāne cassa parivārā catusattatisahassajaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissanti,
atk-s0401a:584_5: mayā tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti attano pattacīvaramādāya aññaṃ kañci anāmantetvā sīho viya ekacaro hutvā
atk-s0401a:584_6: saradatāpasassa antevāsikesu phalāphalatthāya gatesu “buddhabhāvaṃ me jānātū”ti tassa passantasseva saradatāpasassa
atk-s0401a:584_8: Saradatāpaso buddhānubhāvaṃ ceva sarīrasampattiṃ cassa disvā lakkhaṇamante sammasitvā “imehi lakkhaṇehi
atk-s0401a:584_9: samannāgato nāma agāramajjhe vasanto rājā hoti cakkavattī,
atk-s0401a:584_10: pabbajjanto loke vivaṭṭacchado sabbaññu buddho hoti,
atk-s0401a:584_11: ayaṃ puriso nissaṃsayaṃ buddho”ti jānitvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:584_13: Saradatāpasopi attano anucchavikaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:585_0: Tasmiṃ samaye catusattatisahassajaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ojavantāni phalāphalāni gahetvā ācariyassa santikaṃ
atk-s0401a:585_1: sampattā buddhānañceva ācariyassa ca nisinnāsanaṃ oloketvā āhaṃsu – “ācariya,
atk-s0401a:585_2: mayaṃ ‘imasmiṃ loke tumhehi mahantataro natthī’ti vicarāma,
atk-s0401a:585_3: ayaṃ pana puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe”ti. Tātā,
atk-s0401a:585_5: Sāsapena saddhiṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ sineruṃ samaṃ kātuṃ icchatha,
atk-s0401a:585_6: sabbaññubuddhena saddhiṃ mayhaṃ upamaṃ mā karittha puttakāti.
atk-s0401a:585_7: Atha te tāpasā “sace ayaṃ ittarasatto abhavissa,
atk-s0401a:585_8: na amhākaṃ ācariyo evarūpaṃ upamaṃ āhareyya,
atk-s0401a:585_9: yāva mahā vatāyaṃ puriso”ti sabbeva pādesu nipatitvā sirasā vandiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:586_6: Āharāpetvā hatthe dhovitvā sayaṃ tathāgatassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0401a:586_7: Satthārā ca phalāphale paṭiggahitamatte devatā dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:586_9: Tato bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā hatthaṃ dhovitvā nisinne satthari sabbe antevāsike pakkositvā satthu santike sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ kathento nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:586_10: Satthā “dve aggasāvakā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ āgacchantū”ti cintesi.
atk-s0401a:586_11: Te satthu cittaṃ ñatvā satasahassakhīṇāsavaparivārā āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:587_3: tumhehi ajja uḷāraṃ buddhasakkāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0401a:587_6: iddhimantānaṃ pana visayo acinteyyoti muhuttamatteneva te tāpasā vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni āharitvā
atk-s0401a:587_11: Evaṃ paññattesu āsanesu saradatāpaso tathāgatassa purato añjaliṃ paggahetvā ṭhito, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:587_12: mayhaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitasukhatthāya imaṃ pupphāsanaṃ abhiruhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:594_0: Evaṃ nisinne satthari dve aggasāvakā ca sesabhikkhū ca attano attano pattāsanesu nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:594_1: Saradatāpaso mahantaṃ pupphacchattaṃ gahetvā tathāgatassa matthake dhārayanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:594_2: Satthā “jaṭilānaṃ ayaṃ sakkāro mahapphalo hotū”ti nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajji.
atk-s0401a:594_3: Satthu samāpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā dve aggasāvakāpi sesabhikkhūpi samāpattiṃ samāpajjiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:594_4: Tathāgate sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisinne antevāsikā bhikkhācārakāle sampatte vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ
atk-s0401a:594_5: paribhuñjitvā sesakāle buddhānaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0401a:594_6: Saradatāpaso pana bhikkhācārampi agantvā pupphacchattaṃ gahitaniyāmeneva sattāhaṃ pītisukhena vītināmesi.
atk-s0401a:595_0: Satthā nirodhato vuṭṭhāya dakkhiṇapasse nisinnaṃ aggasāvakaṃ nisabhattheraṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0401a:595_2: Thero cakkavattirañño santikā paṭiladdhamahālābho mahāyodho viya tuṭṭhamānaso sāvakapāramiñāṇe ṭhatvā pupphāsanānumodanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0401a:595_5: Anomatthero tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sammasitvā dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0401a:595_6: Dvinnaṃ sāvakānaṃ desanāya ekassapi abhisamayo nāhosi.
atk-s0401a:595_7: Atha satthā aparimāṇe buddhavisaye ṭhatvā dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0401a:595_8: Desanāpariyosāne ṭhapetvā saradatāpasaṃ sabbepi catusattatisahassajaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:596_2: Tassa kira buddhānaṃ dutiyāsane nisīditvā sāvakapāramiñāṇe ṭhatvā dhammaṃ desayato aggasāvakassa desanaṃ
atk-s0401a:596_3: sotuṃ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya “aho vatāhampi anāgate uppajjanakassa buddhassa sāsane imināva sāvakena
atk-s0401a:596_5: So tena parivitakkena maggaphalapaṭivedhaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0401a:596_6: Tathāgataṃ pana vanditvā sammukhe ṭhatvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0401a:596_7: tumhākaṃ anantarāsane nisinno bhikkhu tumhākaṃ sāsane ko nāma hotī”ti?
atk-s0401a:596_8: Mayā pavattitaṃ dhammacakkaṃ anuppavattetā sāvakapāramiñāṇassa koṭippatto soḷasa paññā paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0401a:596_9: ṭhito mayhaṃ sāsane aggasāvako nisabhatthero nāma esoti. “Bhante,
atk-s0401a:596_10: yvāyaṃ mayā sattāhaṃ pupphacchattaṃ dhārentena sakkāro kato,
atk-s0401a:596_11: ahaṃ imassa phalena aññaṃ sakkattaṃ vā brahmattaṃ vā na patthemi,
atk-s0401a:596_12: anāgate pana ayaṃ nisabhatthero viya ekassa buddhassa aggasāvako bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:597_0: Satthā “samijjhissati nu kho imassa purisassa patthanā”ti anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pesetvā olokento kappasatasahassādhikaṃ
atk-s0401a:597_4: anāgate pana kappasatasahassādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā gotamo nāma buddho loke uppajjissati.
atk-s0401a:597_5: Tassa mātā mahāmāyā nāma devī bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:597_10: tvaṃ pana tassa aggasāvako dhammasenāpati sāriputto nāma bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0401a:597_11: Evaṃ tāpasaṃ byākaritvā dhammakathaṃ kathetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0401a:598_0: Saradatāpasopi antevāsikattherānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā sahāyakassa sirivaḍḍhanakuṭumbikassa sāsanaṃ pesesi – “bhante,
atk-s0401a:598_1: mama sahāyakassa vadetha ‘sahāyakena te saradatāpasena anomadassibuddhassa pādamūle anāgate uppajjanakassa
atk-s0401a:598_4: Evañca pana vatvā therehi puretarameva ekapassena gantvā sirivaḍḍhassa nivesanadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:599_0: Sirivaḍḍhano “cirassaṃ vata me ayyo āgato”ti āsane nisīdāpetvā attanā nīcāsane nisinno “antevāsikaparisā pana vo, bhante,
atk-s0401a:599_3: amhākaṃ assamaṃ anomadassī nāma buddho āgato,
atk-s0401a:599_4: mayaṃ tassa attano balena sakkāraṃ akarimha.
atk-s0401a:599_6: desanāpariyosāne ṭhapetvā maṃ sesā arahattaṃ patvā pabbajiṃsūti.
atk-s0401a:599_8: Ahaṃ satthu aggasāvakaṃ nisabhattheraṃ disvā anāgate uppajjanakassa gotamassa nāma buddhassa sāsane aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthesiṃ,
atk-s0401a:599_10: Mayhaṃ buddhehi saddhiṃ paricayo natthi, bhanteti.
atk-s0401a:599_11: Buddhehi saddhiṃ kathanaṃ mayhaṃ bhāro hotu,
atk-s0401a:600_0: Sirivaḍḍhano saradatāpasassa vacanaṃ sutvā attano nivesanadvāre rājamānena aṭṭhakarīsamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ samatalaṃ
atk-s0401a:600_1: kāretvā vālukaṃ okirāpetvā lājapañcamāni pupphāni vikiritvā nīluppalacchadanaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā buddhāsanaṃ
atk-s0401a:600_2: paññāpetvā sesabhikkhūnampi āsanāni paṭiyādāpetvā mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ sajjetvā buddhānaṃ nimantanatthāya
atk-s0401a:600_4: Tāpaso tassa vacanaṃ sutvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā tassa nivesanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:600_5: Sirivaḍḍhano paccuggamanaṃ katvā tathāgatassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā maṇḍapaṃ pavesetvā paññattāsanesu
atk-s0401a:600_6: nisinnassa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā paṇītena bhojanena parivisitvā bhattakiccapariyosāne
atk-s0401a:600_9: imināva niyāmena sattāhaṃ anukampaṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:600_11: So teneva niyāmena sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā ṭhito āha – “bhante,
atk-s0401a:600_12: mama sahāyo saradatāpaso yassa satthu aggasāvako homīti patthesi,
atk-s0401a:601_0: Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā byākāsi –
atk-s0401a:601_1: “tvaṃ ito kappasatasahassādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā gotamabuddhassa dutiyasāvako bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0401a:601_2: Buddhānaṃ byākaraṇaṃ sutvā sirivaḍḍhano haṭṭhapahaṭṭho ahosi.
atk-s0401a:601_3: Satthāpi bhattānumodanaṃ katvā saparivāro vihārameva gato.
atk-s0401a:601_4: Sirivaḍḍhano tato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā dutiyattavāre kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:601_5: Saradatāpaso cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:602_0: Tato paṭṭhāya imesaṃ ubhinnampi antarākammaṃ na kathitaṃ.
atk-s0401a:602_1: Amhākaṃ pana buddhassa nibbattito puretarameva saradatāpaso rājagahanagarassa avidūre upatissagāme sāribrāhmaṇiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:602_2: Taṃdivasameva cassa sahāyopi rājagahasseva avidūre kolitagāme moggallibrāhmaṇiyā kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:602_3: Tāni kira dvepi kulāni yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā ābaddhapaṭibaddhasahāyakāneva.
atk-s0401a:602_5: Dasamāsaccayena jātānampi tesaṃ chasaṭṭhi dhātiyo upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:602_6: Nāmaggahaṇadivase sāribrāhmaṇiyā puttassa upatissagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā upatissoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0401a:602_7: itarassa kolitagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā kolitoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:602_8: Te ubhopi vuddhimanvāya sabbasippānaṃ pāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:603_0: Upatissamāṇavassa kīḷanatthāya nadiṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā pabbataṃ vā gamanakāle pañca suvaṇṇasivikāsatāni parivārā honti,
atk-s0401a:603_3: Rājagahe ca anusaṃvaccharaṃ giraggasamajjaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0401a:603_5: Dvepi janā ekatova nisīditvā samajjaṃ passantā hasitabbaṭṭhāne hasanti,
atk-s0401a:603_8: Tesaṃ imināva niyāmena ekadivasaṃ samajjaṃ passantānaṃ paripākagatattā ñāṇassa purimadivasesu viya hasitabbaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:603_9: hāso vā saṃvegaṭṭhāne saṃvejanaṃ vā dāyaṃ dātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne dāyadānaṃ vā nāhosi.
atk-s0401a:603_13: Amhehi pana ekaṃ mokkhadhammaṃ gavesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:604_2: na tvaṃ aññasu divasesu viya haṭṭhapahaṭṭho,
atk-s0401a:604_8: attano mokkhadhammaṃ gavesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ cintayanto nisinnomhīti,
atk-s0401a:604_11: Athassa attanā saddhiṃ ekajjhāsayataṃ ñatvā upatisso taṃ evamāha –
atk-s0401a:604_13: mokkhadhammaṃ gavesantehi pana ekā pabbajjā laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0401a:605_0: Tena kho pana samayena sañcayo paribbājako rājagahe paṭivasati mahatiyā paribbājakaparisāya saddhiṃ.
atk-s0401a:605_1: Te “tassa santike pabbajissāmā”ti pañcahi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ sañcayassa santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:605_2: Tesaṃ pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sañcayo atirekalābhaggayasaggappatto ahosi.
atk-s0401a:605_3: Te katipāheneva sabbaṃ sañcayassa samayaṃ pariggaṇhitvā, “ācariya,
atk-s0401a:605_11: so imassa santike uppādetuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0401a:605_13: gāmanigamarājadhāniyo carantā mayaṃ avassaṃ mokkhadhammadesakaṃ ekaṃ ācariyaṃ labhissāmā”ti.
atk-s0401a:605_14: Te tato paṭṭhāya yattha yattha paṇḍitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā atthīti suṇanti,
atk-s0401a:605_16: Tehi puṭṭhaṃ pañhaṃ aññe kathetuṃ samatthā natthi,
atk-s0401a:605_18: Evaṃ sakalajambudīpaṃ pariggaṇhitvā nivattitvā sakaṭṭhānameva āgantvā,
atk-s0401a:606_0: Tena samayena amhākaṃ satthā paṭhamābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahaṃ sampatto hoti.
atk-s0401a:606_1: Atha “ekasaṭṭhi arahanto loke uppannā hontī”ti vuttakāle “caratha,
atk-s0401a:606_3: cārikaṃ bahujanahitāyā”ti ratanattayaguṇappakāsanatthaṃ uyyojitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ antare pañcavaggiyabbhantaro
atk-s0401a:606_5: Punadivase pātova pattacīvaraṃ ādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0401a:607_0: Tasmiṃ samaye upatissaparibbājako pātova bhattakiccaṃ katvā paribbājakārāmaṃ gacchanto theraṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0401a:607_2: Ye vata loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā,
atk-s0401a:607_4: yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ puccheyyaṃ –
atk-s0401a:607_13: yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandheyyaṃ atthikehi upaññātaṃ magga”nti.
atk-s0401a:607_14: So theraṃ laddhapiṇḍapātaṃ aññataraṃ okāsaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā nisīditukāmatañcassa ñatvā attano paribbājakapīṭhakaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:608_0: Evaṃ ācariyavattaṃ katvā katabhattakiccena therena saddhiṃ madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā “vippasannāni kho te, āvuso,
atk-s0401a:608_7: kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0401a:608_22: na tāvāhaṃ sakkomi vitthārena dhammaṃ desetu”nti.
atk-s0401a:608_24: tvaṃ yathāsattiyā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā vada,
atk-s0401a:608_25: etaṃ nayasatena nayasahassena paṭivijjhituṃ mayhaṃ bhāro”ti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0401a:609_0: “Appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā bhāsassu, atthaṃyeva me brūhi;
atk-s0401a:610_0: Attheneva me attho, kiṃ kāhasi byañjanaṃ bahu”nti. ;
atk-s0401a:611_0: Evaṃ vutte thero “ye dhammā hetuppabhavā”ti gāthaṃ āha.
atk-s0401a:611_1: Paribbājako paṭhamapadadvayameva sutvā sahassanayasampanne sotāpattimagge patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0401a:612_0: So sotāpanno hutvā uparivisese appavattante “bhavissati ettha kāraṇa”nti sallakkhetvā theraṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0401a:612_7: Amhehi ca aññamaññaṃ katikā katā “yo paṭhamaṃ amataṃ adhigacchati,
atk-s0401a:612_9: Ahaṃ taṃ paṭiññaṃ mocetvā sahāyakaṃ gahetvā tumhākaṃ gatamaggeneva satthu santikaṃ āgamissāmīti pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0401a:612_10: therassa pādesu nipatitvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā theraṃ uyyojetvā paribbājakārāmābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:613_0: Kolitaparibbājako taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā “ajja mayhaṃ sahāyakassa mukhavaṇṇo na aññesu divasesu viya,
atk-s0401a:613_1: addhā tena amataṃ adhigataṃ bhavissatī”ti amatādhigamaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0401a:613_3: amataṃ adhigata”nti paṭijānitvā tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0401a:613_8: vasatī”ti evaṃ no ācariyena assajittherena kathitanti.
atk-s0401a:613_13: amhehi adhigataṃ amataṃ amhākaṃ ācariyassa sañcayaparibbājakassāpi kathessāma.
atk-s0401a:613_15: appaṭivijjhanto amhākaṃ saddahitvā satthu santikaṃ gamissati,
atk-s0401a:614_0: Tato dvepi janā sañcayassa santikaṃ gantvā, “ācariya,
atk-s0401a:614_7: tātā”ti tepi vāretvā lābhaggayasaggappattimeva tesaṃ dīpesi.
atk-s0401a:614_9: tumhākaṃ pana gamanaṃ vā agamanaṃ vā jānāthā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:614_10: Sañcayo “ime ettakaṃ jānantā mama vacanaṃ na karissantī”ti ñatvā “gacchatha tumhe, tātā,
atk-s0401a:614_11: ahaṃ mahallakakāle antevāsikavāsaṃ vasituṃ na sakkomī”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:614_12: Te anekehipi kāraṇehi taṃ bodhetuṃ asakkontā attano ovāde vattamānaṃ janaṃ ādāya veḷuvanaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:614_13: Atha tesaṃ pañcasu antevāsikasatesu aḍḍhateyyasatā nivattiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:615_0: Satthā catuparisamajjhe dhammaṃ desento te dūratova disvā bhikkhū āmantesi – “ete,
atk-s0401a:615_2: dve sahāyā āgacchanti kolito ca upatisso ca,
atk-s0401a:615_3: etaṃ me sāvakayugaṃ bhavissati aggaṃ bhaddayuga”nti.
atk-s0401a:615_4: Atha tesaṃ parisāya cariyavasena dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhesi.
atk-s0401a:615_5: Ṭhapetvā dve aggasāvake sabbepi te aḍḍhateyyasatā paribbājakā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:616_0: Athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno pabbajitadivasato sattame divase magadharaṭṭhe kallavālagāmakaṃ upanissāya samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:616_1: karonto thinamiddhe okkante satthārā saṃvejito thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā tathāgatena dinnaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:616_2: suṇantova uparimaggattayakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto.
atk-s0401a:616_3: Sāriputtattheropi pabbajitadivasato addhamāsaṃ atikkamitvā satthārā saddhiṃ tameva rājagahaṃ upanissāya
atk-s0401a:616_4: sūkarakhataleṇe viharanto attano bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanāpariggahasuttante desiyamāne
atk-s0401a:616_5: suttānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā parassa vaḍḍhitabhattaṃ bhuñjanto viya sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto.
atk-s0401a:616_7: Iti dvinnampi mahāsāvakānaṃ tathāgate rājagahe viharanteyeva sāvakapāramiñāṇakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ.
atk-s0401a:616_8: Aparabhāge pana satthā jetavane viharanto “mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto,
atk-s0401a:616_9: iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno”ti dvepi mahāsāvake ṭhānantare ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:618_5: Tattha dhutoti dhutakileso vā puggalo kilesadhunano vā dhammo.
atk-s0401a:619_0: Dhutavādoti ettha pana atthi dhuto na dhutavādo,
atk-s0401a:619_4: Tattha yo dhutaṅgena attano kilese dhuni,
atk-s0401a:619_5: paraṃ pana dhutaṅgena na ovadati nānusāsati bākulatthero viya,
atk-s0401a:619_8: Yo pana dhutaṅgena attano kilese na dhuni,
atk-s0401a:619_9: kevalaṃ aññe dhutaṅgena ovadati anusāsati upanandatthero viya,
atk-s0401a:619_13: ayaṃ neva dhuto na dhutavādo. Yathāha –
atk-s0401a:619_14: “tayidaṃ āyasmā lāḷudāyī neva dhuto na dhutavādo”ti.
atk-s0401a:619_15: Yo pana ubhayasampanno āyasmā mahākassapatthero viya,
atk-s0401a:619_16: ayaṃ dhuto ceva dhutavādo ca. Yathāha –
atk-s0401a:619_17: “tayidaṃ āyasmā mahākassapo dhuto ceva dhutavādo cā”ti.
atk-s0401a:620_0: Dhutadhammā veditabbāti appicchatā santuṭṭhitā sallekhatā pavivekatā idamaṭṭhikatāti ime dhutaṅgacetanāya
atk-s0401a:620_1: parivārā pañca dhammā “appicchaṃyeva nissāyā”tiādivacanato dhutadhammā nāma.
atk-s0401a:620_2: Tattha appicchatā ca santuṭṭhitā ca alobho,
atk-s0401a:620_3: sallekhatā ca pavivekatā ca dvīsu dhammesu anupatanti alobhe ceva amohe ca,
atk-s0401a:620_7: Alobhena ca anuññātānaṃ paṭisevanamukhena pavattaṃ kāmasukhallikānuyogaṃ,
atk-s0401a:620_8: amohena dhutaṅgesu atisallekhamukhena pavattaṃ attakilamathānuyogaṃ dhunāti.
atk-s0401a:621_0: Dhutaṅgāni veditabbānīti terasa dhutaṅgāni veditabbāni paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ…pe… nesajjikaṅganti.
atk-s0401a:622_0: Dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākassapoti yattakā dhutavādaṃ vadanti,
atk-s0401a:622_1: tesaṃ sabbesampi antare ayaṃ mahākassapatthero aggoti aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:622_2: Mahākassapoti uruveḷakassapo nadīkassapo gayākassapo kumārakassapoti ime khuddānukhuddake there upādāya ayaṃ mahā,
atk-s0401a:623_1: atīte kira kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttaro nāma satthā loke udapādi,
atk-s0401a:623_2: tasmiṃ haṃsavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya kheme migadāye viharante vedeho nāma kuṭumbiko asītikoṭidhanavibhavo
atk-s0401a:623_3: pātova subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya gandhapupphādīni gahetvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:623_5: Tasmiñca khaṇe satthā mahānisabhattheraṃ nāma tatiyasāvakaṃ “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0401a:623_9: Upāsako taṃ sutvā pasanno dhammakathāvasāne mahājane uṭṭhāya gate satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:623_10: sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethā”ti āha. Mahā kho, upāsaka,
atk-s0401a:623_14: ekaṃ sāmaṇerampi vihāre asesetvā bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethāti.
atk-s0401a:623_16: Upāsako satthu adhivāsanaṃ viditvā gehaṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ sajjetvā punadivase satthu kālaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0401a:623_17: Satthā pattacīvaramādāya bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto upāsakassa gharaṃ gantvā paññatte āsane nisinno dakkhiṇodakāvasāne
atk-s0401a:624_0: Tasmiṃ antare mahānisabhatthero piṇḍāya caranto tameva vīthi paṭipajji.
atk-s0401a:624_1: Upāsako disvā uṭṭhāya gantvā theraṃ vanditvā “pattaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0401a:624_7: Upāsako therassa pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātassa pūretvā nīharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:624_8: Tato theraṃ anugantvā nivatto satthu santike nisīditvā evamāha – “bhante,
atk-s0401a:624_9: mahānisabhatthero ‘satthā gehe nisinno’ti vuttepi pavisituṃ na icchi,
atk-s0401a:624_10: atthi nu kho etassa tumhākaṃ guṇehi atireko guṇo”ti.
atk-s0401a:624_14: so bhikkhu na evaṃ nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ udikkhati.
atk-s0401a:624_19: Iti tassa ayañca ayañca guṇo”ti mahāsamuddaṃ pūrayamāno viya kathesi.
atk-s0401a:624_20: Upāsako pakatiyāpi jalamānadīpo telena āsitto viya suṭṭhutaraṃ pasanno hutvā cintesi –
atk-s0401a:624_22: anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike dhutavādānaṃ aggabhāvatthāya patthanaṃ karissāmī”ti?
atk-s0401a:625_0: So punapi satthāraṃ nimantetvā teneva niyāmena satta divasāni mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0401a:625_1: mahābhikkhusaṅghassa ticīvarāni datvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā evamāha – “yaṃ me, bhante,
atk-s0401a:625_2: satta divasāni dānaṃ dentassa mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0401a:625_3: imināhaṃ na aññaṃ devasampattiṃ vā sakkamārabrahmasampattiṃ vā patthemi,
atk-s0401a:625_4: idaṃ pana me kammaṃ anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike etassa mahānisabhattherena pattaṭhānantaraṃ pāpuṇanatthāya
atk-s0401a:625_10: anāgate satasahassakappāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0401a:625_11: tassa tvaṃ tatiyasāvako mahākassapatthero nāma bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0401a:625_12: Taṃ sutvā upāsako “buddhānaṃ dve kathā nāma natthī”ti punadivase pattabbaṃ viya taṃ sampattiṃ amaññittha.
atk-s0401a:625_13: So yāvatāyukaṃ nānappakāraṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā nānappakāraṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā tattha kālaṃ kato sagge nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:626_0: Tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu sampattiṃ anubhavanto ito ekanavutikappe vipassisammāsambuddhe bandhumatiṃ
atk-s0401a:626_1: nissāya kheme migadāye viharante devalokā cavitvā aññatarasmiṃ parijiṇṇe brāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:626_2: Tasmiñca kāle vipassī bhagavā sattame sattame saṃvacchare dhammaṃ katheti,
atk-s0401a:626_10: Brāhmaṇānaṃ kenacideva kiccena sannipāte sati brāhmaṇiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā sayaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0401a:626_11: Brāhmaṇīnaṃ sannipāte sati sayaṃ gehe tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0401a:626_13: Tasmiṃ pana divase brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ āha – “bhoti,
atk-s0401a:626_15: “Mayaṃ mātugāmajātikā nāma rattiṃ sotuṃ na sakkoma,
atk-s0401a:626_16: divā sossāmī”ti brāhmaṇaṃ gehe ṭhapetvā taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā upāsikāhi saddhiṃ divā gantvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:626_17: vanditvā ekamante nisinnā dhammaṃ sutvā upāsikāhiyeva saddhiṃ āgamāsi.
atk-s0401a:626_18: Atha brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā taṃ vatthaṃ pārupitvā vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:627_0: Tasmiñca samaye satthā parisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane nisinno cittabījaniṃ ādāya ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento
atk-s0401a:627_1: viya sineruṃ matthaṃ katvā sāgaraṃ nimmathento viya dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0401a:627_2: Brāhmaṇassa parisante nisinnassa dhammaṃ suṇantassa paṭhamayāmasmiṃyeva sakalasarīraṃ pūrayamānā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajji.
atk-s0401a:627_7: apārupitvā ca nāma bahi carituṃ na sakkā”ti sabbathāpi adātukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0401a:627_8: Athassa nikkhante paṭhamayāme majjhimayāmepi tatheva pīti uppajji.
atk-s0401a:627_9: So tatheva cintetvā tatheva adātukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0401a:627_10: Athassa majjhimayāme nikkhante pacchimayāmepi tatheva pīti uppajji.
atk-s0401a:627_12: pacchāpi jānissāmī”ti vatthaṃ saṅgharitvā satthu pādamūle ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:627_13: Tato vāmahatthaṃ ābhujitvā dakkhiṇena hatthena tikkhattuṃ apphoṭetvā “jitaṃ me,
atk-s0401a:628_0: Tasmiñca samaye bandhumarājā dhammāsanassa pacchato antosāṇiyaṃ nisinno dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0401a:628_1: Rañño ca nāma “jitaṃ me”ti saddo amanāpo hoti.
atk-s0401a:628_5: “avasesā hatthiyānādīni āruyha asicammādīni gahetvā parasenaṃ jinanti,
atk-s0401a:628_7: ahaṃ pana pacchato āgacchantassa duṭṭhagoṇassa muggarena sīsaṃ bhinditvā taṃ palāpento viya maccheracittaṃ madditvā pārutavatthaṃ dasabalassa adāsiṃ,
atk-s0401a:628_9: So puriso āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0401a:628_14: “ayaṃ mayhaṃ tuṇhī nisinnassa paṭhamaṃ kiñci adatvā satthu guṇe kathentassa adāsi,
atk-s0401a:628_15: satthu guṇe paṭicca uppannena mayhaṃ ko attho”ti?
atk-s0401a:628_17: Rājāpi “kiṃ brāhmaṇena kata”nti pucchitvā “tampi tena vatthayugaṃ tathāgatasseva dinna”nti sutvā aññānipi dve vatthayugāni pesesi.
atk-s0401a:628_19: Rājā aññānipi cattārīti evaṃ yāva dvattiṃsavatthayugāni pesesi.
atk-s0401a:628_20: Atha brāhmaṇo “idaṃ vaḍḍhetvā gahaṇaṃ viya hotī”ti attano atthāya ekaṃ,
atk-s0401a:628_21: brāhmaṇiyā ekanti dve vatthayugāni gahetvā tiṃsa yugāni tathāgatasseva adāsi.
atk-s0401a:628_22: Tato paṭṭhāya cassa satthu vissāsiko jāto.
atk-s0401a:629_0: Atha naṃ rājā ekadivasaṃ sītasamaye satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇantaṃ disvā satasahassagghanakaṃ attano pārutarattakambalaṃ datvā āha –
atk-s0401a:629_2: So “kiṃ me iminā kambalena imasmiṃ pūtikāye upanītenā”ti cintetvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ tathāgatassa mañcassa upari vitānaṃ katvā agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:629_3: Athekadivasaṃ rājā pātova vihāraṃ gantvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ satthu santike nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:629_4: Tasmiñca samaye chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo kambale paṭihaññanti,
atk-s0401a:629_12: na maya”nti pasīditvā yaṃ manussānaṃ upakārabhūtaṃ,
atk-s0401a:629_13: taṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ katvā sabbaaṭṭhakaṃ nāma dānaṃ datvā purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:629_14: Sopi “aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ nāma catusaṭṭhi hotī”ti catusaṭṭhi salākābhattāni upanibandhāpetvā yāvajīvaṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tato cuto sagge nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:630_0: Puna tato cuto imasmiṃ kappe koṇāgamanassa ca bhagavato kassapadasabalassa cāti dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ antare bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbiyaghare nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:630_1: So vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekadivasaṃ araññe jaṅghavihāraṃ carati,
atk-s0401a:630_2: tasmiṃ ca samaye paccekabuddho nadītīre cīvarakammaṃ karonto anuvāte appahonte saṅgharitvā ṭhapetuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0401a:630_6: karothā”ti sāṭakaṃ datvā “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kenaci parihāni mā hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:631_0: Atha gharepissa bhaginiyā saddhiṃ bhariyāya kalahaṃ karontiyā paccekabuddho piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0401a:631_1: Athassa bhaginī paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā tassa bhariyaṃ sandhāya,
atk-s0401a:631_3: Sā gehadvāre ṭhitā sutvā “imāya dinnaṃ bhattaṃ mā esa bhuñjatū”ti pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalassa pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:631_4: Itarā disvā “bāle maṃ tāva akkosa vā pahara vā,
atk-s0401a:631_5: evarūpassa pana dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramissa pattato bhattaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalaṃ dātuṃ na yutta”nti āha.
atk-s0401a:631_8: bhante”ti kalalaṃ chaḍḍetvā pattaṃ dhovitvā gandhacuṇṇena ubbaṭṭetvā catumadhurassa pūretvā upari āsittena
atk-s0401a:631_9: padumagabbhavaṇṇena sappinā vijjotamānaṃ paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapetvā “yathā ayaṃ piṇḍapāto obhāsajāto,
atk-s0401a:631_10: evaṃ obhāsajātaṃ me sarīraṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:631_12: Tepi dve jāyampatikā yāvatāyukaṃ kusalaṃ katvā sagge nibbattitvā puna tato cavitvā upāsako kassapasammāsambuddhakāle
atk-s0401a:631_13: bārāṇasiyaṃ asītikoṭivibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0401a:631_14: itarāpi tādisasseva seṭṭhino dhītā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:632_1: Tassā pubbe adinnavipākassa tassa kammassa ānubhāvena patikūlaṃ paviṭṭhamattāya ummārabbhantare sakalasarīraṃ
atk-s0401a:632_3: Seṭṭhikumāro “kassāyaṃ gandho”ti pucchitvā “seṭṭhikaññāyā”ti sutvā “nīharathā”ti ābhataniyāmeneva kulagharaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0401a:632_4: Sā eteneva nīhārena sattasu ṭhānesu paṭinivattitā.
atk-s0401a:633_1: tassa ghanakoṭṭimāhi satasahassagghanikāhi rattasuvaṇṇaiṭṭhakāhi yojanubbedhaṃ cetiyaṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:633_2: Tasmiṃ cetiye kariyamāne sā seṭṭhidhītā cintesi –
atk-s0401a:633_4: kiṃ me jīvitenā”ti attano sarīrābharaṇabhaṇḍakaṃ bhañjāpetvā suvaṇṇaiṭṭhakaṃ kāresi ratanāyataṃ vidatthivitthinnaṃ caturaṅgulubbedhaṃ.
atk-s0401a:633_5: Tato haritālamanosilāpiṇḍaṃ gahetvā aṭṭha uppalahatthake ādāya cetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gatā.
atk-s0401a:633_6: Tasmiñca khaṇe ekā iṭṭhakāpanti parikkhipitvā āgacchamānā ghaṭaniṭṭhakāya ūnā hoti.
atk-s0401a:633_11: Sā āruyha telena haritālamanosilaṃ yojetvā tena bandhanena iṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā upari aṭṭhahi uppalahatthakehi
atk-s0401a:633_12: pūjaṃ katvā vanditvā “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kāyato candanagandho vāyatu,
atk-s0401a:633_13: mukhato uppalagandho”ti patthanaṃ katvā cetiyaṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:634_0: Atha tasmiṃyeva khaṇe yassa seṭṭhiputtassa paṭhamaṃ gehaṃ nītā,
atk-s0401a:634_9: Te gantvā taṃ vanditvā ṭhitā “kiṃ, tātā,
atk-s0401a:634_10: āgatatthā”ti tāya puṭṭhā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhiṃsu. Tātā,
atk-s0401a:634_17: Tassā saha gharappavesanena sakalagehaṃ candanagandhañceva nīluppalagandhañca vāyi.
atk-s0401a:635_0: Seṭṭhiputto taṃ pucchi “paṭhamaṃ tava sarīrato duggandho vāyi,
atk-s0401a:635_4: Sā ādito paṭṭhāya attanā katakammaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0401a:635_5: Seṭṭhiputto “niyyānikaṃ vata buddhasāsana”nti pasīditvā yojanikaṃ suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ kambalakañcukena parikkhipitvā
atk-s0401a:635_8: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā sagge nibbattitvā tato cuto bārāṇasito yojanamatte ṭhāne aññatarasmiṃ amaccakule nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:635_9: Seṭṭhikaññāpi devalokato cavitvā rājakule jeṭṭhadhītā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:636_0: Tesu vayapattesu kumārassa vasanagāme nakkhattaṃ saṅghuṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0401a:636_13: natthi no ito sukhumatarassa paṭilābhāya puñña”nti.
atk-s0401a:636_15: Putta ahaṃ ajjeva tuyhaṃ bārāṇasinagare rajjapaṭilābhaṃ icchāmīti.
atk-s0401a:636_20: idha vā ettha vā gehe nisīdissatī”ti?
atk-s0401a:636_21: So pana puññaniyāmena nikkhamitvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā uyyāne maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nipajji.
atk-s0401a:636_22: So ca bārāṇasirañño kālakatassa sattamo divaso hoti.
atk-s0401a:637_0: Amaccā rañño sarīrakiccaṃ katvā rājaṅgaṇe nisīditvā mantayiṃsu –
atk-s0401a:637_9: Te kumudavaṇṇe cattāro sindhave yojetvā pañcavidhaṃ rājakakudhabhaṇḍaṃ setacchattañca rathasmiṃyeva ṭhapetvā
atk-s0401a:637_15: Ratho kumāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā ārohanasajjo hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:637_16: Purohito pārupanakaṇṇaṃ apanetvā pādatalāni olokento “tiṭṭhatu ayaṃ dīpo,
atk-s0401a:637_17: dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu dīpesu eso rajjaṃ kāretuṃ yutto”ti vatvā “punapi tūriyāni paggaṇhatha,
atk-s0401a:637_18: punapi tūriyāni paggaṇhathā”ti tikkhattuṃ tūriyāni paggaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0401a:638_0: Atha kumāro mukhaṃ vivaritvā oloketvā “kena kammena āgatatthā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:638_10: Te tāvadeva abhisekamaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā rājadhītaraṃ sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā uyyānaṃ ānetvā kumārassa abhisekaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:639_5: Manussānaṃ paribhogavatthesu ito sukhumataraṃ natthi devāti.
atk-s0401a:639_6: Tumhākaṃ rājā evarūpaṃ nivāsesīti? Āma, devāti.
atk-s0401a:639_11: So uṭṭhāya hatthe dhovitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā hatthena udakaṃ ādāya puratthimāya disāya abbhukkiri,
atk-s0401a:639_12: tāvadeva ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā aṭṭha kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:639_13: Puna udakaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇaṃ pacchimaṃ uttaranti evaṃ catassopi disā abbhukkiri,
atk-s0401a:639_14: sabbadisāsu aṭṭhaṭṭha katvā dvattiṃsa kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:639_15: So ekaṃ dibbadussaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā “nandarañño vijite suttakantikā itthiyo mā suttaṃ kantiṃsūti
atk-s0401a:639_16: evaṃ bheriṃ carāpethā”ti vatvā chattaṃ ussāpetvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatto hatthikkhandhavaragato nagaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0401a:640_0: Evaṃ kāle gacchante ekadivasaṃ devī rañño mahāsampattiṃ disvā “aho tapassī”ti kāruññākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0401a:640_1: “Kimidaṃ devī”ti ca puṭṭhā “atimahatī te deva sampatti,
atk-s0401a:640_3: idāni anāgatassa paccayaṃ kusalaṃ na karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:640_10: Devī pātova uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya uparipāsāde puratthābhimukhā urena nipajjitvā “sace etissā disāya arahanto atthi,
atk-s0401a:640_11: sve āgantvā amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantū”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:641_0: Punadivase dakkhiṇadvāre dānaṃ sajjetvā tatheva akāsi,
atk-s0401a:641_2: Uttaradvāre sajjanadivase pana deviyā tatheva nimantite himavante vasantānaṃ padumavatiyā puttānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ
atk-s0401a:641_6: Te adhivāsetvā punadivase anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā ākāsena āgantvā uttaradvāre otariṃsu.
atk-s0401a:641_9: Rājā saddhiṃ deviyā gantvā vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā paccekabuddhe pāsādaṃ āropetvā tatra tesaṃ dānaṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne rājā saṅghattherassa,
atk-s0401a:641_13: amhākaṃ yāvajīvaṃ idha nivāsāya paṭiññaṃ dethā”ti.
atk-s0401a:641_14: Paṭiññaṃ kāretvā uyyāne pañca paṇṇasālāsatāni pañca caṅkamanasatānīti sabbākārena nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ sampādetvā tattha vasāpesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:642_0: Evaṃ kāle gacchante rañño paccanto kupito.
atk-s0401a:642_2: tvaṃ paccekabuddhesu mā pamajjī”ti deviṃ ovaditvā gato.
atk-s0401a:642_4: Mahāpadumapaccekabuddho tiyāmarattiṃ jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā aruṇuggamane ālambanaphalakaṃ ālambitvā ṭhitakova anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0401a:642_6: Punadivase devī paccekabuddhānaṃ nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ haritupalittaṃ kāretvā pupphāni vikiritvā dhūmaṃ datvā tesaṃ āgamanaṃ olokentī nisinnā;
atk-s0401a:642_7: āgamanaṃ apassantī purisaṃ pesesi “gaccha, tāta, jānāhi,
atk-s0401a:642_9: So gantvā mahāpadumassa paṇṇasālādvāraṃ vivaritvā tattha apassanto caṅkamanaṃ gantvā ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ disvā vanditvā “kālo,
atk-s0401a:642_12: So “niddāyati maññe”ti gantvā piṭṭhipāde hatthena parāmasitvā pādānaṃ sītalatāya ceva thaddhatāya ca
atk-s0401a:642_14: evaṃ tatiyassāti sabbesaṃ parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā rājakulaṃ gato. “Kahaṃ, tāta,
atk-s0401a:642_16: Devī kandantī rodantī nikkhamitvā nāgarehi saddhiṃ tattha gantvā sādhukīḷitaṃ kāretvā paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:642_17: sarīrakiccaṃ katvā dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0401a:643_0: Rājā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā āgato paccuggamanaṃ āgataṃ deviṃ pucchi – “kiṃ, bhadde,
atk-s0401a:643_7: So nagaraṃ agantvā uyyānameva pavisitvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ pakkosāpetvā tassa rajjaṃ paṭiyādetvā sayaṃ samaṇakapabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:643_8: Devīpi “imasmiṃ pabbajite ahaṃ kiṃ karissāmī”ti tattheva uyyāne pabbajitā.
atk-s0401a:643_9: Dvepi jhānaṃ bhāvetvā tato cutā brahmaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:644_0: Tesu tattheva vasantesu amhākaṃ satthā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0401a:644_1: Satthari tattha vasante ayaṃ pippalimāṇavo magadharaṭṭhe mahātitthabrāhmaṇagāme kapilabrāhmaṇassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatto,
atk-s0401a:644_2: ayaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagare kosiyagottabrāhmaṇassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattā.
atk-s0401a:644_3: Tesaṃ anukkamena vaḍḍhamānānaṃ pippalimāṇavassa vīsatime vasse bhaddāya soḷasame vasse sampatte mātāpitaro puttaṃ oloketvā, “tāta,
atk-s0401a:645_0: Māṇavo “mama mātaraṃ saññāpessāmī”ti rattasuvaṇṇassa nikkhasahassaṃ datvā suvaṇṇakārehi ekaṃ itthirūpaṃ
atk-s0401a:645_1: kārāpetvā tassa majjanaghaṭṭanādikammapariyosāne taṃ rattavatthaṃ nivāsāpetvā vaṇṇasampannehi pupphehi
atk-s0401a:645_2: ceva nānāalaṅkārehi ca alaṅkārāpetvā mātaraṃ pakkosāpetvā āha – “amma,
atk-s0401a:645_8: addhā etena saha katapuññā suvaṇṇarūpakapaṭibhāgāva bhavissatī”ti aṭṭha brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā sabbakāmehi
atk-s0401a:645_10: yattha amhākaṃ jātigottabhogehi samānakule evarūpaṃ dārikaṃ passatha,
atk-s0401a:645_11: imameva suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ katvā dethā”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0401a:646_0: Te “amhākaṃ nāma etaṃ kamma”nti nikkhamitvā “kattha gamissāmā”ti cintetvā “maddaraṭṭhaṃ nāma itthākaro,
atk-s0401a:646_2: Tattha taṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ nhānatitthe ṭhapetvā ekamante nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:646_3: Atha bhaddāya dhātī bhaddaṃ nhāpetvā alaṅkaritvā sirigabbhe nisīdāpetvā nhāyituṃ āgacchantī taṃ rūpakaṃ
atk-s0401a:646_4: disvā “ayyadhītā me idhāgatā”ti saññāya santajjetvā “dubbinīte kiṃ tvaṃ idhāgatā”ti talasattikaṃ uggiritvā
atk-s0401a:646_7: Sā paṭikkamitvā “evaṃ thaddhaṃ nāma mahāgīvaṃ disvā ‘ayyadhītā me’ti saññaṃ uppādesiṃ,
atk-s0401a:646_8: ayyadhītāya hi me nivāsanapaṭiggāhikāyapi ayuttā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:646_9: Atha naṃ te manussā parivāretvā “evarūpā te sāmidhītā”ti pucchiṃsu. Kiṃ esā,
atk-s0401a:646_10: imāya sataguṇena sahassaguṇena mayhaṃ ayyādhītā abhirūpatarā,
atk-s0401a:646_13: “Tena hi āgacchā”ti khujjaṃ gahetvā suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ rathaṃ āropetvā kosiyagottassa brāhmaṇassa gharadvāre ṭhatvā āgamanaṃ nivedayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:647_9: Taṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā pippalimāṇavassa ārocayiṃsu “laddhā kira dārikā”ti.
atk-s0401a:647_12: anatthiko hutvā paṇṇaṃ pesessāmī”ti rahogato paṇṇaṃ likhi “bhaddā attano jātigottabhogānurūpaṃ gharāvāsaṃ labhatu,
atk-s0401a:647_15: Bhaddāpi “asukassa kira maṃ dātukāmo”ti sutvā rahogatā paṇṇaṃ likhi “ayyaputto attano jātigottabhogānurūpaṃ gharāvāsaṃ labhatu,
