atk-s0401a:647_22: Bhaddāya pippalimāṇavassa pahitanti ca vutte dvepi vācetvā “passatha dārakānaṃ kamma”nti phāletvā araññe
atk-s0401a:647_23: chaḍḍetvā samānapaṇṇaṃ likhitvā ito ca etto ca pesesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:648_0: Taṃdivasameva māṇavo ekaṃ pupphadāmaṃ gahetvā ṭhapesi. Bhaddāpi,
atk-s0401a:648_2: Bhuttasāyamāsā ubhopi “sayanaṃ abhiruhissāmā”ti samāgantvā māṇavo dakkhiṇapassena sayanaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0401a:648_7: Te pana aññamaññaṃ sarīrasamphassabhayena tiyāmarattiṃ niddaṃ anokkamantāva vītināmenti,
atk-s0401a:648_9: Te lokāmisena asaṃsaṭṭhā yāva mātāpitaro dharanti,
atk-s0401a:648_10: tāva kuṭumbaṃ avicāretvā tesu kālaṅkatesu vicārayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:648_12: ekadivasaṃ sarīraṃ ubbaṭṭetvā chaḍḍetabbaṃ suvaṇṇacuṇṇameva magadhanāḷiyā dvādasanāḷimattaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0401a:649_0: So ekadivasaṃ alaṅkataassaṃ āruyha mahājanaparivuto kammantaṃ gantvā khettakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito naṅgalehi bhinnaṭṭhānato
atk-s0401a:649_1: kākādayo sakuṇe gaṇḍuppādādipāṇake uddharitvā khādante disvā, “tātā,
atk-s0401a:649_4: Etehi kataṃ pāpaṃ kassa hotīti? Tumhākaṃ, ayyāti.
atk-s0401a:649_11: Sabbametaṃ bhaddāya kāpilāniyā niyyātetvā nikkhamma pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0401a:650_0: Bhaddāpi kāpilānī tasmiṃ khaṇe antaravatthumhi tayo tilakumbhe pattharāpetvā dhātīhi parivutā nisinnā kāke tilapāṇake khādante disvā, “ammā,
atk-s0401a:650_1: kiṃ ime khādantī”ti pucchi. Pāṇake, ayyeti.
atk-s0401a:650_5: yadi panetaṃ ettakena janena kataṃ akusalaṃ mayhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0401a:650_6: addhā bhavasahassenapi vaṭṭato sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0401a:650_7: ayyaputte āgatamatteyeva sabbaṃ tassa niyyātetvā nikkhamma pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0401a:651_0: Māṇavo āgantvā nhāyitvā pāsādaṃ āruyha mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:651_2: Dvepi bhuñjitvā parijane nikkhante rahogatā phāsukaṭṭhāne nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:651_4: “bhadde imaṃ gharaṃ āgacchantī kittakaṃ dhanaṃ āharī”ti?
atk-s0401a:651_7: yā ca imasmiṃ ghare sattāsīti koṭiyo yantabaddhā saṭṭhitaḷākādibhedā sampatti atthi,
atk-s0401a:651_13: Tesaṃ ādittapaṇṇakuṭi viya tayo bhavā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:651_14: Te antarāpaṇato kasāvarasapītāni vatthāni mattikāpatte ca āharāpetvā aññamaññaṃ kese ohārāpetvā “ye loke arahanto,
atk-s0401a:651_15: te uddissa amhākaṃ pabbajjā”ti vatvā thavikāya patte osāretvā aṃse laggetvā pāsādato otariṃsu.
atk-s0401a:651_16: Gehe dāsesu vā kammakāresu vā na koci sañjāni.
atk-s0401a:652_0: Atha ne brāhmaṇagāmato nikkhamma dāsagāmadvārena gacchante ākappakuttavasena dāsagāmavāsino sañjāniṃsu.
atk-s0401a:652_1: Te rodantā pādesu nipatitvā “kiṃ amhe anāthe karotha,
atk-s0401a:652_3: “Mayaṃ bhaṇe ādittapaṇṇasālā viya tayo bhavāti pabbajimhā,
atk-s0401a:652_6: Tumheva tumhākaṃ sīsaṃ dhovitvā bhujissā hutvā jīvathā”ti vatvā tesaṃ rodantānaṃyeva pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:652_7: Thero purato gacchanto nivattitvā olokento cintesi –
atk-s0401a:652_8: “ayaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī sakalajambudīpagghanikā itthī mayhaṃ pacchato āgacchati.
atk-s0401a:652_10: yaṃ kocideva evaṃ cinteyya ‘ime pabbajitvāpi vinā bhavituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0401a:652_12: Koci vā pana amhesu manaṃ padūsetvā apāyapūrako bhaveyya.
atk-s0401a:652_13: Imaṃ pahāya mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0401a:653_0: So purato gacchanto dvedhāpathaṃ disvā tassa matthake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:653_3: “bhadde tādisiṃ itthiṃ mama pacchato āgacchantiṃ disvā ‘ime pabbajitvāpi vinā bhavituṃ na sakkontī’ti
atk-s0401a:653_4: cintetvā amhesu paduṭṭhacitto mahājano apāyapūrako bhaveyya.
atk-s0401a:653_8: ‘pabbajitvāpi vinā na bhavantī’ti amhākaṃ dosaṃ dassanti,
atk-s0401a:653_10: ahaṃ ekaṃ gaṇhitvā vinā bhavissāmā”ti tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā
atk-s0401a:653_11: dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha “satasahassakappappamāṇe addhāne kato mittasanthavo ajja
atk-s0401a:653_15: amhākaṃ vāmamaggo vaṭṭatī”ti vanditvā maggaṃ paṭipannā.
atk-s0401a:653_16: Tesaṃ dvedhābhūtakāle ayaṃ mahāpathavī “ahaṃ cakkavāḷagirisinerupabbate dhāretuṃ sakkontīpi tumhākaṃ
atk-s0401a:653_17: guṇe dhāretuṃ na sakkomī”ti vadantī viya viravamānā akampi,
atk-s0401a:654_0: Sammāsambuddho veḷuvanamahāvihāre gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinno pathavīkampanasaddaṃ sutvā “kassa nu kho pathavī
atk-s0401a:654_1: kampatī”ti āvajjento “pippalimāṇavo ca bhaddā ca kāpilānī maṃ uddissa appameyyaṃ sampattiṃ pahāya pabbajitā,
atk-s0401a:654_2: tesaṃ viyogaṭṭhāne ubhinnampi guṇabalena ayaṃ pathavīkampo jāto,
atk-s0401a:654_3: mayāpi etesaṃ saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gandhakuṭito nikkhamma sayameva pattacīvaramādāya asītimahātheresu
atk-s0401a:654_4: kañci anāmantetvā tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ paccuggamanaṃ katvā rājagahassa ca nālandāya ca antare bahuputtakanigrodharukkhamūle
atk-s0401a:654_6: Nisīdanto pana aññatarapaṃsukūliko viya anisīditvā buddhavesaṃ gahetvā asītihatthā ghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjento nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:654_7: Iti tasmiṃ khaṇe paṇṇacchattasakaṭacakkakūṭāgārādippamāṇā buddharasmiyo ito cito ca vipphandantiyo vidhāvantiyo candasahassa-
atk-s0401a:654_9: uggamanakālo viya kurumānā taṃ vanantaṃ ekobhāsaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:654_15: Tasmiṃ pana divase satasākho nigrodho suvaṇṇavaṇṇova ahosi.
atk-s0401a:655_1: imāhaṃ uddissa pabbajito”ti diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya oṇatoṇato gantvā tīsu ṭhānesu vanditvā “satthā me,
atk-s0401a:655_8: sace tvaṃ imaṃ nipaccakāraṃ mahāpathaviyā kareyyāsi,
atk-s0401a:655_10: Tathāgatassa evaṃ guṇamahantataṃ jānatā tayā kato nipaccakāro mayhaṃ lomampi cāletuṃ na sakkoti. Nisīda, kassapa,
atk-s0401a:655_12: Athassa bhagavā tīhi ovādehi upasampadaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:655_13: Datvā bahuputtakanigrodhamūlato nikkhamitvā theraṃ pacchāsamaṇaṃ katvā maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0401a:655_16: So kañcanamahānāvāya pacchābandho viya satthu padānupadikaṃ anugañchi.
atk-s0401a:655_17: Satthā thokaṃ maggaṃ gantvā maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisajjākāraṃ dassesi,
atk-s0401a:655_18: thero “nisīditukāmo satthā”ti ñatvā attano pārupanapilotikasaṅghāṭiṃ catugguṇaṃ katvā paññāpesi.
atk-s0401a:656_0: Satthā tasmiṃ nisīditvā hatthena cīvaraṃ parāmasitvā “mudukā kho tyāyaṃ, kassapa,
atk-s0401a:656_9: Mayā hi imassa paṃsukūlassa gahitadivase udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī kampi,
atk-s0401a:656_10: imaṃ buddhānaṃ paribhogajiṇṇaṃ cīvaraṃ nāma na sakkā parittaguṇena dhāretuṃ,
atk-s0401a:656_11: paṭibalenevidaṃ paṭipattipūraṇasamatthena jātipaṃsukūlikena gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā therena saddhiṃ cīvaraṃ parivattesi.
atk-s0401a:657_0: Evaṃ pana cīvaraparivattaṃ katvā therena pārutacīvaraṃ bhagavā pārupi,
atk-s0401a:657_2: Tasmiṃ samaye acetanāpi ayaṃ mahāpathavī “dukkaraṃ, bhante, akattha,
atk-s0401a:657_3: attanā pārutacīvaraṃ sāvakassa dinnapubbaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0401a:657_4: ahaṃ tumhākaṃ guṇaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkomī”ti vadantī viya udakapariyantaṃ katvā kampi.
atk-s0401a:657_6: kiṃ me idāni uttari kattabbaṃ atthī”ti unnatiṃ akatvā buddhānaṃ santikeyeva terasa dhutaguṇe samādāya
atk-s0401a:657_7: sattadivasamattaṃ puthujjano hutvā aṭṭhame aruṇe saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:657_11: apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ niccanavako kulesu appagabbho”ti evamādīhi suttehi theraṃ thometvā aparabhāge
atk-s0401a:657_12: etadeva kassapasaṃyuttaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā “mama sāsane dhutavādānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahākassapo aggo”ti
atk-s0401a:659_1: Pañcame dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ anuruddhoti dibbacakkhukabhikkhūnaṃ anuruddhatthero aggoti vadati.
atk-s0401a:659_3: Thero kira bhojanapapañcamattaṃ ṭhapetvā sesakālaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhunā satte olokentova viharati.
atk-s0401a:659_4: Iti ahorattaṃ ciṇṇavasitāya esa dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:659_5: Apica kappasatasahassaṃ patthitabhāvenapesa dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggova jāto.
atk-s0401a:660_1: ayampi hi kulaputto padumuttarasseva bhagavato kāle pacchābhattaṃ dhammassavanatthaṃ vihāraṃ gacchantena mahājanena saddhiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:660_2: Ayaṃ hi tadā aññataro apākaṭanāmo issarakuṭumbiko ahosi.
atk-s0401a:660_3: So dasabalaṃ vanditvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammakathaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0401a:660_4: Satthā desanaṃ yathānusandhikaṃ ghaṭetvā ekaṃ dibbacakkhukaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:661_2: yaṃ evaṃ satthā sayaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:661_3: Aho vatāhampi anāgate uppajjanakabuddhassa sāsane dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti cittaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0401a:661_4: parisantarena gantvā svātanāya bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ nimantetvā punadivase buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0401a:661_5: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā “mahantaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ mayā patthita”nti teneva niyāmena ajjatanāya svātanāyāti
atk-s0401a:661_6: nimantetvā satta divasāni mahādānaṃ pavattetvā saparivārassa bhagavato uttamavatthāni datvā “bhagavā
atk-s0401a:661_7: nāhaṃ imaṃ sakkāraṃ dibbasampattiyā na manussasampattiyā atthāya karomi.
atk-s0401a:661_8: Yaṃ pana tumhe ito sattadivasamatthake bhikkhuṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapayittha,
atk-s0401a:661_9: ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane so bhikkhu viya dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā pādamūle nipajji.
atk-s0401a:661_10: Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā evamāha –
atk-s0401a:661_12: anāgate kappasatasahassapariyosāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0401a:661_13: tassa sāsane tvaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ aggo anuruddho nāma bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0401a:661_14: Evañca pana vatvā bhattānumodanaṃ katvā vihārameva agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:662_1: tāva avijahitameva kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā parinibbute satthari niṭṭhite sattayojanike suvaṇṇacetiye bhikkhusaṅghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:662_3: Padīpadānaṃ nāma dātuṃ vaṭṭati upāsakāti. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0401a:662_4: karissāmīti sahassadīpānaṃyeva tāva dīparukkhānaṃ sahassaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0401a:662_6: tadanantaraṃ tato pariyattatareti anekasahasse dīparukkhe kāresi.
atk-s0401a:663_0: Evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto kappasatasahassaṃ atikkamitvā kassapasammāsambuddhassa
atk-s0401a:663_1: kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbiyagehe nibbattitvā parinibbute satthari niṭṭhite yojanike cetiye bahu kaṃsapātiyo
atk-s0401a:663_2: kārāpetvā sappimaṇḍassa pūretvā majjhe ekekaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā ujjāletvā mukhavaṭṭiyā mukhavaṭṭiṃ
atk-s0401a:663_3: phusāpento cetiyaṃ parikkhipāpetvā attano sabbamahantaṃ kaṃsapātiṃ kāretvā sappimaṇḍassa pūretvā tassā
atk-s0401a:663_4: mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ samantato vaṭṭisahassaṃ jālāpetvā majjhaṭṭhāne thūpikaṃ pilotikāya veṭhetvā jālāpetvā kaṃsapātiṃ
atk-s0401a:663_6: Evaṃ tenāpi attabhāvena yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:664_0: Puna anuppanne buddhe tasmiṃyeva nagare duggatakulassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā sumanaseṭṭhiṃ nāma nissāya vasi,
atk-s0401a:664_2: So pana sumanaseṭṭhi devasikaṃ kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakānaṃ gehadvāre mahādānaṃ deti.
atk-s0401a:664_3: Athekadivasaṃ upariṭṭho nāma paccekabuddho gandhamādanapabbate nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpanno.
atk-s0401a:664_4: Tato vuṭṭhāya “ajja kassa anuggahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vīmaṃsi.
atk-s0401a:664_6: So “ajja mayā annabhārassa anuggahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā “idāni annabhāro aṭavito attano gehaṃ
atk-s0401a:664_7: āgamissatī”ti ñatvā pattacīvaramādāya gandhamādanapabbatā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā gāmadvāre annabhārassa
atk-s0401a:665_0: Annabhāro paccekabuddhaṃ tucchapattahatthaṃ disvā paccekabuddhaṃ abhivādetvā “api, bhante,
atk-s0401a:665_3: thokaṃ idheva hothā”ti vegena gantvā attano gehe mātugāmaṃ pucchi – “bhadde,
atk-s0401a:665_7: So tatova gantvā paccekabuddhassa hatthato pattamādāya āgantvā “bhadde,
atk-s0401a:665_8: mayaṃ purimabhave kalyāṇakammassa akatattā bhattaṃ paccāsīsamānā viharāma,
atk-s0401a:665_9: amhākaṃ dātukāmatāya sati deyyadhammo na hoti,
atk-s0401a:666_0: Byattā itthī “yato mayhaṃ sāmiko bhāgabhattaṃ deti,
atk-s0401a:666_1: mayāpi imasmiṃ dāne bhāginiyā bhavitabba”nti attano bhāgabhattampi upariṭṭhassa paccekabuddhassa patte patiṭṭhapetvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:666_2: Annabhāro pattaṃ āharitvā paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:666_6: So attano uttarasāṭakaṃ ekasmiṃ padese attharitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:666_8: Paccekabuddho tattha nisīditvā navavidhaṃ pāṭikūlyaṃ paccavekkhanto paribhuñji.
atk-s0401a:668_0: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando pannaraso yathā”ti. –
atk-s0401a:669_1: Sumanaseṭṭhissa chatte adhivatthā devatā “aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ upariṭṭhe suppatiṭṭhita”nti tikkhattuṃ vatvā sādhukāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:669_2: Sumanaseṭṭhi “kiṃ tvaṃ maṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ dānaṃ dadamānaṃ na passasī”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:669_4: annabhārena upariṭṭhapaccekabuddhassa dinnapiṇḍapāte pasīditvā sādhukāraṃ demīti.
atk-s0401a:670_2: ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ dānaṃ dento devataṃ sādhukāraṃ dāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ.
atk-s0401a:670_3: Ayaṃ annabhāro maṃ nissāya vasanto anurūpassa paṭiggāhakapuggalassa laddhattā ekapiṇḍapātadāneneva sādhukāraṃ dāpesi,
atk-s0401a:670_4: etassa anucchavikaṃ datvā etaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ mama santakaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti annabhāraṃ pakkosāpetvā “ajja tayā kassaci kiñci dānaṃ dinna”nti pucchi. Āma, ayya,
atk-s0401a:670_5: upariṭṭhapaccekabuddhassa me attano bhāgabhattaṃ dinnanti. Handa, bho,
atk-s0401a:670_6: kahāpaṇaṃ gaṇhitvā etaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ mayhaṃ dehīti.
atk-s0401a:670_9: annabhāro “sahassenāpi na demī”ti āha. Hotu, bho,
atk-s0401a:670_12: “Etampi dātuṃ yuttaṃ vā ayuttaṃ vā na jānāmi,
atk-s0401a:670_13: ayyaṃ pana upariṭṭhapaccekabuddhaṃ pucchitvā sace dātuṃ yuttaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:670_15: sumanaseṭṭhi mayhaṃ sahassaṃ datvā tumhākaṃ dinnapiṇḍapāte pattiṃ yācati,
atk-s0401a:670_18: Seyyathāpi kulasatike gāme ekasmiṃyeva ghare dīpaṃ jāleyya,
atk-s0401a:670_19: sesā attano attano telena vaṭṭiṃ temetvā jālāpetvā gaṇheyyuṃ,
atk-s0401a:670_23: Evameva paṇḍita uḷuṅkayāgu vā hotu kaṭacchubhikkhā vā,
atk-s0401a:670_24: attano piṇḍapāte paresaṃ pattiṃ dentassa satassa vā detu sahassassa vā,
atk-s0401a:670_28: sumanaseṭṭhissa pana pattiyā dinnāya dve piṇḍapātā honti eko tava,
atk-s0401a:671_0: So paccekabuddhaṃ abhivādetvā sumanaseṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā “piṇḍapāte pattiṃ gaṇha sāmī”ti āha. Handa,
atk-s0401a:671_3: saddhāya pana tumhākaṃ pattiṃ demīti. Tāta,
atk-s0401a:671_5: ahaṃ pana tuyhaṃ guṇaṃ pūjento sahassaṃ demi, gaṇha, tātāti.
atk-s0401a:671_7: tuyhaṃ sahassaṃ laddhakālato paṭṭhāya sahatthā kammakaraṇakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0401a:671_11: Nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhitapaccekabuddhassa dinnapiṇḍapāto nāma taṃdivasameva vipākaṃ deti.
atk-s0401a:671_12: Tasmā sumanaseṭṭhi aññaṃ divasaṃ annabhāraṃ gahetvā rājakulaṃ agacchantopi taṃdivasaṃ gahetvāva gato.
atk-s0401a:672_0: Annabhārassa puññaṃ āgamma rājā seṭṭhiṃ anoloketvā annabhārameva olokesi. Kiṃ, deva,
atk-s0401a:672_5: Ajja attano bhāgabhattaṃ sayaṃ abhuñjitvā upariṭṭhapaccekabuddhassa dinnattā mama hatthato sahassaṃ labhi devāti.
atk-s0401a:672_8: “Tava hatthato laddhattā mamapi hatthato laddhuṃ arahati,
atk-s0401a:672_9: ahampissa pūjaṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā sahassaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:672_11: Sādhu devāti ekaṃ gehaṭṭhānaṃ sodhentā kuddālena āhatāhataṭṭhāne nidhikumbhiyo gīvāya gīvaṃ āhacca ṭhitā disvā rañño ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:672_17: Kuddālena āhatāhataṭṭhāne ahicchattakamakuḷāni viya kumbhiyo uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:672_18: Te dhanaṃ āharitvā rañño santike rāsiṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:672_19: Rājā amacce sannipātetvā “imasmiṃ nagare kassa aññassa ettakaṃ dhanaṃ atthī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0401a:672_21: Tena hi ayaṃ annabhāro imasmiṃ nagare dhanaseṭṭhi nāma hotūti.
atk-s0401a:673_0: So tato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:673_1: Dīgharattaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ satthu uppajjanakāle kapilavatthunagare amittodanasakkassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:673_3: Mahānāmasakkassa kaniṭṭhabhātā satthu cūḷapituputto paramasukhumālo mahāpuñño ahosi.
atk-s0401a:673_5: Athassa mātā ekadivasaṃ “mama puttaṃ natthīti padaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti ekaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ aññāya suvaṇṇapātiyā pidahitvā tucchakaṃyeva pesesi.
atk-s0401a:673_8: Tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu alaṅkatanāṭakitthīhi parivuto devo viya sampattiṃ anubhavi.
atk-s0401a:674_0: Amhākampi bodhisatto tasmiṃ samaye tusitapurā cavitvā suddhodanamahārājassa aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0401a:674_1: gahetvā anukkamena vuddhippatto ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe vasitvā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0401a:674_2: anukkamena paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo bodhimaṇḍe sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā isipatane migadāye dhammacakkappattanaṃ
atk-s0401a:674_3: pavattetvā lokānuggahaṃ karonto rājagahaṃ āgamma “putto me rājagahaṃ āgato”ti sutvā “gacchatha bhaṇe
atk-s0401a:674_4: mama puttaṃ ānethā”ti pitarā pahite sahassasahassaparivāre dasa amacce ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā
atk-s0401a:674_5: kāḷudāyittherena cārikāgamanaṃ āyācito rājagahato vīsatisahassabhikkhuparivāro nikkhamitvā kapilavatthupuraṃ
atk-s0401a:674_6: gantvā ñātisamāgame anekehi iddhipāṭihāriyehi sappāṭihāriyaṃ vicitradhammadesanaṃ katvā mahājanaṃ amatapānaṃ
atk-s0401a:674_7: pāyetvā dutiyadivase pattacīvaramādāya nagaradvāre ṭhatvā “kiṃ nu kho kulanagaraṃ āgatānaṃ sabbaññubuddhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:674_8: āciṇṇa”nti āvajjamāno “sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caraṇaṃ āciṇṇa”nti ñatvā sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caranto “putto me
atk-s0401a:674_9: piṇḍāya caratī”ti sutvā āgatassa rañño dhammaṃ kathetvā tena sakanivesanaṃ pavesetvā katasakkārasammāno
atk-s0401a:674_10: tattha kātabbaṃ ñātijanānuggahaṃ katvā rāhulakumāraṃ pabbājetvā nacirasseva kapilavatthupurato mallaraṭṭhe
atk-s0401a:675_0: Tasmiṃ samaye suddhodanamahārājā sākiyajanaṃ sannipātetvā āha –
atk-s0401a:675_3: Nattāpi me rāhulakumāro khattiyagaṇena saddhiṃ taṃ parivāretvā acarissa,
atk-s0401a:675_5: Idāni pana me putto buddho jāto,
atk-s0401a:675_12: abhiññātā abhiññātā sakyakumārā bhagavantaṃ pabbajitaṃ anupabbajanti,
atk-s0401a:675_13: amhākaṃ kule natthi koci agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito.
atk-s0401a:675_16: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā gharāvāse ruciṃ akatvā attasattamo agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito.
atk-s0401a:676_0: Evaṃ anupiyaambavanaṃ gantvā pabbajitesu pana tesu tasmiṃyeva antovasse bhaddiyatthero arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:676_4: bhagutthero ca kimilatthero ca pacchā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:676_5: Tesaṃ pana sabbesampi therānaṃ attano attano āgataṭṭhāne pubbapatthanābhinīhāro āgamissati.
atk-s0401a:676_6: Ayaṃ pana anuruddhatthero dhammasenāpatissa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā cetiyaraṭṭhe pācīnavaṃsamigadāyaṃ
atk-s0401a:676_7: gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto satta mahāpurisavitakke vitakkesi,
atk-s0401a:676_9: Satthā “anuruddho aṭṭhame mahāpurisavitakke kilamatī”ti ñatvā “tassa saṅkappaṃ pūressāmī”ti tattha gantvā
atk-s0401a:676_10: paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno aṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ pūretvā catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0401a:676_11: mahāariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ kathetvā ākāse uppatitvā bhesakalāvanameva gato.
atk-s0401a:677_0: Thero tathāgate gatamatteyeva tevijjo mahākhīṇāsavo hutvā “satthā mayhaṃ manaṃ jānitvā āgantvā aṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:677_1: So ca me manoratho matthakaṃ patto”ti buddhānaṃ dhammadesanaṃ attano ca paṭividdhadhammaṃ ārabbha imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0401a:680_0: “Yathā me ahu saṅkappo, tato uttari desayi;
atk-s0401a:683_0: Tisso vijjā anuppatto, kataṃ buddhassa sāsana”nti. ;
atk-s0401a:684_0: Atha naṃ aparabhāge satthā jetavanamahāvihāre viharanto “mama sāsane dibbacakkhukānaṃ anuruddho aggo”ti aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:686_10: Tassa hi mātā sākiyānīnaṃ antare vayena sabbajeṭṭhikā,
atk-s0401a:686_11: soyeva ca sākiyakule sampattaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajito.
atk-s0401a:686_13: Apica pubbapatthanānubhāvena cesa anupaṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni rājakule nibbattitvā rajjaṃ kāresiyeva.
atk-s0401a:687_1: ayampi hi atīte padumuttarabuddhakāle mahābhogakule nibbatto vuttanayeneva dhammassavanatthāya gato.
atk-s0401a:687_2: Taṃdivasaṃ satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ uccākulikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate
atk-s0401a:687_3: ekassa buddhassa sāsane uccākulikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tathāgataṃ nimantetvā satta
atk-s0401a:687_5: ahaṃ imassa dānassa phalena nāññaṃ sampattiṃ ākaṅkhāmi,
atk-s0401a:687_6: anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa sāsane uccākulikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthayitvā pādamūle nipajji.
atk-s0401a:688_0: Satthā anāgataṃ olokento samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “samijjhissati te idaṃ kammaṃ,
atk-s0401a:688_1: ito kappasatasahassāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0401a:688_2: tvaṃ tassa sāsane uccākulikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā bhattānumodanaṃ katvā vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:688_3: Sopi taṃ byākaraṇaṃ labhitvā uccākulikasaṃvattanikakammaṃ pucchitvā dhammāsanāni kāretvā tesu paccattharaṇāni
atk-s0401a:688_4: santharāpetvā dhammabījaniyo dhammakathikavaṭṭaṃ uposathāgāre padīpateladānanti evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ bahuvidhaṃ
atk-s0401a:688_5: kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā tattha kālakato devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto kassapadasabalassa ca amhākañca
atk-s0401a:689_0: Tena ca samayena sambahulā paccekabuddhā gandhamādanapabbatā āgamma bārāṇasiyaṃ gaṅgāya tīre phāsukaṭṭhāne nisīditvā piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjanti.
atk-s0401a:689_1: So kuṭumbiyo tesaṃ nibaddhameva tasmiṃ ṭhāne bhattavissaggakaraṇaṃ ñatvā aṭṭha pāsāṇaphalakāni attharitvā yāvajīvaṃ paccekabuddhe upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0401a:689_2: Athekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare khattiyakule nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:689_4: So vayaṃ āgamma heṭṭhā anuruddhasutte vuttanayeneva channaṃ khattiyānaṃ abbhantaro hutvā satthari anupiyaambavane
atk-s0401a:689_5: viharante satthu santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:689_6: Atha satthā aparabhāge jetavanamahāvihāre viharanto “mama sāsane uccākulikānaṃ kāḷigodhāya putto bhaddiyatthero aggo”ti aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:691_5: ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbatto vuttanayeneva dhammassavanatthāya vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:691_6: Tasmiṃ samaye satthāraṃ ekaṃ mañjussaraṃ bhikkhuṃ etadagge ṭhapentaṃ disvā “aho vatāhampi anāgate ayaṃ
atk-s0401a:691_7: bhikkhu viya ekassa buddhassa sāsane mañjussarānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti cittaṃ uppādetvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:691_8: nimantetvā satta divasāni buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:691_9: ahaṃ imassa dānassa phalena na aññaṃ sampattiṃ ākaṅkhāmi,
atk-s0401a:691_10: anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa sāsane mañjussarānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthayitvā satthupādamūle nipajji.
atk-s0401a:691_11: Satthā anāgataṃ olokento samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “samijjhissati te idaṃ kammaṃ,
atk-s0401a:691_12: ito kappasatasahassāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0401a:691_13: tvaṃ tassa sāsane mañjussarānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:692_0: Sopi taṃ byākaraṇaṃ labhitvā yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā tato kālakato devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto
atk-s0401a:692_1: vipassīsammāsambuddhakāle cittapattakokilo nāma hutvā kheme migadāye vasanto ekadivasaṃ himavantaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:692_2: madhuraṃ ambaphalaṃ tuṇḍena gahetvā āgacchanto bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ satthāraṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0401a:692_4: ajja pana me imaṃ ambapakkaṃ puttakānaṃ atthāya āgataṃ.
atk-s0401a:692_6: imaṃ pana dasabalassa dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti otaritvā ākāse carati.
atk-s0401a:692_7: Satthā tassa cittaṃ ñatvā asokattheraṃ nāma upaṭṭhākaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0401a:692_8: So pattaṃ nīharitvā satthu hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:692_9: So kokilo dasabalassa patte ambapakkaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0401a:692_11: Kokilo pasannacitto punappunaṃ dasabalassa guṇe āvajjetvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā attano kulāvakaṃ gantvā sattāhaṃ pītisukhena vītināmesi.
atk-s0401a:693_8: dviyojana”nti vutte ayaṃ tadā jeṭṭhavaḍḍhakī hutvā “etha, bho,
atk-s0401a:693_9: anāgate sukhapaṭijaggiyaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā rajjuṃ ādāya parikkhipanto gāvutamattake ṭhatvā “ekekaṃ mukhaṃ gāvutaṃ gāvutaṃ hotu,
atk-s0401a:693_13: Tena kammena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne aññehi hīnatarappamāṇo ahosi.
atk-s0401a:693_14: So amhākaṃ satthu kāle sāvatthiyaṃ mahābhogakule nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:693_16: So vayappatto satthari jetavanamahāvihāre paṭivasante vihāraṃ gantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho
atk-s0401a:693_17: pabbajitvā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:693_18: Atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge ariyavaragaṇamajjhe nisinno mañjussarānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:695_2: Piṇḍolabhāradvājoti so kira arahattaṃ pattadivase avāpuraṇaṃ ādāya vihārena vihāraṃ pariveṇena pariveṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:695_3: gantvā “yassa magge vā phale vā kaṅkhā atthi,
atk-s0401a:695_4: so maṃ pucchatū”ti sīhanādaṃ nadanto vicari.
atk-s0401a:695_6: sāsane katabbakiccaṃ mayhaṃ matthakaṃ patta”nti sīhanādaṃ nadi.
atk-s0401a:696_1: ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle pabbatapāde sīhayoniyaṃ nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:696_2: Satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento tassa hetusampattiṃ disvā haṃsavatiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ
atk-s0401a:696_3: sīhe gocarāya pakkante tassa vasanaguhaṃ pavisitvā ākāse pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:696_4: Sīho gocaraṃ labhitvā nivatto guhādvāre ṭhito antoguhāyaṃ dasabalaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā “mama vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:696_5: āgantvā añño satto nisīdituṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0401a:696_10: Ayaṃ puriso imasmiṃ loke pūjaneyyānaṃ aggo bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:696_11: mayāpissa yathāsatti yathābalaṃ sakkāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti jalajathalajāni nānākusumāni āharitvā bhūmito
atk-s0401a:696_12: yāva nisinnapallaṅkaṭṭhānā pupphāsanaṃ santharitvā sabbarattiṃ sammukhaṭṭhāne tathāgataṃ namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:696_13: Punadivase purāṇapupphāni apanetvā navapupphehi āsanaṃ santhari.
atk-s0401a:697_0: Eteneva niyāmena satta divasāni pupphāsanaṃ paññāpetvā balavapītisomanassaṃ nibbattetvā guhādvāre ārakkhaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:697_1: Sattame divase satthā nirodhato vuṭṭhāya guhādvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:697_2: Sīhopi migarājā tathāgataṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditvā paṭikkamitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:697_3: Satthā “vaṭṭissati ettako upanissayo etassā”ti vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā vihārameva gato.
atk-s0401a:698_0: Sopi sīho buddhaviyogena dukkhito kālaṃ katvā haṃsavatīnagare mahāsālakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā vayappatto
atk-s0401a:698_1: ekadivasaṃ nagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ sīhanādikānaṃ
atk-s0401a:698_2: aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā vuttanayeneva sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā satthārā
atk-s0401a:698_3: samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā byākato yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā tattha kālakato devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto
atk-s0401a:698_6: So vayappatto tayo vede uggahetvā pañca māṇavasatāni mante vācento vicarati.
atk-s0401a:698_7: So attano jeṭṭhakabhāvena nimantanaṭṭhānesu sabbesaṃ bhikkhaṃ sayameva sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0401a:698_9: So tehi māṇavehi saddhiṃ “kuhiṃ yāgu kuhiṃ bhatta”nti yāgubhattakhajjakāneva pariyesamāno carati.
atk-s0401a:698_10: So gatagataṭṭhāne piṇḍameva paṭimānento caratīti piṇḍolabhāradvājoteva paññāyi.
atk-s0401a:699_0: So ekadivasaṃ satthari rājagahamanuppatte dhammakathaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:699_1: Arahattaṃ pattavelāyameva avāpuraṇaṃ ādāya vihārena vihāraṃ pariveṇena pariveṇaṃ gantvā “yassa magge vā phale vā kaṅkhā atthi,
atk-s0401a:699_2: so maṃ pucchatū”ti sīhanādaṃ nadanto vicari.
atk-s0401a:699_3: So ekadivasaṃ rājagahaseṭṭhinā veḷuparamparāya ussāpetvā ākāse laggitaṃ jayasumanavaṇṇaṃ candanasārapattaṃ
atk-s0401a:699_4: iddhiyā ādāya sādhukāraṃ dadantena mahājanena parivuto vihāraṃ āgantvā tathāgatassa hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:700_1: “sīhanādiyatthero arahattaṃ pattadivase bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe ‘yassa magge vā phale vā kaṅkhā atthi,
atk-s0401a:700_5: Attano sīhanādiyabhāveneva mahājanassa pasādaṃ janetvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā candanasārapattañca gaṇhī”ti.
atk-s0401a:700_6: Te bhikkhū ime tayopi guṇe ekato katvā satthu kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:700_8: pasaṃsitabbayuttakaṃ pasaṃsantīti imasmiṃ ṭhāne therassa pasaṃsitabbayuttameva aṅgaṃ gahetvā “tiṇṇaṃ kho pana,
atk-s0401a:700_10: indriyānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā bhāradvājo bhikkhu aññaṃ byākāsi –
atk-s0401a:700_21: tiṇṇaṃ indriyānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā bhāradvājo bhikkhu aññaṃ byākāsi –
atk-s0401a:700_25: nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānāmī”’ti theraṃ pasaṃsitvā sīhanādikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:702_4: ayaṃ kira padumuttaradasabalassa uppattito puretarameva haṃsavatīnagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:702_6: So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā sabbasippesu kovido hutvā pañcamāṇavakasataparivāro vicaranto tayopi
atk-s0401a:702_7: vede oloketvā mokkhadhammaṃ adisvā “idaṃ vedattayaṃ nāma kadalikkhandho viya bahi maṭṭhaṃ anto nissāraṃ,
atk-s0401a:702_9: Kiṃ me iminā”ti isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā brahmavihāre nibbattetvā “aparihīnajjhāno brahmalokokūpapanno
atk-s0401a:702_10: bhavissāmī”ti pañcahi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ pabbatapādaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:702_12: So pañca abhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā tesampi kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0401a:702_13: Te tassa ovāde ṭhatvā sabbepi pañca abhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:703_0: Addhāne atikkante tassa gotamatāpasassa mahallakakāle padumuttaradasabalo paṭhamābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko
atk-s0401a:703_2: So ekadivasaṃ paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento gotamatāpasassa parisāya arahattūpanissayaṃ gotamatāpasassa
atk-s0401a:703_3: ca “ahaṃ anāgate uppajjamānakabuddhassa sāsane dhammakathikabhikkhūnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanabhāvañca
atk-s0401a:703_4: disvā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā attano pattacīvaraṃ sayameva gahetvā aññātakavesena gotamatāpasassa
atk-s0401a:703_5: antevāsikesu vanamūlaphalāphalatthāya gatesu gantvā gotamassa paṇṇasālādvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:703_6: Gotamo buddhānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ ajānantopi dūratova dasabalaṃ disvā “ayaṃ puriso lokato mutto hutvā paññāyati,
atk-s0401a:703_7: yathā assa sarīranipphatti yehi ca lakkhaṇehi samannāgato agāramajjhe vā tiṭṭhanto cakkavattī rājā hoti,
atk-s0401a:703_8: pabbajanto vā vivaṭṭacchado sabbaññubuddho hotī”ti ñatvā paṭhamadassaneneva dasabalaṃ abhivādetvā “ito etha bhagavā”ti buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:704_0: Tasmiṃ samaye te jaṭilā “paṇītapaṇītaṃ vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ ācariyassa datvā sesakaṃ paribhuñjissāmā”ti āgacchantā dasabalaṃ uccāsane,
atk-s0401a:704_2: mayaṃ ‘imasmiṃ loke amhākaṃ ācariyena uttaritaro natthī’ti vicarāma.
atk-s0401a:704_3: Idāni pana no ācariyaṃ nīcāsane nisīdāpetvā uccāsane nisinnako eko paññāyati,
atk-s0401a:704_4: mahanto vatāyaṃ puriso bhavissatī”ti piṭakāni gahetvā āgacchanti.
atk-s0401a:704_5: Gotamatāpaso “ime maṃ dasabalassa santike vandeyyu”nti bhīto dūrato āha – “tātā,
atk-s0401a:704_7: sadevake loke aggapuggalo sabbesaṃ vandanāraho puriso idha nisinno,
atk-s0401a:704_9: Tāpasā “na ajānitvā ācariyo kathessatī”ti sabbeva tathāgatassa pāde vandiṃsu. “Tātā,
atk-s0401a:704_10: amhākaṃ aññaṃ dasabalassa dātabbayuttakaṃ bhojanaṃ natthi,
atk-s0401a:704_11: imaṃ vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ dassāmā”ti paṇītapaṇītaṃ buddhānaṃ patte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0401a:704_14: Satthā bhattakiccaṃ katvā “dve aggasāvakā bhikkhusatasahassaṃ gahetvā āgacchantū”ti cintesi.
atk-s0401a:704_15: Tasmiṃ khaṇe aggasāvako mahādevalatthero “kahaṃ nu kho satthā gato”ti āvajjento “satthā amhākaṃ āgamanaṃ
atk-s0401a:704_16: paccāsīsatī”ti bhikkhusatasahassaṃ gahetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:705_5: Te tāvadeva pabbatapādato vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni iddhiyā āharitvā sāriputtattherassa vatthumhi vuttanayeneva āsanāni paññāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:706_0: Satthā sattame divase nirodhato vuṭṭhāya parivāretvā ṭhite tāpase disvā dhammakathikabhāve etadaggappattaṃ sāvakaṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0401a:706_3: So satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tīṇi piṭakāni sammasitvā anumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:706_4: Tassa desanāpariyosāne satthā sayaṃ brahmaghosaṃ nicchāretvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0401a:706_5: Desanāpariyosāne ṭhapetvā gotamatāpasaṃ sesā aṭṭhārasa sahassajaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:707_0: Gotamo pana tenattabhāvena paṭivedhaṃ kātuṃ asakkonto bhagavantaṃ āha –
atk-s0401a:707_3: Ayaṃ gotama mayhaṃ sāsane dhammakathikānaṃ aggoti. “Ahampi, bhante,
atk-s0401a:707_4: imassa satta divasāni katassa adhikārassa phalena ayaṃ bhikkhu viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane dhammakathikānaṃ
atk-s0401a:707_5: aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā pādamūle nipajji.
atk-s0401a:708_0: Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā anantarāyenassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “anāgate kappasatasahassāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0401a:708_1: tvaṃ tassa sāsane dhammakathikānaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā te arahattappatte tāpase “etha bhikkhavo”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:709_0: Gotamopi yāvajīvaṃ tathāgataṃ paricaritvā yathābalaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ca
atk-s0401a:709_1: manussesu ca saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kapilavatthunagarassa avidūre doṇavatthubrāhmaṇagāme brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:709_3: Satthari abhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke anupubbena āgantvā rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharante
atk-s0401a:709_4: aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero kapilavatthuṃ gantvā attano bhāgineyyaṃ puṇṇamāṇavaṃ pabbājetvā punadivase dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:709_5: santikaṃ āgantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā āpucchitvā nivāsatthāya chaddantadahaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:709_6: Puṇṇopi mantāṇiputto mātulena aññāsikoṇḍaññattherena saddhiṃ dasabalassa santikaṃ agantvā “mayhaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ
atk-s0401a:709_7: matthakaṃ pāpetvāva dasabalassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti kapilavatthusmiṃyeva ohīno yonisomanasikāre kammaṃ
atk-s0401a:709_10: Thero sayaṃ dasakathāvatthulābhitāya tepi dasahi kathāvatthūhi ovadati.
atk-s0401a:709_11: Te tassa ovāde ṭhatvā sabbeva arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0401a:710_0: Te attano pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ ñatvā upajjhāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āhaṃsu – “bhante,
atk-s0401a:710_6: ahaṃ dhammaṃ desento dasa kathāvatthūni amuñcantova desemi.
atk-s0401a:710_7: Mayi gacchante sabbepime bhikkhū parivāretvā gacchissanti,
atk-s0401a:710_8: evaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya gantvā pana ayuttaṃ mayhaṃ dasabalaṃ passituṃ,
atk-s0401a:710_9: ime tāva gantvā passantū”ti te bhikkhū āha – “āvuso,
atk-s0401a:711_0: Te therā sabbepi dasabalassa jātibhūmiraṭṭhavāsino sabbe khīṇāsavā sabbe dasakathāvatthulābhino attano
atk-s0401a:711_1: upajjhāyassa ovādaṃ abhinditvā anupubbena cārikaṃ carantā saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ atikkamma rājagahe veḷuvanamahāvihāraṃ
atk-s0401a:711_2: gantvā dasabalassa pāde vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:711_3: Āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammoditunti bhagavā tehi saddhiṃ “kacci,
atk-s0401a:711_5: khamanīya”ntiādinā nayena madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā “kuto ca tumhe,
atk-s0401a:711_10: jātibhūmiyaṃ jātibhūmakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sabrahmacārīhi evaṃ sambhāvito attanā ca appiccho appicchakathañca
atk-s0401a:711_14: Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā āyasmā sāriputto therassa dassanakāmo ahosi.
atk-s0401a:712_1: Puṇṇatthero dasabalassa tattha āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā “satthāraṃ passissāmī”ti gantvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃyeva tathāgataṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:712_3: Thero dhammaṃ sutvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā paṭisallānatthāya andhavanaṃ gantvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:712_4: Sāriputtattheropi tassa gamanaṃ sutvā sīsānulokiko gantvā okāsaṃ sallakkhetvā taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0401a:712_8: Atha satthā aparabhāge bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe nisinno theraṃ dhammakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:714_2: Vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānanti taṃ desanaṃ vitthāretvā atthaṃ vibhajamānānaṃ.
atk-s0401a:714_3: Aññe kira tathāgatassa saṅkhepavacanaṃ atthavasena vā pūretuṃ sakkonti byañjanavasena vā,
atk-s0401a:715_1: ayaṃ kira padumuttarasammāsambuddhakāle gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattitvā vuddhippatto ekadivasaṃ vuttanayeneva
atk-s0401a:715_2: vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ attanā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena
atk-s0401a:715_3: atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā “mahanto vatāyaṃ bhikkhu,
atk-s0401a:715_5: mayāpi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti satthāraṃ nimantetvā vuttanayeneva sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:715_6: ahaṃ imassa sakkārassa phalena na aññaṃ sampattiṃ patthemi,
atk-s0401a:715_7: anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa sāsane ito sattadivasamatthake tumhehi ṭhānantare ṭhapitabhikkhu viya ahampi
atk-s0401a:715_8: taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ labheyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā pādamūle nipajji.
atk-s0401a:715_9: Satthā anāgataṃ olokento “samijjhissati imassa kulaputtassa patthanā”ti disvā “ambho,
atk-s0401a:715_11: anāgate kappasatasahassāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0401a:715_12: tvaṃ tassa sāsane saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:716_0: Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā kassapabuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:716_1: kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā satthari parinibbute suvaṇṇacetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā satasahassagghanikāya
atk-s0401a:716_2: suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāya pūjaṃ katvā “bhagavā mayhaṃ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sarīraṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:716_3: Tato yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ dasabalassa uppattikāle ujjeninagare purohitassa gehe nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:716_4: Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase “mayhaṃ putto suvaṇṇavaṇṇasarīro attanāva attano nāmaṃ gahetvā āgato”ti kañcanamāṇavotevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:716_5: So vuddhimanvāya tayo vede uggaṇhitvā pitu accayena purohitaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
atk-s0401a:717_2: taṃ ānetuṃ samatthā gantvā ānetha tātā”ti. Deva,
atk-s0401a:717_3: añño dasabalaṃ ānetuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0401a:717_11: So “buddhānaṃ santikaṃ gacchantassa mahāparisāya kammaṃ natthī”ti attaṭṭhamo agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:717_13: Desanāpariyosāne saddhiṃ sattahi janehi saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:717_15: Taṃkhaṇaṃyeva sabbeva antarahitakesamassū iddhimayapattacīvaradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya jātā.
atk-s0401a:718_0: Thero attano kicce matthakaṃ patte tuṇhībhāvena anisīditvā kāḷudāyitthero viya satthu ujjenigamanatthāya gamanavaṇṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0401a:718_1: Satthā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “kaccāno attano jātibhūmiyaṃ mama gamanaṃ paccāsīsatī”ti aññāsi.
atk-s0401a:718_2: Buddhā ca nāma ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca gantuṃ ayuttaṭṭhānaṃ na gacchanti.
atk-s0401a:718_6: Thero “buddhānaṃ dve kathā nāma natthī”ti tathāgataṃ vanditvā attanā saddhiṃ āgatehi sattahi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0401a:718_7: saddhiṃ ujjeniṃ gacchanto antarāmagge telapanāḷi nāma nigamo,
atk-s0401a:718_10: Tāsu ekā parijiṇṇakule nibbattā duggatā mātāpitūnaṃ accayena dhātiṃ nissāya jīvati.
atk-s0401a:718_13: Tasmiṃyeva nigame aññā issaraseṭṭhikulassa dhītā nikkesikā.
atk-s0401a:718_14: Sā tato pubbe tassā samīpaṃ pesetvā “sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā dassāmī”ti vatvāpi kese āharāpetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0401a:719_0: Tasmiṃ pana divase sā seṭṭhidhītā mahākaccānattheraṃ sattahi bhikkhūhi parivutaṃ tucchapattaṃ āgacchantaṃ
atk-s0401a:719_1: disvā “ayaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇo eko brahmabandhubhikkhu yathādhoteneva pattena āgacchati,
atk-s0401a:719_3: Asukaseṭṭhidhītā pana imesaṃ kesānaṃ atthāya pesesi.
atk-s0401a:719_4: Idāni ito laddhauppādena sakkā therassa deyyadhammaṃ dātu”nti dhātiṃ pesetvā there nimantetvā antogehe nisīdāpesi.
atk-s0401a:719_5: Therānaṃ nisinnakāle gabbhaṃ pavisitvā dhātiyā attano kese kappāpetvā, “amma,
atk-s0401a:719_6: ime kese asukāya nāma seṭṭhidhītāya datvā yaṃ sā deti,
atk-s0401a:719_9: Dhāti piṭṭhihatthena assūni puñchitvā ekena hatthena hadayamaṃsaṃ sandhāretvā therānaṃ santike paṭicchādetvā
atk-s0401a:719_10: te kese ādāya tassā seṭṭhidhītāya santikaṃ gatā.
atk-s0401a:720_0: Paṇiyaṃ nāma sāravantampi sayaṃ upanītaṃ gāravaṃ na janeti,
atk-s0401a:720_2: “ahaṃ pubbe bahunāpi dhanena ime kese āharāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0401a:720_3: idāni pana chinnakālato paṭṭhāya na yathāmūlameva labhissatī”ti.
atk-s0401a:720_5: “ahaṃ pubbe tava sāminiṃ bahunāpi dhanena kese āharāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0401a:720_6: yattha katthaci vinipātā pana nijjīvakesā nāma aṭṭha kahāpaṇe agghantī”ti aṭṭheva kahāpaṇe adāsi.
atk-s0401a:720_8: Seṭṭhidhītā ekekaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ ekekakahāpaṇagghanakaṃ katvā therānaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0401a:720_9: Thero āvajjitvā seṭṭhidhītāya upanissayaṃ disvā “kahaṃ seṭṭhidhītā”ti pucchi. Gabbhe, ayyāti.
atk-s0401a:720_11: Sā ca theresu gāravena ekavacaneneva āgantvā there vanditvā balavasaddhaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0401a:720_12: Sukhette patiṭṭhitapiṇḍapāto diṭṭheva dhamme vipākaṃ detīti saha therānaṃ vandanena kesā pakatibhāveyeva aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:720_13: Therāpi taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gahetvā passantiyāyeva seṭṭhidhītāya vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā kañcanavanuyyāne otariṃsu.
atk-s0401a:721_0: Uyyānapālo theraṃ disvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā “deva,
atk-s0401a:721_1: me ayyo purohito kaccāno pabbajitvā uyyānamāgato”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:721_2: Rājā caṇḍapajjoto uyyānaṃ gantvā katabhattakiccaṃ theraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno “kahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0401a:721_4: Satthā sayaṃ anāgantvā maṃ pesesi mahārājāti. Kahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0401a:721_6: Thero rañño pucchāsabhāgena sabbaṃ seṭṭhidhītāya kataṃ dukkaraṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0401a:721_7: Rājā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ paṭiyādetvā theraṃ nimantetvā nivesanaṃ gantvā seṭṭhidhītaraṃ āṇāpetvā aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:722_0: Tato paṭṭhāya rājā therassa mahāsakkāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0401a:722_1: Therassa dhammakathāya pasīditvā mahājano therassa santike pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:722_2: Tato paṭṭhāya sakalanagaraṃ ekakāsāvapajjotaṃ isivātapaṭivātaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0401a:722_3: Sāpi devī gabbhaṃ labhitvā dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0401a:722_4: Tassa nāmaggahaṇadivase gopālakumāroti mātāmahaseṭṭhino nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:722_5: Sā puttassa nāmavasena gopālamātā nāma devī jātā.
atk-s0401a:722_6: Sā devī there ativiya pasīditvā rājānaṃ sampaṭicchāpetvā kañcanavanuyyāne therassa vihāraṃ kāresi.
atk-s0401a:722_7: Thero ujjeninagaraṃ pasādetvā puna satthu santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:722_8: Atha satthā aparabhāge jetavane viharanto madhupiṇḍikasuttaṃ kaccānapeyyālaṃ pārāyanasuttanti ime tayo
atk-s0401a:722_9: suttante aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:727_3: iddhiyā upasaṅkamī”ti vuttaṭṭhānasmiñhi manena katakāyo manomayakāyo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:727_4: “Aññataraṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ upapajjatī”ti vuttaṭṭhāne manena nibbattitakāyo manomayakāyo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:727_6: Tattha aññe bhikkhū manomayaṃ kāyaṃ nibbattentā tayo vā cattāro vā nibbattenti,
atk-s0401a:727_8: Ekasadiseyeva ca katvā nibbattenti ekavidhameva kammaṃ kurumāne.
atk-s0401a:727_10: Dvepi ca jane na ekasadise akāsi na ekavidhaṃ kammaṃ kurumāne.
atk-s0401a:727_11: Tasmā manomayaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminantānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:728_2: Tattha cūḷapanthakatthero catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ lābhitāya “cetovivaṭṭakusalo”ti vutto,
atk-s0401a:729_0: Apica cūḷapanthakatthero rūpāvacarajjhānalābhī hutvā jhānaṅgehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pattoti cetovivaṭṭakusalo,
atk-s0401a:729_1: mahāpanthako arūpāvacarajjhānalābhī hutvā jhānaṅgehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pattoti saññāvivaṭṭakusalo.
atk-s0401a:729_2: Ubhopi panthe jātattā panthakā nāma jātā.
atk-s0401a:730_1: atīte kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagaravāsino dve bhātikā kuṭumbikā saddhā pasannā nibaddhaṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanti.
atk-s0401a:730_2: Tesu ekadivasaṃ kaniṭṭho satthāraṃ dvīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ “mama sāsane manomayaṃ kāyaṃ
atk-s0401a:730_3: abhinimminantānaṃ cetovivaṭṭakusalānañca ayaṃ bhikkhu aggo”ti etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0401a:730_4: “mahā vatāyaṃ bhikkhu eko hutvā dve aṅgāni paripūretvā carati,
atk-s0401a:730_5: mayāpi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane aṅgadvayapūrakena hutvā vicarituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0401a:730_6: So purimanayeneva satthāraṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā evamāha – “yaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0401a:730_7: bhikkhuṃ tumhe ito sattadivasamatthake manomayaṅgena ca cetovivaṭṭakusalaṅgena ca ‘ayaṃ mama sāsane aggo’ti etadagge ṭhapayittha,
atk-s0401a:730_8: ahampi imassa adhikārakammassa phalena so bhikkhu viya aṅgadvayapūrako bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:731_0: Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā anantarāyenassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate kappasatasahassāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0401a:731_1: so taṃ imasmiṃ ṭhānadvaye ṭhapessatī”ti byākaritvā anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:731_2: Bhātāpissa ekadivasaṃ satthāraṃ saññāvivaṭṭakusalaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadaggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā tatheva adhikāraṃ katvā patthanaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0401a:732_0: Te ubhopi janā satthari dharamāne kusalakammaṃ karitvā satthu parinibbutakāle sarīracetiye suvaṇṇapūjaṃ katvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattā.
atk-s0401a:732_2: Tattha mahāpanthakassa antarā katakalyāṇakammaṃ na kathiyati,
atk-s0401a:732_3: cūḷapanthako pana kassapabhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni odātakasiṇakammaṃ katvā devapure nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:732_4: Atha amhākaṃ satthā abhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvanamahāvihāre paṭivasati.
atk-s0401a:733_0: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā imesaṃ dvinnaṃ nibbattiṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0401a:733_1: Rājagahe kira dhanaseṭṭhikulassa dhītā attano dāseneva saddhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā “aññepi me imaṃ kammaṃ jāneyyu”nti cintetvā evamāha –
atk-s0401a:733_3: sace me mātāpitaro imaṃ dosaṃ jānissanti,
atk-s0401a:733_5: videsaṃ gantvā vasissāmā”ti hatthasāraṃ gahetvā aggadvārena nikkhamitvā “yattha vā tattha vā aññehi ajānanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:734_0: Tesaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ saṃvāsamanvāya tassā kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:734_1: Sā gabbhassa paripākaṃ āgamma sāmikena saddhiṃ mantesi –
atk-s0401a:734_3: ñātimittādivirahite ṭhāne gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ nāma ubhinnampi amhākaṃ dukkhameva,
atk-s0401a:734_8: “ayaṃ bālo attano dosamahantāya gantuṃ na ussahati,
atk-s0401a:734_12: Tasmiṃ gehā nikkhante sā gehe parikkhāraṃ paṭisāmetvā attano kulagharaṃ gatabhāvaṃ anantaragehavāsīnaṃ ārocetvā maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0401a:735_0: Atha so puriso gharaṃ āgato taṃ adisvā paṭivissake pucchitvā “kulagharaṃ gatā”ti sutvā vegena anubandhitvā antarāmagge sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:735_9: Tassa dārakassa ca panthe jātattā panthakoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:735_12: Tassapi dārakassa panthe jātattā paṭhamajātassa mahāpanthakoti nāmaṃ katvā pacchājātassa cūḷapanthakoti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:736_0: Te dvepi dārake gahetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gatā.
atk-s0401a:736_1: Tesaṃ tattha vasantānaṃ ayaṃ mahāpanthakadārako aññe dārakajane “cūḷapitā mahāpitā ayyako ayyikā”ti vadante sutvā mātaraṃ paṭipucchi – “amma,
atk-s0401a:736_3: kiṃ amhākaṃ ñātakā natthī”ti? Āma, tāta,
atk-s0401a:736_5: rājagahanagare pana vo dhanaseṭṭhi nāma ayyako,
atk-s0401a:736_8: Sā attano agamanakāraṇaṃ puttassa akathetvā puttesu punappunaṃ kathentesu sāmikamāha –
atk-s0401a:736_10: kiṃ no mātāpitaro disvā maṃsaṃ khādissanti,
atk-s0401a:736_15: yena kenaci upāyena dārakānaṃ ayyakakulameva daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti dvepi janā dārake ādāya anupubbena rājagahaṃ
atk-s0401a:736_16: patvā nagaradvāre ekissā sālāya nivāsaṃ katvā dārakamātā dve dārake gahetvā āgatabhāvaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0401a:737_0: Te taṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā saṃsāre saṃsarantānaṃ na putto na dhītā nāma natthi,
atk-s0401a:737_2: na sakkā tehi amhākaṃ cakkhupathe ṭhātuṃ.
atk-s0401a:737_3: Ettakaṃ pana dhanaṃ gahetvā dvepi janā phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā jīvantu,
atk-s0401a:737_5: Seṭṭhidhītā mātāpitūhi pesitaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā dārake āgatadūtānaṃ hattheyeva datvā pesesi.
atk-s0401a:737_8: mahāpanthako pana ayyakena saddhiṃ dasabalassa dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ gacchati.
atk-s0401a:737_9: Tassa niccaṃ satthu sammukhe dhammaṃ suṇantassa pabbajjāya cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0401a:737_14: mayhaṃ sakalalokassapi pabbajjato taveva pabbajjā bhaddikā.
atk-s0401a:738_0: Satthā aññataraṃ piṇḍacārikaṃ “imaṃ dārakaṃ pabbājehī”ti āṇāpesi.
atk-s0401a:738_2: So bahuṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā paripuṇṇavasso upasampadaṃ labhi.
atk-s0401a:738_3: Upasampanno hutvā yonisomanasikāre kammaṃ karonto catunnaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ lābhī hutvā jhānaṅgehi vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:738_6: “sakkā nu kho imaṃ sukhaṃ cūḷapanthakassa dātu”nti.
atk-s0401a:738_7: Tato ayyakaseṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā “mahāseṭṭhi sace tumhe sampaṭicchatha,
atk-s0401a:738_10: Thero cūḷapanthakadārakaṃ pabbājetvā dasasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0401a:743_2: Tassa imaṃ gāthaṃ gahetuṃ vāyamantasseva cattāro māsā atikkantā.
atk-s0401a:743_6: catūhi māsehi ekagāthampi gahetuṃ na sakkosi,
atk-s0401a:743_7: pabbajitakiccaṃ pana tvaṃ kathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpessasi,
atk-s0401a:743_9: So therena paṇāmito vihārapaccante rodamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:744_0: Tena samayena satthā rājagahaṃ upanissāya jīvakambavane viharati.
atk-s0401a:744_1: Tasmiṃ samaye jīvako purisaṃ pesesi “pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ satthāraṃ nimantehī”ti.
atk-s0401a:744_2: Tena kho pana samayena mahāpanthako bhattuddesako hoti.
atk-s0401a:744_4: bhante”ti vutto “cūḷapanthakaṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ sampaṭicchāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:744_5: Cūḷapanthako taṃ kathaṃ sutvā bhiyyosomattāya domanassappatto ahosi.
atk-s0401a:744_6: Satthā cūḷapanthakassa khedaṃ disvā “cūḷapanthako mayi gate bujjhissatī”ti gantvā avidūre ṭhāne attānaṃ dassetvā “kiṃ tvaṃ, panthaka,
atk-s0401a:744_11: tvaṃ buddhaveneyyapuggalo nāmāti iddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā suddhaṃ coḷakhaṇḍaṃ adāsi “imaṃ gahetvā ‘rajoharaṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:745_0: So satthārā dinnaṃ coḷakhaṇḍaṃ “rajoharaṇaṃ rajoharaṇa”nti hatthena parimajjanto nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:745_3: So ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamma tattha khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā cintesi –
atk-s0401a:745_7: Samādhiṃ bhāvetvā cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni pādakāni katvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:745_8: So manomayajjhānalābhī hutvā eko hutvā bahudhā,
atk-s0401a:745_9: bahudhā hutvā eko bhavituṃ samattho ahosi.
atk-s0401a:745_10: Arahattamaggeneva cassa tepiṭakañca cha abhiññā ca āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:746_0: Punadivase satthā ekūnehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ gantvā jīvakassa nivesane nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:746_1: Cūḷapanthako pana attano bhikkhāya asampaṭicchitattāyeva na gato.
atk-s0401a:746_3: satthā hatthena pattaṃ pidahi. Kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0401a:746_8: Cūḷapanthakattheropi tassa purisassa pure āgamanāyeva bhikkhusahassaṃ nimminitvā ekampi ekena asadisaṃ,
atk-s0401a:746_9: ekassapi ca cīvaravicāraṇādisamaṇakammaṃ aññena asadisaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:746_10: So puriso vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ bahubhāvaṃ disvā gantvā jīvakassa kathesi – “bhante,
atk-s0401a:746_16: Gaccha bho “cūḷapanthako nāma kataro”ti pucchitvā ānehīti.
atk-s0401a:746_20: So punāgantvā jīvakassa kathesi “sahassamattā bhikkhū sabbepi ‘ahaṃ cūḷapanthako ahaṃ cūḷapanthako’ti kathenti,
atk-s0401a:746_22: Jīvakopi paṭividdhasaccatāya “iddhimā bhikkhū”ti nayato ñatvā “paṭhamaṃ kathanabhikkhumeva ‘tumhe satthā
atk-s0401a:746_23: pakkosatī’ti vatvā cīvarakaṇṇe gaṇha tātā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:747_0: Dasabale bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ gate dhammasabhāyaṃ kathā udapādi “yāva mahantā vata buddhā nāma
atk-s0401a:747_1: cattāro māse ekagāthaṃ gaṇhituṃ asakkontaṃ bhikkhuṃ evaṃmahiddhikaṃ akaṃsū”ti.
atk-s0401a:747_2: Satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā gantvā paññattāsane nisajja “kiṃ vadetha,
atk-s0401a:747_5: cūḷapanthakena tumhākaṃ santikā mahālābho laddhoti tumhākaṃyeva guṇaṃ kathemāti.
atk-s0401a:747_9: ayaṃ atītepi aparipakkañāṇe ṭhitassa mayhaṃ ovādaṃ katvā lokiyadāyajjaṃ labhīti.
atk-s0401a:747_12: Satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā dassesi.
atk-s0401a:748_1: atīte bārāṇasīnagare brahmadatto nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0401a:748_2: Tasmiṃ samaye cūḷakaseṭṭhi nāma paṇḍito byatto sabbanimittāni jānāti.
atk-s0401a:748_3: So ekadivasaṃ rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto antaravīthiyaṃ matamūsikaṃ disvā tasmiṃ khaṇe nakkhattaṃ samānetvā idamāha –
atk-s0401a:748_4: “sakkā cakkhumatā kulaputtena imaṃ undūraṃ gahetvā dārabharaṇañca kātuṃ kammante ca payojetu”nti.
atk-s0401a:748_5: Aññataro duggatakulaputto taṃ seṭṭhissa vacanaṃ sutvā “nāyaṃ ajānitvā kathessatī”ti mūsikaṃ gahetvā ekasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:748_7: Tāya kākaṇikāya phāṇitaṃ kiṇitvā ekena kuṭena pānīyaṃ gaṇhitvā araññato āgacchante mālākāre disvā thokaṃ
atk-s0401a:748_8: thokaṃ phāṇitakhaṇḍaṃ datvā uḷuṅkena pānīyaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:748_10: So tena pupphamūlena punadivasepi phāṇitañca pānīyaghaṭañca gahetvā pupphārāmameva gato.
atk-s0401a:748_11: Tassa taṃdivasaṃ mālākārā aḍḍhaocitake pupphagacche datvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:748_12: So nacirasseva iminā upāyena aṭṭha kahāpaṇe labhi.
atk-s0401a:749_0: Puna ekasmiṃ vātavuṭṭhidivase chaḍḍitauyyānaṃ gantvā patitadārūnaṃ rāsiṃ katvā nisinno rājakumbhakārassa santikā soḷasa kahāpaṇe labhi.
atk-s0401a:749_1: So catuvīsatiyā kahāpaṇesu jātesu “atthi ayaṃ upāyo mayha”nti nagaradvārato avidūre ṭhāne ekaṃ pānīyacāṭiṃ
atk-s0401a:749_6: Sopi “mayhaṃ kicce uppanne karissathā”ti vatvā ito cito ca vicaranto thalapathakammikena ca jalapathakammikena ca saddhiṃ mittasanthavaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:749_7: Tassa thalapathakammiko “sve imaṃ nagaraṃ assavāṇijako pañca assasatāni gahetvā āgamissatī”ti ācikkhi.
atk-s0401a:749_8: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tiṇahārakānaṃ saññaṃ datvā ekekaṃ tiṇakalāpaṃ diguṇaṃ katvā āharāpesi.
atk-s0401a:749_9: Atha so assānaṃ nagaraṃ paviṭṭhavelāya tiṇakalāpasahassaṃ antaradvāre rāsiṃ katvā nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:749_10: Assavāṇijo sakalanagare assānaṃ cāriṃ alabhitvā tassa sahassaṃ datvā taṃ tiṇaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:750_0: Tato katipāhaccayenassa samuddakammikasahāyako ārocesi “paṭṭanaṃ mahānāvā āgatā”ti.
atk-s0401a:750_1: So “atthi ayaṃ upāyo”ti aṭṭhahi kahāpaṇehi sabbaparivārasampannaṃ tāvakālikaṃ rathaṃ gahetvā nāvāpaṭṭanaṃ
atk-s0401a:750_2: gantvā ekaṃ aṅgulimuddikaṃ nāvikassa saccakāraṃ datvā avidūre ṭhāne sāṇiṃ parikkhipāpetvā tattha nisinno
atk-s0401a:750_3: purise āṇāpesi “bāhirakesu vāṇijesu āgatesu tatiyena paṭihārena ārocethā”ti.
atk-s0401a:750_4: “Nāvā āgatā”ti sutvā bārāṇasito satamattā vāṇijā “bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhāmā”ti āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:750_7: Te tesaṃ sutvā tassa santikaṃ āgatā,
atk-s0401a:750_8: pādamūlikapurisā purimasaññāvasena tatiyena pāṭihārena tesaṃ āgatabhāvaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:750_9: Te satamattāpi vāṇijā ekekaṃ sahassaṃ datvā tena saddhiṃ nāvāya pattikā hutvā puna ekekaṃ sahassaṃ datvā
atk-s0401a:750_10: pattiṃ vissajjāpetvā bhaṇḍaṃ attano santakaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:750_11: So puriso dve satasahassāni gahetvā bārāṇasiṃ āgantvā “kataññunā bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ekaṃ satasahassaṃ gahetvā cūḷaseṭṭhissa santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:751_2: So “tumhehi kathitaupāye ṭhatvā catumāsabbhantareyeva laddha”nti āha.
atk-s0401a:751_3: Seṭṭhi tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “idāni evarūpaṃ dārakaṃ parasantakaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vayappattaṃ dhītaraṃ datvā sakalakuṭumbassa sāmikaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:751_4: Sopi kulaputto seṭṭhino accayena tasmiṃ nagare seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:751_5: Satthā dve vatthūni kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā abhisambuddhakāle imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:754_0: Iti satthā dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnānaṃ imaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0401a:754_1: Ayaṃ dvinnampi mahāsāvakānaṃ pubbapatthanato paṭṭhāya anupubbikathā.
atk-s0401a:754_2: Aparabhāge pana satthā ariyagaṇaparivuto dhammāsane nisinno manomayaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminantānaṃ cetovivaṭṭakusalānañca
atk-s0401a:756_8: therena pana dhammadesanāya etaṃ nāmaṃ laddhaṃ.
atk-s0401a:756_9: Aññe hi bhikkhū dhammaṃ desento uddissakaṃ katvā vaṇṇaṃ vā avaṇṇaṃ vā kathenti,
atk-s0401a:756_10: thero pana dhammaṃ desento satthārā desitaniyāmato anokkamitvā deseti,
atk-s0401a:757_3: thero pana piṇḍāya caranto ghare ghare mettājhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya bhikkhaṃ gaṇhāti
atk-s0401a:757_7: alaṅkatatoraṇaṃ viya cittapaṭo viya ca ativiya virocati.
atk-s0401a:758_1: ayaṃ kira padumuttare bhagavati anuppanneyeva haṃsavatīnagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti,
atk-s0401a:758_3: So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā tattha sāraṃ apassanto attano parivārehi catucattālīsāya māṇavakasahassehi
atk-s0401a:758_4: saddhiṃ pabbatapāde isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā pañca abhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattesi,
atk-s0401a:759_0: Tasmiṃ samaye padumuttaro bhagavā loke nibbattitvā haṃsavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya viharanto ekadivasaṃ paccūsasamaye
atk-s0401a:759_1: lokaṃ olokento nandatāpasassa antevāsikānaṃ jaṭilānaṃ arahattūpanissayaṃ nandatāpasassa ca dvīhaṅgehi
atk-s0401a:759_2: samannāgatassa sāvakassa ṭhānantarapatthanaṃ disvā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0401a:759_3: sāriputtattherassa vatthumhi vuttanayeneva nandatāpasassa assamaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:759_4: Tattha phalāphaladānañca pupphāsanapaññāpanañca nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanañca vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:760_0: Satthā pana nirodhā vuṭṭhito araṇavihāriaṅgena ca dakkhiṇeyyaṅgena cāti dvīhaṅgehi samannāgataṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0401a:760_2: So attano visaye ṭhatvā tepiṭakaṃ sammasitvā anumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:760_3: Tassa desanāvasāne satthā sayaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0401a:760_4: Desanāpariyosāne sabbe catucattālīsasahassāpi tāpasā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:760_5: Nandatāpaso pana anumodakassa bhikkhuno nimittaṃ gaṇhitvā satthu desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0401a:760_8: Sabbepi antarahitakesamassū iddhimayaparikkhārā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:761_0: Nandatāpaso tathāgataṃ vanditvā sammukhe ṭhito āha – “bhante,
atk-s0401a:761_3: Araṇavihāriaṅgena ca dakkhiṇeyyaṅgena ca etadaggaṃ patto esoti. “Bhante,
atk-s0401a:761_4: ahampi iminā sattāhakatena adhikārakammena aññaṃ sampattiṃ na patthemi,
atk-s0401a:761_5: anāgate panāhaṃ ekassa buddhassa sāsane ayaṃ thero viya dvīhaṅgehi samannāgato bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:761_7: Nandatāpasopi kālena kālaṃ dasabalassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā aparihīnajjhāno brahmaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:762_0: So kappasatasahassaṃ atikkamitvā sāvatthiyaṃ sumanaseṭṭhissa gehe nibbatti,
atk-s0401a:762_2: Aparabhāge amhākaṃ satthā loke nibbatto rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharati.
atk-s0401a:762_3: Tadā anāthapiṇḍiko seṭṭhi sāvatthiyaṃ uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā attano sahāyakassa rājagahaseṭṭhino gharaṃ
atk-s0401a:762_4: gato satthu uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā satthāraṃ sītavane viharantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpattiphale
atk-s0401a:762_5: patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ sāvatthiṃ āgamanatthāya yācitvā pañcacattālīsayojane magge yojane yojane satasahassapariccāgena
atk-s0401a:762_6: vihāre patiṭṭhāpetvā sāvatthiyaṃ rājamānena aṭṭhakarīsappamāṇaṃ jetarājakumārassa uyyānabhūmiṃ koṭisanthārena
atk-s0401a:762_7: kiṇitvā tattha bhagavato vihāraṃ kāretvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:762_8: Vihāramahadivase ayaṃ subhūtikuṭimbiko anāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhinā saddhiṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇanto saddhaṃ paṭilabhitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:762_9: So upasampanno dve mātikā paguṇaṃ katvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā araññe samaṇadhammaṃ karonto vipassanaṃ
atk-s0401a:762_10: vaḍḍhetvā mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:762_12: piṇḍāya caranto vuttanayeneva mettājhānato vuṭṭhāya bhikkhaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0401a:762_13: Atha naṃ satthā imaṃ kāraṇadvayaṃ paṭicca araṇavihārīnañca dakkhiṇeyyānañca bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:764_3: So yathā aññe therā araññe vasamānā vanasabhāgaṃ udakasabhāgaṃ bhikkhācārasabhāgañca sallakkhetvā araññe vasanti,
atk-s0401a:764_5: Etāni pana sabhāgāni anādiyitvā ujjaṅgalasakkharapāsāṇavisame khadiravane paṭivasati.
atk-s0401a:765_1: ayaṃ kira atīte padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare nibbatto mahāgaṅgāya payāgapatiṭṭhānatitthe nāvākammaṃ karonto paṭivasati.
atk-s0401a:765_2: Tasmiṃ samaye satthā satasahassabhikkhuparivāro cārikaṃ caranto payāgapatiṭṭhānatitthaṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:765_5: ayaṃ me kalyāṇakammāyūhanakkhaṇo”ti nāvāsaṅghāṭaṃ bandhāpetvā upari celavitānaṃ kāretvā gandhamālādāmāni
atk-s0401a:765_6: osāretvā heṭṭhā varapotthakaṃ cittattharaṇaṃ attharāpetvā saparivāraṃ satthāraṃ paratīraṃ tāresi.
atk-s0401a:766_0: Tasmiṃ samaye satthā ekaṃ āraññakaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:766_1: So nāviko taṃ disvā “mayāpi evamevaṃ anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane āraññakānaṃ aggena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0401a:766_2: satthāraṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:766_3: tumhehi etadagge ṭhapito so bhikkhu viya ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane āraññakānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:766_4: Satthā anantarāyaṃ disvā “anāgate gotamabuddhassa sāsane tvaṃ āraññakānaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:766_5: Antarā pana aññaṃ kammaṃ na kathiyati.
atk-s0401a:767_0: So yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadhakkhette nālakabrāhmaṇagāme
atk-s0401a:767_1: sārībrāhmaṇiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā tiṇṇaṃ bhātikānaṃ tissannañca bhaginīnaṃ sabbakaniṭṭho hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0401a:767_5: amhākaṃ puttaṃ revataṃ daharameva gharabandhanena bandhissāmā”ti samānakulato dārikaṃ ānetvā revatassa ayyikaṃ vandāpetvā, “amma,
atk-s0401a:767_9: imissā kira evaṃvidhaṃ rūpaṃ mama ayyikāya rūpasadisaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:767_10: pucchissāmi tāva nesaṃ adhippāya”nti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0401a:767_12: “ayaṃ dārikā ayyikā viya te jaraṃ pāpuṇātū”ti vadāmāti.
atk-s0401a:767_13: So “imissā rūpaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ bhavissatī”ti pucchi. Tāta,
atk-s0401a:768_1: “idaṃ kira rūpaṃ iminā niyāmena valittacaṃ bhavissati palitakesaṃ khaṇḍadantaṃ,
atk-s0401a:768_2: ahaṃ evarūpe rūpe rajjitvā kiṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0401a:768_3: mama bhātikānaṃ gatamaggameva gamissāmī”ti kīḷanto viya hutvā samavaye taruṇadārake āha – “etha, bho,
atk-s0401a:768_6: So dārakehi saddhiṃ kīḷanto viya attano dhāvanavāre sampatte thokaṃ gantvā papañcetvā āgacchati.
atk-s0401a:768_7: Puna dutiyavāre sampatte tato turitaṃ viya gantvā āgato,
atk-s0401a:768_8: tatiyavāre sampatte “ayaṃ me kālo”ti ñatvā sammukhaṭṭhāneneva palāyitvā paṃsukūlikabhikkhūnaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:768_9: araññaṃ gantvā there abhivādetvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0401a:768_10: Sappurisa mayaṃ taṃ na jānāma “kassāsi putto”ti,
atk-s0401a:768_13: So ubho bāhā paggayha “vilumpanti maṃ vilumpanti ma”nti mahāravaṃ viravi.
atk-s0401a:768_15: imasmiṃ ṭhāne tava vatthaṃ vā piḷandhanaṃ vā koci gaṇhanto nāma natthi,
atk-s0401a:768_19: tissannaṃ pana me sampattīnaṃ vilopo vattati,
atk-s0401a:768_25: idāni pana sāriputto nāma jātoti vadantīti. “Āvuso,
atk-s0401a:768_26: evaṃ sante ayaṃ kulaputto amhākaṃ kaniṭṭhabhātiko nāma hoti,
atk-s0401a:768_32: pabbājetha na”nti vatvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā pabbājayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:768_33: Atha naṃ paripuṇṇavassaṃ upasampādetvā kammaṭṭhāne yojayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:769_0: Thero kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ avidūre ṭhāne vuttappakāraṃ khadiravanaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0401a:769_1: Tassa “arahattaṃ appatvā dasabalaṃ vā bhātikattheraṃ vā na passissāmī”ti vāyamantasseva tayo māsā atikkantā,
atk-s0401a:769_2: sukhumālakulaputtassa lūkhabhojanaṃ bhuñjantassa cittaṃ valītaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0401a:769_4: So temāsaccayena pavāretvā vutthavasso hutvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne samaṇadhammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0401a:769_5: Tassa samaṇadhammaṃ karontassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0401a:770_4: Bhagavā revatassa āraddhavipassakabhāvaṃ ñatvā dve vāre paṭikkhipitvā tatiyavāre yācito arahattaṃ pattabhāvaṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0401a:770_11: Dasabalassa cārikatthāya gamanakāle ohīnakabhikkhū nāma appakā honti,
atk-s0401a:770_13: madhuradhammakathaṃ vā suṇissāmā”ti yebhuyyena gantukāmāva bahukā honti.
atk-s0401a:771_0: Athekasmiṃ padese ānandatthero dvedhāpathaṃ patvā bhagavantaṃ pucchi – “bhante,
atk-s0401a:771_5: parihāramaggo pana saṭṭhiyojaniko khemo subhikkhoti. Ānanda,
atk-s0401a:771_6: sīvali amhehi saddhiṃ āgatoti? Āma, bhante, āgatoti.
atk-s0401a:771_9: Satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro sīvalittherassa puññavīmaṃsanatthaṃ aṭavimaggaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0401a:771_10: Maggaṃ abhiruhanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya devasaṅgho yojane yojane ṭhāne nagaraṃ māpetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa vasanatthāya vihāre paṭiyādesi.
atk-s0401a:771_11: Devaputtā raññā pesitakammakārā viya hutvā yāgukhajjakādīni gahetvā “kahaṃ ayyo sīvali,
atk-s0401a:771_13: Thero taṃ sakkārasammānaṃ gaṇhāpetvā satthu santikaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0401a:772_0: Imināva niyāmena satthā sakkārasammānaṃ anubhavanto devasikaṃ yojanaparamaṃ gantvā tiṃsayojanikaṃ kantāraṃ
atk-s0401a:772_2: Thero satthu āgamanaṃ ñatvā attano vasanaṭṭhāne buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa pahonakavihāre dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:772_3: gandhakuṭiṃ rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīni ca iddhiyā māpetvā tathāgatassa paccuggamanaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:772_5: Atha tathāgate gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe bhikkhū vassaggena pattasenāsanāni pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:772_8: Imināva niyāmena tathāgatassa sakkārasammānaṃ anubhavantasseva addhamāso atikkanto.
atk-s0401a:773_0: Athekacce ukkaṇṭhitabhikkhū ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditvā kathaṃ uppādayiṃsu “satthā dasabalo ‘mayhaṃ aggasāvakassa
atk-s0401a:773_1: kaniṭṭhabhātā’ti vatvā evarūpaṃ navakammikabhikkhuṃ passituṃ āgato,
atk-s0401a:773_2: imassa vihārassa santike jetavanamahāvihāro vā veḷuvanavihārādayo vā kiṃ karissanti.
atk-s0401a:773_6: “mayi ciraṃ vasante idaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākiṇṇaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:773_8: revatassa aphāsuvihāro bhavissatī”ti tato revatassa divāṭṭhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:773_9: Thero ekakova caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya pāsāṇaphalake nisinno satthāraṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā paccuggantvā vandi.
atk-s0401a:774_2: caṇḍānaṃ hatthiassādīnaṃ saddaṃ sutvā kinti karosī”ti? Tesaṃ me, bhante,
atk-s0401a:774_4: Satthā tasmiṃ ṭhāne revatattherassa pañcahi gāthāsatehi araññe nivāsānisaṃsaṃ nāma kathetvā punadivase
atk-s0401a:774_5: avidūre ṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā revatattheraṃ nivattetvā yehi bhikkhūhi therassa avaṇṇo kathito,
atk-s0401a:774_7: Te attano parikkhāratthāya nivattā āgatamaggeneva gacchantāpi taṃ ṭhānaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0401a:774_8: Paṭhamaṃ hi te alaṅkatapaṭiyattena maggena gantvā taṃdivasaṃ pana visamamaggena gacchantā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdanti,
atk-s0401a:774_10: Te gumbe ca gacche ca kaṇṭake ca maddantā attano vasitasabhāgaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khadirakhāṇuke attano chattaṃ sañjānanti,
atk-s0401a:774_12: Te tasmiṃ samaye “iddhimā ayaṃ bhikkhū”ti ñatvā attano parikkhāre ādāya “dasabalassa paṭiyattasakkāro nāma evarūpo hotī”ti vadantā āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:775_6: Atha nesaṃ sabbapacchato āgatabhikkhū pucchi – “manāpaṃ, ayyā,
atk-s0401a:775_12: purimānañca pacchimānañca bhikkhūnaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “kesaṃ nu kho kathā saccā”ti pacchābhatte gandhamālaṃ ādāya dasabalassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0401a:775_18: Visākhe ramaṇīyaṃ vā hotu mā vā,
atk-s0401a:775_20: tadeva ṭhānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ nāmāti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:776_0: “Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
atk-s0401a:778_0: Atha satthā aparabhāge jetavanamahāvihāre ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ āraññakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:780_2: So kira thero yā jhānasamāpattiyo dasabalo samāpajjati,
atk-s0401a:780_8: Kiṃ pana aññe kukkuccakā natthīti? Atthi,
atk-s0401a:780_9: ayaṃ pana thero kappiyepi kukkuccaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0401a:780_10: Tenassa kukkuccakatā atipākaṭā jātāti kaṅkhārevatotveva saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:781_1: ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle purimanayeneva mahājanena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito
atk-s0401a:781_2: dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ jhānābhiratānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena
atk-s0401a:781_3: bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti desanāvasāne satthāraṃ nimantetvā purimanayeneva sattāhaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ katvā bhagavantaṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0401a:781_4: ahaṃ iminā adhikārakammena na aññaṃ sampattiṃ patthemi,
atk-s0401a:781_5: yathā pana so tumhehi ito sattadivasamatthake bhikkhu jhāyīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapito,
atk-s0401a:781_6: evaṃ ahampi anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane jhāyīnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:781_7: Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā “anāgate kappasatasahassāvasāne gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0401a:781_8: tassa sāsane tvaṃ jhāyīnaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:782_0: So yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthinagare
atk-s0401a:782_1: mahābhogakule nibbatto pacchābhattaṃ dhammassavanatthaṃ gacchantena mahājanena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:782_2: parisapariyante ṭhito dasabalassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā saddhaṃ paṭilabhitvā pabbajito upasampadaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0401a:782_3: kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā jhānaparikammaṃ karonto jhānalābhī hutvā jhānameva pādakaṃ katvā arahattaphalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:782_4: So dasabalena samāpajjitabbasamāpattīnaṃ appatarā ṭhapetvā bahutarā samāpajjanto ahorattaṃ jhānesu ciṇṇavasī ahosi.
atk-s0401a:782_5: Atha naṃ aparabhāge satthā imaṃ guṇaṃ gahetvā jhāyīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:782_8: akappiyā muggā”ti evaṃ pana kappiyesveva vatthūsu kukkuccassa uppāditatāya kukkuccasaṅkhātāya kaṅkhāya bhāvena kaṅkhārevatoti saṅkhaṃ gatoti.
atk-s0401a:784_6: Yasmā pana aññesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vīriyaṃ nāma vaḍḍhetabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0401a:784_8: Tasmā esa āraddhavīriyānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:785_1: ayaṃ kira atīte padumuttarabuddhakāle seṭṭhikule nibbatti,
atk-s0401a:785_3: So vayappatto purimanayeneva vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0401a:785_4: āraddhavīriyānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0401a:785_5: dasabalaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā vuttanayeneva patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:785_6: Satthā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā purimanayeneva byākaritvā vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:786_0: Sopi sirivaḍḍhaseṭṭhi yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kappasatasahassaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0401a:786_1: imasmiṃ kappe parinibbute kassapadasabale anuppanne amhākaṃ bhagavati bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:786_2: So attano sahāyakehi saddhiṃ gaṅgāyaṃ kīḷati.
atk-s0401a:786_3: Tasmiṃ samaye eko jiṇṇacīvariko paccekabuddho “bārāṇasiṃ upanissāya gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṃ katvā vassaṃ
atk-s0401a:786_4: upagacchissāmī”ti udakena samupabyūḷhe daṇḍake ca valliyo ca saṃkaḍḍhati.
atk-s0401a:786_5: Ayaṃ kumāro sahāyakehi saddhiṃ gantvā abhivādetvā ṭhito, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:786_7: Kumāra upakaṭṭhe antovasse pabbajitānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭatīti. “Bhante,
atk-s0401a:786_8: ajjeva ekadivasaṃ ayyo yathā tathā āgametu,
atk-s0401a:786_9: ahaṃ sve ayyassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ karissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:786_10: Paccekabuddho “tasseva kumārassa saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti āgatattā adhivāsesi.
atk-s0401a:786_11: So tassa adhivāsanaṃ viditvā gato punadivase sakkārasammānaṃ sajjetvā paccekabuddhassa āgamanaṃ olokento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:786_12: Paccekabuddhopi “kahaṃ nu kho ajja bhikkhācāraṃ labhissāmī”ti āvajjento ñatvā tasseva gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:787_0: Kumāro paccekabuddhaṃ disvā sampiyāyamāno pattaṃ ādāya bhikkhaṃ datvā “imaṃ antovassaṃ mayhaṃ gehadvārameva āgacchatha,
atk-s0401a:787_1: bhante”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā paccekabuddhe bhattakiccaṃ katvā pakkante attano sahāyakehi saddhiṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:787_2: ekadivaseneva paccekabuddhassa vasanapaṇṇasālañca caṅkamanañca rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni ca kārāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:787_3: Tasseva paṇṇasālaṃ pavisanavelāya haritūpalittāya bhūmiyā “pādesu kalalaṃ mā laggī”ti attano pārupanaṃ
atk-s0401a:787_4: satasahassagghanakaṃ rattakambalaṃ bhūmattharaṇaṃ santharitvā kambalassa vaṇṇena saddhiṃ paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0401a:787_5: sarīrappabhaṃ ekasadisaṃ disvā ativiya pasanno hutvā āha –
atk-s0401a:787_6: “yathā tumhehi akkantakālato paṭṭhāya imassa kambalassa ativiya pabhā virocati,
atk-s0401a:787_7: evameva mayhampi nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne hatthapādānaṃ vaṇṇo bandhujīvakapupphavaṇṇo hotu,
atk-s0401a:787_9: So temāsaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ upaṭṭhahitvā pavāritakāle ticīvaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:788_0: Sopi kulaputto devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle kāḷacampānagare upaseṭṭhissa ghare paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:788_1: Tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇakālato paṭṭhāya seṭṭhikulaṃ anekāni paṇṇākārasahassāni āgacchanti.
atk-s0401a:788_3: Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase mātāpitaro “amhākaṃ putto attano nāmaṃ gaṇhitvāva āgato,
atk-s0401a:788_4: rattasuvaṇṇarasaparisittā viyassa sarīracchavī”ti soṇakumārotvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:789_0: Athassa saṭṭhi dhātiyo upanetvā devakumāraṃ viya naṃ sukhena vaḍḍhesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:789_2: saṭṭhikarīsamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ kasitvā tividhena udakena posenti.
atk-s0401a:789_3: Kedāre pavisantīsu udakamātikāsu khīrodakassa ca gandhodakassa ca anekāni cāṭisahassāni āsiñcanti.
atk-s0401a:789_4: Sālisīsānaṃ khīraggahaṇakāle sukādīnaṃ pāṇānaṃ ucchiṭṭhakaraṇanivāraṇatthaṃ vīhigabbhānaṃ sukhumālabhāvatthañca
atk-s0401a:789_5: pariyantaparikkhepe ca antarantarā ca thambhe nikhanitvā upari daṇḍake datvā kilañjehi chādetvā samantā
atk-s0401a:789_7: Sasse nipphanne koṭṭhe catujātigandhehi paribhaṇḍaṃ katvā upari uttamagandhehi paribhāventi.
atk-s0401a:789_8: Anekasahassapurisā khettaṃ oruyha sālisīsāni vaṇṭesu chinditvā muṭṭhimuṭṭhiyo katvā rajjukehi bandhitvā sukkhāpenti.
atk-s0401a:789_9: Tato koṭṭhakassa heṭṭhimatale gandhe santharitvā upari sālisīsāni santharanti.
atk-s0401a:789_10: Evaṃ ekantarikaṃ katvā santharantā koṭṭhakaṃ pūretvā dvāraṃ pidahanti,
atk-s0401a:789_13: Sālimhi pahate dhuttā thuse kiṇitvā gaṇhanti,
atk-s0401a:789_16: Te suvaṇṇahīrakapacchiyaṃ pakkhipitvā satakālaṃ parissāvetvā gahite pakkuthitajātirase ekavāraṃ pakkhipitvā uddharanti,
atk-s0401a:789_18: Taṃ bhojanaṃ suvaṇṇasarake pakkhipitvā pakkuthitaappodakamadhupāyāsapūritassa rajatathālassa upari katvā ādāya gantvā seṭṭhiputtassa purato ṭhapenti.
atk-s0401a:790_0: So attano yāpanamattaṃ bhuñjitvā gandhavāsitena udakena mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā hatthapāde dhovati.
atk-s0401a:790_6: So kassacideva kujjhitvā “ājānāhi bhūmiṃ akkamissāmī”ti vadati.
atk-s0401a:790_7: Tassa vayappattassa tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavike tayo pāsāde kāretvā nāṭakāni ca upaṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:790_8: So mahāsampattiṃ anubhavanto devo maññe paṭivasati.
atk-s0401a:791_0: Atha amhākaṃ satthari sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke rājagahaṃ upanissāya viharante pādalomadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:791_1: raññā māgadhena pakkosāpetvā asītiyā gāmiyasahassehi saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ pahito dhammadesanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0401a:791_3: Atha naṃ bhagavā “anuññātosi mātāpitūhī”ti pucchitvā ananuññātabhāvaṃ sutvā “na kho, soṇa,
atk-s0401a:791_4: tathāgatā mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ pabbājentī”ti paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0401a:791_5: So “sādhu bhagavā”ti tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchitvā mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ gantvā anujānāpetvā
atk-s0401a:791_6: satthu santikaṃ āgamma aññatarassa bhikkhuno santike pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:792_0: Tassa pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhitvā rājagahe viharantassa sambahulā ñātisālohitā ca sandiṭṭhasambhattā ca sakkārasammānaṃ āharanti,
atk-s0401a:792_5: kammaṭṭhāne vā vipassanāya vā kammaṃ kātuṃ kathaṃ sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0401a:792_6: yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā sītavanasusānaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ kareyyaṃ.
atk-s0401a:792_7: Tatra hi susānanti jigucchitvā bahū janā nāgamissanti,
atk-s0401a:792_8: evaṃsante mama kiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā sītavanaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0401a:792_11: na kho pana sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ pāpuṇituṃ,
atk-s0401a:792_14: Tassa sukhumālānaṃ pādatalānaṃ antantehi phoṭā uṭṭhāya bhijjiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:792_16: Pādesu avahantesu jaṇṇukehipi hatthehipi vāyamitvā caṅkamati.
atk-s0401a:792_17: Evaṃ vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ karontopi obhāsamattampi nibbattetuṃ asakkonto cintesi –
atk-s0401a:792_20: Ahaṃ kho pana evaṃ vāyamantopi maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā uppādetuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0401a:792_25: hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjissāmi puññāni ca karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0401a:793_0: Tasmiṃ samaye satthā therassa vitakkaṃ ñatvā sāyanhasamaye bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tattha gantvā lohitena
atk-s0401a:793_1: phuṭṭhaṃ caṅkamaṃ disvā theraṃ vīṇovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamathayojanatthāya tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0401a:793_3: Soṇattheropi dasabalassa sammukhā ovādaṃ labhitvā nacirasseva arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:793_4: Atha satthā aparabhāge jetavane bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto dhammaṃ desento theraṃ āraddhavīriyānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:795_3: Ayañhi thero dasabalena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyā tathāgatassa madhurena sarena dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0401a:795_5: Tasmā so kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:796_1: ayampi padumuttarabuddhakāle purimanayeneva mahājanena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhatvā
atk-s0401a:796_2: satthu dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi
atk-s0401a:796_3: anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā dasabalaṃ nimantetvā
atk-s0401a:796_5: yaṃ bhikkhuṃ tumhe ito sattadivasamatthake kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapayittha,
atk-s0401a:796_6: ahampi imassa adhikārakammassa phalena anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane tathārūpo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:796_7: Satthā tassa anantarāyaṃ disvā “anāgate gotamabuddhassa sāsane kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:797_0: Sopi yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto amhākaṃ dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:797_1: uppattito puretarameva devalokā cavitvā kāḷiyā nāma kuraragharikāya upāsikāya kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:797_2: Sā paripakke gabbhe rājagahanagare attano kulanivesanaṃ āgatā.
atk-s0401a:798_0: Tasmiṃ samaye amhākaṃ satthā sabbaññutaṃ patto isipatane dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0401a:798_2: Tattha eko aṭṭhavīsatiyā yakkhasenāpatīnaṃ abbhantare sātāgiro nāma yakkho dasabalassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya cintesi –
atk-s0401a:798_3: “kiṃ nu kho ayaṃ evaṃ madhuradhammakathā mama sahāyena hemavatena sutā na sutā”ti?
atk-s0401a:798_4: So devasaṅghassa antare olokento taṃ apassitvā “addhā mama sahāyo tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0401a:798_6: paṭividdhadhammañca ārocessāmī”ti attano parisāya saddhiṃ rājagahamatthakena tassa santikaṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0401a:799_0: Hemavatopi tiyojanasahassaṃ himavantaṃ akālapupphitaṃ disvā “mama sahāyena sātāgirena saddhiṃ himavantakīḷitaṃ
atk-s0401a:799_1: kīḷissāmī”ti attano parisāya saddhiṃ rājagahamatthakeneva pāyāsi.
atk-s0401a:799_2: Tesaṃ dvinnampi aggabalakāyā kulagharikāya kāḷiupāsikāya nivesanamatthake samāgantvā “tumhe kassa parisā,
atk-s0401a:799_6: Te haṭṭhatuṭṭhāva gantvā tesaṃ yakkhasenāpatīnaṃ ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:799_12: Himavantaṃ pupphitaṃ disvā tayā saddhiṃ tattha kīḷissāmīti.
atk-s0401a:799_19: Suddhodanamahārājassa putto siddhatthakumāro dasasahassilokadhātuṃ kampetvā paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo
atk-s0401a:799_24: tassa pana purisassa sakkāratthāya sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷaṃ ekamālāguḷasadisaṃ ajja jātaṃ sammāti.
atk-s0401a:799_26: tayā so satthā akkhīni pūretvā diṭṭhoti. Āma, samma,
atk-s0401a:799_30: Ahaṃ “etaṃ amatadhammaṃ tampi jānāpessāmī”ti tava santikaṃ āgatosmi, sammāti.
atk-s0401a:799_31: Tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ kathentānaṃyeva upāsikā sirisayanato uṭṭhāya nisinnā taṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā sadde nimittaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:799_35: no manussabhāsito”ti sallakkhetvā ohitasotā paggahitamānasā hutvā nisīdi. Tato –
atk-s0401a:809_0: Evaṃ hemavato satthu kāyasamācārañca ājīvañca manosamācārañca pucchi.
atk-s0401a:809_2: Evaṃ satthu sarīravaṇṇaguṇavaṇṇakathanavasena hemavatasuttante niṭṭhite hemavato sahāyakassa dhammadesanānusārena
atk-s0401a:810_2: parassa dhamme desīyamāne tathāgataṃ adiṭṭhapubbāva hutvā anussavappasādaṃ uppādetvā parassa vaḍḍhitaṃ
atk-s0401a:810_4: Sā sabbamātugāmānaṃ antare paṭhamakasotāpannā sabbajeṭṭhikā ahosi.
atk-s0401a:810_5: Tassā saha sotāpattibhāvena tameva rattiṃ gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0401a:810_7: Sā yathāruciyā kulagehe vasitvā kulagharameva agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:811_0: Tasmiṃ samaye mahākaccānatthero taṃ nagaraṃ upanissāya upavatte pabbate paṭivasati.
atk-s0401a:811_3: Soṇadārakopi nibaddhaṃ therassa santike vicaranto vissāsiko ahosi.
atk-s0401a:811_4: So aparena samayena therassa santike pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:811_5: Thero taṃ upasampādetukāmo tīṇi vassāni gaṇaṃ pariyesitvā upasampādesi.
atk-s0401a:811_6: So upasampanno kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā therasseva santike suttanipātaṃ
atk-s0401a:811_7: uggaṇhitvā vutthavasso pavāretvā satthāraṃ passitukāmo hutvā upajjhāyaṃ āpucchi.
atk-s0401a:811_9: tayi gate satthā taṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasāpetvā dhammaṃ ajjhesissati,
atk-s0401a:811_11: Satthā tava dhammakathāya pasīditvā tuyhaṃ varaṃ dassati.
atk-s0401a:811_12: Tvaṃ varaṃ gaṇhanto imañca imañca gaṇhāhi,
atk-s0401a:811_14: So upajjhāyena anuññāto mātuupāsikāya gehaṃ gantvā ārocesi.
atk-s0401a:811_16: tvaṃ dasabalaṃ passituṃ gacchanto imaṃ kambalaṃ āharitvā satthu vasanagandhakuṭiyā bhūmattharaṇaṃ katvā attharāhī”ti kambalaṃ adāsi.
