atk-s0401a:811_17: Soṇatthero taṃ ādāya senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā anupubbena satthu vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā dasabalassa buddhāsane
atk-s0401a:811_19: Satthā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi – “ānanda,
atk-s0401a:811_21: Thero satthu adhippāyaṃ ñatvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃyeva bhūmattharaṇaṃ ussārento viya atthari.
atk-s0401a:812_0: Atha kho bhagavā bahudevarattiṃ ajjhokāse vītināmetvā vihāraṃ pāvisi,
atk-s0401a:812_1: āyasmāpi kho soṇo bahudevarattiṃ ajjhokāse vītināmetvā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0401a:812_2: Satthā pacchimayāme sīhaseyyaṃ kappetvā paccūsasamaye vuṭṭhāya nisīditvā “ettakena kālena soṇassa kāyadaratho
atk-s0401a:812_3: paṭippassaddho bhavissatī”ti ñatvā āyasmantaṃ soṇaṃ ajjhesi –
atk-s0401a:812_5: Soṇatthero madhurassarena ekabyañjanampi avināsento aṭṭhakavaggiyāni suttāni abhāsi.
atk-s0401a:812_6: Kathāpariyosāne bhagavā sādhukāraṃ datvā “suggahito te bhikkhu dhammo,
atk-s0401a:812_7: mayā desitakāle ca ajja ca ekasadisāva desanā,
atk-s0401a:812_8: kiñci ūnaṃ vā adhikaṃ vā natthī”ti pasannabhāvaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0401a:812_9: Soṇattheropi “ayaṃ okāso”ti sallakkhetvā upajjhāyassa vacanena dasabalaṃ vanditvā vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbe vare yāci,
atk-s0401a:812_11: Puna thero mātuupāsikāya vacanena vanditvā “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0401a:812_12: upāsikāya tumhākaṃ vasanagandhakuṭiyaṃ bhūmattharaṇatthaṃ kambalo pahito”ti kambalaṃ datvā uṭṭhāyāsanā satthāraṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:812_14: vitthārato pana therassa pabbajjaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ sutte āgatameva.
atk-s0401a:813_0: Iti thero satthu santikā aṭṭha vare labhitvā upajjhāyassa santikaṃ gantvā sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0401a:813_1: Punadivase mātuupāsikāya nivesanadvāraṃ gantvā bhikkhāya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:813_2: Upāsikā “putto kira me dvāre ṭhito”ti sutvā vegena āgantvā abhivādetvā hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā antonivesane nisīdāpetvā bhojanaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:813_9: sopi ca me kambalo tathāgatassa vasanaṭṭhāne bhūmattharaṇaṃ katvā atthatoti. Kiṃ, tāta,
atk-s0401a:813_13: mayhaṃ gehe adhivatthā devatā dasabalena tuyhaṃ sādhukāraṃ dinnadivase “sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷe devatā sādhukāraṃ adaṃsū”ti āha – tāta,
atk-s0401a:813_14: tayā kathitadhammakathaṃ buddhānaṃ kathitaniyāmeneva mayhampi kathetuṃ paccāsīsāmīti.
atk-s0401a:813_16: Sā tassa adhivāsanaṃ viditvā dvāre maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā dasabalassa kathitaniyāmeneva attano dhammakathaṃ kathāpesīti vatthu ettha samuṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0401a:813_17: Satthā aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ kalyāṇavākkaraṇānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:815_1: Navame lābhīnaṃ yadidaṃ sīvalīti ṭhapetvā tathāgataṃ lābhīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīvalitthero aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:815_3: ayampi atīte padumuttarabuddhakāle vuttanayeneva vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0401a:815_4: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ lābhīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0401a:815_5: dasabalaṃ nimantetvā purimanayeneva sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā “bhagavā ahampi iminā adhikārakammena aññaṃ
atk-s0401a:815_7: anāgate pana ekassa buddhassa sāsane ahampi tumhehi so etadagge ṭhapitabhikkhu viya lābhīnaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:815_8: Satthā anantarāyaṃ disvā “ayaṃ te patthanā anāgate gotamassa buddhassa sāsane samijjhissatī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:816_0: Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto vipassībuddhakāle bandhumatīnagarato avidūre ekasmiṃ gāme paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:816_1: Tasmiṃ samaye bandhumatīnagaravāsino raññā saddhiṃ sākacchitvā sākacchitvā dasabalassa dānaṃ denti.
atk-s0401a:816_2: Te ekadivasaṃ sabbeva ekato hutvā dānaṃ dentā “kiṃ nu kho amhākaṃ dānamukhe natthī”ti madhuñca guḷadadhiñca na addasaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:816_3: Te “yato kutoci āharissāmā”ti janapadato nagaraṃ pavisanamagge purisaṃ ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:816_4: Tadā esa kulaputto attano gāmato guḷadadhivārakaṃ gahetvā “kiñcideva āharissāmī”ti nagaraṃ gacchanto
atk-s0401a:816_5: mukhaṃ dhovitvā “dhotahatthapādo pavisissāmī”ti phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ olokento naṅgalasīsamattaṃ nimmakkhikaṃ
atk-s0401a:816_6: daṇḍakamadhuṃ disvā “puññena me idaṃ uppanna”nti gahetvā nagaraṃ pavisati.
atk-s0401a:816_11: vikkiṇituṃ pana me idaṃ ānītanti. Tena hi,
atk-s0401a:816_13: imaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ gahetvā etaṃ madhuñca guḷadadhiñca dehīti.
atk-s0401a:817_16: kena kammena idaṃ gaṇhāsī”ti? Idha, bho,
atk-s0401a:817_17: nagaravāsino raññā saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhitvā vipassīdasabalassa dānaṃ dentā idaṃ dvayaṃ dānamukhe apassantā pariyesanti.
atk-s0401a:817_24: Atthi pana te koci nāgarānaṃ dāne ekadivasaṃ sahassaṃ dātāti?
atk-s0401a:817_30: “eko puriso imāni dve mūlena na deti,
atk-s0401a:817_32: tumhe imesaṃ dvinnaṃ kāraṇā nirussukkā hothā”ti.
atk-s0401a:817_33: Tvaṃ pana me imasmiṃ dānamukhe jeṭṭhakabhāvassa kāyasakkhī hohīti.
atk-s0401a:818_0: So gāmavāsī paribbayatthaṃ gahitamāsakena pañcakaṭukaṃ gahetvā cuṇṇaṃ katvā dadhito kañjiyaṃ vāhetvā
atk-s0401a:818_1: tattha madhupaṭalaṃ pīḷetvā pañcakaṭukacuṇṇena yojetvā ekasmiṃ paduminipatte pakkhipitvā taṃ saṃvidahitvā
atk-s0401a:818_3: Mahājanena āhariyamānassa sakkārassa antare attano pattavāraṃ olokayamāno okāsaṃ ñatvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā “bhagavā ayaṃ mayhaṃ duggatapaṇṇākāro,
atk-s0401a:818_5: Satthā tassa anukampaṃ paṭicca catumahārājadattiyena selamayena pattena taṃ paṭiggahetvā yathā aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassassa
atk-s0401a:818_8: Sopi kulaputto niṭṭhitabhattakiccaṃ bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito āha –
atk-s0401a:818_9: “diṭṭho me bhagavā ajja bandhumatīnagaravāsikehi tumhākaṃ sakkāro āhariyamāno,
atk-s0401a:818_10: ahampi imassa kammassa nissandena nibbattanibbattabhave lābhaggayasaggappatto bhaveyya”nti.
atk-s0401a:818_11: Satthā “evaṃ hotu kulaputtā”ti vatvā tassa ca nagaravāsīnañca bhattānumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:819_0: Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde suppavāsāya rājadhītāya kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:819_1: Paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya sāyaṃ pātañca paṇṇākārasatāni pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0401a:819_3: Atha naṃ puññavīmaṃsanatthaṃ hatthena bījapacchiṃ phusāpenti,
atk-s0401a:819_7: rājadhītāya puññena gaṇhantānaṃ gahitagahitaṭṭhānaṃ puna pūrati.
atk-s0401a:819_8: Paripuṇṇabhattakumbhitopi “rājadhītāya puñña”nti vatvā yassa kassaci dentānaṃ yāva na ukkaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0401a:820_0: Gabbhe pana paripakke sattāhaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhosi.
atk-s0401a:820_1: Sā sāmikaṃ āmantetvā “pure maraṇā jīvamānāva dānaṃ dassāmī”ti satthu santikaṃ pesesi –
atk-s0401a:820_2: “gaccha imaṃ pavattiṃ satthu ārocetvā satthāraṃ nimantehi,
atk-s0401a:820_4: taṃ sādhukaṃ upalakkhetvā āgantvā mayhaṃ kathehī”ti.
atk-s0401a:820_5: So gantvā tassā sāsanaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0401a:820_7: sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyatū”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:820_8: Rājā taṃ sutvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā antogāmābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0401a:820_9: Tassa pure āgamanāyeva suppavāsāya kucchito dhamakaraṇā udakaṃ viya gabbho nikkhami,
atk-s0401a:820_11: Haṭṭhatuṭṭho mahājano rañño puttasāsanaṃ ārocetuṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:821_0: Rājā tesaṃ iṅgitaṃ disvāva “dasabalena kathitakathā nipphannā maññe”ti cintesi.
atk-s0401a:821_1: So āgantvā satthu sāsanaṃ rājadhītāya ārocesi.
atk-s0401a:821_6: Dārako sabbesaṃ ñātīnaṃ santattacittaṃ nibbāpento jātoti sīvalidārakotvevassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:821_7: So satta vassāni gabbhe vasitattā jātakālato paṭṭhāya sabbakammakkhamo ahosi.
atk-s0401a:821_8: Dhammasenāpati sāriputto sattame divase tena saddhiṃ kathāsallāpaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:825_1: “kiṃ pana tayā evarūpaṃ dukkharāsiṃ anubhavitvā pabbajituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0401a:825_3: Suppavāsā taṃ dārakaṃ therena saddhiṃ kathentaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho me putto dhammasenāpatinā saddhiṃ kathetī”ti theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi –
atk-s0401a:825_6: Attanā anubhūtaṃ gabbhavāsadukkhaṃ kathetvā tumhehi anuññāto pabbajissāmīti vadatīti. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0401a:825_8: Thero taṃ vihāraṃ netvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pabbājento, “sīvali,
atk-s0401a:825_9: na tuyhaṃ aññena ovādena kammaṃ atthi,
atk-s0401a:825_10: tayā satta vassāni anubhūtadukkhameva paccavekkhāhī”ti. Bhante,
atk-s0401a:825_17: Sabbesaṃyeva pana kesānaṃ oropanañca arahattasacchikiriyā ca apacchā apurimā ahosi.
atk-s0401a:825_18: Tassa pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhusaṅghassa cattāro paccayā yadicchakaṃ uppajjanti.
atk-s0401a:826_3: pañca me bhikkhusatāni dethā”ti āha. Gaṇha, sīvalīti.
atk-s0401a:826_4: So pañcasate bhikkhū gahetvā himavantābhimukhaṃ gacchanto aṭavimaggaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0401a:826_5: Tassa paṭhamaṃ diṭṭhā nigrodhe adhivatthā devatā satta divasāni dānaṃ adāsi. Iti so –
atk-s0401a:831_0: Sabbaṭṭhānesu satta satta divasāneva dānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:831_1: Gandhamādanapabbate pana nāgadattadevarājā nāma sattadivasesu ekadivasaṃ khīrapiṇḍapātaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0401a:831_4: imassa devarañño neva dhenuyo duyhamānā paññāyanti,
atk-s0401a:831_7: kassapadasabalassa kāle khīrasalākabhattadānassetaṃ phala”nti devarājā āha.
atk-s0401a:831_8: Aparabhāge satthā khadiravaniyarevatassa paccuggamanaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ attano sāsane lābhaggayasaggappattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:834_1: ayampi hi atīte padumuttarabuddhakāle vuttanayeneva vihāraṃ gantvā parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0401a:834_2: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ
atk-s0401a:834_3: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttanayeneva satthāraṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:834_4: ahampi iminā adhikārakammena tumhehi saddhādhimuttānaṃ etadagge ṭhapitabhikkhu viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa
atk-s0401a:834_5: sāsane saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggo bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:834_6: Satthā tassa anantarāyaṃ disvā byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:835_0: Sopi yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ satthukāle sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0401a:835_2: So vuddhippatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā dasabalaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ carantaṃ disvā satthu
atk-s0401a:835_3: sarīrasampattiṃ olokento sarīrasampattidassanena atitto dasabalena saddhiṃyeva vicarati.
atk-s0401a:835_4: Vihāraṃ gacchantena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā sarīranipphattiṃ olokentova tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0401a:835_5: Dhammasabhāyaṃ nisīditvā dhammaṃ kathentassa sammukhaṭṭhāne ṭhito dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0401a:835_6: So saddhaṃ paṭilabhitvā “agāramajjhe vasanto nibaddhaṃ dasabalassa dassanaṃ na labhissāmī”ti pabbajjaṃ yācitvā satthu santike pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:836_0: Tato paṭṭhāya ṭhapetvā āhārakaraṇavelaṃ avasesakāle yattha ṭhitena sakkā dasabalaṃ passituṃ,
atk-s0401a:836_1: tattha ṭhito yonisomanasikāraṃ pahāya dasabalaṃ olokentova viharati.
atk-s0401a:836_2: Satthā tassa ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamento dīghampi addhānaṃ tasmiṃ rūpadassanavaseneva vicarante kiñci avatvā “idānissa ñāṇaṃ paripākagataṃ,
atk-s0401a:836_3: sakkā etaṃ bodhetu”nti ñatvā evamāha – “kiṃ te, vakkali,
atk-s0401a:836_4: iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho, vakkali,
atk-s0401a:837_0: Satthari evaṃ ovadantepi thero dasabalassa dassanaṃ pahāya neva aññattha gantuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0401a:837_1: Tato satthā “nāyaṃ bhikkhu saṃvegaṃ alabhitvā bujjhissatī”ti upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya rājagahaṃ gantvā vassūpanāyikadivase “apehi,
atk-s0401a:837_4: tasmā thero satthāraṃ paṭippharitvā ṭhātuṃ asakkonto temāsaṃ dasabalassa sammukhe āgantuṃ avisahanto “kiṃ dāni sakkā kātuṃ,
atk-s0401a:837_7: kiṃ mayhaṃ jīvitenā”ti gijjhakūṭapabbate papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0401a:837_8: Satthā tassa kilamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ bhikkhu mama santikā assāsaṃ alabhanto maggaphalānaṃ upanissayaṃ
atk-s0401a:837_10: Athassa satthu diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya eva mahantaṃ sokasallaṃ pahīnaṃ.
atk-s0401a:837_11: Satthā sukkhataḷāke oghaṃ āharanto viya vakkalittherassa balavapītisomanassaṃ uppādetuṃ dhammapade imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:840_3: ehīti avhāyanampi laddha”nti balavapītiṃ uppādetvā “kuto gacchāmī”ti attano gamanabhāvaṃ ajānitvāva dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:840_4: sammukhe ākāse pakkhanditvā paṭhamapādena pabbate ṭhitoyeva satthārā vuttagāthaṃ āvajjento ākāseyeva
atk-s0401a:840_5: pītiṃ vikkhambhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā tathāgataṃ vandamānova otari.
atk-s0401a:840_6: Aparabhāge satthā ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:844_1: Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame sikkhākāmānanti tisso sikkhā kāmayamānānaṃ sampiyāyitvā sikkhantānanti attho.
atk-s0401a:844_3: Thero kira pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya pātova uṭṭhahanto hatthapūraṃ vālikaṃ ukkhipitvā “aho vatāhaṃ ajja
atk-s0401a:844_4: dasabalassa ceva ācariyupajjhāyānañca santikā ettakaṃ ovādañceva anusāsaniñca labheyya”nti pattheti.
atk-s0401a:845_3: bhinnaṃ vā raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthe kule jātotipi raṭṭhapāloti saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:845_4: So hi satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho cuddasabhattacchede katvā mātāpitaro pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetvā pabbajito.
atk-s0401a:847_0: Imesaṃ pana ubhinnampi therānaṃ pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathā –
atk-s0401a:847_1: ete kira dvepi atīte padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare gahapatimahāsālakule nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:847_2: Tesaṃ daharakāle nāmaṃ vā gottaṃ vā na kathiyati.
atk-s0401a:847_3: Vayappattā pana gharāvāse patiṭṭhāya attano attano pitu accayena ubhopi attano attano ratanakoṭṭhāgārakammike pakkosāpetvā aparimāṇaṃ dhanaṃ disvā –
atk-s0401a:847_4: “imaṃ ettakaṃ dhanarāsiṃ ayyakapayyakādayo attanā saddhiṃ gahetvā gantuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:847_5: amhehi dāni yena kenaci upāyena imaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti te ubhopi janā catūsu ṭhānesu kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ mahādānaṃ dātuṃ āraddhā.
atk-s0401a:847_6: Eko attano dānagge āgatāgatajanaṃ pucchitvā yāgukhajjakādīsu yassa yaṃ paṭibhāti,
atk-s0401a:847_8: tassa teneva kāraṇena āgatapākoti nāmaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0401a:847_9: Itaro apucchitvāva gahitagahitabhājanaṃ pūretvā pūretvā deti,
atk-s0401a:847_10: tassapi teneva kāraṇena anaggapākoti nāmaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0401a:848_0: Te ubhopi ekadivasaṃ pātova mukhadhovanatthaṃ bahigāmaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:848_1: Tasmiṃ samaye himavantato dve mahiddhikā tāpasā bhikkhācāratthāya ākāsena āgantvā tesaṃ sahāyakānaṃ avidūre
atk-s0401a:848_2: otaritvā “mā no ete passiṃsū”ti ekapasse aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:848_3: Te ubhopi janā tesaṃ lābubhājanādiparikkhāraṃ saṃvidhāya antogāmaṃ sandhāya bhikkhāya gatānaṃ santikaṃ āgamma vandiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:848_4: Atha ne tāpasā “kāya velāya āgatattha mahāpuññā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:848_6: bhante”ti vatvā tesaṃ hatthato lābubhājanaṃ gahetvā attano attano gehaṃ netvā bhattakiccapariyosāne nibaddhaṃ bhikkhāgahaṇatthaṃ paṭiññaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:849_1: So attano ānubhāvena mahāsamuddaudakaṃ dvedhā katvā pathavindharanāgarājassa bhavanaṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ nisīdati.
atk-s0401a:849_2: So utusappāyaṃ gahetvā paccāgantvā attano upaṭṭhākassa gehe bhattānumodanaṃ karonto “pathavindharanāgabhavanaṃ viya hotū”ti vadati.
atk-s0401a:849_4: tumhe anumodanaṃ karontā ‘pathavindharanāgabhavanaṃ viya hotū’ti vadatha,
atk-s0401a:849_8: kuṭumbiya ahaṃ “tumhākaṃ sampatti pathavindharanāgarājasampattisadisā hotū”ti vadāmīti.
atk-s0401a:849_9: Kuṭumbiko tato paṭṭhāya pathavindharanāgarājabhavane cittaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:850_0: Itaro tāpaso tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā suññe serisakavimāne divāvihāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0401a:850_1: So āgacchanto gacchanto ca sakkassa devarājassa sampattiṃ disvā attano upaṭṭhākassa anumodanaṃ karonto “sakkavimānaṃ viya hotū”ti vadati.
atk-s0401a:850_2: Atha naṃ sopi kuṭumbiyo itaro sahāyako taṃ tāpasaṃ viya pucchi.
atk-s0401a:850_3: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sakkabhavane cittaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:851_1: So nibbattakkhaṇe attano attabhāvaṃ disvā “amanāpassa vata me ṭhānassa kulupakatāpaso vaṇṇaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0401a:851_3: nūna so aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ na jānātī”ti vippaṭisārī ahosi.
atk-s0401a:851_4: Athassa taṃkhaṇeyeva alaṅkatapaṭiyattāni nāganāṭakāni sabbadisāsu tūriyāni paggaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:851_5: So tasmiṃyeva khaṇe taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇī ahosi.
atk-s0401a:851_6: Anvaddhamāsañca cattāro mahārājāno sakkassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0401a:851_7: Tasmā sopi virūpakkhena nāgaraññā saddhiṃ sakkassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:851_8: Sakko taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā sañjāni.
atk-s0401a:851_9: Atha naṃ samīpe āgantvā ṭhitakāle “kahaṃ nibbattosi sammā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0401a:851_15: tassa adhikārakammaṃ katvā imaṃyeva ṭhānaṃ patthehi,
atk-s0401a:851_17: karissāmī”ti gantvā padumuttaradasabalaṃ nimantetvā attano nāgabhavane nāgaparisāya saddhiṃ sabbarattiṃ sakkārasammānaṃ sajjesi.
atk-s0401a:852_0: Satthā punadivase uṭṭhite aruṇe attano upaṭṭhākaṃ sumanattheraṃ āmantesi – “sumana,
atk-s0401a:852_4: Thero satthu vacanaṃ sutvā sabbesaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0401a:852_5: Satthārā saddhiṃ satasahassā bhikkhū ākāsaṃ pakkhandiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:852_6: Pathavindharo nāgaparisāya saddhiṃ dasabalassa paccuggamanaṃ āgato satthāraṃ parivāretvā samuddamatthake
atk-s0401a:852_7: maṇivaṇṇā ūmiyo maddamānaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ oloketvā ādito satthāraṃ,
atk-s0401a:852_8: pariyosāne saṅghanavakaṃ tathāgatassa puttaṃ uparevatasāmaṇeraṃ nāma olokento “anacchariyo sesasāvakānaṃ evarūpo iddhānubhāvo,
atk-s0401a:852_9: imassa pana taruṇabāladārakassa evarūpo iddhānubhāvo ativiya acchariyo”ti pītipāmojjaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0401a:853_0: Athassa bhavane dasabale nisinne sesabhikkhūsu koṭito paṭṭhāya nisīdantesu satthu sammukhaṭṭhāneyeva uparevatasāmaṇerassa āsanaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:853_1: Nāgarājā yāguṃ dentopi khajjakaṃ dentopi sakiṃ dasabalaṃ oloketi,
atk-s0401a:853_3: Tassa kira sarīre satthu sarīre viya dvattiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni paññāyanti.
atk-s0401a:853_4: Tato nāgarājā “ayaṃ sāmaṇero buddhānaṃ sadiso paññāyati,
atk-s0401a:853_5: kiṃ nu kho hotī”ti avidūre nisinnaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchi – “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0401a:853_12: mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:853_13: ahaṃ imassa adhikārakammassānubhāvena ayaṃ uparevato viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa putto bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:853_14: Satthā anantarāyaṃ disvā “anāgate gotamabuddhassa putto bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:854_0: Pathavindharopi puna addhamāse sampatte virūpakkhena saddhiṃ sakkassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:854_1: Atha naṃ samīpe ṭhitaṃ sakko pucchi –
atk-s0401a:854_7: ahaṃ pana dasabalassa puttaṃ uparevatasāmaṇeraṃ passiṃ.
atk-s0401a:854_8: Tassa me diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya aññattha cittaṃ na nami,
atk-s0401a:854_9: svāhaṃ “anāgate ekassa buddhassa evarūpo putto bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsiṃ. Tvampi, mahārāja,
atk-s0401a:854_11: te mayaṃ nibbattaṭṭhāne na vinā bhavissāmāti.
atk-s0401a:854_12: Sakko tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā ekaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā “katarakulā nu kho nikkhamitvā ayaṃ
atk-s0401a:854_13: kulaputto pabbajito”ti āvajjento “ayaṃ bhinnaṃ raṭṭhaṃ sandhāretuṃ samatthassa kulassa putto hutvā cuddasa
atk-s0401a:854_14: bhattacchede katvā mātāpitaro pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetvā pabbajito”ti aññāsi.
atk-s0401a:854_15: Ñatvā ca pana ajānanto viya dasabalaṃ pucchitvā sattāhaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ katvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:854_16: ahaṃ imassa kalyāṇakammassa nissandena tumhākaṃ sāsane ayaṃ kulaputto viya anāgate ekassa buddhassa sāsane
atk-s0401a:854_19: anāgate gotamassa buddhassa sāsane saddhāpabbajitānaṃ aggo bhavissasī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:855_0: Te ubhopi nibbattaṭṭhānato cavitvā devamanussesu saṃsarantā anekasahassakappe atikkamiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:855_1: Ito pana dvānavutikappamatthake phusso nāma buddho loke udapādi.
atk-s0401a:855_2: Tassa pitā mahindo nāma rājā ahosi,
atk-s0401a:855_4: Rājā divase divase “mayhaṃyeva buddho mayhaṃ dhammo mayhaṃ saṅgho”ti mamāyanto sayameva dasabalaṃ nibaddhaṃ bhojanaṃ bhojeti.
atk-s0401a:856_8: mayaṃ core vidhamissāmā”ti pitaraṃ vanditvā paccantaṃ gantvā core vidhamitvā vijitasaṅgāmā hutvā nivattiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:856_12: tumhākaṃ pitu accayena dullabhaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0401a:856_13: tumhākaṃ pana jeṭṭhabhātikaṃ phussabuddhaṃ paṭijagganavaraṃ gaṇhathā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:856_14: Te “kalyāṇaṃ tumhehi vutta”nti sabbepi ekacittā hutvā gantvā pitaraṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:856_15: Tadā pitā tesaṃ pasīditvā varaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:856_22: Rājā tesu punappunaṃ kathentesu attanā paṭiññātattā “na sakkā na dātu”nti cintetvā āha – “tātā,
atk-s0401a:856_24: apica kho pana buddhā nāma durāsadā honti sīhā viya ekacarā,
atk-s0401a:857_1: “amhehi tathāgataṃ paṭijaggantehi anucchavikaṃ katvā paṭijaggituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sabbepi ekacittā hutvā dasasīlāni
atk-s0401a:857_2: samādāya nirāmagandhā hutvā satthu dānaggaparivahanake tayo purise ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:857_6: Tesu dhanadhaññuppādako paccuppanne bimbisāro mahārājā jāto,
atk-s0401a:857_9: So tattha yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devapure nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:857_10: Ayaṃ pana rāhulatthero nāma kassapadasabalassa kāle kikissa kāsirañño jeṭṭhaputto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0401a:857_20: So tāsaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā pañca vihārasatāni kāresi.
atk-s0401a:857_22: So tattha yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devapure nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:857_23: Imasmiṃ pana buddhuppāde pathavindharakumāro amhākaṃ bodhisattassa aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0401a:857_24: tassa sahāyako kururaṭṭhe thullakoṭṭhitanigame raṭṭhapālaseṭṭhigehe nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:858_0: Atha amhākaṃ dasabalo abhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena kapilavatthuṃ āgantvā rāhulakumāraṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0401a:858_2: Evaṃ pabbajitassa panassa satthā abhiṇhaovādavasena rāhulovādasuttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0401a:858_3: Rāhulopi pātova vuṭṭhāya hatthena vālukaṃ ukkhipitvā “dasabalassa ceva ācariyupajjhāyānañca santikā ajja ettakaṃ ovādaṃ labheyya”nti vadati.
atk-s0401a:858_4: Bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe kathā udapādi “ovādakkhamo vata rāhulasāmaṇero pitu anucchaviko putto”ti.
atk-s0401a:858_5: Satthā bhikkhūnaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā “mayi gate ekā dhammadesanā ca vaḍḍhissati,
atk-s0401a:858_6: rāhulassa ca guṇo pākaṭo bhavissatī”ti gantvā dhammasabhāyaṃ buddhāsāne nisinno bhikkhū āmantesi –
atk-s0401a:858_11: Satthā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā rāhulassa guṇadīpanatthaṃ migajātakaṃ āharitvā kathesi –
atk-s0401a:863_0: Athassa sattavassikasāmaṇerakāle “mā heva kho rāhulo daharabhāvena kīḷanatthāyapi sampajānamusā bhāseyyā”ti ambalaṭṭhiyarāhulovādaṃ desesi.
atk-s0401a:863_1: Aṭṭhārasavassikasāmaṇerakāle tathāgatassa pacchato piṇḍāya pavisantassa satthu ceva attano ca rūpasampattiṃ
atk-s0401a:863_4: Saṃyuttake pana rāhulovādopi aṅguttare rāhulovādopi therassa vipassanācāroyeva.
atk-s0401a:863_5: Athassa satthā ñāṇaparipākaṃ ñatvā avassikabhikkhukāle andhavane nisinno cūḷarāhulovādaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0401a:863_6: Desanāpariyosāne rāhulatthero koṭisatasahassadevatāhi saddhiṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0401a:863_8: Atha satthā aparabhāge ariyasaṅghamajjhe nisinno theraṃ imasmiṃ sāsane sikkhākāmānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:864_0: Satthari pana kururaṭṭhe cārikāya nikkhamitvā thullakoṭṭhitaṃ anuppatte raṭṭhapālo kulaputto satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:864_1: sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā satthu āṇattiyā aññatarassa therassa
atk-s0401a:864_3: Tassa pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya seṭṭhigahapati bhikkhū attano nivesanadvārena gacchante disvā “kiṃ tumhākaṃ imasmiṃ gehe kammaṃ,
atk-s0401a:864_7: Satthā addhamāsaṃ thullakoṭṭhite vasitvā puna sāvatthimeva agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:864_8: Tatthāyasmā raṭṭhapālo yoniso manasikaronto kammaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:864_9: So satthāraṃ anujānāpetvā mātāpitaro dassanatthaṃ thullakoṭṭhitaṃ gantvā tattha sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caranto
atk-s0401a:864_10: pitu nivesane ābhidosikaṃ kummāsaṃ labhitvā taṃ amataṃ viya paribhuñjanto pitarā nimantito adhivāsetvā
atk-s0401a:864_11: dutiyadivase pitu nivesane piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatte itthijane asubhasaññaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0401a:864_12: ṭhitakova dhammaṃ desetvā jiyā mutto viya nārāco ākāsaṃ uppatitvā korabyarañño migacīraṃ gantvā maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe
atk-s0401a:864_13: nisinno dassanatthāya āgatassa rañño catupārijuññapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno
atk-s0401a:864_16: Atha satthā aparabhāge ariyagaṇamajjhe nisinno theraṃ imasmiṃ sāsane saddhāpabbajitānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:866_1: Tatiye paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānanti sabbapaṭhamaṃ salākagāhakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kuṇḍadhānatthero aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:866_2: So kira thero mahāsubhaddāya nimantitadivase tathāgate ugganagaraṃ gacchante “ajja satthā dūraṃ bhikkhācāraṃ gamissati,
atk-s0401a:866_4: pañcasatā khīṇāsavāva gaṇhantū”ti vutte paṭhamameva sīhanādaṃ naditvā salākaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:866_5: Cūḷasubhaddāya nimantitadivase tathāgate sāketaṃ gacchantepi pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ antare paṭhamameva salākaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0401a:866_7: Imehi kāraṇehi thero paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:867_1: ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto vuttanayeneva vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:867_2: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā buddhānaṃ adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:867_3: katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā satthārā anantarāyaṃ disvā byākato yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devesu ca
atk-s0401a:867_4: manussesu ca saṃsaranto kassapabuddhakāle bhūmaṭṭhakadevatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:867_5: Dīghāyukabuddhānañca nāma na anvaddhamāsiko uposatho hoti.
atk-s0401a:867_6: Vipassīdasabalassa hi chabbassantare chabbassantare uposatho ahosi,
atk-s0401a:867_7: kassapadasabalo pana chaṭṭhe chaṭṭhe māse pātimokkhaṃ osāresi.
atk-s0401a:867_8: Tassa pātimokkhaṃ osāraṇakāle disāvāsikā dve sahāyakā bhikkhū “uposathaṃ karissāmā”ti gacchanti.
atk-s0401a:867_11: kiṃ nu kho bhedake sati bhijjeyya,
atk-s0401a:867_13: Tesaṃ okāsaṃ olokayamānā tesaṃ avidūreneva gacchati.
atk-s0401a:868_0: Atheko thero ekassa hatthe pattacīvaraṃ datvā sarīravaḷañjanatthaṃ udakaphāsukaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā dhotahatthapādo hutvā gumbasabhāgato nikkhamati.
atk-s0401a:868_1: Bhummadevatā tassa therassa pacchato pacchato uttamarūpā itthī hutvā kese vidhunitvā saṃvidhāya bandhantī
atk-s0401a:868_2: viya piṭṭhito paṃsuṃ puñchamānā viya sāṭakaṃ saṃvidhāya nivāsayamānā viya ca hutvā therassa padānupadikā
atk-s0401a:868_4: Ekamante ṭhito sahāyakatthero imaṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā domanassajāto “naṭṭho dāni me iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṃ dīgharattānugato sineho.
atk-s0401a:868_6: ettakaṃ addhānaṃ iminā saddhiṃ vissāsaṃ na kareyya”nti cintetvā āgacchantassevassa “handāvuso,
atk-s0401a:868_8: tādisena pāpena sahāyena saddhiṃ ekamaggaṃ na gacchāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:868_9: Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā tassa lajjibhikkhuno hadayaṃ tikhiṇasattiṃ gahetvā viddhaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0401a:868_12: ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ dukkaṭamattampi āpattiṃ na jānāmi.
atk-s0401a:868_16: kiṃ tvaṃ evaṃvidhena alaṅkatapaṭiyattena mātugāmena saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne hutvā nikkhantoti?
atk-s0401a:868_19: Tassa yāvatatiyaṃ kathentassāpi itaro thero kathaṃ asaddahitvā attanā diṭṭhakāraṇaṃyeva atthaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0401a:868_20: tena saddhiṃ ekamaggena agantvā aññena maggena satthu santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:868_21: Itaropi aññena maggena satthu santikaṃyeva gato.
atk-s0401a:869_0: Tato bhikkhusaṅghassa uposathāgāraṃ pavisanavelāya so bhikkhu taṃ bhikkhuṃ uposathagge sañjānitvā “imasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:869_2: nāhaṃ tena saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā bahi aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:869_3: Bhummadevatā “bhāriyaṃ mayā kammaṃ kata”nti mahallakaupāsakavaṇṇena tassa santikaṃ gantvā “kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0401a:869_4: ayyo imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhito”ti āha. Upāsaka,
atk-s0401a:869_6: ahaṃ tena saddhiṃ uposathaṃ na karomīti vatvā nikkhamitvā bahi ṭhitomhīti. Bhante,
atk-s0401a:869_10: mayā tumhākaṃ vīmaṃsanatthāya “daḷhā nu kho imesaṃ therānaṃ metti,
atk-s0401a:869_11: no daḷhā”ti lajjialajjibhāvaṃ olokentena taṃ kammaṃ katanti.
atk-s0401a:869_14: Devaputto kathentova dibbānubhāvena ṭhatvā therassa pādesu patitvā “mayhaṃ, bhante, khamatha,
atk-s0401a:869_16: uposathaṃ karothā”ti theraṃ yācitvā uposathaggaṃ pavesesi.
atk-s0401a:869_17: So thero uposathaṃ tāva ekaṭṭhāne akāsi,
atk-s0401a:869_18: mittasanthavavasena na puna tena saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne ahosīti.
atk-s0401a:869_20: cuditakatthero pana aparāparaṃ vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:870_0: Bhummadevatā tassa kammassa nissandena ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ apāyato na muccittha.
atk-s0401a:870_1: Sace pana kālena kālaṃ manussattaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0401a:870_2: aññena yena kenaci kato doso tasseva upari patati.
atk-s0401a:870_3: So amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0401a:870_5: So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā mahallakakāle satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji,
atk-s0401a:870_6: tassa upasampannadivasato paṭṭhāya ekā alaṅkatapaṭiyattā itthī tasmiṃ gāmaṃ pavisante saddhiṃyeva gāmaṃ pavisati,
atk-s0401a:870_11: tassa pana purimassa kammassa nissandena sā aññesaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0401a:871_2: eko imissā amhākaṃ sahāyikāyā”ti parihāsaṃ karonti.
atk-s0401a:871_4: Vihāraṃ gatampi naṃ sāmaṇerā ceva daharabhikkhū ca parivāretvā “dhāno koṇḍo jāto”ti parihāsaṃ karonti.
atk-s0401a:871_5: Athassa teneva kāraṇena kuṇḍadhānattheroti nāmaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0401a:871_6: So uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya tehi kayiramānaṃ keḷiṃ sahituṃ asakkonto ummādaṃ gahetvā “tumhe koṇḍā,
atk-s0401a:871_11: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ bhikkhū”ti pucchitvā “saccaṃ bhagavā”ti vutte “kasmā evaṃ vadesī”ti āha. Bhante,
atk-s0401a:871_13: “Tvaṃ pubbe katakammaṃ yāvajjadivasā jīrāpetuṃ na sakkosi,
atk-s0401a:871_14: puna evarūpaṃ pharusaṃ mā vada bhikkhū”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0401a:873_0: Dukkhā hi sārambhakathā, paṭidaṇḍā phuseyyu taṃ.
atk-s0401a:875_0: Esa pattosi nibbānaṃ, sārambho te na vijjatī”ti. ;
atk-s0401a:876_0: Imañca pana tassa therassa mātugāmena saddhiṃ vicaraṇabhāvaṃ kosalaraññopi kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:876_2: vīmaṃsathā”ti pesetvā sayampi mandeneva parivārena saddhiṃ therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ekamante olokento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:876_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe thero sūcikammaṃ karonto nisinno hoti,
atk-s0401a:876_4: sāpissa itthī avidūre ṭhāne ṭhitā viya paññāyati.
atk-s0401a:877_0: Rājā taṃ disvā “atthidaṃ kāraṇa”nti tassā ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:877_1: Sā tasmiṃ āgacchante therassa vasanapaṇṇasālaṃ paviṭṭhā viya ahosi.
atk-s0401a:877_2: Rājāpi tāya saddhiṃyeva paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā sabbattha olokento adisvā “nāyaṃ mātugāmo,
atk-s0401a:877_3: therassa eko kammavipāko”ti saññaṃ katvā paṭhamaṃ therassa samīpena gacchantopi theraṃ avanditvā tassa
atk-s0401a:877_4: kāraṇassa abhūtabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgamma theraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno “kacci, bhante,
atk-s0401a:877_8: evarūpena ca parikkilesena saddhiṃ carantānaṃ tumhākaṃ ke nāma pasīdissanti,
atk-s0401a:877_9: ito paṭṭhāya vo katthaci gamanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0401a:877_11: tumhe yonisomanasikāre mā pamajjitthā”ti nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:877_12: Thero rājānaṃ upatthambhakaṃ labhitvā bhojanasappāyena ekaggacitto hutvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:878_0: Mahāsubhaddā ugganagare micchādiṭṭhikule vasamānā “satthā maṃ anukampatū”ti uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nirāmagandhā
atk-s0401a:878_1: hutvā uparipāsādatale ṭhitā “imāni pupphāni antare aṭṭhatvā dasabalassa matthake vitānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhantu,
atk-s0401a:878_2: dasabalo imāya saññāya sve pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatū”ti saccakiriyaṃ katvā aṭṭha sumanapupphamuṭṭhiyo vissajjesi.
atk-s0401a:878_3: Pupphāni gantvā dhammadesanāvelāya satthu matthake vitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:878_4: Satthā taṃ sumanapupphavitānaṃ disvā citteneva subhaddāya bhikkhaṃ adhivāsetvā punadivase aruṇe uṭṭhite ānandattheraṃ āha – “ānanda,
atk-s0401a:878_13: Ānandā “satthā tādisānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ salākaṃ na dāpeti,
atk-s0401a:878_14: ariyānaṃyeva dāpetī”ti vitakkaṃ uppādetvā gantvā satthu ārocesi.
atk-s0401a:878_17: “sace kuṇḍadhānassa salākā dātuṃ na yuttā assa,
atk-s0401a:878_21: Kuṇḍadhānatthero tassa pure āgamanāva abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā iddhiyā ākāse ṭhatvā “āharāvuso ānanda,
atk-s0401a:878_23: mādisaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantaṃ na satthā vāretī”ti hatthaṃ pasāretvā salākaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:878_24: Satthā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ imasmiṃ sāsane paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:880_1: Catutthe paṭibhānavantānanti sampannapaṭibhānānaṃ vaṅgīsatthero aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:880_2: Ayaṃ kira thero dasabalassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamanto cakkhupathato paṭṭhāya candena saddhiṃ upametvā, sūriyena, ākāsena,
atk-s0401a:880_5: sīhena migaraññā saddhiṃ upametvāpi anekehi padasatehi padasahassehi satthu vaṇṇaṃ vadantoyeva upasaṅkamati.
atk-s0401a:881_1: ayampi kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā purimanayeneva vihāraṃ

atk-s0401a:910_16: tassa gataṭṭhānaṃ anuvicinitvā etaṃ kāraṇaṃ jānissāmī”ti therassa gatamaggaṃ pucchitvā pāyāsi.
atk-s0401a:911_0: Atheko puriso taṃ ativiya caṇḍikataṃ gacchantaṃ disvā,
atk-s0401a:911_8: tvaṃ etadeva bhājanaṃ pūretvā ādāya gantvā therassa purato tiṭṭha.
atk-s0401a:911_18: Aparabhāge pana satthā devatānaṃ piyamanāpakāraṇameva vatthuṃ katvā theraṃ devatānaṃ piyamanāpānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:913_1: Aṭṭhame khippābhiññānanti khippaṃ adhigataabhiññānaṃ dārucīriyatthero aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:913_5: Bāhiyaraṭṭhe pana jātattā bāhiyotissa nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0401a:914_1: ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto dasabalassa dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:914_2: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ khippābhiññānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā
atk-s0401a:914_3: yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapadasabalassa sāsanassa osakkanakāle heṭṭhā vuttehi
atk-s0401a:914_4: bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā paripuṇṇasīlo jīvitakkhayaṃ patvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:915_0: So ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke vasitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bāhiyaraṭṭhe kulagehe nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:915_1: Vayaṃ āgamma gharāvāsaṃ vasanto “vohāraṃ karissāmī”ti suvaṇṇabhūmigamanīyaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0401a:915_2: Nāvā icchitaṃ desaṃ appatvāva samuddamajjhe bhinnā,
atk-s0401a:915_4: Ayaṃ pana ekaṃ dārukhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā sattame divase suppārakapaṭṭane uttiṇṇo manussāvāsaṃ patvā “acelakaniyāmena
atk-s0401a:915_5: manusse upasaṅkamituṃ ayutta”nti avidūre ṭhāne ekaṃ mahātaḷākā sevālaṃ gahetvā sarīraṃ veṭhetvā ekasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:915_6: ṭhāne patitaṃ ekaṃ kapālaṃ ādāya bhikkhāya pāvisi.
atk-s0401a:916_3: Kiṃ nu kho ayyo ukkaṭṭhabhāvena vatthaṃ na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0401a:916_4: udāhu diyyamānaṃ gaṇheyyā”ti vīmaṃsantā nānādisāhi vatthāni āhariṃsu.
atk-s0401a:916_8: yaṃkiñci katvā ime vañcetvā jīvikupāyaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatthāni na paṭiggaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:916_10: Sopi bhattakiccaṃ katvā avidūraṭṭhāne devakulaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:916_11: Mahājano tena saddhiṃyeva gantvā devakulaṃ paṭijaggitvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:916_13: “ime mayhaṃ sevāle nivāsanamatte pasīditvā evaṃvidhaṃ sakkāraṃ karonti,
atk-s0401a:916_14: etesaṃ mayā ukkaṭṭheneva bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sallahukāni rukkhaphalakāni gahetvā tacchetvā vākesu āvuṇitvā
atk-s0401a:916_15: cīraṃ katvā nivāsetvā pārupitvā jīvikaṃ kappento vasi.
atk-s0401a:917_0: Atha yo so kassapabuddhakāle sattasu janesu samaṇadhammaṃ karontesu eko bhikkhu suddhāvāsabrahmaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:917_1: So nibbattasamanantarameva attano brahmasampattiṃ oloketvā āgataṭṭhānaṃ āvajjento sattannaṃ janānaṃ pabbataṃ
atk-s0401a:917_2: āruyha samaṇadhammakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ disvā sesānaṃ channaṃ nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ āvajjento ekassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ
atk-s0401a:917_3: itaresaṃ pañcannaṃ kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbattabhāvaṃ ñatvā kālānukālaṃ te pañca jane āvajjeti.
atk-s0401a:917_4: Imasmiṃ pana kāle “kahaṃ nu kho”ti āvajjento dārucīriyaṃ suppārakapaṭṭanaṃ upanissāya kuhanakammena jīvikaṃ kappentaṃ disvā “naṭṭho vatāyaṃ bālo,
atk-s0401a:917_5: pubbe samaṇadhammaṃ karonto atiukkaṭṭhabhāvena arahatāpi ābhataṃ piṇḍapātaṃ aparibhuñjitvā idāni udaratthāya
atk-s0401a:917_6: anarahāva arahattaṃ paṭijānitvā lokaṃ vañcento vicarati,
atk-s0401a:917_8: gacchāmi naṃ saṃvejetvā dasabalassa nibbattabhāvaṃ jānāpemī”ti taṃkhaṇaṃyeva brahmalokato suppārakapaṭṭane
atk-s0401a:918_0: So attano vasanaṭṭhāne obhāsaṃ disvā bahi nikkhamitvā ṭhito mahābrahmaṃ oloketvā añjaliṃ paggayha “ke tumhe”ti pucchi.
atk-s0401a:918_1: Ahaṃ tuyhaṃ porāṇakasahāyo anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā brahmaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:918_2: Amhākaṃ pana sabbajeṭṭhako arahattaṃ patvā parinibbuto,
atk-s0401a:918_4: Svāhaṃ taṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne kuhanakammena jīvantaṃ disvā dametuṃ āgatoti vatvā idaṃ kāraṇamāha –
atk-s0401a:918_9: yāya tvaṃ arahā vā assa arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpanno”ti.
atk-s0401a:918_10: Athassa satthu uppannabhāvaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ vasanabhāvañca ācikkhitvā “satthu santikaṃ gacchāhī”ti taṃ uyyojetvā brahmalokameva agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:919_0: Dārucīriyo mahābrahmunā saṃvejito “mokkhamaggaṃ gavesissāmī”ti vīsayojanasataṃ maggaṃ ekarattivāsena
atk-s0401a:919_1: gantvā satthāraṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ antaraghare sampāpuṇitvā satthu pādesu nipatitvā “desetu me, bhante,
atk-s0401a:919_4: Satthā “ettāvatā bāhiyassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gata”nti ñatvā “tasmātiha te, bāhiya,
atk-s0401a:919_5: evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī”ti iminā ovādena ovadi.
atk-s0401a:919_6: Sopi desanāpariyosāne antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhitova desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:920_0: So attano kiccaṃ matthakappattaṃ ñatvā bhagavantaṃ pabbajjaṃ yācitvā aparipuṇṇapattacīvaratāya pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0401a:920_2: Atha naṃ pubbaveriko amanusso ekissā taruṇavacchāya gāviyā sarīre adhimuccitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0401a:920_3: Satthā sāvatthito nikkhamanto antaravīthiyaṃ bāhiyaṃ saṅkāraṭṭhāne patitaṃ disvā “gaṇhatha,
atk-s0401a:920_5: bāhiyassa dārucīriyassa sarīra”nti nīharāpetvā sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā cātumahāpathe cetiyaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0401a:920_14: bāhiyo”ti upari dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ pakāsesi.
atk-s0401a:920_15: Puna saṅghamajjhe kathā udapādi “na ca satthārā bāhiyassa bahu dhammo desito,
atk-s0401a:920_19: visapītakassa agado viya ceso”ti vatvā dhammapade gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:922_0: Ekaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammatī”ti. ;
atk-s0401a:923_1: Idañca pana bāhiyattherassa vatthu sutte āgatattā vitthārena na kathitaṃ.
atk-s0401a:923_2: Aparabhāge pana satthā saṅghamajjhe nisinno bāhiyattheraṃ khippābhiññānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:925_1: Navame cittakathikānanti vicittaṃ katvā dhammaṃ kathentānaṃ.
atk-s0401a:925_2: Thero kira ekassapi dvinnampi dhammaṃ kathento bahūhi upamāhi ca kāraṇehi ca maṇḍayitvā bodhento katheti.
atk-s0401a:926_1: ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā vayappatto dasabalassa
atk-s0401a:926_2: dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ cittakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:926_3: katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapabuddhasāsanosakkanakāle sattannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0401a:926_4: abbhantaro hutvā pabbatamatthake samaṇadhammaṃ katvā aparihīnasīlo tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ
atk-s0401a:926_5: buddhantaraṃ sampattiṃ anubhavamāno amhākaṃ satthu kāle rājagahe ekissā kuladārikāya kucchimhi uppanno.
atk-s0401a:926_6: Sā ca paṭhamaṃ mātāpitaro yācitvā pabbajjaṃ alabhamānā kulagharaṃ gatā gabbhaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:926_7: Tampi ajānantī sāmikaṃ ārādhetvā tena anuññātā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā.
atk-s0401a:926_8: Tassā gabbhanimittaṃ disvā bhikkhuniyo devadattaṃ pucchiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:926_12: Thero sāvatthinagaravāsīni kulāni visākhañca upāsikaṃ pakkosāpetvā sodhento “pure laddho gabbho,
atk-s0401a:927_2: kassapoti cassa nāmaṃ katvā aparabhāge alaṅkaritvā satthu santikaṃ netvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0401a:927_4: idaṃ phalaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā kassapassa dethā”ti vutte “katarakassapassāti.
atk-s0401a:927_5: Kumārakassapassā”ti evaṃ gahitanāmattā tato paṭṭhāya vuḍḍhakālepi kumārakassapotveva vuccati.
atk-s0401a:927_6: Apica rañño posāvanikaputtattāpi kumārakassapoti taṃ sañjāniṃsu.
atk-s0401a:928_0: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya vipassanāya ceva kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0401a:928_2: Atha so tena saddhiṃ pabbatamatthake samaṇadhammaṃ katvā anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā suddhāvāse nibbatto mahābrahmā
atk-s0401a:928_3: tasmiṃ samaye āvajjento kumārakassapaṃ disvā “sahāyako me vipassanāya kilamati,
atk-s0401a:928_4: gantvā tassa vipassanāya nayamukhaṃ dassetvā maggaphalapattiyā upāyaṃ karissāmī”ti brahmaloke ṭhitova
atk-s0401a:928_5: pañcadasa pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā rattibhāgasamanantare kumārakassapattherassa vasanaṭṭhāne andhavane pāturahosi.
atk-s0401a:928_7: “Ahaṃ pubbe tayā saddhiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā suddhāvāse nibbattabrahmā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:928_9: Mahābrahmā attano āgatakāraṇaṃ dīpetuṃ te pañhe ācikkhitvā “tvaṃ ime pañhe uggaṇhitvā aruṇe uṭṭhite tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā puccha,
atk-s0401a:928_10: ṭhapetvā hi tathāgataṃ añño ime pañhe kathetuṃ samattho nāma natthī”ti vatvā brahmalokameva gato.
atk-s0401a:929_0: Theropi punadivase satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā mahābrahmunā kathitaniyāmeneva pañhe pucchi.
atk-s0401a:929_1: Satthā kumārakassapattherassa arahattaṃ pāpetvā pañhe kathesi.
atk-s0401a:929_2: Thero satthārā kathitaniyāmeneva uggaṇhitvā andhavanaṃ gantvā vipassanaṃ gabbhaṃ gāhāpetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:929_3: Tato paṭṭhāya catunnaṃ parisānaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathento bahukāhi upamāhi ca kāraṇehi ca maṇḍetvā cittakathameva katheti.
atk-s0401a:929_4: Atha naṃ satthā pāyāsirañño pañcadasahi pañhehi paṭimaṇḍetvā suttante desite taṃ suttantaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ
atk-s0401a:929_5: katvā imasmiṃ sāsane cittakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:931_1: Dasame paṭisambhidāpattānanti catasso paṭisambhidā patvā ṭhitānaṃ mahākoṭṭhitatthero aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:931_2: Ayaṃ hi thero attano paṭisambhidāsu ciṇṇavasibhāvena abhiññāte abhiññāte mahāsāvake upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ
atk-s0401a:931_3: pucchantopi dasabalaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchantopi paṭisambhidāsuyeva pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0401a:931_4: Iti iminā ciṇṇavasibhāvena paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:932_1: ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare mahābhogakule nibbatto aparena samayena satthu dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0401a:932_2: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:932_4: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:932_6: So vayappatto tayo vede uggaṇhitvā ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:932_7: So upasampannakālato paṭṭhāya vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā niccakālaṃ
atk-s0401a:932_8: paṭisambhidāsu ciṇṇavasī hutvā pañhaṃ pucchanto paṭisambhidāsuyeva pucchati.
atk-s0401a:932_9: Atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge mahāvedallasuttaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā paṭisambhidāpattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:937_1: Catutthassa paṭhame bahussutānantiādīsu aññepi therā bahussutā satimantā gatimantā dhitimantā upaṭṭhākā ca atthi.
atk-s0401a:937_2: Ayaṃ panāyasmā buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhanto dasabalassa sāsane bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattiyaṃ ṭhatvā gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:937_4: Imasseva ca therassa buddhavacanaṃ gahetvā dhāraṇakasati aññehi therehi balavatarā ahosi,
atk-s0401a:937_6: Ayameva cāyasmā ekapade ṭhatvā saṭṭhi padasahassāni gaṇhanto satthārā kathitaniyāmeneva sabbapadāni jānāti,
atk-s0401a:937_8: Tasseva cāyasmato buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhanavīriyaṃ sajjhāyanavīriyañca dhāraṇavīriyañca satthu upaṭṭhānavīriyañca aññehi asadisaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0401a:937_10: Tathāgataṃ upaṭṭhahanto cesa na aññesaṃ upaṭṭhākabhikkhūnaṃ upaṭṭhānākārena upaṭṭhahi,
atk-s0401a:937_11: aññe hi tathāgataṃ upaṭṭhahantā na ciraṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:937_12: na ca buddhānaṃ manaṃ gahetvā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:937_13: Ayaṃ thero pana upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya āraddhavīriyo hutvā tathāgatassa manaṃ gahetvā upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0401a:938_1: ito kira satasahassamatthake kappe padumuttaro nāma satthā loke uppajji.
atk-s0401a:938_6: So puttassa jātadivase mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamma pabbajitvā padhānamanuyutto anukkamena sabbaññutaṃ
atk-s0401a:938_7: patvā “anekajātisaṃsāra”nti udānaṃ udānetvā sattāhaṃ bodhipallaṅke vītināmetvā “pathaviyaṃ ṭhapessāmī”ti
atk-s0401a:938_9: Atha pathaviṃ bhinditvā heṭṭhā vuttappamāṇaṃ padumaṃ uṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:938_11: Tassa devalo ca sujāto ca dve aggasāvakā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0401a:938_12: amitā ca asamā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0401a:938_14: Padumuttaro bhagavā pitu saṅgahaṃ kurumāno bhikkhusatasahassaparivāro haṃsavatiyā rājadhāniyā vasati.
atk-s0401a:939_1: Tassa rājā haṃsavatito vīsayojanasate bhogagāmaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:939_2: So kadāci kadāci āgantvā pitarañca satthārañca passati.
atk-s0401a:939_3: Athekadivasaṃ paccanto kupito sumano rañño pesesi.
atk-s0401a:939_4: Rājā “tvaṃ mayā tattha kasmā ṭhapito”ti paṭipesesi.
atk-s0401a:939_7: Rājā tuṭṭho “sīghaṃ mama putto āgacchatū”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:939_10: “mayhaṃ pitā tuṭṭho sace me varaṃ deti,
atk-s0401a:939_20: Tasmā deve varaṃ dadamāne temāsaṃ padumuttarabhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ varaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:939_24: evaṃ karissāmī”ti gantvā pitaraṃ vanditvā pitarā āliṅgetvā matthake cumbetvā “varaṃ te putta demī”ti vutte “icchāmahaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0401a:939_25: bhagavantaṃ temāsaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahanto jīvitaṃ avañjhaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0401a:939_26: imaṃ me deva varaṃ dehī”ti āha. Na sakkā, tāta,
atk-s0401a:939_34: ahaṃ bhagavato cittaṃ jānissāmī”ti vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:940_0: Tena ca samayena bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho hoti,
atk-s0401a:940_1: so maṇḍalamāḷe sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:940_8: icchiticchitakkhaṇe satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhāmāti. Ko pana, bhante,
atk-s0401a:940_12: Therassa nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā gantvā vanditvā “icchāmahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0401a:940_15: Thero passantasseva rājakumārassa āpokasiṇajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā mahāpathaviṃ udakaṃ adhiṭṭhāya pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0401a:940_17: Atha naṃ bhagavā “sumana kasmā āgatosī”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:940_21: Puna thero passantasseva rājakumārassa buddhāsanaṃ gahetvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ nimujjitvā bahipariveṇe pātubhavitvā pariveṇe āsanaṃ paññāpesi.
atk-s0401a:940_22: Rājakumāro imāni dve acchariyākārāni disvā “mahanto vatāyaṃ bhikkhū”ti cintesi.
atk-s0401a:941_0: Bhagavāpi gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:941_4: bhikkhū pana ‘na mayaṃ icchiticchitakkhaṇe bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhāmā’ti maṃ therassa santikaṃ pāhesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:941_5: Thero pana ekavacaneneva dasseti, thero, bhante,
atk-s0401a:941_8: vallabho esa bhikkhu mayhaṃ sāsaneti. Bhante,
atk-s0401a:941_9: buddhānaṃ sāsane kiṃ katvā vallabhā hontīti?
atk-s0401a:941_10: Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā kumārāti.
atk-s0401a:941_11: Bhagavā ahaṃ thero viya buddhasāsane vallabho hotukāmo,
atk-s0401a:941_14: Rājakumāro attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sabbarattiṃ mahāsakkāraṃ sajjetvā satta divasāni khandhāvārabhattaṃ nāma adāsi.
atk-s0401a:942_1: mayā pitu santikā temāsaṃ antovassaṃ tumhākaṃ paṭijagganavaro laddho,
atk-s0401a:942_3: Bhagavā “atthi nu kho tattha gatena attho”ti oloketvā “atthī”ti disvā “suññāgāre kho,
atk-s0401a:942_6: Kumāro “aññātaṃ bhagavā aññātaṃ sugatā”ti vatvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0401a:942_8: mayā pesite bhikkhusatasahassena saddhiṃ āgacchathā”ti bhagavantaṃ paṭiññaṃ gāhāpetvā pitu santikaṃ gantvā “dinnā me, deva,
atk-s0401a:942_10: mayā pahite bhagavantaṃ peseyyathā”ti vatvā pitaraṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā yojane yojane vihāraṃ kārento vīsayojanasataṃ addhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:942_11: Gantvā ca attano nagare vihāraṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto sobhananāmassa kuṭumbikassa uyyānaṃ disvā satasahassena
atk-s0401a:942_13: Tattha bhagavato gandhakuṭiṃ sesabhikkhūnañca rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānatthāya kuṭileṇamaṇḍape kāretvā pākāraparikkhepaṃ
atk-s0401a:943_0: Rājā bhagavantaṃ bhojetvā “bhagavā sumanassa kiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0401a:943_2: Bhagavā bhikkhusatasahassaparivuto yojane yojane vihāresu vasamāno agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:943_3: Kumāro “satthā āgacchatī”ti sutvā yojanaṃ paccuggantvā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamāno vihāraṃ pavesetvā –
atk-s0401a:946_1: So vassūpanāyikādivase dānaṃ datvā attano puttadāre ca amacce ca pakkosāpetvā āha –
atk-s0401a:946_3: buddhā ca nāma dhammagarukā na āmisacakkhukā.
atk-s0401a:946_4: Tasmā ahaṃ imaṃ temāsaṃ dve sāṭake nivāsetvā dasa sīlāni samādiyitvā idheva vasissāmi,
atk-s0401a:946_5: tumhe khīṇāsavasatasahassassa imināva nīhārena temāsaṃ dānaṃ dadeyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0401a:947_0: So sumanattherassa vasanaṭṭhānasabhāgeyeva ṭhāne vasanto yaṃ thero bhagavato vattaṃ karoti,
atk-s0401a:947_1: taṃ sabbaṃ disvā “imasmiṃ ṭhāne ekantavallabho esa thero,
atk-s0401a:947_2: etasseva me ṭhānantaraṃ patthetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā upakaṭṭhāya pavāraṇāya gāmaṃ pavisitvā sattāhaṃ
atk-s0401a:947_3: mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase bhikkhusatasahassassa pādamūle ticīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā,  “bhante,
atk-s0401a:947_4: yadetaṃ mayā sattāhaṃ khandhāvāradānato paṭṭhāya puññaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0401a:947_8: Tasmā ahampi bhagavā anāgate sumanatthero viya ekassa buddhassa upaṭṭhāko homī”ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena patiṭṭhahitvā vandi.
atk-s0401a:947_9: Satthā tassa anantarāyaṃ disvā byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:947_10: Kumāro taṃ sutvā “buddhā ca nāma advejjhakathā hontī”ti dutiyadivase gotamabuddhassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gacchanto viya ahosi.
atk-s0401a:948_0: So tasmiṃ buddhuppāde vassasatasahassaṃ dānaṃ datvā sagge nibbattitvā kassapabuddhakāle piṇḍāya carato
atk-s0401a:948_1: therassa pattaggahaṇatthaṃ uttarisāṭakaṃ datvā pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:948_2: Puna sagge nibbattitvā tato cuto bārāṇasirājā hutvā uparipāsādavaragato gandhamādanato ākāsena āgacchante
atk-s0401a:948_3: aṭṭha paccekabuddhe disvā nimantāpetvā bhojetvā attano maṅgalauyyāne tesaṃ aṭṭha paṇṇasālāyo kāretvā
atk-s0401a:948_4: tesaṃ nisīdanatthāya attano nivesane aṭṭha sabbaratanamayāni pīṭhāni ceva maṇiādhārake ca paṭiyādetvā
atk-s0401a:949_0: Kappasatasahassaṃ pana dānaṃ dadamānova amhākaṃ bodhisattena saddhiṃ tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cuto amitodanasakkassa gehe nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:949_1: Athassa sabbeva ñātake ānandite pamudite karonto jātoti ānandotveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:949_2: So anupubbena katābhinikkhamane sammāsambodhiṃ patvā paṭhamagamanena kapilavatthuṃ āgantvā tato nikkhante
atk-s0401a:949_3: bhagavati bhagavato parivāratthaṃ rājakumāresu pabbajantesu bhaddiyādīhi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā bhagavato
atk-s0401a:949_4: santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva āyasmato puṇṇassa mantāṇiputtassa santike dhammakathaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale
atk-s0401a:950_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavato paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsati vassāni anibaddhā upaṭṭhākā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:950_1: Ekadā nāgasamālo pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vicari ekadā nāgito,
atk-s0401a:950_8: Tattha ekadā bhagavā nāgasamālattherena saddhiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno dvedhāpathaṃ patto.
atk-s0401a:950_9: Thero maggā okkamma “bhagavā ahaṃ iminā maggena gacchāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:950_13: ahaṃ iminā maggena gacchāmī”ti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0401a:950_14: Atha naṃ bhagavā “āhara bhikkhū”ti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā gato.
atk-s0401a:950_15: Tassapi bhikkhuno itarena maggena gacchato corā pattacīvarañceva hariṃsu,
atk-s0401a:950_18: na añño”ti cintetvā lohitena galantena bhagavato santikaṃ āgami.
atk-s0401a:950_19: “Kimidaṃ bhikkhū”ti ca vutte taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0401a:950_21: etassa kāraṇāyeva taṃ nivārayimhā”ti vatvā samassāsesi.
atk-s0401a:951_0: Ekadā pana bhagavā meghiyattherena saddhiṃ pācīnavaṃse migadāye jantugāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:951_1: Tatrāpi meghiyo jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā nadītīre pāsādikaṃ ambavanaṃ disvā “bhagavā tumhākaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-s0401a:951_2: ahaṃ tasmiṃ ambavane samaṇadhammaṃ karomī”ti vatvā bhagavatā tikkhattuṃ nivāriyamānopi gantvā akusalavitakkehi
atk-s0401a:951_4: Tampi bhagavā “imameva te kāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā nivārayimhā”ti vatvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:951_5: Tattha gandhakuṭipariveṇe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto bhikkhū āmantesi –
atk-s0401a:951_8: ‘ekacce bhikkhū iminā maggena gacchāmā’ti vutte aññena gacchanti,
atk-s0401a:951_12: Athāyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0401a:951_13: tumheyeva patthayamāno satasahassakappādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pāramiyo pūrayiṃ,
atk-s0401a:951_14: nanu mādiso mahāpañño upaṭṭhāko nāma vaṭṭati,
atk-s0401a:951_21: tena me tayā upaṭṭhākakiccaṃ atthī”ti paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0401a:951_22: Eteneva upāyena mahāmoggallānaṃ ādiṃ katvā asīti mahāsāvakā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:952_18: Thero uṭṭhahitvā cattāro paṭikkhepā catasso ca āyācanāti aṭṭha vare yāci.
atk-s0401a:953_1: bhagavā attanā laddhaṃ paṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ na dassati,
atk-s0401a:953_5: evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti vatvā “kaṃ panettha, ānanda,
atk-s0401a:953_8: bhavissanti vattāro ‘ānando dasabalena laddhaṃ paṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjati,
atk-s0401a:954_2: sacāhaṃ tiroraṭṭhā tirojanapadā bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgataṃ parisaṃ āgatakkhaṇeyeva bhagavantaṃ dassetuṃ lacchāmi,
atk-s0401a:954_5: tathā yaṃ bhagavā mayhaṃ parammukhe dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0401a:954_7: evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti vatvā “kaṃ panettha, ānanda,
atk-s0401a:954_9: saddhā kulaputtā bhagavato okāsaṃ alabhantā maṃ evaṃ vadanti ‘sve,
atk-s0401a:954_11: bhagavatā saddhiṃ amhākaṃ ghare bhikkhaṃ gaṇheyyāthā’ti.
atk-s0401a:954_25: kasmā tvaṃ chāyā viya bhagavantaṃ avijahanto dīgharattaṃ vicarasī’ti.
atk-s0401a:954_26: Tenāhaṃ parammukhā desitassapi dhammassa puna kathanaṃ icchāmī”ti.
atk-s0401a:955_0: Evaṃ ime aṭṭha vare gahetvā nibaddhupaṭṭhāko ahosi.
atk-s0401a:955_1: Tasseva ṭhānantarassa atthāya kappasatasahassaṃ pūritānaṃ pāramīnaṃ phalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:955_2: So upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhadivasato paṭṭhāya dasabalassa duvidhena udakena tividhena dantakaṭṭhena hatthapādaparikammena
atk-s0401a:955_3: piṭṭhiparikammena gandhakuṭipariveṇaṃ sammajjanenāti evamādīhi kiccehi upaṭṭhahanto “imāya nāma velāya
atk-s0401a:955_5: idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti divasabhāgaṃ santikāvacaro hutvā rattibhāgasamanantare daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0401a:955_9: dasabale pakkosante paṭivacanaṃ dātuṃ na sakkuṇeyya”nti.
atk-s0401a:955_10: Tasmā sabbarattiṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ hatthena na muñcati.
atk-s0401a:955_12: Aparabhāge pana satthā jetavane viharanto anekapariyāyena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaānandattherassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0401a:955_13: theraṃ imasmiṃ sāsane bahussutānaṃ satimantānaṃ gatimantānaṃ dhitimantānaṃ upaṭṭhākānañca bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0401a:957_1: Dutiye mahāparisānanti mahāparivārānaṃ uruvelakassapo aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:957_2: Aññesañhi therānaṃ kañci kālaṃ parivāro mahā hoti kañci kālaṃ appo,
atk-s0401a:957_3: imassa pana therassa dvīhi bhātikehi saddhiṃ ekaṃ samaṇasahassaṃ nibaddhaparivārova ahosi.
atk-s0401a:957_4: Tesu ekekasmiṃ ekekaṃ pabbājente dve samaṇasahassāni honti,
atk-s0401a:957_5: dve dve pabbājente tīṇi sahassāni honti.
atk-s0401a:957_6: Tasmā so mahāparivārānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:958_1: ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā vayappatto satthu dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0401a:958_2: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ mahāparisānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā “mayāpi anāgate evarūpena bhavituṃ
atk-s0401a:958_3: vaṭṭatī”ti sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā ticīvarena acchādetvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:958_5: Satthā anantarāyaṃ disvā anāgate gotamabuddhassa sāsane mahāparisānaṃ aggo bhavissatī”ti byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:959_0: Sopi kulaputto yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto ito dvenavutikappamatthake phussabuddhassa
atk-s0401a:959_4: Evaṃ te tayo bhātaro visuṃ visuṃ ṭhānantaraṃ labhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:959_5: Te heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva kupitaṃ paccantaṃ vūpasametvā pitu santikā varaṃ labhitvā “temāsaṃ dasabalaṃ paṭijaggissāmā”ti varaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:959_7: “amhehi dasabalaṃ paṭijaggantehi anucchavikaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ekaṃ amaccaṃ uppādakaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā ekaṃ
atk-s0401a:959_8: āyavayajānanakaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa parivesakaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attanā dasa
atk-s0401a:959_10: Te tayo amaccā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bimbisāravisākharaṭṭhapālā jātā.
atk-s0401a:960_0: Te pana rājakumārā vutthavasse dasabale sahatthā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paccayapūjāya pūjetvā
atk-s0401a:960_1: yāvajīvaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā amhākaṃ dasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva brāhamaṇakule nibbattitvā attano
atk-s0401a:960_2: gottavasena tayopi janā kassapā eva nāma jātā.
atk-s0401a:960_4: Tesaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikassa pañca māṇavakasatāni parivāro ahosi,
atk-s0401a:960_7: Te attano ganthe sāraṃ olokentā diṭṭhadhammikameva passiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:960_9: Atha nesaṃ jeṭṭhabhātā attano parivārena saddhiṃ uruvelaṃ gantvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā uruvelakassapo nāma jāto,
atk-s0401a:961_0: Evaṃ tesu isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tattha vasantesu bahūnaṃ divasānaṃ accayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0401a:961_1: nikkhamitvā paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo anukkamena dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā pañcavaggiye there arahatte
atk-s0401a:961_2: patiṭṭhāpetvā yasadārakappamukhe pañcapaññāsa sahāyakepi vinetvā saṭṭhi arahante “caratha,
atk-s0401a:961_4: cārika”nti bahujanahitāya cārikaṃ pesetvā bhaddavaggiye vinetvā uruvelakassapassa hetuṃ disvā “mayi gate
atk-s0401a:961_5: tayo bhātikā saparivārā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissantī”ti ñatvā ekako adutiyo uruvelakassapassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:961_6: gantvā vasanatthāya agyāgāraṃ yācitvā tattha kataṃ nāgadamanaṃ ādiṃ katvā aḍḍhuḍḍhasahassehi pāṭihāriyehi
atk-s0401a:961_8: Tassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ ñatvā itarepi dve bhātaro saparivārā āgantvā pabbajiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:962_0: Satthā taṃ samaṇasahassaṃ ādāya gayāsīsaṃ gantvā piṭṭhipāsāṇe nisinno “kathaṃrūpā nu kho etesaṃ dhammadesanā
atk-s0401a:962_2: imesaṃ tayo bhave ādittāgārasadise katvā dassetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ādittapariyāyasuttaṃ desesi.
atk-s0401a:962_4: Satthā tehi parivuto pubbe bimbisārarañño dinnapaṭiññattā rājagahanagare laṭṭhivanuyyānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:962_5: Rājā dasabalassa āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā dvādasanahutehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:962_6: Satthā sabbāvantaṃ parisaṃ oloketvā mahājanaṃ uruvelakassapassa nipaccakāraṃ karontaṃ disvā “ime mayhaṃ vā kassapassa vā mahantabhāvaṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0401a:962_7: savitakkā ca nāma desanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ na sakkontī”ti cintetvā, “kassapa,
atk-s0401a:962_8: tuyhaṃ upaṭṭhākānaṃ vitakkaṃ chindā”ti therassa saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:962_9: Thero satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā satthāraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā tālappamāṇaṃ ākāsaṃ
atk-s0401a:962_10: uppatitvā iddhivikubbanaṃ dassetvā “satthā me, bhante, bhagavā,
atk-s0401a:962_13: sāvakohamasmī”ti vatvā oruyha dasabalassa pāde vandi.
atk-s0401a:962_14: Etenupāyena sattame vāre sattatālappamāṇaṃ ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā puna āgantvā dasabalassa pāde vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:963_0: Tasmiṃ kāle mahājano “ayaṃ loke mahāsamaṇo”ti satthari nibbitakko jāto,
atk-s0401a:963_2: Desanāpariyosāne rājā ekādasanahutehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0401a:963_4: Tepi uruvelakassapassa parivārā sahassamattā bhikkhū attano āsevanavasena cintesuṃ –
atk-s0401a:963_6: bahi gantvā kiṃ karissāmā”ti uruvelakassapattheraṃyeva parivāretvā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0401a:963_7: Tesu ekekasmiṃ ekekaṃ nissitakaṃ gaṇhante dve sahassāni honti,
atk-s0401a:963_8: dve dve gaṇhante tīṇi sahassāni honti.
atk-s0401a:963_12: Aparabhāge pana satthā jetavane viharanto theraṃ mahāparisānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:965_2: Ayaṃ hi thero adiṭṭhabuddhadassanaṃyeva suddhodanamahārājassa nivesanaṃ pasādesi,
atk-s0401a:966_1: ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:966_2: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ kulappasādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:966_3: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ bodhisattassa mātukucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase
atk-s0401a:966_5: Jātadivase bodhisattena saddhiṃyeva jātoti taṃdivasaṃyeva taṃ dukūlacumbuṭake nipajjāpetvā bodhisattassa upaṭṭhānatthāya nayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:966_6: Bodhisattena hi saddhiṃ bodhirukkho rāhulamātā catasso nidhikumbhiyo ārohaniyahatthī kaṇḍako channo kāḷudāyīti
atk-s0401a:966_7: ime satta ekadivase jātattā sahajātā nāma ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:966_8: Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase sakalanagarassa udaggacittadivase jātoti udāyītveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:966_9: Thokaṃ kāḷadhātukattā pana kāḷudāyī nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:966_10: So bodhisattena saddhiṃ kumārakīḷaṃ kīḷanto vuddhiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:967_0: Aparabhāge bodhisatto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā anukkamena sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko
atk-s0401a:967_2: Tasmiṃ samaye suddhodanamahārājā “siddhatthakumāro abhisambodhiṃ patvā rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane
atk-s0401a:967_3: viharatī”ti sutvā purisasahassaparivāraṃ ekaṃ amaccaṃ “puttaṃ me idha ānehī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0401a:967_4: So saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ gantvā dasabalassa catuparisamajjhe nisīditvā dhammadesanāvelāya vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0401a:967_5: So “tiṭṭhatu tāva raññā pahitasāsana”nti parisapariyante ṭhito satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yathāṭhitova saddhiṃ purisasahassehi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:967_6: Atha nesaṃ satthā “etha bhikkhavo”ti hatthaṃ pasāresi,
atk-s0401a:967_7: sabbe taṃkhaṇaṃyeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:967_8: Arahattaṃ pattakālato paṭṭhāya pana ariyā nāma majjhattāva hontīti raññā pahitasāsanaṃ dasabalassa na kathesi.
atk-s0401a:967_11: tvaṃ gacchā”ti teneva niyāmena aññaṃ amaccaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0401a:967_12: Sopi gantvā purimanayeneva saddhiṃ parisāya arahattaṃ patvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0401a:967_13: Evaṃ navahi amaccehi saddhiṃ nava purisasahassāni pesesi.
atk-s0401a:967_14: Sabbe attano kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā tuṇhī ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:968_1: “ettakā janā mayi sinehābhāvena dasabalassa idhāgamanatthāya na kiñci kathayiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:968_2: aññe gantvāpi dasabalaṃ ānetuṃ na sakkhissanti.
atk-s0401a:968_3: Mayhaṃ kho pana putto udāyī dasabalena saddhiṃ ekavayo sahapaṃsukīḷiko,
atk-s0401a:968_4: mayi cassa sineho atthī”ti kāḷudāyiṃ pakkosāpetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0401a:968_6: Paṭhamaṃ gatapurisā viya pabbajituṃ labhanto ānessāmi, devāti.
atk-s0401a:968_8: devā”ti rañño sāsanaṃ ādāya rājagahaṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanāvelāya parisapariyante ṭhito dhammaṃ
atk-s0401a:968_9: sutvā saparivāro arahattaphalaṃ patvā ehibhikkhubhāve patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:968_11: “na tāva dasabalassa kulanagaraṃ gantuṃ esa kālo,
atk-s0401a:968_12: vasantasamaye supupphitesu vanasaṇḍesu haritatiṇasañchannāya pathaviyā esa kālo bhavissatī”ti kālaṃ paṭimānento tassa kālassa āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā –
atk-s0401a:970_0: Saddalā haritā bhūmi, esa kālo mahāmunī”ti. –
atk-s0401a:971_0: Saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi dasabalassa kulanagaraṃ gamanatthāya gamanavaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0401a:971_2: kapilavatthunagaraṃ gantuṃ esa kālo”ti vīsatisahassabhikkhuparivāro aturitagamanena cārikaṃ nikkhami.
atk-s0401a:972_0: Udāyitthero satthu nikkhantabhāvaṃ ñatvā “pitu mahārājassa saññaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā rañño nivesane pāturahosi.
atk-s0401a:972_1: Suddhodanamahārājā theraṃ disvā tuṭṭhacitto mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā attano paṭiyāditassa nānaggarasabhojanassa pattaṃ pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:972_9: Tumhe imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā yāva mama putto imaṃ nagaraṃ sampāpuṇāti,
atk-s0401a:972_11: Thero bhattakiccaṃ katvā dasabalassa āharitabbaṃ bhattaṃ gahetvā dhammakathaṃ kathetvā dasabalassa adassaneneva
atk-s0401a:972_12: sakalarājanivesanaṃ saddhāpaṭilābhaṃ labhāpetvā sabbesaṃ passantānaññeva pattaṃ ākāse vissajjetvā sayampi
atk-s0401a:972_13: vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya satthu hatthe ṭhapesi,
atk-s0401a:972_15: Thero saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ yojanaparamaṃ gacchantassa satthuno divase divase rājagehato bhattaṃ āharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:972_17: Atha aparabhāge satthā “mayhaṃ pitu mahārājassa sakalanivesanaṃ pasādesī”ti theraṃ kulappasādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:974_0: 226. Catutthe appābādhānanti nirābādhānaṃ. Bākuloti dvīsu kulesu vaḍḍhitattā evaṃladdhanāmo thero.
atk-s0401a:975_1: ayaṃ kira atīte ito kappasatasahassādhike asaṅkhyeyyamatthake anomadassidasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva
atk-s0401a:975_2: brāhmaṇakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā vayaṃ āgamma uggahitavedo vedattaye sāraṃ apassanto “samparāyikatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:975_5: Tasmiṃ samaye anomadassī bodhisatto sabbaññutaṃ patvā ariyagaṇaparivuto cārikaṃ carati.
atk-s0401a:975_6: Tāpaso “tīṇi ratanāni uppannānī”ti sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā desanāpariyosāne saraṇesu patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0401a:975_8: So kālena kālaṃ satthu dassanāya ceva gacchati,
atk-s0401a:976_1: Tāpaso satthu dassanatthāya āgato “satthā gilāno”ti sutvā “ko, bhante,
atk-s0401a:976_3: “Udaravāto”ti vutte “ayaṃ kālo mayhaṃ puññaṃ kātu”nti pabbatapādaṃ gantvā nānāvidhāni bhesajjāni samodhānetvā
atk-s0401a:976_7: yadidaṃ mama bhesajjena tathāgatassa phāsukaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0401a:976_8: tassa me nissandena nibbattanibbattabhave gaddūhanamattampi sarīre byādhi nāma mā hotū”ti.
atk-s0401a:977_0: So tato cuto brahmaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto padumuttarabuddhakāle
atk-s0401a:977_1: haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ appābādhānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ
atk-s0401a:977_2: disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:977_3: So yāvatāyukaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto vipassīdasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva bandhumatīnagare
atk-s0401a:977_4: brāhmaṇakule nibbatto purimanayeneva isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā jhānalābhī hutvā pabbatapāde vasati.
atk-s0401a:978_0: Vipassībodhisattopi sabbaññutaṃ patvā aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassaparivāro bandhumatīnagaraṃ upanissāya
atk-s0401a:978_1: pitu mahārājassa saṅgahaṃ karonto kheme migadāye viharati.
atk-s0401a:978_2: Athāyaṃ tāpaso dasabalassa loke nibbattabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgantvā satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0401a:978_4: kālena kālaṃ pana satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0401a:979_0: Athekasmiṃ samaye ṭhapetvā satthārañceva dve aggasāvake ca himavati pupphitānaṃ visarukkhānaṃ vātasamphassena
atk-s0401a:979_2: Tāpaso satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ āgato bhikkhū sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nipanne disvā – “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0401a:979_6: “ayaṃ kālo mayhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa kāyaveyyāvatikakammaṃ katvā puññaṃ nibbattetu”nti attano ānubhāvena
atk-s0401a:980_0: So yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā brahmaloke nibbattitvā ekanavutikappe devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapabuddhakāle
atk-s0401a:980_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto gharāvāsaṃ vasanto “mayhaṃ vasanagehaṃ dubbalaṃ,
atk-s0401a:980_2: paccantaṃ gantvā dabbasambhāraṃ āharitvā gehaṃ karissāmī”ti vaḍḍhakīhi saddhiṃ gacchanto antarāmagge
atk-s0401a:980_3: ekaṃ jiṇṇaṃ mahāvihāraṃ disvā “tiṭṭhatu tāva mayhaṃ gehakammaṃ,
atk-s0401a:980_5: yaṃkiñci katvā pana saddhiṃ gamanakammameva puretaraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti teheva vaḍḍhakīhi dabbasambhāraṃ gāhāpetvā tasmiṃ vihāre uposathāgāraṃ kāresi,
atk-s0401a:980_6: bhojanasālaṃ aggisālaṃ dīghacaṅkamaṃ jantāgharaṃ kappiyakuṭiṃ vaccakuṭiṃ ārogyasālaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0401a:980_7: yaṃkiñci bhikkhusaṅghassa upabhogaparibhogaṃ bhesajjaṃ nāma sabbaṃ paṭiyādetvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:981_0: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ dasabalassa nibbattito
atk-s0401a:981_2: Tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇadivasato paṭṭhāya taṃ seṭṭhikulaṃ lābhaggayasaggappattaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0401a:981_5: yattakaṃ kālaṃ arogo dīghāyuko hutvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0401a:981_7: Jātadivaseyeva mahāyamunāya nhātadārakā nirogā hontī”ti nhāpanatthāya naṃ pesesi.
atk-s0401a:981_8: “Pañcame divase sīsaṃ nhāpetvā nadīkīḷanatthāya naṃ pesesī”ti majjhimabhāṇakā.
atk-s0401a:981_9: Tattha dhātiyā dārakaṃ nimujjanummujjanavasena kīḷāpentiyā eko maccho dārakaṃ disvā “bhakkho me aya”nti maññamāno mukhaṃ vivaritvā upagato.
atk-s0401a:981_14: Maccho dārakassa tejena tattaphālaṃ gilitvā ḍayhamāno viya vegena tiṃsayojanaṃ gantvā bārāṇasinagaravāsino macchabandhassa jālaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0401a:981_15: Mahāmacchā nāma jālena baddhā māriyamānāva maranti,
atk-s0401a:981_16: ayaṃ pana dārakassa tejena jālato nīhaṭamattova mato.
atk-s0401a:981_17: Macchabandhā ca mahāmacchaṃ labhitvā phāletvā vikkiṇanti,
atk-s0401a:981_18: taṃ pana dārakassa ānubhāvena aphāletvā sakalameva kājena haritvā “sahassena demā”ti vadantā nagare vicariṃsu,
atk-s0401a:982_0: Tasmiṃ pana nagare aputtakaṃ asītikoṭivibhavaṃ seṭṭhikulaṃ atthi.
atk-s0401a:982_1: Tassa dvāramūlaṃ patvā “kiṃ gahetvā dethā”ti vuttā “kahāpaṇa”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:982_3: Seṭṭhibhariyāpi aññesu divasesu macche na keḷāyati,
atk-s0401a:982_4: taṃdivasaṃ pana macchaṃ phalake ṭhapetvā sayameva phālesi.
atk-s0401a:982_6: sā pana piṭṭhito phālentī macchakucchiyaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ dārakaṃ disvā “macchakucchiyaṃ me putto laddho”ti
atk-s0401a:982_7: nādaṃ naditvā dārakaṃ ādāya sāmikassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:982_8: Seṭṭhi tāvadeva bheriṃ carāpetvā dārakamādāya rañño santikaṃ gantvā “macchakucchiyaṃ me, deva,
atk-s0401a:983_0: Assosi kho itaraṃ kulaṃ “bārāṇasiyaṃ kira ekaṃ seṭṭhikulaṃ macchakucchiyaṃ dārakaṃ labhī”ti.
atk-s0401a:983_2: Athassa mātā dārakaṃ alaṅkaritvā kīḷāpiyamānaṃ disvā “manāpo vatāyaṃ dārako”ti gahetvā pakatiṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0401a:983_10: atha naṃ nadiyā kīḷāpiyamānaṃ maccho gilīti.
atk-s0401a:983_11: Tuyhaṃ putto aññena macchena gilito bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:983_12: ayaṃ pana mayā macchakucchiyaṃ laddhoti ubhopi rājakulaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:983_14: “ayaṃ dasa māse kucchiyā dhāritattā amātā kātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0401a:983_15: macchaṃ gaṇhantāpi vakkayakanādīni bahi katvā gaṇhantā nāma natthīti macchakucchiyaṃ laddhattā ayampi amātā kātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0401a:983_17: Tato paṭṭhāya dvepi kulāni ativiya lābhaggayasaggappattāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:983_18: Tassa dvīhi kulehi vaḍḍhitattā bākulakumāroti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0401a:984_0: Tassa viññutaṃ pattassa dvīsupi nagaresu tayo tayo pāsāde kāretvā nāṭakāni paccupaṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:984_1: Ekekasmiṃ nagare cattāro cattāro māse vasati.
atk-s0401a:984_2: Ekasmiṃ nagare cattāro māse vutthassa saṅghāṭanāvāsu maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā tattha naṃ saddhiṃ nāṭakehi āropenti.
atk-s0401a:984_3: So sampattiṃ anubhavamāno catūhi māsehi itaraṃ nagaraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0401a:984_4: Taṃnagaravāsīni nāṭakāni “dvīhi māsehi upaḍḍhamaggaṃ āgato bhavissatī”ti paccuggantvā taṃ parivāretvā dvīhi māsehi attano nagaraṃ nenti,
atk-s0401a:984_5: itarāni nāṭakāni nivattitvā attano nagarameva gacchanti.
atk-s0401a:984_6: Tattha cattāro māse vasitvā teneva niyāmena puna itaraṃ nagaraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0401a:984_7: Evamassa sampattiṃ anubhavantassa asīti vassāni paripuṇṇāni.
atk-s0401a:985_0: Tasmiṃ samaye amhākaṃ bodhisatto sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anukkamena cārikaṃ caramāno kosambiṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0401a:985_2: Bākulo seṭṭhipi kho “dasabalo āgato”ti sutvā bahuṃ gandhamālaṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:985_3: So sattāhameva puthujjano hutvā aṭṭhame aruṇe saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:985_4: Athassa dvīsu nagaresu gihikāle paricārikamātugāmā attano kulagharāni āgantvā tattha vasamānā cīvarāni katvā pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:985_5: Thero ekaṃ addhamāsaṃ kosambivāsikehi pahitaṃ cīvaraṃ bhuñjati,
atk-s0401a:985_7: Eteneva niyāmena dvīsupi nagaresu yaṃ yaṃ uttamaṃ,
atk-s0401a:985_9: Therassa asīti vassāni agāramajjhe vasantassa dvīhaṅgulehi gandhapiṇḍaṃ gahetvā upasiṅghanamattampi kālaṃ na koci ābādho nāma ahosi.
atk-s0401a:985_11: Pabbajitassāpissa appamattakopi ābādho vā catūhi paccayehi vekallaṃ vā nāhosi.
atk-s0401a:985_12: So pacchime kāle parinibbānasamayepi purāṇagihisahāyakassa acelakassapassa attano kāyikacetasikasukhadīpanavaseneva
atk-s0401a:985_13: sakalaṃ bākulasuttaṃ kathetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0401a:985_15: Satthā pana therassa dharamānakāleyeva there yathā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapento bākulattheraṃ imasmiṃ sāsane appābādhānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:987_1: Pañcame pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantānanti pubbe nivutthakkhandhasantānaṃ anussaraṇasamatthānaṃ sobhitatthero aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:987_2: So kira pubbenivāsaṃ anupaṭipāṭiyā anussaramāno pañca kappasatāni asaññibhave acittakapaṭisandhiṃ nayato aggahesi ākāse padaṃ dassento viya.
atk-s0401a:987_3: Tasmā pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:988_1: ayampi kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā vayappatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:988_2: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ pubbenivāsañāṇalābhīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:988_4: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0401a:989_0: So aparena samayena satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā pubbenivāsañāṇe ciṇṇavasī ahosi.
atk-s0401a:989_1: So anupaṭipāṭiyā attano nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ anussaranto yāva asaññibhave acittakapaṭisandhi,
atk-s0401a:989_3: Tato paraṃ antare pañca kappasatāni pavattiṃ adisvā avasāne cutiṃ disvā “kiṃ nāmeta”nti āvajjamāno nayavasena
atk-s0401a:989_5: Satthā imaṃ kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:991_1: Chaṭṭhe vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālīti vinayadharānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upālitthero aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:991_2: Thero kira tathāgatasseva santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:991_5: kumārakassapavatthunti imāni tīṇi vatthūni sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsandetvā kathesi.
atk-s0401a:992_1: padumuttarabuddhakāle kiresa haṃsavatiyaṃ kulaghare nibbatto ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:992_2: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:992_3: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kappakagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0401a:992_5: So vayappatto channaṃ khattiyānaṃ pasādhako hutvā tathāgate anupiyambavane viharante pabbajjatthāya nikkhamantehi
atk-s0401a:992_6: teti chahi khattiyehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:993_0: So pabbajitvā upasampanno satthāraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā “mayhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0401a:993_2: Bhikkhu tava araññe vasantassa ekameva dhuraṃ vaḍḍhissati,
atk-s0401a:993_3: amhākaṃ pana santike vasantassa vipassanādhurañca ganthadhurañca paripūressatīti.
atk-s0401a:993_4: Thero satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā vipassanāya kammaṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:993_5: Atha naṃ satthā sayameva sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ uggaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0401a:993_6: So aparabhāge heṭṭhā vuttāni tīṇi vatthūni vinicchini.
atk-s0401a:993_7: Satthā ekekasmiṃ vinicchite sādhukāraṃ datvā tayopi vinicchaye aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:995_1: Sattame bhikkhunovādakānaṃ yadidaṃ nandakoti ayaṃ hi thero dhammakathaṃ kathento ekasamodhāne pañca bhikkhunīsatāni arahattaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0401a:996_1: ayañhi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe nibbatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:996_2: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhunovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:996_3: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0401a:996_4: gahetvā vayappatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho satthu santike pabbajitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0401a:996_7: So catūsu parisāsu sampattāsu “sabbesaṃyeva manaṃ gahetvā kathetuṃ sakkotī”ti dhammakathikanandako nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:996_8: Tathāgatopi kho rohiṇīnadītīre cumbaṭakakalahe nikkhamitvā pabbajitānaṃ pañcannaṃ sākiyakumārasatānaṃ
atk-s0401a:996_9: anabhiratiyā uppannāya te bhikkhū ādāya kuṇāladahaṃ gantvā kuṇālajātakakathāya nesaṃ saṃviggabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0401a:996_11: Aparabhāge mahāsamayasuttaṃ kathetvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0401a:996_12: Tesaṃ therānaṃ purāṇadutiyikā “amhe dāni idha kiṃ karissāmā”ti vatvā sabbāva ekacittā hutvā mahāpajāpatiṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0401a:996_13: Tāpi pañcasatā theriyā santike pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:996_14: Atītānantarāya pana jātiyā sabbāva tā nandakattherassa rājaputtabhāve ṭhitassa pādaparicārikā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:997_0: Tena samayena satthā “bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantū”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:997_1: Thero attano vāre sampatte tāsaṃ purimabhave attano pādaparicārikabhāvaṃ ñatvā cintesi –
atk-s0401a:997_2: “maṃ imassa bhikkhunīsaṅghassa majjhe nisinnaṃ upamāyo ca kāraṇāni ca āharitvā dhammaṃ kathayamānaṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:997_3: añño pubbenivāsañāṇalābhī bhikkhu imaṃ kāraṇaṃ oloketvā ‘āyasmā nandako yāvajjadivasā orodhe na vissajjeti,
atk-s0401a:997_5: Tasmā sayaṃ agantvā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ pesesi.
atk-s0401a:997_6: Tā pana pañcasatā bhikkhuniyo therasseva ovādaṃ paccāsīsanti.
atk-s0401a:997_7: Iminā kāraṇena bhagavā “attano vāre sampatte aññaṃ apesetvā sayameva gantvā bhikkhunīsaṅghaṃ ovadāhī”ti theraṃ āha.
atk-s0401a:997_8: So satthu kathaṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkonto attano vāre sampatte cātuddase bhikkhunisaṅghassa ovādaṃ datvā
atk-s0401a:997_9: sabbāva tā bhikkhuniyo saḷāyatanapaṭimaṇḍitāya dhammadesanāya sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0401a:998_0: Tā bhikkhuniyo therassa dhammadesanāya attamanā hutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā attano paṭividdhaguṇaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:998_1: Satthā “kasmiṃ nu kho dhammaṃ desente imā bhikkhuniyo uparimaggaphalāni pāpuṇeyyu”nti āvajjento puna
atk-s0401a:998_2: “taṃyeva nandakassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pañcasatāpi etā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissantī”ti disvā punadivasepi
atk-s0401a:998_4: Tā punadivase dhammaṃ sutvā sabbāva arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0401a:998_5: Taṃdivasaṃ bhagavā tāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ attano santikaṃ āgatakāle dhammadesanāya saphalabhāvaṃ ñatvā “hiyyo
atk-s0401a:998_7: ajja pannarasiyaṃ candasadisī”ti vatvā therassa sādhukāraṃ datvā tadeva ca kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theraṃ bhikkhunovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1000_1: Aṭṭhame indriyesu guttadvārānanti chasu indriyesu pihitadvārānaṃ nandatthero aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1000_2: Kiñcāpi hi satthusāvakā aguttadvārā nāma natthi,
atk-s0401a:1000_3: nandatthero pana dasasu disāsu yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ oloketukāmo hoti,
atk-s0401a:1000_5: Tasmā indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:1001_1: ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatīnagare kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā vayappatto satthu santike
atk-s0401a:1001_2: dhammaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1001_4: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kapilavatthupure mahāpajāpatigotamiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:1001_5: Athassa nāmaggahaṇadivase ñātisaṅghaṃ nandayanto tosento jātoti nandakumāroteva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1002_0: Mahāsattopi sabbaññutaṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko lokānuggahaṃ karonto rājagahato kapilavatthupuraṃ
atk-s0401a:1002_2: Punadivase pitu nivesanaṃ gantvā rāhulamātāya ovādaṃ datvā sesajanassapi dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0401a:1002_3: Punadivase nandakumārassa abhisekagehapavesanaāvāhamaṅgalesu vattamānesu tassa nivesanaṃ gantvā kumāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1002_6: pattaṃ ādāya gamanakāle pana janapadakalyāṇī uparipāsādavaragatā sīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭetvā “tuvaṭaṃ kho,
atk-s0401a:1002_9: Taṃ sutvā gehasitachandarāgavasena olokento panesa satthari gāravena yathāruciyā nimittaṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0401a:1002_12: imasmiṃ ṭhāne nivattessatī”ti cintentameva satthā vihāraṃ netvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0401a:1002_14: Pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya pana janapadakalyāṇiyā vuttavacanameva sarati.
atk-s0401a:1002_15: Athassa sā āgantvā avidūre ṭhitā viya ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1002_16: So anabhiratiyā pīḷito thokaṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0401a:1002_17: tassa gumbaṃ vā gacchaṃ vā atikkamantasseva dasabalo purato ṭhitako viya ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1002_18: So aggimhi pakkhittaṃ kukkuṭapattaṃ viya paṭinivattitvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva pavisati.
atk-s0401a:1003_9: So dasabalassa ānubhāvena tathāgateneva saddhiṃ devacārikaṃ gantvā sakkassa devarañño nivesanaṃ oloketvā pañca accharāsatāni addasa.
atk-s0401a:1003_10: Satthā nandattheraṃ subhanimittavasena tā olokentaṃ disvā, “nanda,
atk-s0401a:1003_13: janapadakalyāṇī imā accharā upanidhāya kaṇṇanāsacchinnakā makkaṭī viya khāyatīti. Nanda,
atk-s0401a:1003_14: evarūpā accharā samaṇadhammaṃ karontānaṃ na dullabhāti. Sace me,
atk-s0401a:1003_22: Iti satthā yathāruciyā devacārikaṃ caritvā jetavanameva paccāgañchi.
atk-s0401a:1004_0: Tato paṭṭhāya nandatthero accharānaṃ hetu rattindivaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0401a:1004_2: “tumhe nandassa vasanaṭṭhāne ‘eko kira bhikkhu dasabalaṃ pāṭibhogaṃ katvā accharānaṃ hetu samaṇadhammaṃ karotī’ti tattha tattha kathentā vicarathā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1004_3: Te satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā “bhatako kirāyasmā nando,
