atk-s0401a:1004_6: bhagavā kirassa pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādīna”nti therassa savanūpacāre kathentā vicaranti.
atk-s0401a:1004_7: Nandatthero taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “ime bhikkhū na aññaṃ kathenti,
atk-s0401a:1004_9: ayuttaṃ mama kamma”nti paṭisaṅkhānaṃ uppādetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1004_10: Athassa arahattapattakkhaṇeyeva aññatarā devatā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi,
atk-s0401a:1004_12: Punadivase nandatthero bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha – “yaṃ me,
atk-s0401a:1004_18: Satthā aparabhāge jetavanavihāre viharanto theraṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1006_1: Navame bhikkhuovādakānanti bhikkhū ovadantānaṃ mahākappinatthero aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1006_2: Ayaṃ kira thero ekasamodhānasmiṃyeva dhammakathaṃ kathento bhikkhusahassaṃ arahattaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1007_1: ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulaghare nibbattitvā aparabhāge satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0401a:1007_2: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhikkhuovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:1007_3: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapasammāsambuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0401a:1007_4: gahetvā purisasahassassa gaṇajeṭṭhako hutvā gabbhasahassapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ mahāpariveṇaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0401a:1007_5: Te sabbepi janā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā kappinaupāsakaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā saputtadārā devaloke nibbattā.
atk-s0401a:1008_0: Atha amhākaṃ satthu nibbattito puretarameva ayaṃ kappino paccantadese kukkuṭavatīnagare rājagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0401a:1008_2: Tesu kappinakumāro pitu accayena chattaṃ ussāpetvā mahākappinarājā nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:1008_3: Pubbe kalyāṇakammakaraṇakāle tassa gharasāminī itthī samānajātike rājakule nibbattitvā mahākappinarañño aggamahesī jātā,
atk-s0401a:1008_6: So pātova uṭṭhāya catūhi dvārehi sīghaṃ dūte pesesi –
atk-s0401a:1009_0: Tena kho pana samayena amhākaṃ satthā loke nibbattitvā sāvatthiṃ upanissāya paṭivasati.
atk-s0401a:1009_1: Tasmiṃ kāle sāvatthinagaravāsino vāṇijā sāvatthiyaṃ uṭṭhānakabhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0401a:1009_10: te rājā pakkosāpetvā niyyātitapaṇṇākāre vanditvā ṭhite, “tātā,
atk-s0401a:1009_15: Atthi pana tumhākaṃ dese kiñci sāsananti?
atk-s0401a:1009_19: Te mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā dasabalābhimukhā añjaliṃ paggahetvā, “deva,
atk-s0401a:1009_20: amhākaṃ dese buddharatanaṃ nāma uppanna”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1009_21: Rañño “buddho”ti vacane sutamatteyeva sakalasarīraṃ pharamānā pīti uppajji.
atk-s0401a:1009_25: nāssa sakkā parimāṇaṃ kātu”nti tasmiṃyeva pade pasanno satasahassaṃ datvā “aparaṃ kiṃ sāsana”nti pucchi.
atk-s0401a:1009_27: Tampi sutvā tatheva tikkhattuṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā aparampi satasahassaṃ datvā puna “aññaṃ kiṃ sāsana”nti pucchi.
atk-s0401a:1009_29: Tampi sutvā tatheva paṭiññaṃ gahetvā aparampi satasahassaṃ datvā dinnabhāvaṃ paṇṇe likhitvā, “tātā,
atk-s0401a:1009_37: Te sabbepi gharaṃ vā kuṭumbaṃ vā anapaloketvā ye asse āruyha gatā teheva nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1010_0: Vāṇijā anojādeviyā santikaṃ gantvā paṇṇaṃ dassesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1010_1: Sā taṃ vācetvā “raññā tumhākaṃ bahū kahāpaṇā dinnā,
atk-s0401a:1010_9: Te mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā rañño ārocitaniyāmeneva ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1010_10: Sāpi taṃ sutvā uppannapāmojjā teneva nayena ekekasmiṃ pade tikkhattuṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā paṭiññāgaṇanāya tīṇi tīṇi katvā nava satasahassāni adāsi.
atk-s0401a:1010_15: tumhe gacchathā”ti te uyyojetvā raññā saddhiṃ gatānaṃ amaccānaṃ mātugāme pakkosāpetvā “tumhe attano sāmikānaṃ gataṭṭhānaṃ jānātha ammā”ti pucchi. Jānāma, ayye,
atk-s0401a:1010_20: saṅgho uppanno”ti sutvā “dasabalassa santike pabbajissāmā”ti gatā,
atk-s0401a:1010_27: mayampi pabbajissāmā”ti sabbāpi rathe yojetvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1011_2: Atha naṃ disvā “ayaṃ gaṅgā pūrā hoti caṇḍamacchākiṇṇā,
atk-s0401a:1011_3: amhehi ca saddhiṃ āgatā dāsā vā manussā vā natthi,
atk-s0401a:1011_4: ye no nāvaṃ vā uḷumpaṃ vā katvā dadeyyuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1011_5: Etassa pana satthu guṇā nāma heṭṭhā avīcito upari yāva bhavaggā patthaṭā.
atk-s0401a:1011_7: imesaṃ assānaṃ khurapiṭṭhāni mā tementū”ti udakapiṭṭhena asse pakkhandāpesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1011_9: rājamaggena gacchantā viya paratīraṃ patvā parato aññaṃ mahānadiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1011_11: Nīlavāhinī nāma gambhīratopi puthulatopi aḍḍhayojanamattā devāti.
atk-s0401a:1011_13: tāya eva saccakiriyāya tampi aḍḍhayojanavitthāraṃ nadiṃ atikkamiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1011_14: Atha tatiyaṃ candabhāgaṃ nāma mahānadiṃ patvā tampi tāya eva saccakiriyāya atikkamiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1012_0: Satthāpi taṃdivasaṃ paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ olokento “ajja mahākappino tiyojanasatikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1012_1: rajjaṃ pahāya amaccasahassaparivāro mama santike pabbajituṃ āgacchatī”ti disvā “mayā tesaṃ paccuggamanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1012_2: kātuṃ yutta”nti pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivāro sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ
atk-s0401a:1012_3: piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto sayameva pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā ākāse uppatitvā candabhāgāya tīre tesaṃ uttaraṇatitthaabhimukhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0401a:1012_5: tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā chabbaṇṇabuddharasmiyo vissajjesi.
atk-s0401a:1012_6: Te tena titthena uttarantā buddharasmiyo ito cito ca dhāvantiyo oloketvā dasabalassa puṇṇacandasassirikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1012_7: mukhaṃ disvā “yaṃ satthāraṃ uddissa mayaṃ pabbajitā,
atk-s0401a:1012_8: addhā so eso”ti dassaneneva niṭṭhaṃ gantvā diṭṭhaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya oṇamitvā vandamānā āgamma satthāraṃ vandiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1012_9: Rājā gopphakesu gahetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi saddhiṃ amaccasahassena.
atk-s0401a:1012_11: Desanāpariyosāne sabbeva arahatte patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1012_12: Satthā “pubbe ime cīvaradānassa dinnattā attano pattacīvarāni gahetvāva āgatā”ti suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ hatthaṃ pasāretvā “etha bhikkhavo,
atk-s0401a:1012_14: caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1012_15: Sāva tesaṃ āyasmantānaṃ pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ahosi,
atk-s0401a:1013_0: Anojāpi devī rathasahassaparivārā gaṅgātīraṃ patvā rañño atthāya ābhataṃ nāvaṃ vā uḷumpaṃ vā adisvā attano byattatāya cintesi –
atk-s0401a:1013_2: so pana satthā na kevalaṃ tesaṃyeva atthāya nibbatto,
atk-s0401a:1013_4: amhākaṃ rathā mā udake nimujjiṃsū”ti udakapiṭṭhena rathe pakkhandāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1013_7: Uttaramānā eva ca nigrodharukkhamūle satthāraṃ addasa.
atk-s0401a:1013_8: Satthāpi “imāsaṃ attano sāmike passantīnaṃ chandarāgo uppajjitvā maggaphalānaṃ antarāyaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0401a:1013_12: Tā sabbāpi titthato uttaritvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1013_14: Desanāpariyosāne sabbā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya aññamaññaṃ passiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1013_16: Therī āgantvā sabbā pabbājetvā ādāya bhikkhuniupassayaṃ gatā,
atk-s0401a:1013_17: satthā bhikkhusahassaṃ gahetvā ākāsena jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:1014_0: Athāyaṃ mahākappinatthero attano kiccaṃ matthakappattaṃ ñatvā appossukko hutvā phalasamāpattisukhena
atk-s0401a:1014_1: vītināmento araññagatopi rukkhamūlagatopi suññāgāragatopi “aho sukhaṃ aho sukha”nti abhiṇhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0401a:1014_2: Bhikkhū kathaṃ uppādesuṃ “kappinatthero rajjasukhaṃ anussaranto udānaṃ udānetī”ti.
atk-s0401a:1014_4: Bhagavā “mama putto maggasukhaṃ phalasukhaṃ ārabbha udānaṃ udānesī”ti vatvā dhammapade imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:1017_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthā tassa antevāsikabhikkhusahassaṃ āmantetvā āha –
atk-s0401a:1017_7: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, kappina,
atk-s0401a:1017_12: bhante”ti thero satthu kathaṃ siravarena sampaṭicchitvā ekasamodhāneyeva samaṇasahassassa dhammaṃ desetvā sabbe arahattaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1017_13: Aparabhāge satthā saṅghamajjhe nisinno paṭipāṭiyā there ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento mahākappinattheraṃ bhikkhuovādakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1019_1: Dasame tejodhātukusalānanti tejodhātuṃ samāpajjituṃ kusalānaṃ sāgatatthero aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1019_2: Ayañhi thero tejodhātusamāpattiyā ambatitthanāgassa tejasā tejaṃ pariyādiyitvā taṃ nāgaṃ nibbisevanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:1020_1: ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā aparabhāge satthudhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1020_2: suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ tejodhātukusalānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ
atk-s0401a:1020_4: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇakule nibbatti,
atk-s0401a:1020_6: So aparabhāge satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajitvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā tattha vasībhāvaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1021_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthā cārikaṃ caramāno kosambinagarasamīpaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:1021_1: Tena ca samayena nadītitthe porāṇakanāvikassa bahū āgantukagamikā verino hutvā taṃ pothetvā mārayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1021_2: So viruddhena cittena patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tasmiṃyeva titthe mahānubhāvo nāgarājā hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0401a:1021_6: Sakalaraṭṭhavāsino ca tassa vūpasamanatthaṃ anusaṃvaccharaṃ balikammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0401a:1021_8: Satthāpi teneva titthena uttaritvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto “tasmiṃyeva padese rattiṃ vasissāmī”ti agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:1022_0: Athāyaṃ thero “caṇḍo kirettha nāgarājā”ti sutvā “imaṃ nāgarājānaṃ dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā satthu vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1022_1: pariyādetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti nāgarājassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1022_2: Nāgo kujjhitvā “konāmāyaṃ muṇḍako mayhaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā nisinno”ti dhūpāyi,
atk-s0401a:1022_4: theropi uttaritaraṃ pajjalitvā tassa tejaṃ pariyādiyi.
atk-s0401a:1022_5: So “mahanto vatāyaṃ bhikkhū”ti therassa pādamūle nipatitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:1022_9: So “sādhū”ti saraṇagato hutvā tato paṭṭhāya na kañci viheṭheti,
atk-s0401a:1023_0: Kosambivāsino “ayyena kira sāgatena ambatitthakanāgo damito”ti sutvā satthu āgamanaṃ udikkhamānā dasabalassa mahāsakkāraṃ sajjayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1023_1: Te dasabalassa mahāsakkāraṃ katvā chabbaggiyānaṃ vacanena sabbagehesu kāpotikaṃ pasannaṃ paṭiyādetvā
atk-s0401a:1023_2: punadivase sāgatattherassa piṇḍāya carantassa gehe gehe thokaṃ thokaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1023_3: Thero apaññatte sikkhāpade manussehi yāciyamāno gehe gehe thokaṃ thokaṃ pivitvā avidūraṃ gantvāva anāhārikabhāvena
atk-s0401a:1024_0: Satthā katabhattakicco nikkhamanto taṃ disvā gāhāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā vigarahitvā sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1024_1: So punadivase satiṃ labhitvā attanā katakāraṇaṃ sutvā accayaṃ desetvā dasabalaṃ khamāpetvā uppannasaṃvego vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1024_4: Aparabhāge pana satthā jetavane mahāvihāre nisīditvā paṭipāṭiyā there ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento sāgatattheraṃ tejodhātukusalānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1026_1: Ekādasame paṭibhāneyyakānanti satthu dhammadesanāpaṭibhānassa paccayabhūtānaṃ paṭibhānajanakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rādhatthero aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1026_2: Therassa hi diṭṭhisamudācārañca okappaniyasaddhañca āgamma dasabalassa navanavā dhammadesanā paṭibhāti.
atk-s0401a:1026_3: Tasmā thero paṭibhāneyyakānaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0401a:1027_1: ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā aparabhāge satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0401a:1027_2: satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭibhāneyyakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:1027_3: So yāvajīvaṃ tathāgataṃ paricaritvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahanagare brāhmaṇakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0401a:1028_0: So mahallakakāle attano puttadārena abahumato “pabbajitvā kālaṃ vītināmessāmī”ti vihāraṃ gantvā there pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0401a:1028_2: Athekadivasaṃ brāhmaṇo satthu santikaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1028_3: Satthā tassa upanissayasampattiṃ disvā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetukāmo “kiṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0401a:1028_14: Thero satthu vacanaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchitvā rādhabrāhmaṇaṃ pabbājetvā cintesi –
atk-s0401a:1028_16: na kho me etaṃ anādarena pariharituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti rādhattheraṃ ādāya gāmakāvāsaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:1028_17: Tatrassa adhunā pabbajitattā kicchalābhissa thero attano pattaṃ āvāsaṃ deti,
atk-s0401a:1028_18: attano pattaṃ paṇītapiṇḍapātampi tasseva datvā sayaṃ piṇḍāya carati.
atk-s0401a:1028_19: Rādhatthero senāsanasappāyañca bhojanasappāyañca labhitvā sāriputtattherassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nacirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1029_0: Atha naṃ thero gahetvā dasabalaṃ passituṃ āgato.
atk-s0401a:1029_8: Athāyasmato sāriputtassa “sāriputtatthero kataññū katavedī”ti saṅghamajjhe kathā udapādi.
atk-s0401a:1029_13: so atīte ahetukapaṭisandhiyaṃ nibbattopi kataññūkatavedīyeva ahosī”ti.
atk-s0401a:1030_2: pabbatapādamhi pañcasatamattā vaḍḍhakipurisā mahāaraññaṃ pavisitvā dabbasambhāre chinditvā mahāuḷumpaṃ bandhitvā nadiyā otārenti.
atk-s0401a:1030_3: Atheko hatthināgo ekasmiṃ visamaṭṭhāne soṇḍāya sākhaṃ gaṇhanto sākhābhaṅgavegaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto tikhiṇakhāṇuke pādena avatthāsi,
atk-s0401a:1030_6: So gamanaṃ abhinīharituṃ asakkonto tattheva nipajji.
atk-s0401a:1030_7: So katipāhaccayena te vaḍḍhakī attano samīpena gacchante disvā “ime nissāyāhaṃ jīvitaṃ labhissāmī”ti tesaṃ anupadaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:1030_8: Te nivattitvā hatthiṃ disvā bhītā palāyanti.
atk-s0401a:1031_4: Sabbe taṃ taṃ rukkhaṃ āruyha tassa āgamanaṃ paṭimānentā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1031_5: So tesaṃ santikaṃ āgantvā attano pādaṃ dassento parivattetvā nipajji.
atk-s0401a:1031_9: na aññena kāraṇenā”ti tassa santikaṃ gantvā pāde paviṭṭhakhāṇukaṃ disvā “iminā kāraṇena esa āgato”ti
atk-s0401a:1031_10: tikhiṇavāsiyā khāṇukakoṭiyaṃ odhiṃ datvā daḷhāya rajjuyā bandhitvā kaḍḍhitvā nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1031_11: Athassa vaṇamukhaṃ pīḷetvā pubbalohitaṃ nīharitvā kasāvodakena dhovitvā attano jānanabhesajjaṃ makkhetvā nacirasseva phāsukaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1032_3: mayā imesaṃ kataññunā katavedinā bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā setaṃ gandhahatthipotakaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0401a:1032_4: Vaḍḍhakino hatthipotakaṃ disvā “amhākaṃ hatthī puttampi gahetvā āgato”ti ativiya tuṭṭhacittā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1032_6: “mayi tiṭṭhante ‘kiṃ nu kho ayaṃ āgato’ti mama āgatakāraṇaṃ na jānissantī”ti ṭhitaṭṭhānato pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:1032_8: Hatthināgo tassa āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā nivattanatthāya saddasaññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:1032_9: So pitu kathaṃ sutvā nivattitvā vaḍḍhakīnaṃ santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:1032_10: Vaḍḍhakino “imaṃ hatthipotakaṃ amhākaṃ dātuṃ āgato bhavissati eso”ti ñatvā “amhākaṃ santike tayā kattabbakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0401a:1032_12: Hatthināgo yāvatatiyaṃ attano santikaṃ āgatampi puna vaḍḍhakīnaṃyeva samīpaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0401a:1032_13: Tato paṭṭhāya vaḍḍhakino hatthipotakaṃ attano santike katvā paṭijagganti.
atk-s0401a:1032_16: So vaḍḍhakīhi antogahane koṭṭitaṃ dabbasambhāraṃ āharitvā aṅgaṇaṭṭhāne rāsiṃ karoti.
atk-s0401a:1033_0: Satthā imaṃ kāraṇaṃ āharitvā pubbepi sāriputtassa kataññūkatavedibhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0401a:1033_2: aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ āgato ossaṭṭhavīriyo bhikkhu hatthipotako ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1036_0: Tādisaṃ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo”ti. –
atk-s0401a:1037_1: Aparabhāge pana satthā paṭipāṭiyā there ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento rādhattheraṃ paṭibhāneyyakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1039_1: Dvādasame lūkhacīvaradharānanti lūkhacīvaraṃ dhārentānaṃ mogharājā aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1039_2: Ayaṃ hi thero satthalūkhaṃ suttalūkhaṃ rajanalūkhanti tividhenapi lūkhena samannāgataṃ paṃsukūlaṃ dhāresi.
atk-s0401a:1040_1: ayampi hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā nibbatti,
atk-s0401a:1040_2: tato aparabhāge satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ
atk-s0401a:1040_3: disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:1040_4: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto kassapadasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva kaṭṭhavāhananagare amaccagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:1040_5: Aparabhāge vayappatto kaṭṭhavāhanarājānaṃ upaṭṭhahanto amaccaṭṭhānaṃ labhi.
atk-s0401a:1041_1: Kaṭṭhavāhanarājā “buddho kira loke uppanno”ti sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā āha – “tāta,
atk-s0401a:1041_3: imaṃ paccantanagaraṃ ekappahāreneva ubhohi amhehi tucchaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0401a:1041_4: tvaṃ tāva majjhimadesaṃ gantvā buddhassa uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā dasabalaṃ imaṃ nagaraṃ ānehī”ti purisasahassena saddhiṃ pesesi.
atk-s0401a:1041_5: So anupubbena satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddho tattheva pabbajitvā vīsati vassasahassāni samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:1041_6: Tena saddhiṃ gatapurisā pana sabbepi nivattitvā puna rañño santikaṃ āgatā.
atk-s0401a:1042_0: Ayaṃ thero paripuṇṇasīlo kālaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaranto amhākaṃ dasabalassa nibbattito
atk-s0401a:1042_3: Kaṭṭhavāhanarājāpi kassapassa bhagavato adhikārakammaṃ katvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ saparivāro devamanussesu
atk-s0401a:1042_4: saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ dasabalassa nibbattito puretarameva sāvatthiyaṃ purohitagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0401a:1042_6: So aparena samayena tayo vede uggaṇhitvā soḷasannaṃ māṇavakasahassānaṃ sippaṃ vācento carati.
atk-s0401a:1042_7: Athassa pasenadikosalarañño kāle pitu accayena purohitaṭṭhānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1042_8: Tadā ayampi mogharājamāṇavo bāvaribrāhmaṇassa santike sippaṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0401a:1043_0: Athekadivasaṃ bāvaribrāhmaṇo rahogato attano sippe sāraṃ olokento samparāyikaṃ sāraṃ adisvā “ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0401a:1043_1: pabbajitvā samparāyikaṃ gavesessāmī”ti kosalarājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano pabbajjaṃ anujānāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1043_2: So tena anuññāto soḷasahi māṇavakasahassehi parivuto pabbajjatthāya nikkhami.
atk-s0401a:1043_3: Kosalarājāpi tena saddhiṃyeva ekaṃ amaccaṃ kahāpaṇasahassaṃ datvā pesesi –
atk-s0401a:1043_6: Bāvaribrāhmaṇo phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ olokento majjhimadesato paṭikkamma assakarañño ca muḷhakarañño ca sīmantare godhāvaritīre attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0401a:1044_0: Atheko puriso jaṭilānaṃ dassanāya gato tesaṃ santake bhūmiṭṭhāne tehi anuññāto attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:1044_1: Tena kataṃ disvā aparaṃ kulasataṃ gehasataṃ kāresi.
atk-s0401a:1044_2: Te sabbepi sannipatitvā “mayaṃ ayyānaṃ santake bhūmibhāge vasāma,
atk-s0401a:1044_4: sukhavāsaṃ vo dassāmā”ti ekeko ekekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ bāvaribrāhmaṇassa vasanaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:1044_9: ahaṃ mahantaṃ dhanarāsiṃ pahāya na pabbajeyyaṃ.
atk-s0401a:1044_11: Amhehi ayyassa pariccattaṃ na puna gaṇhāma,
atk-s0401a:1045_0: Tato kāliṅgaraṭṭhe dunniviṭṭhe nāma gāme jūjakabrāhmaṇassa vaṃse jātabrāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇī uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya brāhmaṇaṃ codeti – “bāvarī,
atk-s0401a:1045_3: So tāya codiyamāno saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto bāvarissa santikaṃ gacchamāno bāvarimhi dānaṃ datvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā nipajjitvā dānaṃ anussaramāne gato.
atk-s0401a:1045_4: Gantvā ca “dānaṃ me, brāhmaṇa, dehi, dānaṃ me, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0401a:1045_11: tava ettakaṃ dānaṃ dadantassa na sakkā kahāpaṇehi vinā bhavituṃ,
atk-s0401a:1045_16: Bāvaribrāhmaṇassa paṇṇasāladvāre vālukaṃ thūpaṃ katvā samantato rattavaṇṇāni pupphāni vikiritvā mantaṃ
atk-s0401a:1045_17: jappento viya oṭṭhe cāletvā cāletvā “muddhā phalatu sattadhā”ti vadati.
atk-s0401a:1046_1: “ayaṃ mahātapo tapacāraṃ gaṇhitvā caraṇabrāhmaṇako mayhaṃ sattadivasamatthake ‘sattadhā muddhā phālatū’ti vadati,
atk-s0401a:1046_2: mayhañca imassa dātabbāni pañca kahāpaṇasatāni natthi,
atk-s0401a:1046_4: Evaṃ tasmiṃ sokasallasamappite nipanne rattibhāgasamanantare anantarattabhāve bāvarissa mātā devatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:1046_5: Sā puttassa sokasallasamappitabhāvaṃ disvā āgantvā āha – “tāta,
atk-s0401a:1046_6: esa muddhaṃ vā muddhaphālanaṃ vā na jānāti,
atk-s0401a:1046_7: tvampi loke buddhānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ na jānāsi.
atk-s0401a:1046_11: Brāhmaṇo devatāya kathaṃ sutakālato paṭṭhāya assāsaṃ labhitvā punadivase uṭṭhite aruṇe sabbeva antevāsike pakkositvā, “tātā,
atk-s0401a:1046_13: tumhe sīghaṃ gantvā ‘buddho vā no vā’ti ñatvā āgantvā mayhaṃ ārocetha,
atk-s0401a:1046_15: Apica kho pana mayhaṃ mahallakabhāvena jīvitantarāyo dujjāno,
atk-s0401a:1046_16: tumhe tassa santikaṃ gantvā iminā ca iminā ca niyāmena pañhe pucchathā”ti muddhaphālanapañhaṃ nāma abhisaṅkharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:1047_2: satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā attano kicce matthakaṃ patte puna mayhaṃ santikaṃ āgaccheyyuṃ vā no vā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1047_3: Atha attano bhāgineyyassa ajitamāṇavassa nāma saññaṃ adāsi –
atk-s0401a:1047_4: “tvaṃ pana ekanteneva mama santikaṃ āgantuṃ arahasi,
atk-s0401a:1047_6: Atha te soḷasasahassajaṭilā ajitamāṇavaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā soḷasahi jeṭṭhantevāsikehi saddhiṃ “satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1047_9: kahaṃ gacchathā”ti pucchitā “dasabalassa santikaṃ pañhaṃ pucchituṃ gacchāmā”ti koṭito paṭṭhāya parisaṃ saṃkaḍḍhantā anekayojanasataṃ maggaṃ gatā.
atk-s0401a:1047_10: Satthā “tesaṃ āgamanadivase aññassa okāso na bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:1047_11: idaṃ imissā parisāya anucchavikaṭṭhāna”nti gantvā pāsāṇacetiye piṭṭhipāsāṇe nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1047_12: So ajitamāṇavopi sapariso taṃ piṭṭhipāsāṇaṃ āruyha satthu sarīrasampattiṃ disvā “ayaṃ puriso imasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:1047_13: loke vivaṭacchado buddho bhavissatī”ti attano ācariyena pahite pañhe manasā pucchantova gato.
atk-s0401a:1048_0: Taṃdivasaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sampattaparisā dvādasayojanikā ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1048_1: Tesaṃ soḷasannaṃ antevāsikānaṃ antare mogharājamāṇavo “ahaṃ sabbehi paṇḍitataro”ti mānatthaddho,
atk-s0401a:1048_4: etassa paṭhamataraṃ mama pañhaṃ pucchituṃ na yutta”nti.
atk-s0401a:1048_5: Tassa lajjāyanto paṭhamataraṃ pañhaṃ apucchitvā tena pucchite dutiyo hutvā satthāraṃ pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0401a:1048_8: assa mānaṃ nivārituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0401a:1048_12: So satthu santikā apasādaṃ labhitvā cintesi –
atk-s0401a:1048_13: “ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ mayā paṇḍitataro nāma natthīti vicarāmi,
atk-s0401a:1048_14: buddhā ca nāma ajānitvā na kathenti.
atk-s0401a:1048_15: Satthārā mama pucchāya doso diṭṭho bhavissatī”ti tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1048_16: So aṭṭhahi janehi paṭipāṭiyā pañhe pucchite adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto navamo hutvā puna uṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:1049_0: So punapi tuṇhī hutvā “saṅghanavako dāni bhavituṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti pañcadasamo hutvā pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0401a:1049_1: Atha satthā ñāṇassa paripākabhāvaṃ ñatvā pañhaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0401a:1049_2: So desanāpariyosāne attano parivārena jaṭilasahassena saddhiṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1049_3: Imināva niyāmena sesānipi pannarasa jaṭilasahassāni arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1049_6: Ayaṃ mogharājatthero tato paṭṭhāya tīhi lūkhehi samannāgataṃ cīvaraṃ dhāreti.
atk-s0401a:1049_8: Satthā pana aparabhāge jetavane nisinno there paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento mogharājattheraṃ imasmiṃ
atk-s0401a:1049_11: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ yadidaṃ mogharājā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1055_1: Theripāḷiyā paṭhame yadidaṃ mahāpajāpatigotamīti mahāpajāpatigotamī therī rattaññūnaṃ aggāti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1056_1: ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā aparena samayena satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1056_2: suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ rattaññūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:1056_3: Sā yāvajīvaṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā pana ekasmiṃ buddhantare devalokato
atk-s0401a:1056_4: cavitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ pañcannaṃ dāsisatānaṃ jeṭṭhakadāsī hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:1056_5: Atha vassūpanāyikasamaye pañca paccekabuddhā nandamūlakapabbhārato isipatane otaritvā nagare piṇḍāya
atk-s0401a:1056_6: caritvā isipatanameva gantvā “vassūpanāyikakuṭiyā atthāya hatthakammaṃ yācissāmā”ti cintesuṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0401a:1056_7: Vassaṃ upagacchantena hi nālakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannenāpi pañcannaṃ chadanānaṃ aññatarena chadanena channe sadvārabaddhe senāsane upagantabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:1056_13: Tasmā vassakāle upakaṭṭhe sace senāsanaṃ labhati,
atk-s0401a:1056_20: Tasmā te paccekabuddhā “hatthakammaṃ yācissāmā”ti cīvaraṃ pārupitvā sāyanhasamaye nagaraṃ pavisitvā seṭṭhissa gharadvāre aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1056_21: Jeṭṭhakadāsī kuṭaṃ gahetvā udakatitthaṃ gacchantī paccekabuddhe nagaraṃ pavisante addasa.
atk-s0401a:1056_22: Seṭṭhi tesaṃ āgatakāraṇaṃ sutvā “amhākaṃ okāso natthi,
atk-s0401a:1057_0: Atha te nagarā nikkhante jeṭṭhakadāsī kuṭaṃ gahetvā pavisantī disvā kuṭaṃ otāretvā vanditvā onamitvā mukhaṃ ukkhipitvā, “ayyā,
atk-s0401a:1057_3: Vassūpanāyikakuṭiyā hatthakammaṃ yācituṃ āgatamhāti. Laddhaṃ, bhanteti?
atk-s0401a:1057_7: Yena kenaci sakkā kātunti. Sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0401a:1057_9: sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathāti nimantetvā puna kuṭaṃ gahetvā āgamanatitthamagge ṭhatvā āgatāgatā avasesadāsiyo
atk-s0401a:1057_15: mayā paccekabuddhā hatthakammaṃ alabhantā svātanāya nimantitā,
atk-s0401a:1057_17: Tā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā sāyaṃ aṭavito āgatakāle sāmikānaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1058_1: paccekabuddhānaṃ hatthakammaṃ dethā”ti ānisaṃsaṃ ācikkhitvā yepi na kātukāmā,
atk-s0401a:1058_2: te gāḷhena ovādena tajjetvā sabbepi sampaṭicchāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1058_3: Sā punadivase paccekabuddhānaṃ bhattaṃ datvā sabbesaṃ dāsaputtānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:1058_4: Te tāvadeva araññaṃ pavisitvā dabbasambhāre samodhānetvā sataṃ sataṃ hutvā ekekaṃ kuṭiṃ caṅkamanādiparivāraṃ katvā mañcapīṭhapānīya-
atk-s0401a:1058_5: paribhojanīyādīni ṭhapetvā paccekabuddhānaṃ temāsaṃ tattheva vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ kāretvā vārabhikkhaṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1058_8: Evaṃ temāsaṃ paṭijaggitvā jeṭṭhakadāsī ekekaṃ dāsiṃ ekekaṃ sāṭakaṃ sajjāpesi,
atk-s0401a:1058_10: Tāni parivattāpetvā pañcannaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ ticīvarāni katvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:1058_11: Paccekabuddhā tāsaṃ passantīnaṃyeva ākāsena gandhamādanapabbataṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1059_0: Tāpi sabbā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1059_1: Tāsu jeṭṭhikā tato cavitvā bārāṇasiyā avidūre pesakāragāme pesakārajeṭṭhakassa gehe nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:1059_2: Athekadivasaṃ padumavatiyā puttā pañcasatā paccekabuddhā bārāṇasiraññā nimantitā rājadvāraṃ āgantvā kañci
atk-s0401a:1059_3: olokentampi adisvā nivattitvā nagaradvārena nikkhamitvā taṃ pesakāragāmaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1059_4: Sā itthī paccekabuddhe disvā sampiyāyamānā sabbe vanditvā bhikkhaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:1060_0: Sāpi yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsarantī amhākaṃ satthu nibbattito puretarameva devadahanagare
atk-s0401a:1060_4: Mantajjhāyakā brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇāni pariggaṇhantā “imāsaṃ dvinnampi kucchiyaṃ vasitadārakā cakkavattino bhavissantī”ti byākariṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1060_5: Suddhodanamahārājā vayappattakāle tā dvepi maṅgalaṃ katvā attano gharaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0401a:1060_6: Aparabhāge amhākaṃ bodhisatto tusitapurā cavitvā mahāmāyāya deviyā kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:1060_7: Mahāmāyā tassa jātadivasato sattame divase kālaṃ katvā tusitapure nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:1060_8: Suddhodanamahārājā mahāsattassa mātucchaṃ mahāpajāpatigotamiṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:1060_10: Ayaṃ mahāpajāpati nandakumāraṃ dhātīnaṃ datvā sayaṃ bodhisattaṃ parihari.
atk-s0401a:1061_0: Aparena samayena bodhisatto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā sabbaññutaṃ patvā lokānuggahaṃ karonto anukkamena
atk-s0401a:1061_2: Athassa pitā suddhodanamahārājā antaravīthiyaṃyeva dhammakathaṃ sutvā sotāpanno ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1061_5: Satthā aparena samayena vesāliṃ upanissāya kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ viharati.
atk-s0401a:1061_6: Tasmiṃ samaye suddhodanamahārājā setacchattassa heṭṭhā arahattaṃ sacchikatvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0401a:1061_8: Tato rohiṇīnadītīre kalahavivādasuttapariyosāne nikkhamitvā pabbajitānaṃ pañcannaṃ kumārasatānaṃ pādaparicārikā
atk-s0401a:1061_9: sabbāva ekacittā hutvā “mahāpajāpatiyā santikaṃ gantvā sabbāva satthu santike pabbajissāmā”ti mahāpajāpatiṃ
atk-s0401a:1061_10: jeṭṭhikaṃ katvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā pabbajitukāmā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1061_11: Ayañca mahāpajāpati paṭhamameva ekavāraṃ satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yācamānā nālattha,
atk-s0401a:1061_12: tasmā kappakaṃ pakkosāpetvā kese chinnāpetvā kāsāyāni acchādetvā sabbā tā sākiyāniyo ādāya vesāliṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:1061_13: ānandattherena dasabalaṃ yācāpetvā aṭṭhahi garudhammehi pabbajjañca upasampadañca alattha.
atk-s0401a:1061_14: Itarā pana sabbāpi ekatova upasampannā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1062_0: Evaṃ upasampannā pana mahāpajāpati satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0401a:1062_2: Sā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1062_3: Sesā pañcasatā bhikkhuniyo nandakovādasuttapariyosāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1062_5: Aparabhāge satthā jetavane nisinno bhikkhuniyo ṭhānantare ṭhapento mahāpajāpatiṃ rattaññūnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1064_2: Ito paṭṭhāya ca panassā pañhakamme ayamanupubbikathāti avatvā sabbattha abhinīhāraṃ ādiṃ katvā vattabbameva vakkhāma.
atk-s0401a:1065_0: Atīte kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ ayaṃ parapariyāpannā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:1065_1: Athekadivasaṃ tassa bhagavato aggasāvikaṃ sujātattheriṃ nāma piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā tayo modake datvā
atk-s0401a:1065_2: taṃdivasameva attano kese vissajjetvā theriyā dānaṃ datvā “anāgate buddhuppāde tumhe viya mahāpaññā bhaveyya”nti
atk-s0401a:1065_3: patthanaṃ katvā yāvajīvaṃ kusalakammesu appamattā hutvā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsarantī kassapabuddhakāle
atk-s0401a:1065_4: kikissa kāsirañño gehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā sattannaṃ bhaginīnaṃ abbhantarā hutvā vīsativassasahassāni
atk-s0401a:1065_5: geheyeva komāribrahmacariyaṃ caritvā tāhi bhaginīhi saddhiṃ dasabalassa vasanapariveṇaṃ kāretvā ekaṃ
atk-s0401a:1065_6: buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsarantī imasmiṃ buddhuppāde maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagare rājakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0401a:1066_0: Sā tathāgate rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharante “satthā kira rūpe dosaṃ dassetī”ti rūpamadamattā
atk-s0401a:1066_1: hutvā “mayhampi rūpe dosaṃ dasseyyā”ti bhayena dasabalaṃ dassanāya na gacchati.
atk-s0401a:1066_4: mādisassa ca nāma ariyasāvakassa aggamahesī dasabalaṃ dassanāya na gacchati,
atk-s0401a:1066_6: So kavīhi veḷuvanuyyānassa vaṇṇaṃ bandhāpetvā “khemāya deviyā savanūpacāre gāyathā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1066_7: Sā uyyānassa vaṇṇaṃ sutvā gantukāmā hutvā rājānaṃ paṭipucchi.
atk-s0401a:1066_9: satthāraṃ pana adisvā āgantuṃ na labhissasī”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1066_10: Sā rañño paṭivacanaṃ adatvāva maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0401a:1066_11: Rājā tāya saddhiṃ gacchante purise āha –
atk-s0401a:1066_16: Atha kho sā devī divasabhāgaṃ uyyāne caritvā nivattantī dasabalaṃ adisvāva gantuṃ āraddhā.
atk-s0401a:1066_17: Atha naṃ rājapurisā attano aruciyāva deviṃ satthu santikaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1067_0: Satthā taṃ āgacchantiṃ disvā iddhiyā ekaṃ devaccharaṃ nimminitvā tālavaṇṭaṃ gahetvā bījamānaṃ viya akāsi.
atk-s0401a:1067_3: evarūpā nāma devaccharappaṭibhāgā itthiyo dasabalassa avidūre tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0401a:1067_5: mānamadaṃ hi nissāya pāpacittassa vasena naṭṭhā”ti taṃ nimittaṃ gahetvā tameva itthiṃ olokayamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:1067_6: Athassā passantiyāva tathāgatassa adhiṭṭhānabalena sā itthī paṭhamavayaṃ atikkamma majjhimavaye ṭhitā
atk-s0401a:1067_7: viya majjhimavayaṃ atikkamma pacchimavaye ṭhitā viya ca valittacā palitakesā khaṇḍaviraḷadantā ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1067_8: Tato tassā passantiyāva saddhiṃ tālavaṇṭena parivattitvā paripati.
atk-s0401a:1067_9: Tato khemā pubbahetusampannattā tasmiṃ ārammaṇe āpāthagate evaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0401a:1067_12: Athassā evaṃ cintitakkhaṇe satthā imaṃ dhammapade gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:1072_0: Sā gāthāpariyosāne ṭhitapade ṭhitāyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1072_1: Agāramajjhe vasantena nāma arahattaṃ pattena taṃdivasameva parinibbāyitabbaṃ vā pabbajitabbaṃ vā hoti,
atk-s0401a:1072_2: sā pana attano āyusaṅkhārānaṃ pavattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā “attano pabbajjaṃ anujānāpessāmī”ti satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0401a:1072_12: devī”ti sampaṭicchitvā suvaṇṇasivikāya bhikkhuniupassayaṃ upanetvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0401a:1072_13: Athassā “khemātherī nāma gihibhāve ṭhatvā arahattaṃ pattā”ti mahāpaññabhāvo pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1072_15: Atha satthā aparabhāge jetavane nisinno bhikkhuniyo paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapento khemātheriṃ mahāpaññānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1074_1: Tatiye uppalavaṇṇāti nīluppalagabbhasadiseneva vaṇṇena samannāgatattā evaṃladdhanāmā therī.
atk-s0401a:1074_2: Sā kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā aparabhāge mahājanena saddhiṃ
atk-s0401a:1074_3: satthu santikaṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ iddhimantīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:1074_4: sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:1074_5: Sā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsarantī kassapabuddhakāle bārāṇasinagare kikissa kāsirañño
atk-s0401a:1074_6: gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā sattannaṃ bhaginīnaṃ abbhantarā hutvā vīsati vassasahassāni brahmacariyaṃ caritvā
atk-s0401a:1075_0: Tato cavitvā puna manussalokaṃ āgacchantī ekasmiṃ gāme sahatthā kammaṃ katvā jīvanakaṭṭhāne nibbattā.
atk-s0401a:1075_1: Sā ekadivasaṃ khettakuṭiṃ gacchantī antarāmagge ekasmiṃ sare pātova pupphitaṃ padumapupphaṃ disvā taṃ
atk-s0401a:1075_2: saraṃ oruyha tañceva pupphaṃ lājapakkhipanatthāya paduminiyā pattañca gahetvā kedāre sālisīsāni chinditvā
atk-s0401a:1075_3: kuṭikāya nisinnā lāje bhajjitvā pañca lājasatāni gaṇesi.
atk-s0401a:1075_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe gandhamādanapabbate nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhito eko paccekabuddho āgantvā tassā avidūre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:1075_5: Sā paccekabuddhaṃ disvā lājehi saddhiṃ padumapupphaṃ gahetvā kuṭito oruyha lāje paccekabuddhassa patte
atk-s0401a:1075_9: ahaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā piḷandhissāmī”ti gantvā paccekabuddhassa hatthato pupphaṃ gahetvā puna cintesi – “sace, ayyo,
atk-s0401a:1075_12: addhā ayyassa attho bhavissatī”ti puna gantvā pattamatthake ṭhapetvā paccekabuddhaṃ khamāpetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:1075_13: imesaṃ me lājānaṃ nissandena lājagaṇanāya puttā assu,
atk-s0401a:1075_14: padumapupphassa nissandena nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me pade pade padumapupphaṃ uṭṭhahatū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:1075_15: Paccekabuddho tassā passantiyāva ākāsena gandhamādanapabbataṃ gantvā taṃ padumaṃ nandamūlakapabbhāre
atk-s0401a:1076_0: Sāpi tassa kammassa nissandena devaloke paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0401a:1076_1: nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya cassā pade pade mahāpadumapupphaṃ uṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:1076_2: Sā tato cavitvā pabbatapāde ekasmiṃ padumassare padumagabbhe nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:1076_4: so pātova mukhadhovanatthāya saraṃ gantvā taṃ pupphaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0401a:1076_8: bhavitabbamettha kāraṇenā”ti udakaṃ otaritvā taṃ pupphaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:1076_11: Diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya ca dhītusinehaṃ labhitvā padumeneva saddhiṃ paṇṇasālaṃ netvā mañcake nipajjāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1076_13: So tasmiṃ pupphe milāte aññaṃ navapupphaṃ āharitvā taṃ nipajjāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1076_14: Athassā ādhāvanavidhāvanena kīḷituṃ samatthakālato paṭṭhāya padavāre padavāre padumapupphaṃ uṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0401a:1076_18: Sā pitari phalāphalatthāya gate paṇṇasālāyaṃ ohīyati.
atk-s0401a:1077_0: Athekadivasaṃ tassā vayappattakāle pitari phalāphalatthāya gate eko vanacarako taṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0401a:1077_2: vīmaṃsissāmi na”nti tāpasassa āgamanaṃ udikkhanto nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1077_3: Sā pitari āgacchante paṭipathaṃ gantvā tassa hatthato kājakamaṇḍaluṃ aggahesi,
atk-s0401a:1077_4: āgantvā nisinnassa cassa attanā karaṇavattaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0401a:1077_5: Tadā so vanacarako manussabhāvaṃ ñatvā tāpasaṃ abhivādetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1077_6: Tāpaso taṃ vanacarakaṃ vanamūlaphalāphalehi ca pānīyena ca nimantetvā,
atk-s0401a:1077_12: Idaṃ tayā diṭṭhakāraṇaṃ etto gantvā akathetuṃ sakkhissasīti. Sace, ayyo,
atk-s0401a:1077_14: kiṃ kāraṇā kathessāmīti tāpasaṃ vanditvā puna āgamanakāle maggasañjānanatthaṃ sākhāsaññañca rukkhasaññañca karonto pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:1078_2: tumhākaṃ vanacarako pabbatapāde acchariyaṃ itthiratanaṃ disvā āgatomhī”ti sabbaṃ pavattiṃ kathesi.
atk-s0401a:1078_3: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā vegena pabbatapādaṃ gantvā avidūre ṭhāne khandhāvāraṃ nivesetvā vanacarakena ceva
atk-s0401a:1078_4: aññehi ca purisehi saddhiṃ tāpasassa bhattakiccaṃ katvā nisinnavelāya tattha gantvā abhivādetvā paṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1078_10: Ayyassa pana samīpe visabhāgaparisā atthīti assumha,
atk-s0401a:1078_15: Amhākaṃ rucitakālato paṭṭhāya sesānaṃ jeṭṭhakaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā paṭijaggissāmi, bhanteti.
atk-s0401a:1079_0: So rañño kathaṃ sutvā daharakāle gahitanāmavaseneva, “amma,
atk-s0401a:1079_2: Sā ekavacaneneva paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā pitaraṃ abhivādetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:1079_5: imasmiṃ ṭhāne raññā diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya vasituṃ ayuttā,
atk-s0401a:1079_8: tātā”ti pitu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā abhivādetvā parodamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:1079_9: Rājā “imissā pitu cittaṃ gaṇhāmī”ti tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne kahāpaṇarāsimhi ṭhapetvā abhisekaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:1079_10: Atha naṃ gahetvā attano nagaraṃ ānetvā āgatakālato paṭṭhāya sesaitthiyo anoloketvā tāya saddhiṃyeva ramati.
atk-s0401a:1079_11: Tā itthiyo issāpakatā taṃ rañño antare paribhinditukāmā evamāhaṃsu – “nāyaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0401a:1079_13: kahaṃ nāma tumhehi manussānaṃ vicaraṇaṭṭhāne padumāni uṭṭhahantāni diṭṭhapubbāni,
atk-s0401a:1079_16: Rājā tāsaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1080_1: So “garugabbhā padumavatī”ti taṃ nagare ṭhapetvā paccantaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:1080_2: Atha tā itthiyo tassā upaṭṭhāyikāya lañjaṃ datvā “imissā dārakaṃ jātamattameva apanetvā ekaṃ dārughaṭikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1080_6: Avasesā ekūnapañcasatā dārakā mahāpadumakumārassa mātukucchito nikkhamitvā nipannakāle saṃsedajā hutvā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1080_7: Athassa “na tāvāyaṃ satiṃ paṭilabhatī”ti ñatvā upaṭṭhāyikā ekaṃ dārughaṭikaṃ lohitena makkhetvā samīpe ṭhapetvā tāsaṃ itthīnaṃ saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0401a:1080_8: Tā pañcasatāpi itthiyo ekekā ekekaṃ dārakaṃ gahetvā cundakārakānaṃ santikaṃ pesetvā karaṇḍake āharāpetvā
atk-s0401a:1080_9: attanā attanā gahitadārake tattha nipajjāpetvā bahi lañchanaṃ katvā ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1081_0: Padumavatīpi kho saññaṃ labhitvā taṃ upaṭṭhāyikaṃ “kiṃ vijātamhi,
atk-s0401a:1081_2: Sā taṃ santajjetvā “kuto tvaṃ dārakaṃ labhissasī”ti vatvā “ayaṃ te kucchito nikkhantadārako”ti lohitamakkhitaṃ dārughaṭikaṃ purato ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:1081_3: Sā taṃ disvā domanassappattā “sīghaṃ naṃ phāletvā apanehi,
atk-s0401a:1081_4: sace koci passeyya lajjitabbaṃ bhaveyyā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1081_5: Sā tassā kathaṃ sutvā atthakāmā viya dārughaṭikaṃ phāletvā uddhane pakkhipi.
atk-s0401a:1082_0: Rājāpi paccantato āgantvā nakkhattaṃ paṭimānento bahinagare khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1082_1: Atha tā pañcasatā itthiyo rañño paccuggamanaṃ āgantvā āhaṃsu – “tvaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0401a:1082_6: Rājā taṃ kāraṇaṃ na upaparikkhitvāva “amanussajātikā bhavissatī”ti taṃ gehato nikkaḍḍhi.
atk-s0401a:1082_7: Tassā rājagehato saha nikkhamaneneva padumapupphāni antaradhāyiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:1082_10: Atha naṃ ekā vayappattā mahallikā itthī disvā dhītusinehaṃ uppādetvā “kahaṃ gacchasi ammā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1083_0: Tassā imināva niyāmena tattha vasamānāya tā pañcasatā itthiyo ekacittā hutvā rājānaṃ āhaṃsu –
atk-s0401a:1083_2: tumhesu yuddhaṃ gatesu amhehi gaṅgādevatāya ‘amhākaṃ deve vijitasaṅgāme āgate balikammaṃ katvā udakakīḷaṃ karissāmā’ti patthitaṃ atthi,
atk-s0401a:1083_5: Rājā tāsaṃ vacanena tuṭṭho gaṅgāyaṃ udakakīḷaṃ kātuṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:1083_6: Tāpi attanā attanā gahitaṃ karaṇḍakaṃ paṭicchannaṃ katvā ādāya nadiṃ gantvā tesaṃ karaṇḍakānaṃ paṭicchādanatthaṃ
atk-s0401a:1083_7: pārupitvā pārupitvā udake patitvā karaṇḍake vissajjesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1083_8: Tepi kho karaṇḍakā sabbe saha gantvā heṭṭhāsote pasāritajālamhi laggiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1083_9: Tato udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā rañño uttiṇṇakāle jālaṃ ukkhipantā te karaṇḍake disvā rañño santikaṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1083_13: So te karaṇḍake vivarāpetvā olokento paṭhamaṃ mahāpadumakumārassa karaṇḍakaṃ vivarāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1083_14: Tesaṃ pana sabbesampi karaṇḍakesu nipajjāpitadivaseyeva puññiddhiyā aṅguṭṭhato khīraṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:1083_15: Sakko devarājā tassa rañño nikkaṅkhabhāvatthaṃ antokaraṇḍake akkharāni likhāpesi “ime kumārā padumavatiyā kucchimhi nibbattā bārāṇasirañño puttā,
atk-s0401a:1083_16: atha ne padumavatiyā sapattiyo pañcasatā itthiyo karaṇḍakesu pakkhipitvā udake khipiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:1083_18: Karaṇḍake vivaritamatte rājā akkharāni vācetvā dārake disvā mahāpadumakumāraṃ ukkhipitvā “vegena rathe yojetha,
atk-s0401a:1083_20: ahaṃ ajja antonagaraṃ pavisitvā ekaccānaṃ mātugāmānaṃ piyaṃ karissāmī”ti pāsādaṃ āruyha hatthigīvāya
atk-s0401a:1083_21: sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ ṭhapetvā bheriṃ carāpesi “yo padumavatiṃ passati,
atk-s0401a:1084_0: Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā padumavatī mātuyā saññaṃ adāsi –
atk-s0401a:1084_7: Sā “yaṃ vā taṃ vā hotū”ti gantvā sahassacaṅkoṭakaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:1084_13: ammā”ti vatvā tāya saddhiṃ gantvā padumavatiṃ sañjānitvā pādesu nipatiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1084_14: Tasmiṃ kāle sā “padumavatī devī aya”nti ñatvā “bhāriyaṃ vata itthiyā kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0401a:1084_15: yā evaṃvidhassa rañño mahesī samānā evarūpe ṭhāne nirārakkhā vasī”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1084_16: Tepi rājapurisā padumavatiyā nivesanaṃ setasāṇīhi parikkhipāpetvā dvāre ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1084_19: mama vasanaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya yāva rājagehaṃ etthantare varapotthakacittattharaṇe attharāpetvā upari suvaṇṇatārakavicittaṃ
atk-s0401a:1084_20: celavitānaṃ bandhāpetvā pasādhanatthāya sabbālaṅkāresu pahitesu padasāva gamissāmi,
atk-s0401a:1084_21: evaṃ me nāgarā sampattiṃ passissantī”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1084_23: Tato padumavatī sabbapasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā “rājagehaṃ gamissāmī”ti maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0401a:1084_24: Athassā akkantaakkantaṭṭhāne varapotthakacittattharaṇāni bhinditvā padumapupphāni uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1084_25: Sā mahājanassa attano sampattiṃ dassetvā rājanivesanaṃ āruyha sabbe cittattharaṇe tassā mahallikāya posāvanikamūlaṃ katvā dāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1085_0: Rājāpi kho tā pañcasatā itthiyo pakkosāpetvā “imāyo te devi dāsiyo katvā demī”ti āha. Sādhu, mahārāja,
atk-s0401a:1085_3: “padumavatiyā dūbbhikā pañcasatā itthiyo etissā eva dāsiyo katvā dinnā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1085_4: Sā “tāsaṃ sakalanagarena dāsibhāvo sallakkhito”ti ñatvā “ahaṃ mama dāsiyo bhujissā kātuṃ labhāmi devā”ti rājānaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0401a:1085_6: Evaṃ sante tameva bhericārikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “padumavatideviyā attano dāsiyo katvā dinnā pañcasatā itthiyo
atk-s0401a:1085_7: sabbāva bhujissā katāti puna bheriṃ carāpethā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1085_8: Sā tāsaṃ bhujissabhāve kate ekūnāni pañcasattaputtāni tāsaṃyeva hatthe posanatthāya datvā sayaṃ mahāpadumakumāraṃyeva gaṇhi.
atk-s0401a:1086_0: Atha aparabhāge tesaṃ kumārānaṃ kīḷanavaye sampatte rājā uyyāne nānāvidhaṃ kīḷanaṭṭhānaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0401a:1086_1: Te attano soḷasavassuddesikakāle sabbeva ekato hutvā uyyāne padumasañchannāya maṅgalapokkharaṇiyā kīḷantā
atk-s0401a:1086_2: navapadumāni pupphitāni purāṇapadumāni ca vaṇṭato patantāni disvā “imassa tāva anupādinnakassa evarūpā
atk-s0401a:1086_5: Idampi hi evaṃgatikameva bhavissatī”ti ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā sabbeva paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ nibbattetvā uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya padumakaṇṇikāsu pallaṅkena nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1087_0: Atha tehi saddhiṃ āgatā rājapurisā bahugataṃ divasaṃ ñatvā “ayyaputtā tumhākaṃ velaṃ jānāthā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1087_7: Te sabbarattiṃ gahitārakkhā padumakaṇṇikāsu nisinnaniyāmeneva aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1087_8: Purisā punadivase upasaṅkamitvā “devā velaṃ jānāthā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1087_17: Tato passantasseva mahājanassa ākāsena nandamūlakapabbhāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1088_2: “ahaṃ bahuputtā hutvā niputtā jātā”ti hadayasokaṃ patvā teneva sokena kālaṃ katvā rājagahanagaradvāragāmake
atk-s0401a:1088_4: Aparabhāge kulagharaṃ gantvā ekadivasaṃ sāmikassa khettaṃ yāguṃ haramānā tesaṃ attano puttānaṃ antare
atk-s0401a:1088_5: aṭṭha paccekabuddhe bhikkhācāravelāya ākāsena gacchante disvā sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gantvā sāmikassa ārocesi – “passa, ayya,
atk-s0401a:1088_10: Te tesaṃ kathentānaṃyeva avidūre ṭhāne otariṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1088_11: Sā itthī taṃdivasaṃ attano bhattakhajjabhojanaṃ tesaṃ datvā “svepi aṭṭha janā mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha. Sādhu, upāsike,
atk-s0401a:1088_14: aññepi bahū paccekabuddhe disvā tava cittaṃ pasādeyyāsīti.
atk-s0401a:1088_15: Sā punadivase aṭṭha āsanāni paññāpetvā aṭṭhannaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ paṭiyādetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1089_1: ajja aññattha agantvā sabbeva tumhākaṃ mātu saṅgahaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1089_2: Te tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā sabbeva ekato ākāsena āgantvā mātu-
atk-s0401a:1089_4: Sāpi paṭhamaṃ laddhasaññatāya bahūpi disvā na kampittha,
atk-s0401a:1089_5: sabbepi te gehaṃ pavesetvā āsanesu nisīdāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1089_6: Tesu paṭipāṭiyā nisīdantesu navamo aññāni aṭṭha āsanāni māpetvā sayaṃ dhurāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1089_9: Evaṃ tesu sabbesupi nisinnesu sā itthī aṭṭhannaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ paṭiyāditaṃ sakkāraṃ pañcasatānampi
atk-s0401a:1089_10: yāvadatthaṃ datvā aṭṭha nīluppalahatthake āharitvā nimantitapaccekabuddhānaṃyeva pādamūle ṭhapetvā āha – “mayhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0401a:1089_11: nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sarīravaṇṇo imesaṃ nīluppalānaṃ antogabbhavaṇṇo viya hotū”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:1089_12: Paccekabuddhā mātu anumodanaṃ katvā gandhamādanaṃyeva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1090_0: Sāpi yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhikule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0401a:1090_2: Athassā vayappattakāle sakalajambudīparājāno ca seṭṭhino ca seṭṭhissa santikaṃ pahiṇiṃsu –
atk-s0401a:1090_7: upāyaṃ panekaṃ karissāmī”ti dhītaraṃ pakkosāpetvā “pabbajituṃ amma sakkhissasī”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1090_8: Tassā pacchimabhavikattā pituvacanaṃ sīse āsittasatapākatelaṃ viya ahosi,
atk-s0401a:1090_11: So tassā sakkāraṃ katvā bhikkhuniupassayaṃ netvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0401a:1090_12: Tassā acirapabbajitāya eva uposathāgāre kālavāro pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1090_13: Sā dīpaṃ jāletvā uposathāgāraṃ sammajjitvā dīpasikhāya nimittaṃ gaṇhitvā punappunaṃ olokayamānā tejokasiṇārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0401a:1090_14: jhānaṃ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1090_15: Arahattaphalena saddhiṃyeva ca iddhivikubbane ciṇṇavasī ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1090_18: Satthā idaṃ kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā jetavanavihāre nisinno paṭipāṭiyā bhikkhuniyo ṭhānantare ṭhapento
atk-s0401a:1092_1: Catutthe vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ paṭācārāti paṭācārā therī vinayadharānaṃ aggāti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1092_2: Sā kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā aparabhāge satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1092_3: suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ
atk-s0401a:1092_5: Sā yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsaritvā kassapabuddhakāle kikissa kāsirañño gehe paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0401a:1092_6: gaṇhitvā sattannaṃ bhaginīnaṃ abbhantarā hutvā vīsati vassasahassāni brahmacariyaṃ caritvā bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0401a:1092_7: pariveṇaṃ katvā puna devaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ sampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde
atk-s0401a:1093_0: Sā aparabhāge vayappattā attano gehe ekena kammakārena saddhiṃ santhavaṃ katvā aparabhāge attano samānajātikaṃ
atk-s0401a:1093_1: kulaṃ gacchantī katasanthavassa purisassa saññaṃ adāsi –
atk-s0401a:1093_2: “na tvaṃ sve paṭṭhāya maṃ paṭihārasatenapi daṭṭhuṃ labhissasi,
atk-s0401a:1093_5: So “evaṃ hotū”ti anucchavikaṃ hatthasāraṃ gahetvā taṃ ādāya nagarato tīṇi cattāri yojanāni paṭikkamitvā ekasmiṃ gāmake vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0401a:1094_0: Atha aparabhāge tassā kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:1094_4: sve gacchāmā”ti gantuṃ asakkonto kālaṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0401a:1094_5: Sā tassa kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “nāyaṃ bālo maṃ nessatī”ti tasmiṃ bahi gate “ekikāva kulagehaṃ gamissāmī”ti maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0401a:1094_6: So āgantvā taṃ gehe apassanto paṭivissake pucchitvā “kulagehaṃ gatā”ti sutvā “maṃ nissāya kuladhītā anāthā jātā”ti padānupadikaṃ gantvā sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1094_11: Puna tassā kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhāsīti purimanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:1095_0: Antarāmagge panassā gabbhavuṭṭhāne jātamatteyeva catūsu disāsu mahāmegho uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0401a:1095_4: So “evaṃ karissāmī”ti daṇḍakehi kuṭikaṃ katvā “chadanatthāya tiṇaṃ āharissāmī”ti ekasmiṃ mahāvammikapāde tiṇaṃ chindati.
atk-s0401a:1095_5: Atha naṃ vammike nipanno kaṇhasappo pāde ḍaṃsi,

atk-s0401a:1133_22: taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ āharitvā mātāpitūnaṃ gehaṃ pūreti.
atk-s0401a:1133_23: Pitā naṃ kāraṇasahassampi vatvā vāretuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0401a:1134_0: Aparabhāge panassa vayappattassa sabbākārenāpi vāretuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvaṃ ñatvā dve nīlasāṭake datvā sandhicchedanaupakaraṇañca
atk-s0401a:1134_1: siṅghāṭakayantañca hatthe datvā “tvaṃ imināva kammena jīvāhī”ti naṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0401a:1134_2: So taṃdivasato paṭṭhāya siṅghāṭakayantaṃ khipitvā kulānaṃ pāsāde āruyha sandhiṃ chinditvā parakulesu
atk-s0401a:1134_3: nikkhittabhaṇḍaṃ attanā ṭhapitaṃ viya gahetvā gacchati.
atk-s0401a:1134_5: Ekadivasaṃ rājā rathena nagare vicaranto sārathiṃ pucchi –
atk-s0401a:1134_6: “kiṃ nu kho imasmiṃ nagare tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ghare chiddameva paññāyatī”ti.
atk-s0401a:1134_7: Deva imasmiṃ nagare sattuko nāma coro bhittiṃ chinditvā kulānaṃ santakaṃ haratīti.
atk-s0401a:1134_8: Rājā nagaraguttikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “imasmiṃ kira nagare evarūpo nāma coro atthi,
atk-s0401a:1134_9: kasmā naṃ na gaṇhasī”ti āha. Mayaṃ, deva,
atk-s0401a:1134_10: taṃ coraṃ sahoḍḍhaṃ passituṃ na sakkomāti.
atk-s0401a:1134_11: Sace ajja naṃ coraṃ gaṇhasi, jīvasi.
atk-s0401a:1134_14: Evaṃ devāti nagaraguttiko sakalanagare manusse cāretvā taṃ bhittiṃ chinditvā parabhaṇḍaṃ avaharantaṃ sahoḍḍhameva gahetvā rañño dassesi.
atk-s0401a:1134_15: Rājā “imaṃ coraṃ dakkhiṇadvārena nīharitvā ghātethā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1134_16: Nagaraguttiko rañño paṭissuṇitvā taṃ coraṃ catukke catukke pahārasahassena tāḷento gāhāpetvā dakkhiṇadvāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0401a:1135_0: Tasmiṃ samaye ayaṃ bhaddā nāma seṭṭhidhītā mahājanassa kolāhalasaddena sīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭetvā olokentī
atk-s0401a:1135_1: taṃ sattukaṃ coraṃ tathā nīyamānaṃ disvā ubhohi hatthehi hadayaṃ sandhārentī gantvā sirisayane adhomukhā nipajji.
atk-s0401a:1135_3: tenassā ñātakā appamattakampi mukhavikāraṃ sahituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0401a:1135_4: Atha naṃ mātā sayane nipannaṃ disvā “kiṃ karosi,
atk-s0401a:1135_6: Etaṃ vajjhaṃ katvā nīyamānaṃ coraṃ addasa, ammāti? Āma, ammāti.
atk-s0401a:1135_9: Te taṃ nānappakārenapi saññāpetuṃ asakkontā “maraṇā jīvitaṃ seyyo”ti sallakkhesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1135_10: Athassā pitā nagaraguttikassa santikaṃ gantvā sahassaṃ lañjaṃ datvā “mayhaṃ dhītā core paṭibaddhacittā,
atk-s0401a:1135_11: yena kenaci upāyena imaṃ muñcā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1135_12: So “sādhū”ti seṭṭhissa paṭissuṇitvā coraṃ gahetvā yāva sūriyassa atthaṅgamanā ito cito ca papañcāpetvā
atk-s0401a:1135_13: sūriye atthaṅgate cārakato ekaṃ manussaṃ nīharāpetvā sattukassa bandhanaṃ mocetvā sattukaṃ seṭṭhigehaṃ
atk-s0401a:1135_14: pesetvā tena bandhanena itaraṃ bandhitvā dakkhiṇadvārena nīharitvā ghātesi.
atk-s0401a:1135_15: Seṭṭhidāsāpi sattukaṃ gahetvā seṭṭhino nivesanaṃ āgamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1135_16: Taṃ disvā seṭṭhi “dhītu manaṃ pūressāmī”ti sattukaṃ gandhodakena nhāpetvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ kāretvā pāsādaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0401a:1135_17: Bhaddāpi “paripuṇṇo me saṅkappo”ti anekālaṅkārena alaṅkaritvā taṃ paricarati.
atk-s0401a:1136_2: kenaci upāyena imaṃ ābharaṇaṃ gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti samīpe sukhena nisinnakāle bhaddaṃ āha –
atk-s0401a:1136_4: Seṭṭhidhītā sahassalābhaṃ labhitvā viya tuṭṭhamānasā “vissatthaṃ vadehi,
atk-s0401a:1136_8: ahaṃ pana gahitamattova corapapātapabbate adhivatthāya devatāya “sacāhaṃ jīvitaṃ labhissāmi,
atk-s0401a:1136_12: “ahaṃ tassa manaṃ pūressāmī”ti balikammaṃ sajjāpetvā sabbaṃ pasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā ekayāne āruyha sāmikena
atk-s0401a:1136_13: saddhiṃ corapapātapabbataṃ gantvā “pabbatadevatāya balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti abhiruhituṃ āraddhā.
atk-s0401a:1136_15: “sabbesu abhiruhantesu mama imissā ābharaṇaṃ gahetuṃ na okāso bhavissatī”ti tameva balibhājanaṃ gāhāpetvā pabbataṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0401a:1137_0: So bhaddāya saddhiṃ kathento piyakathaṃ na katheti.
atk-s0401a:1137_3: tava uttarisāṭakaṃ omuñcitvā kāyāruḷhaṃ te pasādhanaṃ ettha bhaṇḍikaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0401a:1137_7: Ahañhi imissā devatāya yakanaṃ ubbaṭṭhetvā dadeyyaṃ,
atk-s0401a:1137_8: balikammāpadesena pana tava ābharaṇaṃ gaṇhitukāmo hutvā āgatomhīti.
atk-s0401a:1137_16: alaṅkataniyāmeneva me purato ca pacchato ca āliṅgituṃ dethāti.
atk-s0401a:1137_18: Sā tena sampaṭicchitabhāvaṃ ñatvā purato āliṅgitvā pacchato āliṅgantī viya hutvā pabbatapapāte pātesi.
atk-s0401a:1137_20: Tāya kataṃ vicitrabhāvaṃ disvā pabbate adhivatthā devatā guṇakittanavasena imā gāthā āha –
atk-s0401a:1138_0: “Na so sabbesu ṭhānesu, puriso hoti paṇḍito;
atk-s0401a:1139_0: Itthīpi paṇḍitā hoti, tattha tattha vicakkhaṇā.
atk-s0401a:1140_0: “Na so sabbesu ṭhānesu, puriso hoti paṇḍito;
atk-s0401a:1142_1: “na sakkā mayā iminā niyāmena puna gehaṃ gantuṃ,
atk-s0401a:1142_8: Te “sādhū”ti tassā tālaṭṭhinā kese luñcitvā pabbājesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1142_9: Kesā puna vaḍḍhantā rāsirāsivasena kuṇḍalāvattā hutvā vaḍḍhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1142_10: Sā teneva kāraṇena kuṇḍalakesā nāma jātā.
atk-s0401a:1142_11: Sā attano pabbajitaṭṭhāne sabbasippaṃ uggaṇhitvā “etesaṃ ito uttari viseso natthī”ti ñatvā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo
atk-s0401a:1142_13: tattha tattha gantvā tesaṃ jānanasippaṃ sabbameva uggaṇhāti.
atk-s0401a:1142_14: Athassā bahūsu ṭhānesu sikkhitabhāvena paṭivādaṃ dātuṃ samatthā na honti.
atk-s0401a:1142_15: Sā attanā saddhiṃ kathetuṃ samatthaṃ adisvā yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā pavisati,
atk-s0401a:1142_16: tassa dvāre vālukarāsiṃ katvā tattha jambusākhaṃ ṭhapeti.
atk-s0401a:1142_18: so imaṃ sākhaṃ maddatū”ti samīpe ṭhitānaṃ dārakānaṃ saññaṃ deti.
atk-s0401a:1143_0: Tasmiṃ samaye amhākaṃ bhagavā loke nibbattitvā sāvatthiṃ upanissāya jetavane viharati.
atk-s0401a:1143_1: Kuṇḍalakesāpi kho anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā antonagaraṃ pavisamānā porāṇakaniyāmeneva vālukārāsimhi sākhaṃ ṭhapetvā dārakānaṃ saññaṃ datvā pāvisi.
atk-s0401a:1143_2: Tasmiṃ samaye dhammasenāpati bhikkhusaṅghe paviṭṭhe ekakova nagaraṃ pavisanto vālukāthūpe jambusākhaṃ disvā “kasmā ayaṃ ṭhapitā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0401a:1143_4: Evaṃ sante imaṃ gahetvā maddatha, dārakāti.
atk-s0401a:1143_5: Tesu therassa vacanaṃ sutvā ekacce maddituṃ na visahiṃsu,
atk-s0401a:1143_7: Kuṇḍalakesā bhattakiccaṃ katvā nikkhamantī taṃ sākhaṃ madditaṃ disvā “kassetaṃ kamma”nti pucchi.
atk-s0401a:1143_9: Sā “attano thāmaṃ ajānanto imaṃ sākhaṃ maddāpetuṃ no visahissati,
atk-s0401a:1143_11: Ahampi pana khuddikā bhavantī na sobhissāmi,
atk-s0401a:1143_12: antogāmameva pavisitvā parisāya saññaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0401a:1143_13: Asītikulasahassanivāse nagare sabhāgasabhāgavasena sabbeva sañjāniṃsūti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:1144_0: Theropi bhattakiccaṃ katvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1144_1: Athāyaṃ kuṇḍalakesā mahājanaparivutā therassa santikaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ ṭhatvā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:1144_4: Evaṃ sante tumhehi saddhiṃ amhākaṃ vādo hotu, bhanteti. Hotu, bhaddeti.
atk-s0401a:1144_9: Sā therena dinnaanumatiyā sabbameva attano jānanakaṃ vādaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0401a:1144_21: Sā therassa pādesu patitvā “tumhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi,
atk-s0401a:1144_27: bhante”ti sāyanhasamaye satthu dhammadesanāvelāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:1144_28: Satthā tassā madditasaṅkhārāya cariyāvasena dhammapade imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:1146_0: Ekaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammatī”ti. ;
atk-s0401a:1147_0: Sā gāthāpariyosāne yathāṭhitāva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0401a:1147_6: Satthā taṃ kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā theriṃ khippābhiññānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1149_1: Dasame pubbenivāsanti pubbe nivutthakkhandhasantānaṃ anussarantīnaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī aggāti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1149_2: Sā kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1149_3: ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:1149_4: Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā anuppanne buddhe bārāṇasiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā
atk-s0401a:1149_5: attano sāmibhaginiyā saddhiṃ kalahaṃ karontī tāya paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapāte dinne,
atk-s0401a:1149_6: “ayaṃ imassa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā attano vasaṃ vattetī”ti paccekabuddhassa hatthato pattaṃ gaṇhitvā bhattaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalassa pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:1149_11: Sā tesaṃ vacanena lajjāyamānā puna pattaṃ gahetvā kalalaṃ hāretvā dhovitvā gandhacuṇṇena ubbaṭṭetvā catumadhurassa
atk-s0401a:1149_12: pūretvā upari āsittena padumagabbhavaṇṇena sappinā vijjotamānaṃ paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapetvā “yathā
atk-s0401a:1149_14: evaṃ obhāsajātaṃ me sarīraṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesīti sabbaṃ mahākassapattherassa vatthumhi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0401a:1150_0: Mahākassapatthero pana dakkhiṇamaggaṃ gahetvā dasabalassa santikaṃ bahuputtakanigrodhamūlaṃ gato,
atk-s0401a:1150_1: ayaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī vāmamaggaṃ gaṇhitvā mātugāmassa pabbajjāya ananuññātabhāvena paribbājikārāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:1150_2: Yadā pana mahāpajāpatigotamī pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhi,
atk-s0401a:1150_3: tadā sā therī theriyā santike pabbajjañca upasampadañca labhitvā aparabhāge vipassanāya kammaṃ karontī
atk-s0401a:1150_5: Atha satthā jetavane nisīditvā bhikkhuniyo paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento imaṃ theriṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1152_4: Ekassa hi buddhassa cattārova janā mahābhiññā honti,
atk-s0401a:1152_9: Amhākampi satthu sāsane dve aggasāvakā bākulatthero bhaddā kaccānāti ime cattāro ettakaṃ anussarituṃ sakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1152_10: Tasmā ayaṃ therī mahābhiññāppattānaṃ aggā nāma jātā.
atk-s0401a:1152_12: Bhaddakañcanassa hi uttamasuvaṇṇassa viya tassā sarīravaṇṇo ahosi,
atk-s0401a:1153_0: Sā hi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā aparabhāge satthu dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0401a:1153_1: suṇantī satthāraṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ mahābhiññāppattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā
atk-s0401a:1153_3: Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde suppabuddhasakkassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0401a:1154_1: Sā aparabhāge rāhulakumāraṃ nāma puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0401a:1154_2: Tassa jātadivaseva bodhisatto nikkhamitvā bodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutaṃ patvā lokānuggahaṃ karonto anupubbena kapilavatthuṃ āgamma ñātīnaṃ saṅgahaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:1154_3: Aparabhāge parinibbute suddhodanamahārāje mahāpajāpatigotamī pañcahi mātugāmasatehi saddhiṃ satthu santike pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:1154_4: Rāhulamātāpi janapadakalyāṇīpi theriyā santikaṃ gantvā pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:1154_5: Sā pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya bhaddakaccānattherītveva pākaṭā ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1154_6: Sā aparabhāge vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā abhiññāsu ciṇṇavasī ahosi,
atk-s0401a:1154_7: ekapallaṅkena nisinnā ekāvajjanena kappasatasahassādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ anussarati.
atk-s0401a:1154_8: Tassā tasmiṃ guṇe pākaṭe jāte satthā jetavane nisinno bhikkhuniyo paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapento imaṃ theriṃ mahābhiññāppattānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1156_1: Dvādasame lūkhacīvaradharānanti tīhi lūkhehi samannāgataṃ paṃsukūlaṃ dhārentīnaṃ,
atk-s0401a:1156_6: Ayampi padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbattitvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1156_7: ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:1156_8: Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ duggatakule nibbattitvā vayappattakāle ekaṃ kulaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:1157_2: So panassā dārako ādhāvitvā paridhāvitvā kīḷanavaye ṭhito kālamakāsi,
atk-s0401a:1157_4: Sā “ahaṃ imasmiṃyeva gehe hatalābhasakkārā hutvā puttassa jātakālato paṭṭhāya sakkāraṃ pāpuṇiṃ,
atk-s0401a:1157_5: ime mayhaṃ puttaṃ bahi chaḍḍetumpi vāyameyyu”nti puttaṃ aṅkenādāya “puttassa me bhesajjaṃ dethā”ti gehadvārapaṭipāṭiyā vicarati.
atk-s0401a:1157_6: Diṭṭhadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne manussā “kattha te matakassa bhesajjaṃ diṭṭhapubba”nti pāṇiṃ paharitvā parihāsaṃ karonti.
atk-s0401a:1157_7: Sā tesaṃ kathāya neva saññattiṃ gacchati.
atk-s0401a:1157_10: etissā pana bhesajjaṃ na añño jānissati,
atk-s0401a:1157_12: tava puttassa bhesajjaṃ añño jānanto nāma natthi,
atk-s0401a:1157_13: sadevake pana loke aggapuggalo dasabalo dhuravihāre vasati,
atk-s0401a:1157_15: Sā “saccaṃ puriso kathetī”ti puttamādāya tathāgatassa buddhāsane nisinnavelāya parisapariyante ṭhatvā “puttassa me bhesajjaṃ detha bhagavā”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1158_0: Satthā tassā upanissayaṃ disvā “bhaddakaṃ te gotami kataṃ bhesajjatthāya idhāgacchantiyā,
atk-s0401a:1158_1: gaccha nagaraṃ pavisitvā koṭito paṭṭhāya sakalanagaraṃ caritvā yasmiṃ gehe koci matapubbo natthi,
atk-s0401a:1158_4: bhante”ti tuṭṭhamānasā antonagaraṃ pavisitvā paṭhamageheyeva “dasabalo mama puttassa bhesajjatthāya siddhatthakaṃ āharāpeti,
atk-s0401a:1158_8: imasmiṃ gehe koci matapubbo nāma natthīti?
atk-s0401a:1158_14: Sā imināva niyāmena tatiyagharaṃ gantvā cintesi –
atk-s0401a:1158_16: idaṃ hitānukampakena buddhena diṭṭhaṃ bhavissatī”ti saṃvegaṃ labhitvā tatova bahi nikkhamitvā āmakasusānaṃ gantvā puttaṃ hatthena gahetvā, “puttaka,
atk-s0401a:1158_17: ahaṃ imaṃ maraṇaṃ taveva uppannanti cintesiṃ,
atk-s0401a:1158_19: mahājanasādhāraṇo esa dhammo”ti vatvā puttaṃ āmakasusāne chaḍḍetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:1163_0: Evañca pana vatvā satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:1165_0: Suttaṃ gāmaṃ mahoghova, maccu ādāya gacchatī”ti. ;
atk-s0401a:1166_0: Sā gāthāpariyosāne yathāṭhitāva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya pabbajjaṃ yāci,
atk-s0401a:1166_2: Sā tikkhattuṃ satthāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vanditvā bhikkhuniupassayaṃ gantvā pabbajjañca upasampadañca
atk-s0401a:1166_3: labhitvā nacirasseva yonisomanasikāre kammaṃ karontī vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhesi.
atk-s0401a:1167_0: “Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, apassaṃ amataṃ padaṃ;
atk-s0401a:1168_0: Ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, passato amataṃ pada”nti. ;
atk-s0401a:1169_0: Sā gāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pattā parikkhāravalañje paramukkaṭṭhā hutvā tīhi lūkhehi samannāgataṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā vicari.
atk-s0401a:1169_1: Aparabhāge satthā jetavane nisinno bhikkhuniyo paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapento imaṃ theriṃ lūkhacīvaradharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1171_4: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulaghare nibbattā satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇantī satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1171_5: ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:1171_6: Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahanagare seṭṭhikule nibbattā samānajātikaṃ kulaṃ gantvā ekaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi,
atk-s0401a:1171_8: Sāpi teneva kāraṇena siṅgālakamātā nāma jātā.
atk-s0401a:1171_9: Sā ekadivasaṃ satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā paṭiladdhasaddhā satthu santikaṃ gantvā pabbaji.
atk-s0401a:1171_11: Sā dhammassavanatthāya vihāraṃ gantvā dasabalassa sarīrasampattiṃ olokayamānāva tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0401a:1171_12: Satthā tassā saddhālakkhaṇe abhiniviṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā sappāyaṃ katvā pasādanīyameva dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0401a:1171_13: Sāpi therī saddhālakkhaṇameva dhuraṃ katvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1171_14: Atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge jetavane nisīditvā bhikkhuniyo paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapento imaṃ theriṃ saddhādhimuttānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1177_1: Upāsakapāḷiyā paṭhame paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānanti sabbapaṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānaṃ tapusso ca bhalliko cāti ime dve vāṇijā aggāti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1177_2: Ime kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā aparabhāge satthu dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1177_3: suṇantā satthāraṃ dve upāsake paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1177_5: Te kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bodhisattassa sabbaññutaññāṇapattito puretarameva asitañjananagare kuṭumbiyagehe nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1178_0: Te aparena samayena gharāvāsaṃ vasantā kālena kālaṃ pañca sakaṭasatāni yojāpetvā vāṇijakammaṃ karontā caranti.
atk-s0401a:1178_1: Tasmiṃ samaye amhākaṃ bodhisatto sabbaññutaṃ patvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe viharitvā aṭṭhame sattāhe rājāyatanamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1178_2: Tasmiṃ samaye te vāṇijā pañcamattehi sakaṭasatehi taṃ ṭhānaṃ anuppattā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1178_3: Tesaṃ anantare attabhāve mātā tasmiṃ padese devatā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:1178_6: Na hi sakkā ito paraṃ nirāhārehi yāpetuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1178_7: Ime ca me puttā iminā maggena gacchanti,
atk-s0401a:1178_8: tehi ajja buddhānaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pañcasu sakaṭasatesu yuttagoṇānaṃ gamanupacchedaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0401a:1178_10: Atha tesaṃ kilamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā ekassa purisassa sarīre adhimuccitvā “kiṃ kāraṇā kilamatha?
atk-s0401a:1178_11: Tumhākaṃ añño yakkhāvaṭṭo vā bhūtāvaṭṭo vā nāgāvaṭṭo vā natthi,
atk-s0401a:1178_12: ahaṃ pana vo atītattabhāve mātā imasmiṃ ṭhāne bhummadevatā hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0401a:1179_0: Te tassā kathaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhamānasā hutvā manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca suvaṇṇathālakena ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā “imaṃ bhojanaṃ paṭiggaṇhatha,
atk-s0401a:1179_3: athassa cattāro mahārājāno selamaye patte upanāmesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1179_4: Satthā “tesaṃ mahapphalaṃ hotū”ti cattāropi patte “ekova patto hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:1179_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe te vāṇijā tathāgatassa patte manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca patiṭṭhapetvā paribhuttakāle udakaṃ
atk-s0401a:1179_6: datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne satthāraṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1179_8: desanāpariyosāne dvepi janā dvevācike saraṇe patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ abhivādetvā attano nagaraṃ gantukāmā, “bhante,
atk-s0401a:1179_10: Satthā dakkhiṇena hatthena sīsaṃ parāmasitvā dvinnampi janānaṃ aṭṭha kesadhātuyo adāsi.
atk-s0401a:1179_11: Te ubhopi janā kesadhātuyo suvaṇṇasamuggesu ṭhapetvā attano nagaraṃ netvā asitañjananagaradvāre jīvakesadhātuyā cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1179_14: Satthā pana aparabhāge jetavane nisīditvā upāsake paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento ime dve jane paṭhamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchantānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1181_3: So kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0401a:1181_4: upāsakaṃ dāyakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:1181_5: So kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ sumanaseṭṭhissa gehe nibbatti,
atk-s0401a:1182_0: So aparabhāge gharāvāse patiṭṭhito dāyako dānapati hutvā teneva guṇena patthaṭanāmadheyyo anāthapiṇḍiko nāma ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1182_1: So pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya rājagahe attano piyasahāyakassa seṭṭhino gehaṃ gantvā tattha buddhassa
atk-s0401a:1182_2: bhagavato uppannabhāvaṃ sutvā balavapaccūsakāle devatānubhāvena vivaṭena dvārena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0401a:1182_3: dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya dutiyadivase ca buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ
atk-s0401a:1182_4: datvā sāvatthiṃ āgamanatthāya satthu paṭiññaṃ gahetvā antarāmagge pañcacattālīsayojanamagge satasahassaṃ
atk-s0401a:1182_5: satasahassaṃ datvā yojanikavihāre kāretvā jetavanaṃ koṭisanthārena santharitvā aṭṭhārasahi koṭīhi kiṇitvā
atk-s0401a:1182_6: aṭṭhārasahi koṭīhi vihāraṃ kāretvā vihāre niṭṭhite catunnaṃ parisānaṃ purebhattapacchābhattesu yadicchakaṃ
atk-s0401a:1182_7: dānaṃ dadanto aṭṭhārasahi koṭīhi vihāramahaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0401a:1183_0: Evaṃ catupaṇṇāsakoṭidhanaṃ vissajjetvā niccakālaṃ gehe evarūpaṃ dānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0401a:1183_11: Atha naṃ aparabhāge satthā jetavane nisinno upāsake paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento dāyakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1185_1: Tatiye dhammakathikānanti dhammakathikānaṃ upāsakānaṃ citto, gahapati,
atk-s0401a:1185_3: So kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto aparabhāge dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1185_4: ekaṃ upāsakaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:1185_5: So kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā kassapabuddhakāle migaluddakagehe nibbatto aparabhāge araññe
atk-s0401a:1185_6: kammaṃ kātuṃ samatthakāle ekadivasaṃ deve vassante migamāraṇatthāya sattiṃ ādāya araññaṃ gantvā migarūpāni
atk-s0401a:1185_7: olokento ekasmiṃ akatapabbhāre sasīsaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ pārupitvā pāsāṇaphalake nisinnaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā
atk-s0401a:1185_8: “eko ayyo samaṇadhammaṃ karonto nisinno bhavissatī”ti saññaṃ uppādetvā vegena gharaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ uddhane
atk-s0401a:1185_10: ekasmiṃ bhattaṃ pacāpetvā piṇḍācārike dve bhikkhū disvā tesaṃ pattaṃ ādāya paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā bhikkhaṃ samādāpetvā, “ayye,
atk-s0401a:1185_11: parivisathā”ti aññe āṇāpetvā taṃ bhattaṃ kuṭe pakkhipitvā paṇṇena mukhaṃ bandhitvā kuṭaṃ ādāya gacchanto
atk-s0401a:1185_12: antarāmagge nānāvidhāni pupphāni ocinitvā pattapuṭakena gahetvā therassa nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā kuṭaṃ
atk-s0401a:1185_14: saṅgahaṃ karothā”ti vatvā therassa pattaṃ ādāya bhattassa pūretvā therassa hatthe patiṭṭhapetvā tehi
atk-s0401a:1185_15: missakapupphehi theraṃ pūjetvā ekamante ṭhito “yathāyaṃ rasapiṇḍapātena saddhiṃ pupphapūjā cittaṃ paritoseti,
atk-s0401a:1185_16: evaṃ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me paṇṇākārasahassāni ceva āgacchantu pañcavaṇṇakusumavassañca vassatū”ti āha.
atk-s0401a:1186_0: Thero tassa upanissayaṃ disvā dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā adāsi.
atk-s0401a:1186_1: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti,
atk-s0401a:1186_3: sayañca aññāhi devatāhi adhikatarena rūpena samannāgato ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1186_4: So ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde magadharaṭṭhe macchikāsaṇḍanagare seṭṭhikule nibbatti,
atk-s0401a:1186_5: jātakālevassa sakalanagare jaṇṇumattena odhinā pañcavaṇṇakusumavassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0401a:1186_6: Athassa mātāpitaro “amhākaṃ putto attanāva attano nāmaṃ gahetvā āgato,
atk-s0401a:1186_7: jātadivasevassa sakalanagaraṃ pañcavaṇṇehi pupphehi vicittaṃ jāta”nti cittakumāroti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1187_0: So aparabhāge gharāvāse patiṭṭhito pitu accayena tasmiṃ nagare seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1187_1: Tasmiṃ samaye pañcavaggiyattherānaṃ abbhantaro mahānāmatthero nāma macchikāsaṇḍanagaraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:1187_2: Citto gahapati tassa iriyāpathe pasīditvā pattaṃ ādāya gehaṃ ānetvā piṇḍapātena patimānetvā katabhattakiccaṃ
atk-s0401a:1187_3: ambāṭakārāmaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ netvā tatthassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kāretvā nibaddhaṃ attano gehe piṇḍapātaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0401a:1187_5: Theropi tassa upanissayaṃ disvā dhammaṃ desento saḷāyatanavibhattimeva desesi.
atk-s0401a:1187_6: Citto gahapati purimabhave madditasaṅkhāratāya nacirasseva anāgāmiphalaṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0401a:1187_7: Athekadivasaṃ isidattatthero tattha gantvā viharanto seṭṭhissa nivesane bhattakiccapariyosāne āyasmatā
atk-s0401a:1187_8: therena pañhaṃ vissajjetuṃ asakkontena ajjhiṭṭho upāsakassa pañhaṃ vissajjetvā tena pubbe gihisahāyakabhāve
atk-s0401a:1187_9: ñāte “na idāni idha vatthabba”nti yathāsukhaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:1187_13: Sopi tassa tejosamāpattipāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā “idāni idha vasituṃ na yutta”nti yathāsukhaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:1188_0: Athekadivasaṃ dve aggasāvakā bhikkhusahassaparivārā ambāṭakārāmaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1188_3: Sudhammatthero taṃ asahamāno seṭṭhiṃ tilasaṅgulikāvādena khuṃsetvā tena paṇāmito satthu santikaṃ gantvā
atk-s0401a:1188_4: ovādaṃ labhitvā dasabalassa ovāde ṭhito cittaṃ gahapatiṃ khamāpetvā tattheva ambāṭakārāme viharanto vipassanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1188_8: satthu santikaṃ gacchantena pana ayuttaṃ tucchahatthena gantu”nti pañcahi sakaṭasatehi telamadhuphāṇitādīni ādāya “ye dasabalaṃ passitukāmā,
atk-s0401a:1188_9: te mayā saddhiṃ āgacchantū”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā dvīhi purisasahassehi parivuto satthāraṃ passituṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0401a:1188_11: So satthu santikaṃ gantvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena satthāraṃ vandi,
atk-s0401a:1188_12: tasmiṃ khaṇe ākāsā pañcavaṇṇānaṃ pupphānaṃ vassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0401a:1189_1: Tassa aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ dasabalassa dānaṃ dentassāpi sakanivesanato nītāni taṇḍulatelamadhuphāṇitādīni na khīyiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1189_3: So satthāraṃ passitvā attano nagaraṃ gacchanto sakaṭehi ābhataṃ sabbaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa adāsi.
atk-s0401a:1189_4: Sakaṭesu tucchesu jātamattesveva devatā satta ratanāni pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1189_5: Mahājanantare kathā udapādi “yāva sakkārasammānappatto vatāyaṃ citto gahapatī”ti.
atk-s0401a:1189_6: Taṃ sutvā satthā dhammapade imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0401a:1191_0: Yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattheva pūjito”ti. ;
atk-s0401a:1192_0: So tato paṭṭhāya ariyasāvakānaṃyeva upāsakānaṃ pañcahi satehi parivuto vicarati.
atk-s0401a:1192_1: Atha naṃ satthā aparabhāge upāsake paṭipāṭiyā ṭhānantare ṭhapento cittasaṃyuttaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā dhammakathikānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1194_1: Catutthe catūhi saṅgahavatthūhīti catubbidhena saṅgahavatthunā parisaṃ saṅgaṇhantānaṃ hatthako āḷavako aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1194_2: Ayaṃ kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulaghare nibbatto aparabhāge satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇanto
atk-s0401a:1194_3: satthāraṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi samannāgataṃ ekaṃ upāsakaṃ ṭhānantare ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ
atk-s0401a:1194_5: So kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde āḷaviraṭṭhe āḷavinagare āḷavakassa rañño gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0401a:1194_6: sve bhattacāṭiyā saddhiṃ āḷavakassa pesetabbo ahosi.
atk-s0401a:1195_1: ekadivasaṃ kira āḷavako rājā migavatthāya araññaṃ gantvā ekaṃ migaṃ anubandhitvā ghātetvā chinditvā dhanukoṭiyaṃ
atk-s0401a:1195_2: lagetvā nivattetvā āgacchanto vātātapena kilantakāyo ekaṃ sandacchāyaṃ nigrodharukkhamūlaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1195_3: Atha naṃ muhuttaṃ darathaṃ vinodetvā nikkhamantaṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā “tiṭṭha tiṭṭha,
atk-s0401a:1195_5: So daḷhaṃ gahitattā aññaṃ upāyaṃ apassanto “devasikaṃ te ekekapurisena saddhiṃ cāṭibhattaṃ pesessāmī”ti vatvā nagaraṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:1195_6: Tato paṭṭhāya bandhanāgārato ekekamanussena saddhiṃ cāṭibhattaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0401a:1195_7: Eteneva niyāmena bandhanāgāre manussesu khīṇesu “mahallakamanussesu gayhamānesu raṭṭhakhobho hotī”ti te aggahetvā daharakumāre gaṇhituṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1195_8: Tato paṭṭhāya nagare dārakamātaro ca gabbhiniyo ca aññaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0401a:1196_0: Tasmiṃ samaye satthā paccūsasamayante lokaṃ volokento āḷavakakumārassa tiṇṇaṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayaṃ
atk-s0401a:1196_1: disvā “ayaṃ kumāro kappasatasahassaṃ patthitapatthano devalokā cavitvā āḷavakarañño gehe nibbatto,
atk-s0401a:1196_2: aññaṃ kumāraṃ alabhantā sve kumāraṃ cāṭibhattena saddhiṃ gahetvā gacchissantī”ti cintetvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0401a:1196_3: aññātakavesena āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavanadvāraṃ gantvā tassa dovārikaṃ gadrabhaṃ nāma yakkhaṃ bhavanaṃ
atk-s0401a:1196_6: mayhaṃ pana āḷavakassa anārocanaṃ nāma ayutta”nti.
atk-s0401a:1196_7: So himavante yakkhasamāgamaṃ gatassa āḷavakassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0401a:1196_8: Satthāpi taṃ bhavanaṃ pavisitvā āḷavakassa nisīdanapallaṅke nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1197_0: Tasmiṃ samaye sātāgirahemavatā āḷavakassa bhavanamatthakena yakkhasamāgamaṃ gacchantā attano gamane asampajjamāne
atk-s0401a:1197_1: “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti āvajjentā satthāraṃ āḷavakassa bhavane nisinnaṃ disvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā
atk-s0401a:1197_5: yassa te sadevake loke aggapuggalo bhavane nisinno,
atk-s0401a:1197_8: “ime ekassa muṇḍakasamaṇassa mama pallaṅke nisinnabhāvaṃ kathentī”ti anattamano kodhābhibhūto hutvā “ajja
atk-s0401a:1197_9: mayhaṃ etena samaṇena saddhiṃ saṅgāmo bhavissati,
atk-s0401a:1197_10: tattha me sahāyā nāma hothā”ti dakkhiṇapādaṃ ukkhipitvā saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ pabbatakūṭaṃ akkami,
atk-s0401a:1197_13: Āḷavako pana sabbarattiṃ tathāgatena saddhiṃ nānappakārena yujjhantopi kiñci kātuṃ asakkonto satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭha pañhe pucchi,
atk-s0401a:1198_0: Punadivase uṭṭhite aruṇe cāṭibhattāharaṇavelāya sakalanagare gahetabbayuttaṃ dārakaṃ adisvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1198_2: “gaṇhituṃ ayuttaṭṭhāne pana atthi, tātā”ti. Āma, deva,
atk-s0401a:1198_7: Te deviyā vikkandamānāya dārakaṃ gahetvā cāṭibhattena saddhiṃ āḷavakassa bhavanadvāraṃ gantvā “handa, ayya,
atk-s0401a:1198_9: Āḷavako tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā ariyasāvakattā lajjamāno adhomukho nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1198_14: Te rājapurisā āḷavakakumāraṃ āḷavakassa hatthe ṭhapesuṃ,
atk-s0401a:1198_15: āḷavako taṃ ādāya dasabalassa hatthe ṭhapesi,
atk-s0401a:1198_16: satthā paṭiggaṇhitvā puna āḷavakassa hatthe ṭhapesi,
atk-s0401a:1198_17: āḷavako taṃ gahetvā rājapurisānaṃ hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0401a:1198_18: Itissa hatthato hatthaṃ gatattā “hatthako āḷavako”tveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1199_0: Atha naṃ te rājapurisā tuṭṭhamānasā ādāya rañño santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1199_1: Rājā taṃ disvā “ajja cāṭibhattaṃ na sampaṭicchatī”ti saññaṃ katvā “kasmā, tātā,
atk-s0401a:1199_4: satthā āḷavakassa bhavane nisīditvā āḷavakaṃ dametvā upāsakatte patiṭṭhāpetvā kumāraṃ amhākaṃ dāpesīti.
atk-s0401a:1199_5: Satthāpi āḷavakaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā āḷavinagarābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0401a:1199_9: nagaravāsino maṃ nissāya mātimaraṇaṃ pitimaraṇaṃ puttadāramaraṇañca pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0401a:1199_10: Te maṃ passitvā daṇḍehipi leḍḍūhipi paharissanti.
atk-s0401a:1199_12: natthi te mayā saddhiṃ gacchantassa bhayaṃ,
atk-s0401a:1199_13: vissattho ehī”ti vatvā nagarassa avidūre ṭhāne vanasaṇḍe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0401a:1199_14: Āḷavakarājāpi nāgare gahetvā satthu paccuggamanaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:1199_17: Te āḷavakassa tattheva vasanaṭṭhānaṃ katvā anusaṃvaccharaṃ balikammaṃ paṭṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0401a:1200_1: Sopi āḷavakakumāro vuḍḍhippatto satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā tīṇi maggaphalāni paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0401a:1200_2: So sabbakālaṃ ariyasāvakaupāsakānaṃ pañcahi satehi parivuto carati.
atk-s0401a:1200_3: Athekadivasaṃ tehi upāsakehi saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0401a:1200_4: Satthā suvinītaṃ parisaṃ disvā “mahatī te, āḷavaka, parisā,
atk-s0401a:1200_8: uppannesu kiccesu tesaṃ nittharaṇena tussantaṃ uppannakiccanittharaṇena saṅgaṇhāmi,
atk-s0401a:1200_11: Atha satthā aparabhāge jetavane nisīditvā upāsake ṭhānantaresu ṭhapento hatthakaṃ āḷavakaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi
atk-s0401a:1202_1: Pañcame paṇītadāyakānanti paṇītarasadāyakānaṃ mahānāmo sakko aggoti dasseti.
atk-s0401a:1202_2: So kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0401a:1202_3: upāsakaṃ paṇītarasadāyakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:1202_4: So kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthupure sakyarājakule nibbattitvā
atk-s0401a:1203_0: Athekasmiṃ samaye satthā verañjāyaṃ vassāvāsaṃ vasitvā anupubbena kapilavatthupuraṃ gantvā nigrodhārāme paṭivasati.
atk-s0401a:1203_1: Mahānāmo “satthā āgato”ti sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisinno satthāraṃ evamāha –
atk-s0401a:1203_3: mama catumāsaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa paṭijaggane paṭiññaṃ detha,
atk-s0401a:1203_6: So satthu adhivāsanaṃ viditvā punadivasato paṭṭhāya buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṇītarasabhojanacatumadhurādīhi
atk-s0401a:1203_7: paṭijaggitvā puna catumāsaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā aṭṭha māse pūretvā puna catumāsaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā sakalasaṃvaccharaṃ
atk-s0401a:1203_10: Mahānāmo pana tato paṭṭhāya aparāparaṃ sampattabhikkhusaṅghassa teneva niyāmena sakkāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0401a:1203_11: Tassa so guṇo sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo jāto.
atk-s0401a:1203_13: Satthā pana aparabhāge jetavane nisīditvā mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ paṇītadāyakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
atk-s0401a:1205_1: Chaṭṭhe manāpadāyakānanti manāpaṃ cittarucitabhojanaṃ dāyakānaṃ uggo gahapati,
atk-s0401a:1205_3: So kira padumuttarabuddhakāle haṃsavatiyaṃ kulagehe nibbatto aparabhāge satthu dhammakathaṃ suṇanto satthāraṃ
atk-s0401a:1205_4: ekaṃ upāsakaṃ manāpadāyakānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapentaṃ disvā adhikārakammaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ patthesi.
atk-s0401a:1205_5: So kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde vesāliyaṃ seṭṭhikule nibbatti.
atk-s0401a:1205_7: Aparabhāge panassa attabhāvopi uggato ahosi samiddho,
atk-s0401a:1205_8: alaṅkatatoraṇaṃ viya ussitacittapaṭo viya ca ativirocittha.
atk-s0401a:1205_10: So imesaṃ dvinnampi uggatattā uggaseṭṭhitveva saṅkhaṃ gato.
atk-s0401a:1205_11: So panāyaṃ dasabalassa paṭhamadassaneyeva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya aparabhāge tīṇipi maggaphalāni sacchākāsi.
atk-s0401a:1205_12: So attano mahallakakāle rahogato nisīditvā cintesi –
atk-s0401a:1205_15: idaṃ me satthu sammukhāpi sutaṃ ‘manāpadāyī labhate manāpa”’nti.
atk-s0401a:1205_17: “api nu kho me cittaṃ jānitvā satthāpi nivesanadvāraṃ āgaccheyyā”ti.
atk-s0401a:1206_0: Satthāpi kho tassa cittaṃ ñatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nivesanadvāreyeva pāturahosi.
atk-s0401a:1206_1: So “satthā āgato”ti sutvā ativiya ussāhajāto dasabalassa santikaṃ gantvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā satthu
atk-s0401a:1206_2: pattaṃ paṭiggahetvā gharaṃ pavesetvā paññattavarabuddhāsane satthāraṃ,
atk-s0401a:1206_3: avasesaāsanesu bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nānaggarasehi parivisitvā bhattakiccapariyosāne ekamantaṃ nisīditvā evamāha –
